T02D2512-1:90b-45: bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas sdig pa thams
T02D2512-1:90b-47: rdo rje bcings pa bsdams byas te //
T02D2512-1:90b-48: gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas ni //
T02D2512-1:90b-49: tha ma bzhi ni rtse mo sbyar //
T02D2512-1:91a-2: de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje la h'um yid kyis mngon par bris nas /
T02D2512-1:91a-3: de nyid yid la gdon par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:91a-4: de nas yi ge h'um de dang dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug gis /
T02D2512-1:91a-5: rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur yongs su gyur pa rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:91a-6: de'i steng du yang yi ge h'um dang ka la
T02D2512-1:91a-7: sogs pa rnams kyis skar ma lta bu'i zla ba'i
T02D2512-1:91a-8: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:91a-9: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis po de nyid h'um dang bcas pa yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D2512-1:91a-10: dang po'i rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D2512-1:91a-11: rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge h'um bsams te /
T02D2512-1:91a-12: rdo rje ni bdag go zhes bsgoms nas /
T02D2512-1:91a-13: rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams sbrul la /
T02D2512-1:91a-14: des sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid du bskyed nas /
T02D2512-1:91a-15: de rnams rdo rje der bcug nas rdo rje chen po de /
T02D2512-1:91a-16: bdag ni sems dpa' kun bdag grags //
T02D2512-1:91a-17: bdag nyid kyang ni bdag la gnas //
T02D2512-1:91a-18: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D2512-1:91a-19: sems dpa' ni bdag go zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:91a-21: badzra satva hom zhes brjod la /
T02D2512-1:91a-22: bzlas ma thag tu bsgoms pa'i rdo rje chen po //
T02D2512-1:91a-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su bsam mo //
T02D2512-1:91a-24: de nas snyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor la /
T02D2512-1:91a-25: yang sgrub pa pos badzra satva hom zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:91a-26: de ltar sems dpar byin gyis rlob pa'i sbyor bas /
T02D2512-1:91a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:91a-28: de thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid so sor snang zhing ;
T02D2512-1:91a-29: gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar bsams la /
T02D2512-1:91a-30: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:91a-31: ma h'a sa ma ya sa tva ham /
T02D2512-1:91a-32: de nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:91a-34: de nyid kyis snying ga dang /
T02D2512-1:91a-37: spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:91a-38: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am /
T02D2512-1:91a-39: de nas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas la /
T02D2512-1:91a-40: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dril bu blangs la snyems par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:91a-41: lag pa g-yas pas dang po'i rdo rje blangs nas gsor nas /
T02D2512-1:91a-42: rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis gzhag par bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:91b-0: h'um 'don pas 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya @91b chen po ste /
T02D2512-1:91b-1: de lta bu'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:91b-3: mdun du sna tshogs padma'i gdan la rdo rje bsams nas /
T02D2512-1:91b-4: h'um brjod de rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02D2512-1:91b-6: yang h'um de nyid zlos shing badzra satva ham zhes brjod la /
T02D2512-1:91b-7: rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du bsgoms la /
T02D2512-1:91b-8: de nyid du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas
T02D2512-1:91b-9: snying po dang phyag rgya dang bcas pa 'di dag
T02D2512-1:91b-13: dbang du bya ba byas te badzra aam ku sha dza: badzra p'a sha h'um /
T02D2512-1:91b-16: de nas 'di dag gi phyag rgya bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:91b-17: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las byung ba'i mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings la /
T02D2512-1:91b-18: mthe'u chung lcags kyu chen por bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:91b-19: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:91b-20: mkhrig ma mdud pa ni zhags pa'i'o //
T02D2512-1:91b-21: mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o //
T02D2512-1:91b-22: rgyab gnyis bsnyams te mnan pa ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:91b-23: de nas dang po'i rdo rje bcings la h'um dri shya zhes bya bas /
T02D2512-1:91b-24: bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:91b-25: ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas /
T02D2512-1:91b-26: rang gi lus la bsgom par bya //
T02D2512-1:91b-27: bkug cing bcug la bcing ba dang //
T02D2512-1:91b-28: dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya //
T02D2512-1:91b-29: h'um dang gsang ba'i lcags kyu dang po'i rdo rjes
T02D2512-1:91b-30: gung mo rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis su byas la
T02D2512-1:91b-31: / de dang dgug pa'i sbyor bas /
T02D2512-1:91b-32: rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:91b-33: yang dang po'i rdo rje bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:91b-34: sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod de /
T02D2512-1:91b-35: rgyab tu 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
T02D2512-1:91b-36: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par gyur pa dang /
T02D2512-1:91b-37: bdag nyid dang lhan cig tu gyur par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:91b-38: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02D2512-1:91b-39: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes lan gsum brjod pas /
T02D2512-1:91b-40: mdzub bcas zla ba'i mdog can la //
T02D2512-1:91b-41: rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog / rdo rje phreng sogs kyis spras shing //
T02D2512-1:91b-43: ces bya ba sna tshogs padma la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D2512-1:91b-44: dga' ba chen pos gzigs pa zhal 'dzum zhing rnam par g-yo ba bsams la /
T02D2512-1:91b-45: mig gnyis su h'um gnyis bsams nas /
T02D2512-1:91b-46: lce la yang h'um bkod de /
T02D2512-1:91b-47: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2512-1:91b-48: rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya gar las byung
T02D2512-1:92a-1: bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:92a-2: yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis dza: h'um bom ho: zhes brjod la /
T02D2512-1:92a-3: rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug la sbyor ba 'di dang /
T02D2512-1:92a-4: phyag rgya 'dis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:92a-5: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:92a-7: badzra dh'a tu dri shya dza: h'um bom ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2512-1:92a-10: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a yo g'i shva ri h'um zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T02D2512-1:92a-11: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2512-1:92a-14: don yod grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:92a-16: aom badzra dh'a tu dri shya /
T02D2512-1:92a-17: dza: h'um bom ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2512-1:92a-19: aa ham badzra dh'a tu zhes lan gsum brjod do //
T02D2512-1:92a-20: yang de rnams kyi gsang sngags ni /
T02D2512-1:92a-24: aom badzra karma h'um zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:92a-25: 'di dag ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sngags yin no //
T02D2512-1:92a-26: de nas de rnams kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:92a-28: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i //
T02D2512-1:92a-29: rdo rje sems ma brtan byas la //
T02D2512-1:92a-30: gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam bsgreng //
T02D2512-1:92a-31: gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni //
T02D2512-1:92a-32: sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par bshad //
T02D2512-1:92a-33: gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang //
T02D2512-1:92a-34: gung mo padma 'dra bar dgug / sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D2512-1:92a-35: de bzhin mdzub mo bkug pa'o //
T02D2512-1:92a-36: de nas badzra dzny'a na zhes bya ba'i chos kyi
T02D2512-1:92a-37: phyag rgya de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ljags la bsams
T02D2512-1:92a-38: nas / de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:92a-39: de la 'di dag ni rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba ste /
T02D2512-1:92a-40: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
T02D2512-1:92a-41: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
T02D2512-1:92a-42: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste //
T02D2512-1:92a-43: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
T02D2512-1:92a-44: mi g-yo ba yi sa la reg / rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o /
T02D2512-1:92a-45: tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog gdon mi za bar mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02D2512-1:92a-47: de bas na go rims ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2512-1:92a-48: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas don yong
T02D2512-1:92a-49: grub pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar du /
T02D2512-1:92a-50: badzra dh'a tu zhes bya ba thun mong gi snying pos byang chub mchog dang /
T02D2512-1:92a-51: sa gnon pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang rab tu sbyar ro //
T02D2512-1:92b-0: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thun @92b
T02D2512-1:92b-1: mong gi snying pos sngags pas rang gi snying gar
T02D2512-1:92b-2: rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02D2512-1:92b-3: mtshan ma rnams dang bcas par rab tu sbyar na /
T02D2512-1:92b-5: de nas dang po'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:92b-6: badzra satva tve no pa tishtha zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:92b-7: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la dang po'i rdo rje bskyed do //
T02D2512-1:92b-8: badzra ratna aa dhi tishtha zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:92b-9: dpral ba'i phyogs su rdo rje rin chen /
T02D2512-1:92b-10: badzra dharma aa dhi tishtha zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:92b-12: badzra karma aa dhi tishtha zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:92b-13: spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:92b-14: de nas aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02D2512-1:92b-17: tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D2512-1:92b-18: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D2512-1:92b-19: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D2512-1:92b-20: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D2512-1:92b-23: tsittam shre yam: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho //
T02D2512-1:92b-24: bha ga b'ana sarba ta th'a ga ta /
T02D2512-1:92b-26: badzr'i bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a:
T02D2512-1:92b-27: zhes bya ba'i yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o
T02D2512-1:92b-28: // de nas rdo rje thal mo lan gsum bskor nas /
T02D2512-1:92b-29: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag bcal dbang bskur ba blang bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:92b-30: aom sarba buddha bha ba ratna sanytsa ya /
T02D2512-1:92b-31: pra tyuta da bi bya mu ku ta n'a ma /
T02D2512-1:92b-33: pra ba ra badzra dha ra shr'i badzra satva sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2512-1:92b-36: dang po kho nar sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:92b-37: de yang spyi gtsug tu bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gser gyi mdog can /
T02D2512-1:92b-38: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:92b-39: aom bh'u kham aa bhi shinytsa mam zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-1:92b-40: dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa sku mdog dkar pos gnon gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:92b-41: badzra satva aa bhi sh'inytsa mam zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-1:92b-42: rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du rin chen 'byung gnas bee d'urya sngo bsangs kyi mdog can /
T02D2512-1:92b-43: mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:92b-44: badzra ratna aa bhi sh'inytsa mam zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-1:92b-45: ltag par 'od dpag tu med pa btsag yug snam gyi mdog can /
T02D2512-1:92b-46: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:92b-47: badzra dharma aa bhi sh'inytsa mam zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-1:92b-48: rna ba g-yon pa'i sted du don yod grub pa
T02D2512-1:92b-49: sna tshogs pa'i mdog can mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i
T02D2512-1:92b-50: phyag rgyas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:92b-51: phyag rgya 'di dang ldan pas badzra karma aa bhi sh'inytsa mam zhes brjod de /
T02D2512-1:93a-1: yang zhal dkar po dpung pa'i mtha' nas phyag gnyis pa la sha'i mdog can /
T02D2512-1:93a-2: lhag ma ni kha dog sngon po //
T02D2512-1:93a-3: zhal gyi 'og nas lte ba'i mthar thug pa'i bar ni dmar skya /
T02D2512-1:93a-5: bus mo man chad kha dog dkar po'i mdog dang
T02D2512-1:93a-6: ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa bskyed
T02D2512-1:93a-7: par bya'o // de nas de rnams kyi phyag rgya bshad bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:93a-8: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bo gnyis bsnol bar byas la /
T02D2512-1:93a-9: mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo nang du bkug nas /
T02D2512-1:93a-10: gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs dang por sbyar ba 'di ni /
T02D2512-1:93a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog ces bya ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:93a-12: de nas phyogs thams cad du cod pan bcings la /
T02D2512-1:93a-13: mdun du rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mdud pa
T02D2512-1:93a-14: byed pa lta bus phreng ba bcing ba byas la
T02D2512-1:93a-15: / rgyab tu de bzhin du mdud pa byas te /
T02D2512-1:93a-16: sgeg pa dang bcas pas mtha' ma la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:93a-17: las dgrol bas logs gnyis su dar dbyangs 'phyang bar
T02D2512-1:93a-18: byas la / mthar mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par byas te /
T02D2512-1:93a-19: badzra tushya ho zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-1:93a-20: de nas yang badzra ratna aa bhi sh'inytsa mam zhes bya bas /
T02D2512-1:93a-21: rdo rje rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:93a-22: de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bshad par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:93a-23: rdo rje thal mo kha thur du bstan la /
T02D2512-1:93a-25: mthe bong la rtse sbyar bar byas nas /
T02D2512-1:93a-26: de snying ga nas bteg ste dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gzhag pa 'di ni /
T02D2512-1:93a-27: rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:93a-28: de nas aom padma m'a la aa bhi sh'inytsa lo ke shva ra te /
T02D2512-1:93a-30: zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di dang /
T02D2512-1:93a-31: padma'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blang ba dang /
T02D2512-1:93a-34: phyag rgya 'dis sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:93a-35: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i //
T02D2512-1:93a-36: rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las /
T02D2512-1:93a-37: srin lag dang mthe'u chung bsnyams te brkyang la ba dan ltar byas te /
T02D2512-1:93a-38: de ltar na rnal 'byor pa rdo rje'i phreng ba la sogs pas sbras par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:93a-39: de nas yi ge gnyis kyis snga ma bzhin du go cha byas la /
T02D2512-1:93a-40: h'um zlos bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje'i dbang dang bdag po'i dbang blang la /
T02D2512-1:93a-41: rdo rje rang gi mgo la gzhag la h'um de
T02D2512-1:93a-42: nyid zlos shing ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar
T02D2512-1:93b-0: bya'o // @93b de nas 'dis dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:93b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02D2512-1:93b-2: aa bhi sh'inytsa mi ma h'a badzra dha ra /
T02D2512-1:93b-3: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D2512-1:93b-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje yin //
T02D2512-1:93b-5: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2512-1:93b-6: rdo rje 'chang chen brtul zhugs yin //
T02D2512-1:93b-7: rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
T02D2512-1:93b-8: thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po'i mchog
T02D2512-1:93b-9: ste / 'di yongs su mi spong bas 'di rtag tu chongs shig ces bya ba'i gsang ba'o //
T02D2512-1:93b-10: hr'i badzra garbha pa ti aa ti shr'i he badzra
T02D2512-1:93b-11: n'a ma siddhya sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba:
T02D2512-1:93b-12: sva:/ de nas rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:93b-13: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bdag nyid yang dag par
T02D2512-1:93b-14: sva:/ mchod la / de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
T02D2512-1:93b-15: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2512-1:93b-16: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02D2512-1:93b-17: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02D2512-1:93b-18: de ltar bdag nyid bskyed nas /
T02D2512-1:93b-19: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:93b-21: g-yas pa'i mig tu ta las zla ba bya /
T02D2512-1:93b-22: g-yon par ma bkod la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed /
T02D2512-1:93b-23: h'um gis mig 'bras dus mtha'i me lta bur //
T02D2512-1:93b-24: gnas pa 'di ni rdo rje'i lta ba bya //
T02D2512-1:93b-25: de nas yid kyis nam mkha'i phyogs la 'dug ste /
T02D2512-1:93b-26: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor la h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa /
T02D2512-1:93b-27: de'i dbus su yi ger bsams la /
T02D2512-1:93b-28: de las dus mtha'i rlung gis sbar ba'i sreg pa'i
T02D2512-1:93b-29: bskal pa'i me lta bu'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od

T02D2512-1:99b-17: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya

T02D2512-1:99b-20: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dgrol bas badzra mu: zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-1:99b-21: de nas snying gnas byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen
T02D2512-1:99b-22: gyi phyag rgyas rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na
T02D2512-1:99b-24: mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba 'ching ba'i tshul du bcing zhing /
T02D2512-1:99b-25: de bzhin du go cha bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:99b-26: de nas aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya
T02D2512-1:99b-27: ba ni phyag rgya thams cad dbang bskur ba'i snying
T02D2512-1:99b-28: po'o // sarba mu dra mee tri ku ru ba
T02D2512-1:99b-29: ra ka ba tse na bam zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:99b-30: go cha bcing ba'i snying po'o //
T02D2512-1:99b-31: de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-1:99b-32: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02D2512-1:99b-34: mthe bong gnyis dang rtse sbyar ba'o //
T02D2512-1:99b-35: de nas mnyam pa'i thal mo brdabs pas mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:99b-36: de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i phyir bskul bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:99b-37: thog mthar rab dga'i ngo bo brtan //
T02D2512-1:99b-39: sems dpa' chen po brtan mdzod la //
T02D2512-1:99b-40: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2512-1:99b-42: me tog gi thal mo gyen du dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:99b-43: h'um mu: yang zhes brjod nas des ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa gshegs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:100a-0: ji ltar mngon par sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor @100a * //
T02D2512-1:100a-1: gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo yang yid kyis
T02D2512-1:100a-2: legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas rang gi lus
T02D2512-1:100a-3: la bcug la yi ge brgya pa dang /
T02D2512-1:100a-4: rdo rje sems dpa' lan gsum bzlas te /
T02D2512-1:100a-7: rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas bdag nyid bsrung bar byas la /
T02D2512-1:100a-8: langs te mchod rten gyi las dang /
T02D2512-1:100a-9: glegs bam bklag pa la sogs pa'i dge pa'i bya ba la sbyor ba ci bder gnas par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:100a-10: de ltar nyin re zhing byas nas /
T02D2512-1:100a-11: ji srid zla ba gcig gam /
T02D2512-1:100a-14: dus ji srid du nyin re'i sbyor bas dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa'am /
T02D2512-1:100a-15: rnal 'byor chen pos ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ba'am /
T02D2512-1:100a-16: rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:100a-20: dus ji srid kyis rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:100a-21: mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de'i bar du
T02D2512-1:100a-22: bsgom par bya'o // gang zhig sgom par byed par
T02D2512-1:100a-23: mi nus pa des ni rnal 'byor chen po byas
T02D2512-1:100a-24: bsgom par bya'o // la / sngags thams cad kyi
T02D2512-1:100a-25: bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
T02D2512-1:100a-26: bsgom par bya'o // la / so // de la
T02D2512-1:100a-27: rnal 'byor chen po 'di nyid bshad par bya ste
T02D2512-1:100a-28: bsgom par bya'o // la / so // / bdag
T02D2512-1:100a-29: bsrung ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba nas
T02D2512-1:100a-31: dam tshig sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i bar gyi
T02D2512-1:100a-32: cho ga rnams rjes su spyad la /
T02D2512-1:100a-33: de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po bcings la nam
T02D2512-1:100a-34: mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus la
T02D2512-1:100a-36: dang po'i rdo rje bcings te /
T02D2512-1:100a-37: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa dang mnyam
T02D2512-1:100a-38: pa'i rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D2512-1:100a-39: snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul la
T02D2512-1:100a-40: / ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te /
T02D2512-1:100a-41: rang gi mgo la me tog gi phreng ba dor la /
T02D2512-1:100a-42: rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:100a-43: de nas dngos grub kyi brtul zhugs blang ba'i bar gyi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad la /
T02D2512-1:100a-44: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang
T02D2512-1:100a-45: gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas su hri
T02D2512-1:100a-46: las sna tshogs pa'i padma'i gdan bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:100a-47: dkyil 'khor de rang gi lus la chu dang 'o
T02D2512-1:100a-48: ma bzhin du gcig tu gyur pa'i rnam par bsams
T02D2512-1:100a-49: la / rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i dbyibs
T02D2512-1:100a-50: la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings
T02D2512-1:100b-0: la / nas / h'um zlos @100b shing 'dug pa'i rnal 'byor pas gzhi'i lus la /
T02D2512-1:100b-1: phyi rol du nam mkha'i phyogs su h'um aa zhes
T02D2512-1:100b-2: bya bas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje chen
T02D2512-1:100b-3: po sna tshogs padma'i steng du bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:100b-4: h'um badzro hom zhes bsgoms la /
T02D2512-1:100b-5: rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:100b-6: de bzhin du rang gi lus la ji srid rdo
T02D2512-1:100b-7: rje'i ro'i gnas su rdo rje ro'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-1:100b-8: po bcings la / h'um zlos shing 'dug pa'i rnal
T02D2512-1:100b-9: 'byor pas gzhi'i lus las phyi rol du nam mkha'i
T02D2512-1:100b-10: phyogs la h'um aa zhes bya bas /
T02D2512-1:100b-11: rdo rje ro'i rdo rje'i snod sna tshogs padma'i steng du bsams la /
T02D2512-1:100b-12: h'um badzra sa ra bhanytsa nam aa ham zhes bsgom par bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:100b-13: ro rdo rje'i snod de ro rdo rje ni bdag po zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:100b-14: de bzhin du lha thams cad kyi gzugs mdun du sprul la /
T02D2512-1:100b-15: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang /
T02D2512-1:100b-19: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la h'um dri shya zhes bya bas thams cad blta bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:100b-20: de nas sngar bshad pa'i gsang ba'i lcags kyu dang /
T02D2512-1:100b-21: h'um gi rang rang gi gnas su thams cad bcug la /
T02D2512-1:100b-22: yang dang po'i rdo rje bcings la /
T02D2512-1:100b-23: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes lan gsum brjod pa dang /
T02D2512-1:100b-24: sa ma ya satvam zhes bya bas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:100b-26: aa ham h'um zhes brjod de /
T02D2512-1:100b-27: lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs dang /
T02D2512-1:100b-28: lhan cig gcig tu gyur pas /
T02D2512-1:100b-29: bdag nyid rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid yin par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:100b-30: de nas lha thams cad kyi ljags la h'um bsams la /
T02D2512-1:100b-31: snga ma bzhin du lha thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:100b-32: phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:100b-33: de nas lha thams cad kyi sku dang gzhi'i lus
T02D2512-1:100b-34: la yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas
T02D2512-1:100b-35: snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad bcug la
T02D2512-1:100b-36: / phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:100b-37: de nas gnas kyi nges pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:100b-38: sngags pa'i snying ga'i zla pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun
T02D2512-1:100b-39: du bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang
T02D2512-1:100b-41: rdo rje yid las byung ba bsam par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:100b-42: dpral bar k'i li k'i la dang /
T02D2512-1:100b-44: lkog ma'i phyogs su 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /
T02D2512-1:100b-46: spyi bor rdo rje snyems pa'o //
T02D2512-1:100b-47: mgo bo la rdo rje dpyid ngo //
T02D2512-1:101a-0: @101a * // mdoms kyi gsang bar rdo rje sprin no //
T02D2512-1:101a-1: mig gnyis su rdo rje ston ka'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-2: nu ma dang brang dang snying ga rnams su rdo rje dgun no //
T02D2512-1:101a-3: rdo rje sems dpa'i g-yon logs su ni rdo rje sgeg mo'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-4: sngags pa'i so'i phreng ba gnyis la ni rdo rje bzhad pa mo'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-5: rdo rje chos kyi g-yon logs su ni rdo rje glu mkhan ma'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-6: rdo rje snyems pa'i g-yon logs su ni /
T02D2512-1:101a-8: sngags pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched la ni rdo rje'i gzugs so //
T02D2512-1:101a-9: sgra'i skye mched la ni rdo rje sgra'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-10: dri'i skye mched la ni rdo rje dri'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-11: ro'i skye mched la ni rdo rje ro dgod par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-12: ye shes kyi nang du ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo //
T02D2512-1:101a-13: phrag pa gnyis ni nam mkha'i mdzod do //
T02D2512-1:101a-14: lte ba la ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-15: rked pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02D2512-1:101a-16: khar ni rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
T02D2512-1:101a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thams cad du khyab
T02D2512-1:101a-18: pa yin pas de rnams kyi gnas nges pa yod
T02D2512-1:101a-20: phyag rgya dgrol ba'i dus su yang bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-1:101a-21: rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyi bo'i gtsug gi gnas
T02D2512-1:101a-22: su dgrol ba'o // mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-23: rin chen 'byung ldan ni k'i li k'i la'i gnas su'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-24: 'od dpag tu med pa ni rdo rje sdug pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-25: don yod grub pa ni rdo rje snyems pa'i gnas su dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-26: de nas de bzhin du dang po'i rdo rje snying ga dang /
T02D2512-1:101a-29: spyi bo rnams su byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:101a-30: yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:101a-31: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur nas ;
T02D2512-1:101a-32: go cha mchog gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid go bgo bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-33: de nas de bzhin du dngos grub dang /
T02D2512-1:101a-34: brtul zhugs blang ba'i bar gyi cho ga thams cad byas nas /
T02D2512-1:101a-35: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pas las kyi phyag
T02D2512-1:101a-36: rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid yang dag
T02D2512-1:101a-37: par mchod la / mchod pa de rnams rang gi gnas su bzhag ste /
T02D2512-1:101a-38: rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i rab tu 'dud pa dang ldan pas kyang /
T02D2512-1:101a-39: phyag byas la phyag rgya chen por bsgoms te /
T02D2512-1:101a-40: de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:101a-41: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2512-1:101a-42: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2512-1:101b-0: kun du bzang po kun bdag @101b nyid ;
T02D2512-1:101b-1: / rdo rje snyems pa bdag po'i bdag / bcom
T02D2512-1:101b-2: ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu nyid do
T02D2512-1:101b-3: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid do //
T02D2512-1:101b-4: yi ge h'um ni rdo rje'i sa bon no //
T02D2512-1:101b-5: aa las dril bu rdo rje snyems mar bsams la /
T02D2512-1:101b-6: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:101b-7: bcom ldan 'das mchog de nyid ni //
T02D2512-1:101b-8: srid pa'i bdag po kun gyi mchog / dam pa'i
T02D2512-1:101b-9: dbang phyug dam chos mchog / bde gshegs bka' bzhin
T02D2512-1:101b-10: byed pa'o // srid pa rang bzhin dag pa ste //
T02D2512-1:101b-11: do bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D2512-1:101b-12: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02D2512-1:101b-13: srid pa mchog tu byed par 'gyur //
T02D2512-1:101b-14: dril bu 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid de //
T02D2512-1:101b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa byed pa'am /
T02D2512-1:101b-16: lha rnams bsgrub pa na dkrol bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:101b-17: des ni chos thams cad khong du chud pa la
T02D2512-1:101b-18: 'jug pas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par
T02D2512-1:101b-19: byed cing / rdo rje thams cad dbab par bya ba rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang /
T02D2512-1:101b-21: bsgrub par bya ba rab tu grub par byed pa'i chos so //
T02D2512-1:101b-22: de nas dag pa'i thabs rtog pa thams cad kyi
T02D2512-1:101b-23: gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig rtag tu bsten par
T02D2512-1:101b-24: bya'o // de brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:101b-25: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02D2512-1:101b-26: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:101b-27: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D2512-1:101b-29: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis //
T02D2512-1:101b-30: ci 'dod par ni bsten nas su //
T02D2512-1:101b-31: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yi //
T02D2512-1:101b-32: bdag dang gzhan la mchod pa bya //
T02D2512-1:101b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang
T02D2512-1:101b-35: ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam
T02D2512-1:101b-36: tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das ni dam
T02D2512-1:101b-37: tshig go // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2512-1:101b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //
T02D2512-1:101b-39: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pa //
T02D2512-1:101b-40: phyag rgya dam tshig ces su bsgrags //
T02D2512-1:101b-41: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:101b-43: de la 'di skad ces kyang bshad de /
T02D2512-1:101b-44: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02D2512-1:101b-45: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe //
T02D2512-1:101b-46: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02D2512-1:101b-47: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D2512-1:101b-48: gsang ba dam pa dam tshig thabs //
T02D2512-1:101b-49: bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub byed cing //
T02D2512-1:101b-50: rtag tu dngos grub kun dbang phyug /
T02D2512-1:102a-0: @102a * // kun du 'gro ba'i don byed do //
T02D2512-1:102a-2: don 'di nyid gsal bar byed pa'i h'um yang bzlas par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:102a-4: de nas dam tshig gsum gyi glu dang /
T02D2512-1:102a-5: mchod pa dang dril bu dkrol bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:102a-6: aom nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02D2512-1:102a-7: thog ma tham med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02D2512-1:102a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2512-1:102a-9: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02D2512-1:102a-10: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02D2512-1:102a-11: mi 'gyur dam par bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2512-1:102a-12: khyod ni nyes bral dam pa ste //
T02D2512-1:102a-13: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes su mnyes //
T02D2512-1:102a-14: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02D2512-1:102a-15: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02D2512-1:102a-16: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas 'gro ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2512-1:102a-17: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2512-1:102a-18: byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod //
T02D2512-1:102a-19: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /
T02D2512-1:102a-20: dbang phyug che sogs phyag rgya yis //
T02D2512-1:102a-21: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas //
T02D2512-1:102a-22: rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag / de nas
T02D2512-1:102a-23: snga ma bzhin du badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes bya
T02D2512-1:102a-24: ba la sogs pa'i sngags gsum brjod la /
T02D2512-1:102a-25: de bzhin du nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas rang gi snying gar zhugs te /
T02D2512-1:102a-26: dang po'i rdo rje las sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag
T02D2512-1:102a-27: tu med pa'i tshad tsam gyi dpal rdo rje sems
T02D2512-1:102a-29: yang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen por bsams te /
T02D2512-1:102a-31: yid kyis de'i dbus su gnas la /
T02D2512-1:102a-32: rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D2512-1:102a-33: chu lha'i mthar thug pa'i bar du dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor bas h'um nyid kyis bcug la /
T02D2512-1:102a-34: badzra a'atma ko& ham la sogs pa sngags gsum brjod de /
T02D2512-1:102a-35: snga ma bzhin du dam tshig chen po'i de kho
T02D2512-1:102a-36: na nyid dang po'i rdo rjer byin gyis rlob pa'i
T02D2512-1:102a-37: dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid ni bdag yin no
T02D2512-1:102a-39: lha thams cad kyi thugs ka na yod pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su h'um bkod de /
T02D2512-1:102a-40: de bzhin du thams cad du bdag yin no zhes bsgom zhing zla ba gcig gam /
T02D2512-1:102a-43: dus ji srid kyis rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i
T02D2512-1:102a-44: dkyil 'khor chen po de mngon sum du mthong bar
T02D2512-1:102a-45: gyur pa de srid du bsgoms la /
T02D2512-1:102a-46: de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:102b-0: @102b sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2512-1:102b-1: de nas sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02D2512-1:102b-4: lo re zhing rnal 'byor chen po nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:102b-5: de la dad po lo kho nar yo byad thams cad dang yang dag par ldan pas /
T02D2512-1:102b-6: mngon par 'dod pa'i sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02D2512-1:102b-7: mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi cho gas dkyil 'khor

T02D2512-1:102b-45: ste / 'di yang 'dir sa sbyang ba'i cho ga'o //

T02D2512-1:103a-3: de nas lugs ma'am 'bur du brkos pa'am /
T02D2512-1:103a-4: ris su bris pa'i sangs rgyas dang /

T02D2512-1:103a-7: gyi ra ba nye bar mdzes par bya ba dang
T02D2512-1:103a-8: / rgyal mtshan gyi dam pa dang /

T02D2512-1:103a-21: mtshams bzhir spos khang gzhag pa dang /
T02D2512-1:103a-23: glu dang gar rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2512-1:103a-24: sa la lag pa bzhag ste /

T02D2512-1:103a-26: sa yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2512-1:103a-27: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:103a-28: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te /
T02D2512-1:103a-29: dang po'i rdo rjes dkyil 'khor sbrul la /
T02D2512-1:103a-30: phyag bya ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas
T02D2512-1:103a-31: sdom pa bzung nas lha'i rnal 'byor dang gzhal yas
T02D2512-1:103a-32: khad dang gdan rnams bskyed de /
T02D2512-1:103a-33: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:103a-34: 'di ltar bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:103a-35: deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02D2512-1:103a-36: bdag gis gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02D2512-1:103a-37: lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par //
T02D2512-1:103a-38: gyur pa bdag ni som nyi med //
T02D2512-1:103a-39: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02D2512-1:103a-40: mi ldog par ni bdag 'gyur te //
T02D2512-1:103a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02D2512-1:103a-42: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //

T02D2512-1:103a-44: bdag gis mchod sbyin bla na med //
T02D2512-1:103a-45: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02D2512-1:103a-46: deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no //
T02D2512-1:103a-47: de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la bdug spos phul te /
T02D2512-1:103a-48: sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:103a-49: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02D2512-1:103a-50: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02D2512-1:103a-51: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi //
T02D2512-1:103a-52: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //

T02D2512-1:103a-54: dngos grub 'dir ni stsal du gsol //
T02D2512-1:103b-0: @103b yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la /

T02D2512-1:103b-4: snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2512-1:103b-5: h'um zlos pa la brtson zhing phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:103b-6: de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:103b-7: bdag nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba gdab par gyur par bsams te /
T02D2512-1:103b-8: bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02D2512-1:103b-9: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D2512-1:103b-10: snying po 'di yi rtag pa nyid //
T02D2512-1:103b-11: bde chen myur du grub par mdzod //
T02D2512-1:103b-12: ces bya bas gsol ba gdab par bsam mo //
T02D2512-1:103b-13: de nas de las langs te /
T02D2512-1:103b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas te /
T02D2512-1:103b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' yongs su gang bar bsams la /
T02D2512-1:103b-16: bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02D2512-1:103b-17: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
T02D2512-1:103b-18: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02D2512-1:103b-19: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag nyid //
T02D2512-1:103b-20: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag / phyag na rdo rje brtan bdag ste //
T02D2512-1:103b-21: bdag po rdo rje chen por bdag / byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro //
T02D2512-1:103b-22: h'um zhes brjod par bya ba'o //
T02D2512-1:103b-23: mchog tu dam tshig gsum thob pa'i //
T02D2512-1:103b-24: slob dpon rang gi phyag rgya yis //
T02D2512-1:103b-25: rdo rje dril bu 'chang bya zhing //
T02D2512-1:103b-26: 'khor lo'i cho ga thams cad bya //
T02D2512-1:103b-27: rtog pa kun la mnyam 'jug pas //
T02D2512-1:103b-28: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02D2512-1:103b-29: dam tshig gsum zhes bya ba yi //
T02D2512-1:103b-30: rgya 'di gsang sngags sgrub byed pa'o //
T02D2512-1:103b-31: dngos grub kun gyi cho ga la //
T02D2512-1:103b-32: rdo rje dril bus rab bskul bas //
T02D2512-1:103b-33: cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na'ang //
T02D2512-1:103b-35: de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad mngon du byas la /
T02D2512-1:103b-36: dang po'i rdo rjes h'um badzra auttishtha ma h'a mandala autp'a da y'a zhes brjod de /
T02D2512-1:103b-37: bar snang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:103b-38: bdag nyid dang po'i rdo rje de nyid du h'um gis byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:103b-39: yang phyag rgya chen por bsams te /
T02D2512-1:103b-40: badzra tishtha ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod de /
T02D2512-1:103b-41: de bzhin du langs la phyag rgya la gnas pas thams cad du bltas te /
T02D2512-1:103b-42: snyems pas h'um 'don cing song la rkang pa gnyis
T02D2512-1:103b-43: kyi 'og tu aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams
T02D2512-1:103b-44: te / rkang pa nas brtsams nas /
T02D2512-1:104a-0: nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa dang mnyam par @104a * //

T02D2512-1:104a-4: nam mkha'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bcad pa dang /
T02D2512-1:104a-5: rab dang dra ba dag bya'o //
T02D2512-1:104a-6: de nas sgo 'byed pa'i phyag rgyas sgo phye la /
T02D2512-1:104a-7: rdo rje rgyu'i ngo bo zhal bzhi pa /
T02D2512-1:104a-8: phyag bzhi pa'i gsang ba'i gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:104a-9: sngags 'di dang ldan pas dgug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:104a-11: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe bo dang mdzub
T02D2512-1:104a-12: mo rdo rjer bya ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad
T02D2512-1:104a-13: 'gugs par byed pa rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya
T02D2512-1:104a-14: ba'i phyag rgya'o // aom ma h'a badzra tsa kra
T02D2512-1:104a-15: aa dhi tishtha siddhya h'um zhes bya ba phyag rgya
T02D2512-1:104a-16: 'di dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor yang byin gyis brlab
T02D2512-1:104a-17: ba'i phyag rgya'o // par bya'o // rdo rje khu
T02D2512-1:104a-18: tshur gnyis kyis 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul du mgal
T02D2512-1:104a-19: me bskor ba ltar bya ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2512-1:104a-20: ba'i phyag rgya'o // par bya'o // // de nas seng ldeng gi phur bu la mtha' yas dang /
T02D2512-1:104a-23: gsus po che zhes bya ba rim pa bzhin du steng gi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:104a-25: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed dang /
T02D2512-1:104a-27: rta mgrin lta bu la 'og tu rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bur bskyed nas /
T02D2512-1:104a-30: me tog gi phreng ba dmar pos bcings te /
T02D2512-1:104a-34: zhes bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02D2512-1:104a-35: de g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la /
T02D2512-1:104a-36: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi grva bzhir dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te ;
T02D2512-1:104a-37: rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya'o //

T02D2512-1:104a-39: de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la /
T02D2512-1:104a-40: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bsrung ba rnams yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02D2512-1:104a-41: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas pa'i bum
T02D2512-1:104a-42: pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bsang gtor bya ba'i phyir

T02D2512-1:104a-47: h'um lan bdun de dag la bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:104b-0: de rnams su @104b dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nam mkha'i phyogs las phab ste /
T02D2512-1:104b-1: h'um nyid kyis bcug la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod do //
T02D2512-1:104b-2: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin la /
T02D2512-1:104b-3: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid rnams dang ldan pa /
T02D2512-1:104b-5: rin po che la sogs pa dag yang dag par ldan par byas nas chu cung zad bcug ste /
T02D2512-1:104b-7: rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T02D2512-1:104b-8: rdo rje sems dpa' re re zhing lan brgya rtsa
T02D2512-1:104b-9: brgyad bzlas pa'i mchod yon bum pa'i steng du bzhag

T02D2512-1:104b-12: me tog bcug la bdug pas bdugs te /

T02D2512-1:104b-15: de la dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-1:104b-16: de ltar bum pa'i bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02D2512-1:104b-19: sangs rgyas spyan gyis mar la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg re re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste /
T02D2512-1:104b-20: 'di ni lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o /
T02D2512-1:104b-22: // / de nas bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod la /
T02D2512-1:104b-23: mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang
T02D2512-1:104b-24: bcas pa legs par mchod la snga ma bzhin du
T02D2512-1:104b-25: phyag byas nas / mchog yon phul te /
T02D2512-1:104b-26: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02D2512-1:104b-27: de la dang por re zhig lag na me tog thogs pas /
T02D2512-1:104b-28: slob dpon la phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:104b-29: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:104b-30: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02D2512-1:104b-31: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2512-1:104b-32: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2512-1:104b-33: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //

T02D2512-1:104b-35: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D2512-1:104b-36: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2512-1:104b-37: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02D2512-1:104b-38: thar pa chen po grong mchog tu //
T02D2512-1:104b-39: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyid //
T02D2512-1:104b-40: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i snying gar sa
T02D2512-1:104b-41: ma ya aa zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:104b-42: bskyed la / de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02D2512-1:104b-43: lag pa g-yas pas rdo rje blangs te /
T02D2512-1:105a-2: badzra siddhyi ya th'a su kham zhes bya ba'i snying
T02D2512-1:105a-3: pos rang gi snying gar rdo rje gzhag par bya'o
T02D2512-1:105a-4: // de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste /
T02D2512-1:105a-5: rtog pa ma lus legs par bsdus nas ni //
T02D2512-1:105a-6: shin tu bsam pa bzang por ldan pas nyon //
T02D2512-1:105a-7: brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i //
T02D2512-1:105a-8: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02D2512-1:105a-9: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02D2512-1:105a-10: rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang //
T02D2512-1:105a-11: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni //
T02D2512-1:105a-12: spyan sngar da ltar ma lus so sor bshags //
T02D2512-1:105a-13: bde gshegs rnams kyi cho gas gnyis ma lus dang //
T02D2512-1:105a-14: sras rnams kyi ni zab cing mtha' med pa'i //
T02D2512-1:105a-15: 'gro ba ma lus don rnams bsgrub mdzad dang //
T02D2512-1:105a-16: de las gzhan la'ang bdag ni yi rang ngo //
T02D2512-1:105a-17: thugs rjes gdung bas thugs dang ldan 'gyur zhing //
T02D2512-1:105a-18: blo gros sdig med gti mug tshogs kun bcom//
T02D2512-1:105a-19: ma lus rigs kyi padma'i nang bzhugs pa //
T02D2512-1:105a-20: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2512-1:105a-21: rab mchog blo yis kun dga' ra ba ste //
T02D2512-1:105a-22: dman pa 'jig par byed pas 'khor lo'i tshul //
T02D2512-1:105a-23: srid pa'i sbyor ba zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul //
T02D2512-1:105a-24: gsung mchog chos kyi mchog la skyabs su mchi //
T02D2512-1:105a-25: 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug 'joms shing //
T02D2512-1:105a-26: blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rje chen po yid //
T02D2512-1:105a-27: brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la skyabs gsol zhing //
T02D2512-1:105a-28: srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2512-1:105a-29: rgyu yi rjes thogs bdag po'i yul nyid las //
T02D2512-1:105a-30: 'bras bu'i nus pas dgra yi tshogs las rgyal //
T02D2512-1:105a-31: so sor rigs dang snying rje'i rtsa ba can //
T02D2512-1:105a-32: byang chub yang dag rig pa bdag gis bzung //
T02D2512-1:105a-33: sems can rnams ni yongs su smin phyir dang //
T02D2512-1:105a-34: bskyab pa'i phyir ram yang na bdag gi sems //
T02D2512-1:105a-35: yang dag nyid du dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:105a-36: thams cad rtsva bzhin ltos pa med par sbyin //
T02D2512-1:105a-37: de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang //
T02D2512-1:105a-38: bsam gtan dang ni shes rab bla med pa //
T02D2512-1:105a-39: bdag dang gzhan rnams dag par bya phyir 'di //
T02D2512-1:105a-40: skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi //
T02D2512-1:105a-41: bde gshegs sngags la rgya cher mkhas pa dang //
T02D2512-1:105b-0: chos rgyal rtag tu lhun @105b gyis grub ba ni //
T02D2512-1:105b-1: 'gro 'di rnams kyis thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:105b-2: 'di na mkha' bzhin du ni gnas par bgyid //
T02D2512-1:105b-4: bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdus pa 'dis /

T02D2512-1:108b-5: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad ni //
T02D2512-1:108b-6: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02D2512-1:108b-7: hi zhes bya ba'i mthar khro bo ti rinti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:108b-8: de la tshon rtsi dkar po la ni /
T02D2512-1:108b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dkar po'i phra rab rnams gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:108b-10: ser po la ni ser po'o //
T02D2512-1:108b-11: sngon po la ni sngon po'o //
T02D2512-1:108b-12: ljang gu la ni ljang gu'o //
T02D2512-1:108b-13: dmar po la ni dmar po bcug nas /
T02D2512-1:108b-14: ji skad du bshad pa'i 'bar ba'i lta bas mngon
T02D2512-1:108b-15: par sbyang ba'i dus su yang dang po'i rdo rje
T02D2512-1:108b-16: thog mar tshon dgye ba brtsam par byas la /
T02D2512-1:108b-17: tshon thams cad dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:108b-18: bskor phyogs su h'um zlos shing dgye la de'i 'og tu ji ltar dga' ba'i tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:108b-19: de la tshon dgye ba'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-1:108b-24: dkar po ni thams cad kyi nang rol du'o //
T02D2512-1:108b-25: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar sna tshogs padma'i gdan la /
T02D2512-1:108b-26: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan nyid sngar bshad pa
T02D2512-1:108b-27: lta bu'i lugs ma la sogs pa'i sku gzugs bkod
T02D2512-1:108b-28: la / h'um gis kyang bar snang gi phyogs su spyan drangs te /
T02D2512-1:108b-29: gzugs dang gcig tu bsre bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:108b-30: de bzhin du thams cad la yang shes par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:108b-31: gang gi phyir lha thams cad kyi yang dgod pa'i snying po ni h'um 'di nyid do //
T02D2512-1:108b-32: de la de'i mdun du rdo rje yid las byung ba sku mdog dmar skya /
T02D2512-1:108b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i cod phan can g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis /
T02D2512-1:108b-34: me tog can gyi gzhu bsnams pa //
T02D2512-1:108b-35: phyag g-yas na rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i mde'u can gyi mda' gsor ba la brtson pa'o //
T02D2512-1:108b-36: de'i g-yas logs su rdo rje k'i la k'i la
T02D2512-1:108b-37: sku mdog rdo rje yid las byung ba dang mthun
T02D2512-1:108b-38: pa / rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa'i phyag gnyis
T02D2512-1:108b-39: kyis rang gi thugs ka'i phyogs su dang po'i rdo
T02D2512-1:108b-40: rje rtse lnga pa mdog dmar po bsnams nas 'khyud
T02D2512-1:108b-42: de'i rgyab tu rdo rje dran pa sku mdog sngo skya /
T02D2512-1:108b-43: phyag g-yas na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa /
T02D2512-1:109a-1: g-yon gyis gdan la snyems pa dang bcas pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109a-2: de'i g-yon du rdo rje snyems pa gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog can /
T02D2512-1:109a-3: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsnams te /
T02D2512-1:109a-4: dku gnyis su snyems pa dang bcas pa /
T02D2512-1:109a-5: dbu g-yon du cung zad 'dud pa sgeg pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109a-6: nang gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi shar lho'i mtshams
T02D2512-1:109a-7: su rab tu dga' ba sku mdog rdo rje yid
T02D2512-1:109a-8: las byung ba dang mthun pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109a-9: lho nub mtshams su rab tu dga' ma sku mdog k'i li k'i la dang mthun pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109a-10: nub byang mtshams su rdo rje spyan sku mdog rdo rje dran pa dang mthun pa'o ;
T02D2512-1:109a-11: / byang shar mtshams su dpal chen mo sku mdog rdo rje snyems pa dang mthun pa ste /
T02D2512-1:109a-12: de dag kyang go rims ji lta ba bzhin du me tog gi za ma tog dang /
T02D2512-1:109a-15: dri'i dung chos rang gi spyi bo'i phyogs su thal mo kha 'byed pas 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109a-16: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi nang du shar
T02D2512-1:109a-17: phyogs su bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa sku mdog
T02D2512-1:109a-18: dkar po rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa sa
T02D2512-1:109a-19: gnon gyi phyag rgyas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109a-20: de'i g-yas logs su phyag na rdo rje /
T02D2512-1:109a-21: rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams shing /
T02D2512-1:109a-22: g-yon snyems pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109a-23: g-yon du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nam mkha'i mdog can gzhon nu'i sku'i cha lugs 'chang ba /
T02D2512-1:109a-24: 'dzum pa dang bcas pa phyag bzhi na ral gri bzhi dang /
T02D2512-1:109a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'debs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109a-26: rdo rje phreng ba'i nang lho phyogs su rin chen 'byung ldan beed'urya sngo bsangs lta bu'i mdog can /
T02D2512-1:109a-27: rdo rje rin po che mchog sbyin pa'i phyag gis bsnams pa /
T02D2512-1:109a-28: de'i g-yas logs su byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i
T02D2512-1:109a-29: snying po sku mdog margad lta bu rang gi mgo
T02D2512-1:109a-30: la dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba rang nyid 'ching ba
T02D2512-1:109a-32: g-yon logs su nam mkha'i mdzod sku mdog sna tshogs pa phyag na sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02D2512-1:109a-33: sna tshogs dril bu bsnams nas /
T02D2512-1:109a-34: rdo rje snyems pa bsgyings nas bzhugs pa zhal rnam par bzhad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109a-35: rdo rje phreng ba'i nang gi nub phyogs su 'od
T02D2512-1:109a-36: dpag tu med pa gser btso ma lta bu'i mdog
T02D2512-1:109a-37: can padma bsnams pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas
T02D2512-1:109b-1: de'i g-yas logs su 'jig rten dbang phyug sku mdog dmar skya /
T02D2512-1:109b-2: g-yon pa snyems pa dang bcas pas padma'i sdong bu bzung nas /
T02D2512-1:109b-3: phyag g-yas pas rang gi thugs kar 'byed par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109b-4: g-yon logs su sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
T02D2512-1:109b-5: gser gyi mdog can phyag g-yon pas gdan la brten pa /
T02D2512-1:109b-6: phyag g-yas pa'i gung mo'i rtse mor rdo rje 'khor
T02D2512-1:109b-7: lo rtsibs brgyad pa rang gi thugs ka'i phyogs su
T02D2512-1:109b-8: bskor ba'i tshul gyis bsnams pa /
T02D2512-1:109b-9: zhal rnam par bzhad pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109b-10: rdo rje phreng ba'i nang gi byang phyogs su don
T02D2512-1:109b-11: yod par grub pa sku mdog sna tshogs pa mi
T02D2512-1:109b-12: 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D2512-1:109b-13: bsnams pa'o // de'i g-yas logs su rdo rje khu
T02D2512-1:109b-14: tshur gser gyi mdog can dam tshig gi khu tshur
T02D2512-1:109b-15: bsnams pa'o // gyis / rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa zhal rnam par bzhad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109b-16: g-yon logs su rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog sngon
T02D2512-1:109b-17: po rdo rje mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa 'bar
T02D2512-1:109b-18: ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrigs pa'i 'od mda' ba
T02D2512-1:109b-20: ha ha zhes gsal bar bzhad pa'i zhal gyis kun du bzhugs shing /
T02D2512-1:109b-21: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha bsnams nas /
T02D2512-1:109b-22: zhal gyi grva gnyis su 'jog pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109b-23: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la /
T02D2512-1:109b-24: shar lho'i mtshams kyi phyogs su rdo rje sgeg mo //
T02D2512-1:109b-25: rdo rje yid las byung ba'i mdog can /
T02D2512-1:109b-26: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa gnyis bsnams nas /
T02D2512-1:109b-27: gnyi ga snyems par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:109b-28: dbu g-yon du 'dud pas phyag 'tshal ba'o //
T02D2512-1:109b-29: lho nub mtshams su rdo rje bzhad pa rdo rje
T02D2512-1:109b-30: k'i li k'i la dang mdog 'dra ba phyag g-yas
T02D2512-1:109b-31: na so'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'i rdo rje
T02D2512-1:109b-32: gnyis bsnams nas bzhad pa'i tshul du mdzad cing /
T02D2512-1:109b-33: g-yon gyis gdan la brten te bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:109b-34: nub byang du rdo rje glu chen mo sku mdog
T02D2512-1:109b-35: rdo rje dran pa dang mthun pa rdo rje pi
T02D2512-1:109b-37: byang shar gyi mtshams su rdo rje gar sku mdog rdo rje snyems ma dang mthun pa /
T02D2512-1:109b-38: phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams te gar mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:110a-0: nang dang phyi rol du bcas pa'i shar phyogs kyi sgo gnyis su rdo rje gzugs sku @110a * //
T02D2512-1:110a-1: mdog rdo rje yid las byung ba dang mthun pa phyag na me long bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-1:110a-2: lho phyogs kyi sgo gnyis su rdo rje sgra sku
T02D2512-1:110a-3: mdog rdo rje k'i li k'i la dang mthun pa'i
T02D2512-1:110a-4: pi wang brdung ba la brtson par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:110a-5: nub phyogs kyi sgo gnyis su rdo rje dri sku
T02D2512-1:110a-6: mdog rdo rje dran pa dang mthun pa phyag na
T02D2512-1:110a-8: byang phyogs kyi sgo gnyis su rdo rje ro sku
T02D2512-1:110a-9: mdog rdo rje snyems pa dang mthun pa phyag na
T02D2512-1:110a-11: de'i phyir 'di dag ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa nyid yin par 'dod de /
T02D2512-1:110a-15: ro'i snod rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan yin no //
T02D2512-1:110a-16: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa ni rdo rje
T02D2512-1:110a-17: lcags kyu la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan no zhes rtsa
T02D2512-1:110a-19: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams kyi nang du 'dod pa'i
T02D2512-1:110a-20: khams kyi dbang phyug rnams sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis
T02D2512-1:110a-21: chu lha'i mthar thug pa'i bar du chung ma dang
T02D2512-1:110a-22: bcas par 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa
T02D2512-1:110a-23: las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen pos bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:110a-24: // de la dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2512-1:110a-25: pa nas rdo rje gzugs kyi bar du ni sems
T02D2512-1:110a-26: dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:110a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:110a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' ni shar phyogs su gzigs nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:110a-29: lhag ma rnams ni rang gi bdag po la gzigs par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:110a-30: de ltar dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas /
T02D2512-1:110a-31: phyi dro'i dus su mtshams la bab pa na dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:110a-32: khro bo ti rinti ri bcings te /
T02D2512-1:110a-33: badzra dang h'um bzhi zlos shing dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:110a-34: de nas bskor ba lan bdun byas la lhag pa
T02D2512-1:110a-35: dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa rnams zhi bar bya
T02D2512-1:110a-36: ba'i phyir rdo rje dril bu dkrol la dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:110a-38: de nas me tog gi phreng ba bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-1:110a-39: la phul la gar bya ba'i tshul gyis blangs te
T02D2512-1:110a-40: / phreng bas dbang bskur ba'i sngags kyis rang gi
T02D2512-1:110a-41: mgo la bcings nas sgo dbye ba ji lta ba
T02D2512-1:110a-42: / bzhin bya'o // de nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2512-1:110b-0: su ra ta badzro h'um zhes bya ba la @110b sogs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:110b-1: gzhan yang rang gi ming brjod cing /
T02D2512-1:110b-2: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:110b-3: h'um a'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:110b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar rang gi rdo rje'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:110b-5: de nas h'um badzro ham zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal du rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:110b-6: h'um badzra sa tva ham zhes bya bas /
T02D2512-1:110b-7: rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-1:110b-8: po'i ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o
T02D2512-1:110b-9: // de bzhin du rdo rje ro'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:110b-10: h'um a'a zhes bya bas rdo rje ro'i gnas su /
T02D2512-1:110b-11: rdo rje ro'i snod bsam mo //
T02D2512-1:110b-12: de nas h'um badzra ra sa bhanydza no ham /
T02D2512-1:110b-13: zhes bya bas phyag rgya'i nga rgyal du bsams la /
T02D2512-1:110b-14: h'um badzra ra so ham zhes bya bas phyag rgya'i gzugs te /
T02D2512-1:110b-15: rdo rje ro'i phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:110b-16: de nas rdo rje bsdu ba dang /
T02D2512-1:110b-17: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa de bzhin du byas la /
T02D2512-1:110b-18: rdo rje can gyi spyan sngar rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:110b-19: yongs su brtags pa'i dkyil 'khor der gsang ba'i lcags
T02D2512-1:110b-20: kyus bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs
T02D2512-1:110b-21: la / de bzhin du rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2512-1:110b-22: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad la /
T02D2512-1:110b-23: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs te /
T02D2512-1:110b-24: de bzhin du mchod yon phul nas dang po'i rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:110b-25: de nas de bzhin du lha thams cad kyi ljags la h'um bsams te /
T02D2512-1:110b-26: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas chu
T02D2512-1:110b-27: lha'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyis las kyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-1:110b-28: dang / phyag rgya chen pos nye bar bstan nas /
T02D2512-1:110b-29: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis de rnams dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:110b-31: bum pa gang ba la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:110b-32: dril bu'i mchog btags rgyal mtshan dag / grva rnams su ni gzhag par bya //
T02D2512-1:110b-33: phyi yi mtshams kyi gnas su ni //
T02D2512-1:110b-34: bum pa yal gar bcas pas mdzes //
T02D2512-1:110b-35: phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar yang //
T02D2512-1:110b-36: bum pa spos chus gang ba gzhag / gang zhig rdo rjer bcas pa la //
T02D2512-1:110b-37: nags kyi lcug mas bzlas brjod bya //
T02D2512-1:111a-2: rtsa ba nag po ra ri med pa lto ba che ba /
T02D2512-1:111a-9: padma r'a ga ste rin po che thams cad dang /
T02D2512-1:111a-14: aa pa ra dzi ta dkar po ste ;
T02D2512-1:111a-22: tsandan dkar po dang ldan pa'i chu dang /
T02D2512-1:111a-24: dri shin tu zhim pa rnams kyis yongs su bkang la /
T02D2512-1:111a-25: phyi rol kun du dri zhim pos byugs te /
T02D2512-1:111a-26: me tog gi phreng ba btags la /
T02D2512-1:111a-27: rang gi lha'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa /
T02D2512-1:111a-28: mgul par ras gtsang ma bzang pos dkris pa /
T02D2512-1:111a-29: 'bras bu dang lo ma bzang po dang ldan pa'i
T02D2512-1:111a-30: yal gas kha brgyan pa dang po'i rdo rjes yongs
T02D2512-1:111a-31: su bzung ba'i me tog gi lcug ma la mtshan
T02D2512-1:111a-32: brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas shing /
T02D2512-1:111a-33: h'um yang bzlas la phyi rol kun du lha re re zhing dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:111a-34: de la dang po'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun du gcig dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:111a-35: yang bum pa gcig 'jug pa'i sgor mngon du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:111a-36: de ltar bum pa phul nas bum pa gang ba yang so sor dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:111a-37: de ltar 'byor par ma gyur na //
T02D2512-1:111a-38: bcom ldan 'das la bum pa gcig / lhag ma rnams la bum pa lnga dang /
T02D2512-1:111a-39: bum pa gang ba yang dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:111a-40: bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-1:111a-41: de ltar bum pa rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:111a-42: bum pa gang ba yang phul nas /
T02D2512-1:111a-46: lha re re zhing rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02D2512-1:111a-51: ba dan sna tshogs pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:111a-53: bzhi 'am me tog thams cad kyang sngar bshad pa'i me tog gi rig sngags kyis dbul ba dang /
T02D2512-1:111a-54: dri thams cad kyang dri'i rig sngags kyis dbul ba dang /
T02D2512-1:111a-58: tsandan la sogs pa'i bdug pa rnams ni bdug pa'i rim pas so //
T02D2512-1:111a-59: kha zas ro brgya pa la sogs pa ni aa k'a ro la sogs pas so //
T02D2512-1:111b-0: @111b mar gyi mar me la sogs pa ni mar me'i rig sngags mngon par bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:111b-1: badzra spha ra na kham zhes brjod la /
T02D2512-1:111b-2: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:111b-3: ma 'byor na yang bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o //
T02D2512-1:111b-4: mar me sdong bu dang bcas pa'i snod chen po stong gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:111b-5: tha na snod chen po bzhi mar me'i rig sngags nyid bzlas la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:111b-7: rol mo'i sil snyan bcu h'um gis rol mo'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas bzlas la dbul te /
T02D2512-1:111b-8: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis lag pa'i sor mo
T02D2512-1:111b-9: rnams kyis rol mo brdung ba lta bu rnam pa
T02D2512-1:111b-20: ti mi la brdung ba'i rked nyag tshul du byed pa'o //
T02D2512-1:111b-21: phyi rol du gar la sogs pa yang h'um nyid kyis dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:111b-22: dar dpyangs 'phyang bar bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:111b-23: me tog gi chun po dang ;
T02D2512-1:111b-24: rnga yab kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /
T02D2512-1:111b-25: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas sbras pa dang /
T02D2512-1:111b-26: zla ba phyed pa dang bcas pas nye bar mdzes par byas pa dang /
T02D2512-1:111b-27: rta dang glang po che dang /
T02D2512-1:111b-28: ba lang gi khyu shin tu brtags pa rnams kyang dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:111b-29: rta babs yid du 'ong ba dril bu dang bcas pa yang dbul bar bya'o ;
T02D2512-1:111b-30: / de nas rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:111b-31: las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis 'og nas
T02D2512-1:111b-32: bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas /
T02D2512-1:111b-33: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:111b-34: aom gyis rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02D2512-1:111b-36: kha zas ro brgya pa dang /
T02D2512-1:111b-38: gar la sogs pa'i sprin rnams sprul la /
T02D2512-1:111b-39: dpral ba'i phyogs su thal mo khong stong du sbyar la /
T02D2512-1:111b-40: aom sarba bid p'u ra p'u ra /
T02D2512-1:111b-41: a'a brta ya a'a brta ya ho //
T02D2512-1:111b-42: zhes bya bas de rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:111b-43: de nas aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpan na tv'a ta /
T02D2512-1:111b-44: zhes bya ba mngon par bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:111b-45: 'di nyid brjod cing phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:111b-46: de nas rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T02D2512-1:111b-48: rdo rje spyan ma la sogs pas sbyin sreg byas la /
T02D2512-1:111b-49: dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis
T02D2512-1:111b-50: thab kyi dbus su me tog gis bzhugs su gsol
T02D2512-1:112a-1: la sogs pa'i rdzas las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112a-2: de nas rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D2512-1:112a-3: rdo rje ro'i bar las yang h'um zlos shing re re la sbyin sreg bdun bdun dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112a-4: de nas phyag btsal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa bzung la /
T02D2512-1:112a-5: aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a da y'a mi /
T02D2512-1:112a-7: byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:112a-8: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dang po'i rdo
T02D2512-1:112a-9: rje blangs nas rang gi snying gar legs par bzhag
T02D2512-1:112a-10: ste / h'um zhes bya bas rdo rje bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:112a-11: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:112a-12: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho //
T02D2512-1:112a-13: badzra siddhya ya th'a su kham /
T02D2512-1:112a-14: de nas sgor bzhag pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:112a-15: ras dmar po zung gyon zhing /
T02D2512-1:112a-16: me tog gi phreng ba btags pa dang /
T02D2512-1:112a-17: gdong dri zhim pos byugs la ji skad du bshad
T02D2512-1:112a-18: pa'i gar las byung ba'i rdo rje thal mo bcings
T02D2512-1:112a-19: nas / de dang me tog blangs te /
T02D2512-1:112a-20: de'i snying ga'i phyogs su bskor nas bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:112a-21: badzra badzra h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:112a-23: shar phyogs kyi sgor badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes
T02D2512-1:112a-24: brjod la rdo rje lcags kyus bdag nyid dgug par
T02D2512-1:112a-25: bya'o // yang lho phyogs kyi sgor dkyil 'khor chen por de bzhin du 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:112a-26: badzra p'a sha h'um zhes brjod la /
T02D2512-1:112a-27: rdo rje bsdams pa las zhags par byas pas bdag nyid gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112a-28: de nas nub phyogs kyi sgor de bzhin du bdag nyid zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:112a-29: badzra spho ta bom zhes bya bas /
T02D2512-1:112a-30: rdo rje lcags sgrog bcings te bdag nyid bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112a-31: yang byang phyogs kyi sgor zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:112a-33: zhes bya bas bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112a-34: yang shar phyogs kyi sgor zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:112a-35: ma h'a ra ta su dri dha su to sho su su sho badzra sa tva a'adya siddhy'a m'am /
T02D2512-1:112a-37: rdo rje gar las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la phyag bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112a-39: zhugs nas mgon la phyag byas te //
T02D2512-1:112a-40: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mig dang ni //
T02D2512-1:112a-41: g-yon snyems 'dzum pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2512-1:112a-42: rol pa'i mig ni btsum par bya //
T02D2512-1:112a-44: aom par ma su kha aa sha ya /
T02D2512-1:112a-45: su la li ta bi la se na mi te /
T02D2512-1:112a-46: na ma m'i bha ga b'ana tam /
T02D2512-1:112b-0: dza: h'um bam ho: @112b hi hi hi hi h'i /
T02D2512-1:112b-1: pra t'itstsha ku su ma aanydza li n'a tha ho //
T02D2512-1:112b-2: zhes bya ba ni phyag 'tshal ba'i rig sngags so //
T02D2512-1:112b-3: yang zhugs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:112b-4: dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112b-5: de nas yang mdun du 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:112b-6: de kho na nyid 'di lan cig brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:112b-7: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che ;
T02D2512-1:112b-8: / rdo rje chen po nor che zhing //
T02D2512-1:112b-9: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02D2512-1:112b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' deng bdag 'grub //
T02D2512-1:112b-11: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhye m'am /
T02D2512-1:112b-12: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la /
T02D2512-1:112b-13: aas bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:112b-14: aa yang g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems ma phye la /
T02D2512-1:112b-15: bdag nyid dbab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:112b-16: aom a'a zhes bya ba brgya bzlas la bcom ldan
T02D2512-1:112b-17: 'das rdo rje sems dpas bdag nyid kun du gang
T02D2512-1:112b-18: bar bsam mo // de nas h'um gis me tog gi phreng ba dor la /
T02D2512-1:112b-20: rang gi mgo la de nyid kyang bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112b-21: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol la /
T02D2512-1:112b-22: de nyid zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:112b-23: rdo rje gzugs kyi bar gyi dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112b-24: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas zhugs pa'i phyag rgya snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:112b-26: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje lta bas blta zhing /
T02D2512-1:112b-27: ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyi mthong ba gnang nas /
T02D2512-1:112b-28: dngos grub thams cad stsal pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112b-29: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor la 'dug ste /
T02D2512-1:112b-30: shis pa brjod pa'i tshul gyis bdag gi snying gar bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:112b-31: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa la sogs pas bstod pa byas te /
T02D2512-1:112b-32: 'dod chags rdo rje la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod
T02D2512-1:112b-33: pa bzhis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mchod do
T02D2512-1:112b-34: // glu dang rol mo la sogs pas kyang mchod la /
T02D2512-1:112b-35: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2512-1:112b-36: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas nas /
T02D2512-1:112b-37: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag bya'o //
T02D2512-1:112b-39: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:112b-40: de la dang po kho nar dang po'i rdo rjes
T02D2512-1:112b-41: bzung ba'i me tog gi yal ga la rnam par
T02D2512-1:112b-42: rgyal ba'i bum pa las sngags 'di bzlas brjod nyi
T02D2512-1:113a-1: ma h'a su kha badzra aa mo gha sa ma yo da ka siddhyi /
T02D2512-1:113a-2: aa bhi shinytsa sarba su kha so ma na sya
T02D2512-1:113a-3: ni aa dad ku ru ku ru dza: h'um bam
T02D2512-1:113a-4: ho: aa / de nas rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:113a-5: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rang gi lus la rnal
T02D2512-1:113a-6: 'byor chen pos bshad pa'i gnas rnams su lha thams
T02D2512-1:113a-8: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma'i steng du phyag rgya chen pos 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:113a-9: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:113a-10: mchod yon blangs nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gzugs rang gi mgo la bzhag ste /
T02D2512-1:113a-11: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02D2512-1:113a-12: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa blangs nas /
T02D2512-1:113a-13: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D2512-1:113a-15: des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing chu de btung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:113a-16: aom ma h'a su kha badzra sa tva dza: h'um
T02D2512-1:113a-17: bam ho: su ra ta stvam zhes bya bas thog
T02D2512-1:113a-18: ma'i rdo rje rang gi mgo la bcings te /
T02D2512-1:113a-19: bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02D2512-1:113a-20: de nas sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba thams cad yang dag par blangs te /
T02D2512-1:113a-24: byas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi phreng ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:113a-25: dang ldan pa'i cod pan rdo rje rin chen gyi
T02D2512-1:113a-26: sngags dang phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags bzlas pas
T02D2512-1:113a-27: bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:113a-28: de nas rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02D2512-1:113a-29: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyis rdo rje'i dbang blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:113a-30: de nas me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:113a-31: phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:113a-32: de nas de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje bzung la /
T02D2512-1:113a-33: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:113a-34: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:113a-35: h'um zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:113a-36: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la gsang sngags bzung ste /
T02D2512-1:113a-37: tshigs su bcad pa lnga bas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2512-1:113a-39: lung bstan pa yang blangs la /
T02D2512-1:113a-40: bdag la byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:113a-41: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das rab tu bsgrubs la phyir 'byung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:113a-42: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:113b-0: // / @113b de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho ga nyid kyis slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:113b-1: slob dpon gyis lnga po bsdus pa 'di nyid bcings la slar yang zhugs te /
T02D2512-1:113b-2: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyong nas /
T02D2512-1:113b-3: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:113b-4: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:113b-5: khyod sdon khyim la dga' ba yi //
T02D2512-1:113b-6: sred pa'i bde ba dag bya'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:113b-7: 'dod pa kun gyi dngos grub ces //
T02D2512-1:113b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:113b-11: de la bslab pa'i gzhi lnga blangs pa'am /
T02D2512-1:113b-13: dge slong gi bslab pa yongs su bzung bas /
T02D2512-1:113b-14: sdom pa bzung la de slob dpon la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:113b-15: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas //
T02D2512-1:113b-16: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2512-1:113b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pas //
T02D2512-1:113b-18: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2512-1:113b-19: dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol //
T02D2512-1:113b-20: sdom pa rnams kyang stsal du gsol //
T02D2512-1:113b-21: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas
T02D2512-1:113b-22: pa'i ras dmar po bzang po gcig gis smad g-yogs
T02D2512-1:113b-23: bya / gcig gis stod g-yogs byas la /
T02D2512-1:113b-24: yang rdo rje lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang /
T02D2512-1:113b-26: gdong g-yogs la yongs su bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:113b-27: des slob ma'i gdong g-yogs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:113b-28: me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing /
T02D2512-1:113b-29: gdong dri zhim pos byugs la phyag bzhi byed du gzhug go //
T02D2512-1:113b-30: yang lag na me tog thogs pas slob dpon la
T02D2512-1:113b-31: phyag byas la lag na me tog thogs pa nyid
T02D2512-1:113b-32: kyis sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D2512-1:113b-33: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2512-1:113b-35: gsol ba gdab pa byas nas /
T02D2512-1:113b-36: slob mas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:113b-37: thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa //
T02D2512-1:113b-38: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02D2512-1:113b-39: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni //
T02D2512-1:113b-40: slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la ;
T02D2512-1:113b-41: / sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba //
T02D2512-1:113b-42: mi ldog pa yi 'khor los sbyor //
T02D2512-1:113b-43: thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che //
T02D2512-1:113b-44: gsang ba chen po 'jug par bgyi //
T02D2512-1:113b-45: gsang ba thams cad bsdus par ni //
T02D2512-1:113b-46: slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod //
T02D2512-1:113b-47: mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba //
T02D2512-1:114a-2: mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing //
T02D2512-1:114a-3: dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2512-1:114a-4: sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba //
T02D2512-1:114a-5: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2512-1:114a-6: dbang bskur chen po rmad byung ba //
T02D2512-1:114a-7: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D2512-1:114a-8: bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur //
T02D2512-1:114a-9: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D2512-1:114a-10: de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:114a-11: che ge zhes bya 'di nyid ni //
T02D2512-1:114a-12: byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin pa //
T02D2512-1:114a-13: dam tshig mchog dang gsang ba yi //
T02D2512-1:114a-15: de nas yang slob dpon gyis yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:114a-16: bdag nyid chen po khyod gsang ba chen po'i rigs
T02D2512-1:114a-17: dag pa shin tu sbas pa yongs su 'dzin par
T02D2512-1:114a-19: des kyang bdag 'tshal lo zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:114a-20: de nas yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:114a-21: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2512-1:114a-22: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //
T02D2512-1:114a-23: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02D2512-1:114a-24: dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-1:114a-25: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02D2512-1:114a-26: blo chen khyod kyis gzung bar gyis //
T02D2512-1:114a-27: byang chub sems gang de rdo rje //
T02D2512-1:114a-28: shes rab dril bu zhes bsgrags so ;
T02D2512-1:114a-29: / slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2512-1:114a-30: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
T02D2512-1:114a-31: 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i //
T02D2512-1:114a-32: sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs //
T02D2512-1:114a-33: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sngom pa la //
T02D2512-1:114a-34: tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //
T02D2512-1:114a-35: dge ba'i chos rnams sdud pa dang //
T02D2512-1:114a-36: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02D2512-1:114a-37: khyod kyis brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2512-1:114a-38: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2512-1:114a-39: bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum //
T02D2512-1:114a-40: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2512-1:114a-41: nam du yang ni mi spong ngo //
T02D2512-1:114a-42: 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i //
T02D2512-1:114a-43: sngom pa brtan par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-1:114a-44: rin chen rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2512-1:114a-45: nyin dang mtshan du lan gsum du //
T02D2512-1:114a-46: zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams //
T02D2512-1:114a-47: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02D2512-1:114a-48: phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02D2512-1:114a-49: dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya //
T02D2512-1:114a-51: dam tshig sngom pa yin par gsungs //
T02D2512-1:114b-0: @114b las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02D2512-1:114b-1: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02D2512-1:114b-2: yang dag nyid du gzung bar gyis //
T02D2512-1:114b-3: mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya //
T02D2512-1:114b-4: gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di dag ni //
T02D2512-1:114b-5: phas pham par ni rab tu bshad //
T02D2512-1:114b-6: spang zhing dor bar mi bya'o //
T02D2512-1:114b-7: rtsa ba'i ltung bar shes par bya //
T02D2512-1:114b-8: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du //
T02D2512-1:114b-9: nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya //
T02D2512-1:114b-10: gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2512-1:114b-11: kha na ma tho spom por 'gyur //
T02D2512-1:114b-12: khyod kyis srog chags gsang mi bya //
T02D2512-1:114b-13: ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //
T02D2512-1:114b-14: 'dod la log par mi spyad cing //
T02D2512-1:114b-15: brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o //

T02D2512-1:114b-21: rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya //

T02D2512-1:114b-26: theg pa dman pa 'dod mi bya //

T02D2512-1:114b-29: rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags //
T02D2512-1:114b-30: lha dang lha min gsang ba pa //
T02D2512-1:114b-31: khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //
T02D2512-1:114b-32: phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang //

T02D2512-1:114b-36: des kyang 'di skad brjod bya ste //
T02D2512-1:114b-37: slob dpon 'dir ni bdag la gson //
T02D2512-1:114b-38: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //

T02D2512-1:114b-40: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2512-1:114b-41: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:114b-42: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2512-1:114b-43: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:114b-44: de nas de la aom sarba yo ga tsitta autp'a

T02D2512-1:114b-47: de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed nas /
