T02D2512-1:123b-10: rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:123b-11: ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya las
T02D2512-1:123b-12: lag pa g-yas pa'i yang mdzub mo bsgreng la g-yon
T02D2512-1:123b-13: pa'i ye ge h'um dang sdigs mdzub bya ba'i tshul
T02D2512-1:123b-15: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:123b-16: 'dis ni nor dang 'bru thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:123b-17: thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni
T02D2512-1:123b-18: pi wang brdung ba dang bcas pa'i ka ka le'i
T02D2512-1:123b-19: glu len pas bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-1:123b-20: / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:123b-21: sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba
T02D2512-1:123b-22: ni thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba ste
T02D2512-1:123b-23: / rdo rje sgra dang phyag rgya chen pos bya'o //
T02D2512-1:123b-24: thams cad 'bigs shing rjes su chags par bya ba
T02D2512-1:123b-25: la ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya
T02D2512-1:123b-26: ba la / rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni 'bigs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:123b-27: yid bde ba bskyed pa ni rjes su chags par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:123b-28: rdo rje yid las byung ba'i las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:123b-31: thams cad dga' bar bya ba la ni phyogs thams
T02D2512-1:123b-32: cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes pa'o zhes bya
T02D2512-1:123b-33: ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang
T02D2512-1:123b-34: / sems can gyi khams thams cad ni thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:123b-35: de dga' bar bya ba ni bsgrub par bya zhing rang dbang du bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:123b-36: k'i li k'i l'i rdo rje phyag rgya bcings la
T02D2512-1:123b-37: des phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bris
T02D2512-1:123b-38: la / yid kyis bzlas brjod bya ste des ni thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:123b-39: sdug pa'i bcing ba brtan par bya ba la ni
T02D2512-1:123b-40: snying brtan par nges par btsir bas so zhes bya
T02D2512-1:123b-41: ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas sems
T02D2512-1:124a-0: can thams cad 'khor pa ji srid @124a * //
T02D2512-1:124a-1: par yongs su mi gtong ba'i chags pa ni sdug pa brtan pa'o //
T02D2512-1:124a-2: des 'ching ba ni dam por bzung ba ste /
T02D2512-1:124a-3: sdug pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la brtan
T02D2512-1:124a-4: pa'i 'khrul 'khor btsir bdes ni snying btsir bas de
T02D2512-1:124a-6: ma rungs pa rab tu bsgrub pa la ni rdo
T02D2512-1:124a-7: rje snyems mas so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D2512-1:124a-8: snyems ma'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje snyems ma ste
T02D2512-1:124a-9: / des ma rungs pa rnams rab tu sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:124a-11: ma rungs pa rnams la bltas la rdo rje snyems ma'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:124a-12: yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la zhugs te /
T02D2512-1:124a-13: bdag nyid de dang lhan cig tu gyur par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:124a-15: bsgrub par bya ba 'dud par byed pa'i bsam pas gdud de /
T02D2512-1:124a-16: des ni de ltung bar byas par 'gyur zhing /
T02D2512-1:124a-18: rgyan thams cad ces bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-1:124a-19: de rnams dbrog pa ni 'bar ba'i lta bas dbrog pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:124a-20: rab tu myur bar g-yo ba'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
T02D2512-1:124a-21: 'bar ba'i lta ba zhes grags te //
T02D2512-1:124a-23: zhes bya ba ni 'bar ba'i lta ba'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D2512-1:124a-24: de dbrog pa ni 'gugs pa ste /
T02D2512-1:124a-26: thams cad yid tshim pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba bskyed pa'o //
T02D2512-1:124a-28: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis snying gar bzhag pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:124a-29: dam tshig rdo rje'i khu tshur bcings la snying ga'i phyogs su bzhag ste /
T02D2512-1:124a-30: des ni thams cad yid tshim par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:124a-31: mun pa snang bar bya ba la ni /
T02D2512-1:124a-32: rdo rje kha shar du bltas te bskor bas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:124a-33: dang po'i rdo rje blangs la 'od zer 'bar ba gtod ba'i tshul gyis shar phyogs su bltas la /
T02D2512-1:124a-34: bskor na mun pa mun nag snang bar byed do //
T02D2512-1:124a-35: lus bde bar bya ba la ni rang gi mtshan gyis bzlas pas so//
T02D2512-1:124a-36: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pas rang gi mtshan bzung la /
T02D2512-1:124a-37: lus kyi sdug bsngal gzhig par bya ba'i phyir bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02D2512-1:124a-38: des lus bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:124a-39: g-yogs nas bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D2512-1:124a-40: gzugs thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni /
T02D2512-1:124b-0: rdo rje gzugs kyi mchog @124b gis phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:124b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa gzugs thams cad
T02D2512-1:124b-2: yang dag par ston pa'i bsam pa gar las byung
T02D2512-1:124b-3: ba'i rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /
T02D2512-1:124b-4: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus g-yas pa'i gung mo'i rtse mo 'khyud /
T02D2512-1:124b-5: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus g-yon pa'i gung mo'i rtse mo 'khyud /
T02D2512-1:124b-6: mthe bong gnyis rang rang gi mdzub mo dang rtse
T02D2512-1:124b-7: sbyar la mthe'u chung gnyis sbyar te brkyang ba 'di
T02D2512-1:124b-8: ni rdo rje gzugs kyi mchog ste /
T02D2512-1:124b-9: 'dis gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:124b-10: sgra thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i sgra'o //
T02D2512-1:124b-11: de thos par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba ni gzhan rnams kyis thos par bya ba'o //
T02D2512-1:124b-13: rdo rje pi wang gis so zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:124b-14: gar las byung ba'i rdo rje bsdams pa las g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug pa ni yu ba ste /
T02D2512-1:124b-15: g-yas pa'i mdzub mos brdungs la /
T02D2512-1:124b-16: 'di dang sgra rnams brag ca lta bur bsgoms pas sgra thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:124b-17: 'di ni rdo rje pi wang ngo //
T02D2512-1:124b-18: dri zhim po sna tshogs pa'i phyir na /
T02D2512-1:124b-19: sna'i dbugs 'byin pa'i glu yis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:124b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dri zhim po
T02D2512-1:124b-21: rnams sna tshogs pa bskyed pa'i dbugs 'byin pa dang
T02D2512-1:124b-22: / h'um zhes pa'i glu'i bzlas pas /
T02D2512-1:124b-23: de bskyed pa'i bsam pa'i dbang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:124b-24: zas dang skom thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:124b-25: rdzas thams cad rdo rje bsdams pas bcing zhing yid kyis blangs la /
T02D2512-1:124b-26: mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:124b-27: de ltar na rdo rje spro ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:124b-28: dbab pa thams cad ni zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:124b-29: lag pa gnyis kyis se gol rdebs shing bcom ldan
T02D2512-1:124b-30: 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'od zer 'bar bas kun
T02D2512-1:124b-31: nas 'khrigs pas bsgrub par bya ba kun du gang
T02D2512-1:124b-32: bar bsam zhing / h'um zhes bya ba'i glu blang bar bya ste ;
T02D2512-1:124b-33: des ni pra se na la sogs pa dbab pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:124b-34: thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni zhes
T02D2512-1:124b-35: bya ba la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya ba'i
T02D2512-1:124b-36: lus la yid kyis zhugs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba
T02D2512-1:124b-37: gar byed pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid gar byed cing
T02D2512-1:125a-2: des na thams cad gar byed du 'dzud par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:125a-3: thams cad glu len du gzhug pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:125a-4: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad
T02D2512-1:125a-5: la h'um zhes bya ba'i glu la sogs pa'i gre
T02D2512-1:125a-7: de rdzogs par bya ba'i bsam pas lce bskyod cing bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02D2512-1:125a-8: des ni thams cad glu len du 'dzud par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:125a-9: thams cad smrar 'jug pa ni rdo rje chu yis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:125a-10: thams cad babs pas yi ge h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:125a-11: spos chu'i rdul phra rab rdo rje smra ba lta bur rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:125a-13: khar blud na des ni thams cad smrar 'dzud par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:125a-14: thams cad babs nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:125a-15: gdon la sogs pa thams cad zhugs nas de rnams
T02D2512-1:125a-16: kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams ston cing
T02D2512-1:125a-19: rdo rje 'bebs pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:125a-20: dam tshig rdo rje 'bebs pas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:125a-23: lce la h'um zhes bya ba las rdo rje bsams te /
T02D2512-1:125a-24: de'i steng du h'um aa zhes bya ba 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrigs pa bkod la /
T02D2512-1:125a-25: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ston par rnam par bsams nas /
T02D2512-1:125a-26: h'um aa zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-1:125a-27: gdon thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni
T02D2512-1:125a-28: rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-1:125a-29: / srin po la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni /
T02D2512-1:125a-30: gar las byung ba'i ba dan gsum pa'i phyag rgya gnyis byas la ;
T02D2512-1:125a-31: mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs pa mdzub mo rdo rjer bya /
T02D2512-1:125a-32: gung mo gnyis mdud de bzlog nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su mdzub mo rtse sbyar bar bzhag nas /
T02D2512-1:125a-34: khros shing gdong mche ba gtsigs pa 'od zer 'bar
T02D2512-1:125a-35: bas kun du 'khrigs pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2512-1:125a-36: sems dpa' bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du bsams la
T02D2512-1:125a-37: / des kyang de'i mgo bo nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:125a-38: rkang ba'i mthar thug gi bar du bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la khyab par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:125a-39: des ni gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:125a-40: 'di ni rdo rje mu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:125b-0: @125b gdon thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:125b-1: srin po la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad kyis sems can 'ga' zhig 'dzin par bya bar 'dod na /
T02D2512-1:125b-2: de'i tshe tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs brnyan mdun du bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:125b-3: der tshogs kyi bdag po bkug cing bcug la dbang du bya ste /
T02D2512-1:125b-4: snga ma bzhin du rab tu bsgrubs la dbang bskur te legs par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:125b-5: khros pas rdo rje gso ra zhing bzlas nas /
T02D2512-1:125b-6: che ge mo gdon gyis zin du chug shing / h'um zhes bskul na /
T02D2512-1:125b-7: de'i tshe de gdon gyis zin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:125b-8: rims thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa la ni rdo
T02D2512-1:125b-9: rje rims kyi gdon gyis so zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-1:125b-10: ; nyin gcig pa la sogs pa'i rims brgyad ni rims thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:125b-11: gang gi tshe des sems can 'ga' zhig zin par 'dod na /
T02D2512-1:125b-12: de'i tshe h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:125b-13: nam mkha' las rims blangs la /
T02D2512-1:125b-14: bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar sbyor ba 'dis rims gzhug par bya ste ;
T02D2512-1:125b-15: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang la snying 'dar bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:125b-16: de nas rims kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:125b-17: rims thams cad bsal ba la ni rdo rje'i lta bas bsal ba'o zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:125b-18: rdo rje'i lta ba ni chags shing rab tu gdangs
T02D2512-1:125b-19: pa'i mig ces bya ba ni rdo rje lta ba'i
T02D2512-1:125b-20: mtshan nyid do // des bya bas pas rims thams cad sel nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:125b-22: ji skad du gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor
T02D2512-1:125b-23: ba byas la mig g-yas par ma las nyi ma'i
T02D2512-1:125b-24: dkyil 'khor / g-yon par aa med pa'i yi ge ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2512-1:125b-25: yang yi ge h'um las mig gnyis su rdo rje gnyis bsams la /
T02D2512-1:125b-26: de dang h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing bsgrub par bya ba'i spyi bo nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:125b-27: byabs la mig gnyis las byung ba'i rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams kyis rims la bsnun par byas na /
T02D2512-1:125b-28: des ni rims thams cad bsal nus par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:125b-29: dug thams cad sbar ba la ni zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:125b-30: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dug thams cad bems por gyur pa rnams la /
T02D2512-1:125b-31: bems po ma yin par bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:125b-32: rang gi nus pa bskyed par bya ba ni spar ba'o //
T02D2512-1:125b-33: de ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D2512-1:125b-34: rdo rje lta bu'i dug gi phyag rgyas so zhes
T02D2512-1:125b-35: bya ba ni khros shing mig mi 'jums [?] pa'i
T02D2512-1:125b-36: lta bas lta ba 'di ni rdo rje'i lta ba
T02D2512-1:126a-1: thams cad 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro /
T02D2512-1:126a-2: 'dis ni don 'di skad du ston par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:126a-3: khros pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid ji lta ba bzhin du bsams la /
T02D2512-1:126a-4: h'um zhes bya ba las mig gnyis su lta ba'i
T02D2512-1:126a-5: dug can gyi khro bo gnyis 'bar ba'i 'od rnam
T02D2512-1:126a-7: lta ba des 'bar ba ni dug me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bsams nas /
T02D2512-1:126a-8: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing sbar bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:126a-9: dug thams cad gzhig pa la ni rma bya'i sgro'i
T02D2512-1:126a-10: chun pos so zhes bya ba ni rang gi lha'i
T02D2512-1:126a-11: rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin byas la /
T02D2512-1:126a-12: rma bya'i chun po la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2512-1:126a-13: steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zla ba'i mdog
T02D2512-1:126a-14: can nyid kyi dbu las byung ba'i bdud rtsi'i chu
T02D2512-1:126a-15: rgyun dgus phyogs bcu thams cad kun du gang bar
T02D2512-1:126a-16: bsams la / chun po nges bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la bya ba par bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:126a-17: des kyang bcom ldan 'das dug thams cad rnam par
T02D2512-1:126a-18: g-yeng bar byed pas bsgrub par bya ba'i lus bkrus
T02D2512-1:126a-20: des ni dug thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:126a-21: dug thams cad bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo
T02D2512-1:126a-22: rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:126a-23: / dang po'i rdo rje las mdzub mo gnyis sbyar te /
T02D2512-1:126a-24: rkang pa'i sor mo bsgyur zhing /
T02D2512-1:126a-25: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing dug gi steng du bzhag nas /
T02D2512-1:126a-26: bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na bzhugs shing /
T02D2512-1:126a-27: sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dug la khyab pas bdud rtsir gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:126a-29: bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad brlag
T02D2512-1:126a-30: pa la ni 'khrugs pas dpag tu med par bzlas
T02D2512-1:126a-31: pas so zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du
T02D2512-1:126a-32: bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' zhal mche ba rnam
T02D2512-1:126a-33: par gtsogs pa / mdog nag po rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od kun du 'khrugs pa /
T02D2512-1:126a-34: rdo rje gsor ba la sogs pa la brtson par rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:126a-35: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing ;
T02D2512-1:126a-36: rdo rje las rdo rje khro bo sprul la /
T02D2512-1:126a-37: des bgegs thams cad skrag par bya zhing bskrad par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:126a-38: dpag tu med pa bzlas pas so zhes bya ba ni h'um zhes bya ba nyid bzlas pas so //
T02D2512-1:126a-39: mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thams cad las gol [?] ba
T02D2512-1:126a-40: la ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba'i phyag rgyas
T02D2512-1:126b-0: so zhes bya ba ni bcom @126b ldan 'das rdo
T02D2512-1:126b-1: rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-1:126b-2: po ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba ste /
T02D2512-1:126b-3: des mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thams cad las grol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:126b-4: de yang rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar bar bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:126b-5: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje chen po gsor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:126b-6: de nas rdo rje las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-1:126b-7: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams
T02D2512-1:126b-8: gsod cing 'joms par byed bar bsam par bya'o zhes
T02D2512-1:126b-10: phyag rgya thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje
T02D2512-1:126b-11: 'phen pas so zhes bya ba ni srin po la
T02D2512-1:126b-12: sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:126b-13: gang gi tshe 'ga' zhig 'dos par gyur na /
T02D2512-1:126b-14: de'i tshe rdo rje sems dpa' khros par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:126b-15: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:126b-17: rdo rje 'bar ba'i steng du nges par bab par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:126b-18: de ltar na phyag rgya des 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:126b-19: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dgug pa dang gzhug pa
T02D2512-1:126b-20: dang gdul ba la ni zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-1:126b-21: pa la / dur khrod dam lam gyi bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor bris la /

T02D2512-1:127a-0: @127a * // bya ste / khro bo stong po mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa /

T02D2512-1:127a-30: bzlog nas kha'i grva gnyis su bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:127a-31: ha ha ha ha h'um zhes bzlas pa 'di ni
T02D2512-1:127a-32: rdo rje drag po'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i gad

T02D2512-1:127a-42: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /

T02D2512-1:127b-37: 'khrul 'khor rnams la 'bab par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:127b-38: de ni rdo rje 'jigs byed do //

T02D2512-1:127b-43: lcags sgrog rnams la 'phangs pas phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:128a-1: byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar ba rnams lcags sgrog la

T02D2512-1:128a-3: bya ste / 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go //

T02D2512-1:128a-5: dang po'i rdo rje bcings la mthe bong dang /
T02D2512-1:128a-6: mthe'u chud rdo rje rtse mo bzhi pa 'bar ba
T02D2512-1:128a-7: rnam par 'phro ba rab tu ston pa'i tshul du

T02D2512-1:128a-11: h'um zhes bya ba nyid zlos shing me bskyed par bya'o //

T02D2512-1:129a-0: @129a * // der gsang ba'i lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug nas bcug la /

T02D2512-1:129a-5: rmad du byung ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro //

T02D2512-1:129a-11: ba las dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can

T02D2512-1:135b-3: // gsungs so zhes bya ba ni 'di skad du bka' stsal pa'o //

T02D2512-1:138b-5: // g-yon pa'i snying gar bzhag pa la /
T02D2512-1:138b-6: g-yas kyis ral gri 'dzin pa lta bu ni mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi'o //
T02D2512-1:138b-7: rdo rje gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i tshul du 'jog pa ni nam mkha' snying po'i'o //
T02D2512-1:138b-8: rdo rje gar bskor zhing bkrol te /
T02D2512-1:138b-10: spyi gtsug tu bzhag pa ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyi'o //
T02D2512-1:138b-11: g-yas kyi g-yon pa dbye ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi'o ;
T02D2512-1:138b-12: / mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor ba ni sems
T02D2512-1:138b-13: bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i'o
T02D2512-1:138b-14: // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mnan pa 'tshir ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi'o //
T02D2512-1:138b-15: mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo mche ba ltar bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:138b-16: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:138b-17: byang phyogs na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
T02D2512-1:138b-18: kyi phyag rgya ni don yod par grub pa dang
T02D2512-1:138b-20: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-1:138b-21: po ni bris pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas bsam par
T02D2512-1:138b-22: bya'o // de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2512-1:138b-23: mdzad la sog spa phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa
T02D2512-1:138b-24: bya'o // byas nas / sngar bshad pa'i tshul nyid
T02D2512-1:138b-25: kyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur
T02D2512-1:138b-26: bya'o // byas nas / la / yang mchod yon phul te /
T02D2512-1:138b-29: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:138b-30: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:138b-31: de nas yid kyis dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs
T02D2512-1:138b-32: pa'i sprin rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du yang dag
T02D2512-1:138b-33: par mchod la / phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:138b-34: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02D2512-1:138b-35: rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T02D2512-1:138b-36: sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyin sreg bya ba nas /
T02D2512-1:138b-37: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sna ma bzhin
T02D2512-1:138b-38: du thab kyi dbus su dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis
T02D2512-1:138b-39: bkod nas / yang sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2512-1:138b-40: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgo ba'i gos la bzlas pa'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02D2512-1:138b-41: smad g-yogs bgo zhing ze'u kha bcings te /
T02D2512-1:139a-0: yang rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi'i snying bos gdong g-yogs kyis @139a * //
T02D2512-1:139a-1: ras la yongs su bzlas te /
T02D2512-1:139a-3: slob dpon gyis sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2512-1:139a-4: aa zhes bya ba bzlas pa'i bum pa sgon [?] gnas pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:139a-5: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i dang po'i rdo
T02D2512-1:139a-6: rje bcings nas badzra badzra aa zhes brjod cing zhugs
T02D2512-1:139a-7: la / ji srid deng bdag rdo rje sems grub mdzod //
T02D2512-1:139a-8: ces bya ba'i bar du sngar bshad pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad nas /
T02D2512-1:139a-10: rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag bya'o //
T02D2512-1:139a-11: de la rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rje ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-1:139a-12: rdo rje gar gyi mchod pas rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas shing /
T02D2512-1:139a-13: 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis phyag bya bas
T02D2512-1:139a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2512-1:139a-15: cad kyang rjes su mnyes par bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:139a-16: phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:139a-18: de nas bskor ba lan gsum byas ya /
T02D2512-1:139a-19: de kho na nyid brjod de /
T02D2512-1:139a-22: zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:139a-23: de nas de bzhin du gos gyon la /
T02D2512-1:139a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:139a-25: zhugs na zhes bya ba 'di'i don bshad pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:139a-26: bdag nyid slob dpon med par yang //
T02D2512-1:139a-27: zhes bya ba 'di dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang ma bskur ba ste /
T02D2512-1:139a-28: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dbang bskur ba rnams ni /
T02D2512-1:139a-29: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:139a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i slob
T02D2512-1:139a-31: dpon nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:139a-32: gyi slob dpon nyid du legs par byin gyis brlab
T02D2512-1:139a-33: par mdzad de zhes ston pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:139a-34: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2512-1:139a-35: gang zhig rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:139a-36: 'dir ni dbang ma bskur ba des kyang /
T02D2512-1:139a-37: dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bris te zhugs na /
T02D2512-1:139a-38: de lta na yang ji skad du gsungs pa'i 'bras bu thob bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:139a-39: deng nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:139a-40: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:139a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtogs pa dang
T02D2512-1:139a-42: zhes bya brgyud gzhan dag nas gsungs pa dag tu
T02D2512-1:139a-43: yang / dngos grub thams cad la zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:139a-44: sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa rnams la bdud la
T02D2512-1:139b-0: @139b sogs pas zil gyis mi non pas na mi
T02D2512-1:139b-2: de dag nyid kyis gsod par mi nus pas na /
T02D2512-1:139b-4: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:139b-5: de nas slob ma yang de bzhin du gzhug go
T02D2512-1:139b-6: zhes bya ba ni slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i
T02D2512-1:139b-7: phyir / rjes su gnang ba ji lta ba bzhin du gsol te /
T02D2512-1:139b-8: de'i rjes thogs nyid la bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho gas slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:139b-9: zhugs nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa byin la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:139b-10: slob ma rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du chu'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:139b-14: dar dpyang gi dbang bskur ba byin la aa zhes bya ba nyid zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:139b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:139b-16: de nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:139b-17: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs byin la /
T02D2512-1:139b-18: sems can kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pas dam tshig rnams kyang bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:139b-19: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sems can thams cad la phan pa ni /
T02D2512-1:139b-20: bde ba'i rnam par smin pa rgya chen por 'gyur ba'i las rnams te /
T02D2512-1:139b-21: de'i phyir ni de rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-1:139b-22: bstan pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thams cad do //
T02D2512-1:139b-23: de yongs su skyong zhing nyams su len ba ni grub pa ste de'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-1:139b-24: rnam par mi rtog sbyor ba yis //
T02D2512-1:139b-25: ci bde bar ni thams cad kyis //
T02D2512-1:139b-30: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa rnams ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyor ba ste /
T02D2512-1:139b-31: rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyor ba des bzlas brjod dam /
T02D2512-1:139b-33: dge ba'i las gzhan gang yang rung ba de //
T02D2512-1:139b-34: ci bde bar ni thams cad kyis //
T02D2512-1:139b-36: dngos po la mngon par zhen pa spangs pas /
T02D2512-1:139b-37: dge ba'i phyogs thams cad la bya ba'i rgyud las
T02D2512-1:139b-38: bshad pa'i stan la sogs pa'i nges pa'i gnod pa
T02D2512-1:139b-39: spangs te / ci bde bar thams cad kyis shig ces bya'o //
T02D2512-1:139b-40: de ltar dam tshig byin nas de nas de bzhin
T02D2512-1:139b-41: du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs
T02D2512-1:139b-42: pa'i tshul gyis bza' ba dang /
T02D2512-1:139b-44: gnas pa rnams kyis slob ma rnams longs spyod du gzhug cing /
T02D2512-1:139b-45: 'byor pa ci yod pas yang dag par tshim par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:139b-46: de nas mtshan ma bzhi po zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:140a-1: chub kyi sems rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ne'u gsing dang bcas pa'i dum bu dang /
T02D2512-1:140a-2: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:140a-5: gos la sogs pas gang ba'i snod dang /
T02D2512-1:140a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par
T02D2512-1:140a-7: bya ba'i phyir 'jam zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan
T02D2512-1:140a-8: dang / bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo
T02D2512-1:140a-9: bo nyid brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2512-1:140a-11: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs 'byor pa ji lta bas
T02D2512-1:140a-12: skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du slob dpon gyis
T02D2512-1:140a-13: slob ma rnams la sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:140a-14: mi bskyod pa'i rigs la ni ne'u gsing sa dang bcas pa'i dum bu'o //
T02D2512-1:140a-15: rin po che'i rigs la mngon par brtson pa rnams la ni ji skad du bshad pa'i snod do //
T02D2512-1:140a-16: 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs la mngon par brtson pa rnams la ni stan no //
T02D2512-1:140a-17: don yod par grub pa'i rigs la mngon par brtson
T02D2512-1:140a-18: pa rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sbyin
T02D2512-1:140a-19: par bya ste / 'di ni 'dir skal pa ji
T02D2512-1:140a-20: lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don yin
T02D2512-1:140a-21: par bya ste / no // dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:140a-22: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:140a-23: de nas de bzhin du zhes bya ba nas rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:140a-24: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji skad du bshad pa rnams ni /
T02D2512-1:140a-25: thams cad du song ba yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:140a-26: dam tshig chen po yin la /
T02D2512-1:140a-27: de las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs
T02D2512-1:140a-28: pa la yang nye bar gdags pas dam tshig chen
T02D2512-1:140a-30: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:140a-31: de nas de bzhin du zhes bya ba nas brtsams
T02D2512-1:140a-32: te sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don slar yang
T02D2512-1:140a-33: gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya ba ste
T02D2512-1:140a-34: / de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2512-1:140a-35: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sbyor bas
T02D2512-1:140a-36: 'di las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la
T02D2512-1:140a-38: bum pa rnams kyang rdo rje bsdams pa las byung
T02D2512-1:140a-39: ba'i dang po'i rdo rjes aa zhes bya ba brgya
T02D2512-1:140a-41: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas /
T02D2512-1:140a-42: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phye la /
T02D2512-1:140a-43: yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi nga rgyal gyis rdo rje bsdu ba byas te /
T02D2512-1:140a-44: rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen por bsgom zhing /
T02D2512-1:140b-0: @140b mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02D2512-1:140b-1: aa zhes bya ba zlos shing gsang ba'i lcags kyus
T02D2512-1:140b-2: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa thams cad bkug
T02D2512-1:140b-3: la / rang ge gnas su bcug ste rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad cing /
T02D2512-1:140b-8: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad de rdo rje
T02D2512-1:140b-9: bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrungs
T02D2512-1:140b-10: la / aa zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02D2512-1:140b-11: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:140b-12: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rdo
T02D2512-1:140b-13: rje'i ljags la de bzhin du aa zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:140b-15: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:140b-16: phyag rgya chen po dag bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:140b-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur zhing /
T02D2512-1:140b-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:140b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la aa zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02D2512-1:140b-21: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:140b-23: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2512-1:140b-24: dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pas mchod bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:140b-30: ba lang gi khyu la sogs pa phyi rol gyi
T02D2512-1:140b-31: mchod pa rnams kyang 'byor bar gyur na mchod la
T02D2512-1:140b-32: / me tog la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:140b-33: de nas yid kyi mchod pa byas la phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:140b-34: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i sbyin sreg byas la /
T02D2512-1:140b-35: ji skad du bshad pa'i gos dang /
T02D2512-1:140b-36: rgyan dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D2512-1:140b-37: phyag btsal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:140b-38: de nas aom sarba yo gtsitta autp'a da y'a mi /
T02D2512-1:140b-39: zhes bya bas byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:140b-40: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-1:140b-41: pa'i rdo rje blangs la rang gi snying gar gzhag
T02D2512-1:140b-42: ste / aa zhes bya bas rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la des bskyed nas /
T02D2512-1:140b-43: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:140b-44: su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho /
T02D2512-1:140b-45: badzra siddhya ya th'a su kham /
T02D2512-1:141a-1: nas sgo na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:141a-2: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-1:141a-3: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung nas /
T02D2512-1:141a-4: badzra badzra aa zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:141a-5: slob dpon shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug cing /
T02D2512-1:141a-6: badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:141a-7: de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:141a-8: badzra p'a sha h'um zhes brjod nas /
T02D2512-1:141a-9: yang yid kyis zhugs pas 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:141a-10: yang nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la badzra spho
T02D2512-1:141a-11: ta bam zhes bya ba dang yid kyis bcing bar
T02D2512-1:141a-12: bya'o // de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:141a-15: rdo rje 'bebs pas bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02D2512-1:141a-16: de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs nas /
T02D2512-1:141a-17: ma h'a ra ta su dri dha su to she //
T02D2512-1:141a-18: su su kham badzra satva aaddya siddhya mam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:141a-19: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag byas la dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum bya'o //
T02D2512-1:141a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste /
T02D2512-1:141a-22: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D2512-1:141a-23: rdo rje chen po nor che zhing //
T02D2512-1:141a-24: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02D2512-1:141a-25: rdo rje sems dpa' deng bdag 'grub //
T02D2512-1:141a-26: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya mam //
T02D2512-1:141a-27: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la /
T02D2512-1:141a-28: bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:141a-29: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:141a-30: yang g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya phye nas /
T02D2512-1:141a-31: bdag nyid la dbab par bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:141a-32: aa aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas so //
T02D2512-1:141a-33: de nas aa zhes bya bas me tog der bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:141a-34: de nas de blangs la rang gi mgo la de nyid kyis bcings bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:141a-35: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:141a-36: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:141a-38: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2512-1:141a-39: dbab pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dgrol bar
T02D2512-1:141a-40: bya'o // de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen por rang bsams la /
T02D2512-1:141a-41: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02D2512-1:141a-42: ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bstan nas dngos
T02D2512-1:141a-43: grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad pa de srid kyi
T02D2512-1:141a-45: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor la /
T02D2512-1:141b-0: @141b bdag nyid dbul ba'i tshul gyis snying gar bzhag
T02D2512-1:141b-1: nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod de sgeg mo
T02D2512-1:141b-2: la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bcom ldan
T02D2512-1:141b-4: glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:141b-5: de nas yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2512-1:141b-6: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing
T02D2512-1:141b-7: rdo rje thal mos bskor bas phyag bya zhing me
T02D2512-1:141b-8: tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:141b-9: dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:141b-10: de la dang po kho nar dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-1:141b-11: rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje'i me tog gi
T02D2512-1:141b-12: yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la
T02D2512-1:141b-13: bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig byas la /
T02D2512-1:141b-14: aom ma h'a su kha badzra aa mo gha sa
T02D2512-1:141b-15: ma yo da ka siddha aa bhishnytsi sa rba su
T02D2512-1:141b-16: kha so ma na sya ni aa ddya ku ru
T02D2512-1:141b-17: ku ru dza: h'um bam ho: aa zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:141b-18: brjod do // de nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:141b-19: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnal 'byor chen por gsungs
T02D2512-1:141b-20: pa'i gnas rnams su rang gi lus la lha thams
T02D2512-1:141b-22: phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs
T02D2512-1:141b-23: padma'i steng du phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis 'dug
T02D2512-1:141b-24: nas / me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:141b-26: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02D2512-1:141b-27: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02D2512-1:141b-28: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa aa zhes brjod de /
T02D2512-1:141b-29: des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02D2512-1:141b-30: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02D2512-1:141b-34: bris pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan rdo
T02D2512-1:141b-35: rje rin chen yongs su bzlas pas dbang bskur bar
T02D2512-1:141b-36: bya'o // de nas rdo rje dang /
T02D2512-1:141b-38: ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02D2512-1:141b-39: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:141b-40: de nas me tog la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa
T02D2512-1:141b-41: rnams kyis kyang bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de
T02D2512-1:141b-43: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //
T02D2512-1:141b-44: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2512-1:141b-45: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
T02D2512-1:141b-46: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02D2512-1:141b-48: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:142a-1: pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2512-1:142a-3: lung bstan pa dag kyang blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:142a-4: de nas yang bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2512-1:142a-5: ci 'dod par bzlas pa byas nas /
T02D2512-1:142a-6: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:142a-7: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi //
T02D2512-1:142a-8: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02D2512-1:142a-9: sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:142a-10: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2512-1:142a-12: slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:142a-13: 'di ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2512-1:142a-14: de nas sngom pa sbyin par 'os pa'i slob ma
T02D2512-1:142a-15: la sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdom pa 'dzin du
T02D2512-1:142a-16: gzhug par bya'o // de nas de bzhin du byang
T02D2512-1:142a-17: chub kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa yang byed
T02D2512-1:142a-18: gzhug par bya'o // du bcug nas / de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:142a-19: de rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2512-1:142a-20: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod la /
T02D2512-1:142a-21: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:142a-22: deng khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur gyis /
T02D2512-1:142a-23: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang
T02D2512-1:142a-24: ba'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la brjod par
T02D2512-1:142a-25: mi bya zhing / dad pa med par yang ma byed cig /
T02D2512-1:142a-26: de nas lnga po bsdus pa bcings la /
T02D2512-1:142a-27: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:142a-28: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gsang //
T02D2512-1:142a-29: sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsgrub pa //
T02D2512-1:142a-30: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02D2512-1:142a-31: rigs rnams kun gyis khyod brlag 'gyur //
T02D2512-1:142a-32: aom ma h'a su kha ha na sa ma ya aa dhi kra ma mi su ra ta stvam /
T02D2512-1:142a-33: de nas yon gyi mchog blangs la /
T02D2512-1:142a-34: phyi rol gyi sgo la mngon par phyogs nas gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:142a-35: bdag nyid 'jug pa'i tshul du bcug nas /
T02D2512-1:142a-36: cho ga thams cad snga ma bzhin du rjes su spyod la /
T02D2512-1:142a-37: dam tshig 'di slob ma rnams kyi rna bar bsgrag par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:142a-38: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02D2512-1:142a-39: bstan pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:142a-40: rnam par mi rtog sbyor ba yis //
T02D2512-1:142a-41: ci bde bar ni thams cad kyis //
T02D2512-1:142a-42: lhag ma rnams ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:142a-43: slob ma zhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:142a-45: // / de ltar dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:142a-46: dam tshig thob pa rnams la /
T02D2512-1:142b-0: slob dpon gyi dngos grub kyi ye shes @142b bslab
T02D2512-1:142b-1: par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya
T02D2512-1:142b-2: ba'i phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:142b-3: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:142b-4: 'dis bsgrub par bya ba yin pas na bsgrub pa ste /
T02D2512-1:142b-7: ras la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:142b-8: 'di dag ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-1:142b-9: de nas des de bzhin du sems dpa' mchog bsgrub pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:142b-10: ji ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgrub pa bshad pa de bzhin du /
T02D2512-1:142b-11: 'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsgrub pa la yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:142b-12: dngos grub mchog rnams kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:142b-13: ji ltar der rdo rje sems dpa'i ras ris la sangs rgyas nyid dang /
T02D2512-1:142b-14: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi dngos grub kyi mchog
T02D2512-1:142b-15: tu gyur pa de bzhin du 'dir yang grub par
T02D2512-1:142b-18: zla ba nya nas brtsams nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2512-1:142b-19: par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar rdo rje'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-1:142b-20: bcings te / ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur pas /
T02D2512-1:142b-21: dang po bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2512-1:142b-22: rdo rje tshig gis aa zhes bya ba ji srid
T02D2512-1:142b-23: zla ba gcig gis sngon du bsnyen pa byas par
T02D2512-1:142b-24: 'gyur ba de ji srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod
T02D2512-1:142b-25: bya'o ; / de nas ras la rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgya dang por brtsam zhing /
T02D2512-1:142b-26: phyis ci bder bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:142b-29: dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad phyag
T02D2512-1:142b-30: gnyis byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya dang ldan par
T02D2512-1:142b-31: bri bar bya'o // de bzhin du gzhan thams cad
T02D2512-1:142b-32: ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du
T02D2512-1:142b-34: de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:142b-35: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:142b-36: de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa'i sbyong bas zla
T02D2512-1:142b-37: ba phyi ma nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bya zhing
T02D2512-1:142b-38: / de'i tshe mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-1:142b-39: de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das kyis mthong ba stsal nas /
T02D2512-1:142b-40: sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid stsol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-1:142b-41: gzhan yang ras la bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig pu bris te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:142b-42: snga ma bzhin du bsnyen pa byas pa'o //
T02D2512-1:142b-43: bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig po ras la bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:143a-2: phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:143a-4: de nas zla ba phyi ma'i nya la bab pa dang /
T02D2512-1:143a-5: mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02D2512-1:143a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing /
T02D2512-1:143a-7: ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:143a-8: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ste /
T02D2512-1:143a-9: sngon du bsnyen pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-1:143a-10: ma bsgrubs pas kyang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:143a-11: de nas ras ris grub pa ma bsgrub pas so //
T02D2512-1:143a-12: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:143a-13: ye shes babs pa med kyang zhes ston pa yin te /
T02D2512-1:143a-14: gang zhig ye shes babs par gyur pa de la ni /
T02D2512-1:143a-15: las rnams bklags pa tsam nyid kyis shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:143a-16: 'di lta ste zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nye bar ston pa'i don to //
T02D2512-1:143a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i bsgrub pa'i mchod pa ni ;
T02D2512-1:143a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'o //
T02D2512-1:143a-20: ji snyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba thams cad phul bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:143a-21: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sgom pas so //
T02D2512-1:143a-22: bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyis bde ba gang zhig byung bar gyur pa de rnams ni chung du dang /
T02D2512-1:143a-23: 'bring dang chen po rnams ji snyed pa ste /
T02D2512-1:143a-24: ji ltar thob pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba rnams so //
T02D2512-1:143a-25: de rnams dbul ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2512-1:143a-26: snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid du
T02D2512-1:143a-27: sems can thams cad bskyed par yang dang yang du
T02D2512-1:143a-29: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:143a-30: sangs rgyas ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02D2512-1:143a-31: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
T02D2512-1:143a-32: bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar ro //
T02D2512-1:143a-33: de rnams la mchod par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-1:143a-34: bdag phul bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:143a-35: phyag 'tshal ba bzhi'i sbyor bas bdag nyid phul nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:143a-36: dkon mchog gsum ni sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2512-1:143a-39: 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
T02D2512-1:143b-0: sangs rgyas chos dang @143b dge 'dun ni //
T02D2512-1:143b-1: dam tshig chen po gsum 'di yin //
T02D2512-1:143b-2: ras la dkon mchog gsum dang ni //
T02D2512-1:143b-3: byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mchog bri //
T02D2512-1:143b-4: zhes bya la sogs pa bshad pas so //
T02D2512-1:143b-5: de rnams la mchod par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-1:143b-6: me tag la sogs pa'i bzlas pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
T02D2512-1:143b-10: lha mo dpal chen bzhi'i snying po bzla zhing phyag
T02D2512-1:143b-11: rgya dang ldan pas so zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2512-1:143b-13: khams gsum na spyod pa rnams so //
T02D2512-1:143b-14: de rnams la mchod pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams su bskyed pa ste /
T02D2512-1:143b-15: khams gsum pa rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bsgoms pas /
T02D2512-1:143b-16: des khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad
T02D2512-1:143b-17: rnam par byang ngo zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi
T02D2512-1:143b-19: thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:143b-20: khams gsum gyi rdo rje rgyas par 'khor lo chen
T02D2512-1:143b-21: po thog ma med pa las byung ba bsgoms pas
T02D2512-1:143b-22: so // khams gsum ma lus pa na spyod pa'i
T02D2512-1:143b-23: sems can gyi khams thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-1:143b-25: bzlas pa ni thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas pa ste /
T02D2512-1:143b-26: bzlas pa des sems can thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:143b-27: chos thams cad bsdus pa ni /
T02D2512-1:143b-28: byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02D2512-1:143b-29: sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:143b-30: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:143b-31: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi nye bar len pa'o //
T02D2512-1:143b-33: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi po 'don pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:143b-34: rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam
T02D2512-1:143b-35: pa nyid kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
T02D2512-1:143b-36: ni byang chub chen po'o zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2512-1:143b-37: thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D2512-1:143b-38: thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang
T02D2512-1:143b-39: chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o zhes gsungs pa'i
T02D2512-1:143b-40: bar gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T02D2512-1:143b-42: des byang chub kyi sems chen po la sogs pa'i chos rnams bsdus par gyur pa yin zhing /
T02D2512-1:143b-43: de lta bu'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:144a-0: bdud thams cad 'dul ba la ni brtan zhing nges pa'i bzlas pas so zhes bya @144a * //
T02D2512-1:144a-2: gang gi tshe sgrub pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i
T02D2512-1:144a-3: rnal 'byor pa la bdud dag de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2512-1:144a-4: thams cad kyi gzugs kyi rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2512-1:144a-5: sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul las
T02D2512-1:144a-6: rnal 'byor pa'i sems phyir phyogs par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-1:144a-8: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i sa gnon gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:144a-9: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom zhing /
T02D2512-1:144a-10: aa zhes bya ba'i bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02D2512-1:144a-11: de lta bu brtan zhing nges pa'i bzlas pas ni bdud thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:144a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba thob
T02D2512-1:144a-13: pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2512-1:144a-14: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying por bdag nyid bsams la
T02D2512-1:144a-15: / rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-1:144a-16: aa zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:144a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:144a-18: rgyan thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:144a-19: yang bdag nyid des dbang bskur zhing /
T02D2512-1:144a-20: bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid la rgyan thams cad gdags par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:144a-21: de lta bus ni dbang thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:144a-22: chos thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D2512-1:144a-23: de'i thob pa nyid ni rnyed pa'o //
T02D2512-1:144a-25: rdo rje padma la lta bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:144a-26: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya
T02D2512-1:144a-27: chen po ni rdo rje padma la lta ba ste
T02D2512-1:144a-28: / de chos nyid thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:144a-29: de yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bcings pas /
T02D2512-1:144a-30: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam bar dag par bsgom zhing /
T02D2512-1:144a-31: aa zhes bya ba'i bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02D2512-1:144a-32: de lta bus ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:144a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:144a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las ni 'gro ba'i don bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:144a-36: de'i dngos grub ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-1:144a-37: de thob pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-1:144a-39: thams cad rdo rje'i las kyi mchog gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:144a-40: dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:144b-0: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las kyi gzugs @144b su bdag nyid bsams te /
T02D2512-1:144b-1: aa zhes bya ba bzlas nas /
T02D2512-1:144b-2: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:144b-3: sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:144b-4: sangs rgyas nyid rab tu 'thob pa ni 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba nyid thob pa'o //

T02D2512-1:144b-7: na nyid kyi phyag rgya chen bos so zhes bya
T02D2512-1:144b-8: ba gsungs te / rdo rje ye shes ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
T02D2512-1:144b-9: de ston par byed pa'i khu tshur ni byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
