T02D2512-1:150b-7: la sogs pa'i khro bo brgyad sa la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:150b-8: dang bcas pa'i khyams las byas pa h'um nyid kyis
T02D2512-1:150b-9: gzhag par bya'o // gang gi phyir lha thams cad
T02D2512-1:150b-10: kyi sngags ni 'dir yi ge h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:150b-11: gzhag par bya'o // yin pa'i phyir // 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa //
T02D2512-1:150b-12: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-1:150b-13: 'khor lo de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:150b-14: slar yang gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:150b-15: bri ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:150b-16: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas rnal 'byor chen po byas las /
T02D2512-1:150b-17: dam tshig gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:150b-18: dkyil 'khor 'di ji srid du mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa'i bar du bsgoms par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:150b-19: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dam tshig gsum bsgoms la /
T02D2512-1:150b-20: bar snang gi phyogs su snga ma bzhin du yang dag par gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:150b-21: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su legs par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:150b-22: 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra'o //
T02D2512-1:150b-23: de'i nang du de'i phyed kyi tshad kyi thig rdo
T02D2512-1:150b-24: rje zlum por dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dang 'dra ba
T02D2512-1:150b-25: rdo rje 'bar ba 'od kun du 'khrigs par phyi
T02D2512-1:150b-26: dang nang du bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:150b-27: // de nas lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna
T02D2512-1:150b-28: tshogs padma'i gdan byas pa'i dbus su rdo rje h'um
T02D2512-1:150b-29: mdzad ji skad du bshad pa bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:150b-30: de'i shar phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje yid las
T02D2512-1:150b-31: byung ba'i gnas su khro bo rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D2512-1:150b-33: lhor k'i li k'i la'i gnas su lcags kyu 'dzin
T02D2512-1:150b-34: pa sku mdog ljang gu / nub tu rdo rje
T02D2512-1:150b-35: dran pa'i gnas su ral gri 'dzin pa sku mdog
T02D2512-1:150b-36: sngon po // byang du rdo rje bsnyems pa'i gnas
T02D2512-1:150b-37: su zhags pa 'dzin pa sku mdog ser po dgod
T02D2512-1:150b-38: sngon po // par bya'o // shar lho la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su dbyig pa dang /
T02D2512-1:150b-41: chu gri 'dzin pa'i khro bo rnams rim bzhin du
T02D2512-1:150b-42: rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa dang sku mdog
T02D2512-1:150b-43: mthun par bri bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:150b-44: de dag thams cad kyang g-yon brkyang ba'i nas pas bzhugs pa la /
T02D2512-1:151a-0: g-yon pa khro bo'i khu tshur @151a * //
T02D2512-1:151a-1: thugs ka'i phyogs su bzhag nas sdigs mdzub bsgreng ba la brtson pa /
T02D2512-1:151a-2: g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi mtshan
T02D2512-1:151a-3: ma bsdams shing stang stabs dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'o
T02D2512-1:151a-4: // phyi'i mtshams bzhi'i lha'i snam bu la sgeg mo
T02D2512-1:151a-5: la sogs pa'i khro mo bzhi de bzhin du bri
T02D2512-1:151a-6: // bar bya'o ; / shar phyogs kyi sgor mda' dang gzhu /
T02D2512-1:151a-9: byang gi sgor mdung rtse gsum pa dgod pa'o //
T02D2512-1:151a-10: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams su dbang phyug chen po
T02D2512-1:151a-11: chung ma dang bcas pa ma gtogs par rdo rje
T02D2512-1:151a-12: sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis 'dod pa'i khams
T02D2512-1:151a-13: kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa nas chu la'i mthar
T02D2512-1:151a-14: thug pa'i bar du bri bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:151a-15: 'dir thams cad kyang h'um zhes bya bas yang dag par dgod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:151a-16: khyams kyi phyi rol du dkyil 'khor gyi nye 'khor
T02D2512-1:151a-17: kun du phreng ba sna tshogs dang ba dan sngon
T02D2512-1:151a-18: po dril bu btags pa rtse mo sna tshogs pas
T02D2512-1:151a-20: de nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:151a-21: yang dag par de ltar bris nas dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:151a-22: cho ga thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gang dag tu
T02D2512-1:151a-23: 'das ma thag pa'i cho ga thams cad kyis 'jug
T02D2512-1:151a-24: na / 'dir slob dpon ji ltar 'jug par bya zhe na /
T02D2512-1:151a-25: sngon po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:151a-26: kha dog sngon po dang ldan pa'i ras zung blangs la /
T02D2512-1:151a-28: gnyis pas stod g-yogs byas la /
T02D2512-1:151a-29: gsum pas ze'u kha bcings pa ste /
T02D2512-1:151a-30: de ltar gos sngon po bgos par gyur nas zhugs na /
T02D2512-1:151a-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje slob dpon byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2512-1:151a-32: de lta bur byas pa 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad kyi khros pas zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:151a-33: dpal rdo rje khro bo h'um mdzad kyi nyams dang ldan pa ni khros pa'o //
T02D2512-1:151a-34: de yang rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la
T02D2512-1:151a-35: sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba lta bur bzhag
T02D2512-1:151a-36: ste / mthe bong rdo rje bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:151a-37: de 'dzin cing bdag gir byed pa gang yin pa
T02D2512-1:151a-38: de ni rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya yongs
T02D2512-1:151a-40: dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa dang bcas pas dpal
T02D2512-1:151a-41: rdo rje h'um mdzad du bdag nyid lhag par mos
T02D2512-1:151a-42: par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:151a-43: de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa dang
T02D2512-1:151b-0: bcas @151b pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi nga rgyal
T02D2512-1:151b-2: dkyil 'khor 'dir gzhug pa'i rnal 'byor pa la ni /
T02D2512-1:151b-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis rdo rje
T02D2512-1:151b-4: rigs kyi slob dpon du byin gyis rlob par mdzad
T02D2512-1:151b-5: do // deng nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:151b-6: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa de nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02D2512-1:151b-7: sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing zhes
T02D2512-1:151b-8: bya ba mtshams med pa la sogs pa sdig pa
T02D2512-1:151b-9: thams cad dang bral zhing mi gsong par 'gyur ro
T02D2512-1:151b-10: // de nyid kyis ni mi tshugs pa ste /
T02D2512-1:151b-11: zil gyis mi non pa dang /
T02D2512-1:151b-12: khams gsum thams cad na spyod pa'i dbang phyug chen
T02D2512-1:151b-13: po la sogs pa yang h'um zhes bya ba tsam
T02D2512-1:151b-14: gyis tshar gcod par nus ba dang /
T02D2512-1:151b-16: de dag nyid la bde ba dang yid bde ba ster bas na phan 'dogs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:151b-17: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad dang 'dra bar thams cad las rgyal ba dang /
T02D2512-1:151b-18: 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur zhing /
T02D2512-1:151b-19: h'um zhes bya ba tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po
T02D2512-1:151b-20: la sogs pa rang dbang du byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D2512-1:151b-21: // dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2512-1:151b-22: bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob
T02D2512-1:151b-23: // par 'gyur ba'o // slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2512-1:151b-24: de nas slob ma de bzhin du bcug ste zhes
T02D2512-1:151b-25: bya ba ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga'i
T02D2512-1:151b-26: 'og tu rang gi 'jug pa'i tshul gyis slob ma
T02D2512-1:151b-28: bcug nas de'i 'og tu de rnams la h'um zhes bya ba sbyin no //
T02D2512-1:151b-29: ji ltar 'dir snying po spyin par bshad pa de
T02D2512-1:151b-30: bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rigs
T02D2512-1:151b-31: kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang shes par bya'o
T02D2512-1:151b-32: // de nas rdo rje rnon po rtse bzhi pa
T02D2512-1:151b-33: 'bar ba sbyin la zhes bya ba ni dbu rgyan
T02D2512-1:151b-34: gyi dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu rdo rje rnon po
T02D2512-1:151b-35: rtse bzhi pa 'bar ba h'um zhes bya bas sbyin
T02D2512-1:151b-36: // par bya ste / h'um zhes bya bzlos shing /
T02D2512-1:151b-37: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:151b-38: de ltar dbang bskur nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje
T02D2512-1:151b-39: brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:151b-40: / 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:151b-41: de nas de bzhin du dbyung bar bya'o zhes bya
T02D2512-1:151b-42: ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2512-1:151b-43: las bshad pa bzhin du cho ga rnams rjes su
T02D2512-1:151b-44: spyad la / dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdu ba ji
T02D2512-1:151b-45: lta ba bzhin du bya ste dbyung bar bya'o zhes
T02D2512-1:152a-2: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ji skad du bshad
T02D2512-1:152a-3: pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor
T02D2512-1:152a-4: ba dang / yang rang gi sbyor bas rnal 'byor
T02D2512-1:152a-5: chen po byas la 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-1:152a-6: rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02D2512-1:152a-7: me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal pa'i bum pa dang /
T02D2512-1:152a-8: lha thams cad kyi bum pa dang /
T02D2512-1:152a-9: bum pa gang ba rnams la h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:152a-10: re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas
T02D2512-1:152a-11: la dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phye ste /
T02D2512-1:152a-12: rdo rje bsdu ba byas nas /
T02D2512-1:152a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
T02D2512-1:152a-14: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod de ;
T02D2512-1:152a-16: h'um zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
T02D2512-1:152a-17: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad ba dang /
T02D2512-1:152a-18: mtshams dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /
T02D2512-1:152a-19: rab dang dra ba dag byas nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi bcings la /
T02D2512-1:152a-20: rdo rje bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad go cha bskon te /
T02D2512-1:152a-21: h'um zhes bya bas mchod yon phul la /
T02D2512-1:152a-22: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas h'um dri shya dza: h'um bom ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2512-1:152a-23: sa ma ya stvam aa hom h'um /
T02D2512-1:152a-24: zhes bya bas bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:152a-25: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya nyid ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:152a-26: de nas rang gi lce la rdo rje bsam zhing
T02D2512-1:152a-27: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:152a-28: ljags la h'um bsam par bya ste 'di ni chos
T02D2512-1:152a-29: kyi phyag rgya'o // aa zhes bya ba rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2512-1:152a-30: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:152a-31: las kyi phyag rgya h'um zhes bya ba nyid zlos
T02D2512-1:152a-33: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2512-1:152a-34: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis snyims [?] pa byas la
T02D2512-1:152a-35: g-yas pas rdo rje gsor ba 'di ni bcom ldan
T02D2512-1:152a-36: 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o
T02D2512-1:152a-37: // gzhan rnams ni phyag rgya chen po nyid dang 'dra'o //
T02D2512-1:152a-38: de nas rdo rje dril bu dang /
T02D2512-1:152a-39: rdo rje rtse bzhi pa blangs la bris pa dang /
T02D2512-1:152a-40: rjes su mthun par rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen por bsam pa dang /
T02D2512-1:152a-41: gzhan rnams kyi yang bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:152a-42: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas /
T02D2512-1:152a-43: rdo rje phreng ba gsum gyis dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:152a-44: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad dbang bskur bar
T02D2512-1:152a-45: bya zhing rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni
T02D2512-1:152a-46: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyi rdo rje phreng ba'i
T02D2512-1:152b-0: dbang @152b bskur ba'i phyag rgya dag gis dbang bskur
T02D2512-1:152b-1: ro // de nas de bzhin du mchod yon phul la bum pa dang bum pa gang ba dang /
T02D2512-1:152b-2: na bza' dang bla re la sogs pa phul la /
T02D2512-1:152b-3: me tog gi shing la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lnga'i mchod pa byas la /
T02D2512-1:152b-4: phyi rol du glu dang gar dang rol mo dang /
T02D2512-1:152b-5: rta dang glang po che dang ;
T02D2512-1:152b-6: ba lang gi chu rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:152b-7: de nas khro bo'i mtshon cha la sogs pa mchod
T02D2512-1:152b-8: pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod
T02D2512-1:152b-9: pa / yid kyi mchod pa byas te /
T02D2512-1:152b-10: phyi rol du gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2512-1:152b-11: de nas ras sngon po la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas te /
T02D2512-1:152b-12: de nas smad g-yogs dang stod g-yogs ze'u kha dag byas la /
T02D2512-1:152b-13: yang gcig la rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02D2512-1:152b-15: lcags sgrog dang 'bebs pa yongs su bzlas pas rang gi gdong g-yogs te /
T02D2512-1:152b-16: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:152b-17: de nas de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02D2512-1:152b-18: rdo rje rtse bzhi pa 'bar ba snying gar de bzhin du gzhag la /
T02D2512-1:152b-19: snga ma bzhin du shar sgo la mngon par phyogs
T02D2512-1:152b-20: pa'i phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag
T02D2512-1:152b-21: nyid dbang bskur nas 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-1:152b-22: rgya bcing la de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng
T02D2512-1:152b-23: ba blangs te / badzra badzra h'um zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:152b-24: shar phyogs kyi sgor aom badzra aam ku sha ma
T02D2512-1:152b-25: h'a kro dha a'a karsha ya sarba sa ma y'a
T02D2512-1:152b-26: h'um dza: zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:152b-27: rdo rje lcags kyus bdag nyid dgug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:152b-28: lhor aom badzra p'a sha ma h'a kro dha pra
T02D2512-1:152b-29: be sha ya sarba sa ma y'a h'um h'um zhes
T02D2512-1:152b-30: bya ba dang gzhug bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:152b-31: nub tu aom badzra sphot ma h'a kro dha bandha
T02D2512-1:152b-32: bandha sarba sa ma y'a h'um bam zhes bya bas
T02D2512-1:152b-33: bcing bar bya'o // byang phyogs kyi sgor zhugs te /
T02D2512-1:152b-34: aom badzra a'a be sha ya ma h'a kro dha
T02D2512-1:152b-35: a'a be sha ya sarba sa ma y'a h'um aa
T02D2512-1:152b-36: zhes byabs bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02D2512-1:152b-37: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:152b-45: de nas rdo rje gsor zhing khros pas khro gnyer dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pas phyag bya'o //
T02D2512-1:152b-46: de nas slob dpon cher khros shing //
T02D2512-1:152b-47: rdo rje can gyi slob ma mchog / rdo rje h'um mdzad sdigs mdzub dang //
T02D2512-1:152b-48: h'um zhes bya bas rab tu sbyar //
T02D2512-1:153a-2: / khro bos 'dul ba de lta bus //
T02D2512-1:153a-4: dgyes pa yang ni rab tu 'gyur //
T02D2512-1:153a-5: yang 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-1:153a-6: bskor ba lan gsum byas la /
T02D2512-1:153a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste /
T02D2512-1:153a-8: 'di skad du zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:153a-9: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D2512-1:153a-10: rdo rje chen po nor che zhing //
T02D2512-1:153a-11: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02D2512-1:153a-12: rdo rje sems dpar deng bdag 'grub //
T02D2512-1:153a-13: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhy'a mam /
T02D2512-1:153a-14: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:153a-15: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:153a-16: yang rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:153a-18: zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:153a-19: de nas yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya phye la /
T02D2512-1:153a-20: h'um aa zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod na 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:153a-21: de nas h'um zhes bya bas me tog dor ro //
T02D2512-1:153a-22: de nas blangs la h'um nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:153a-23: de nas de ltar babs par gyur pa dang /
T02D2512-1:153a-24: 'di ltar gdong g-yogs h'um zhes bya ba nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:153a-25: de nas h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:153a-26: bcom ldan 'das la khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02D2512-1:153a-27: ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas dngos
T02D2512-1:153a-28: grub thams cad stsal ba de srid kyi bar du
T02D2512-1:153a-29: bzlas brjod bya'o // de nas rdo rje thal mos
T02D2512-1:153a-30: bskor bas shis pa rjod par byed pa'i tshul du
T02D2512-1:153a-31: rang gi snying gar bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:153a-32: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa byas nas /
T02D2512-1:153a-33: khro bo'i mtshon cha la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod
T02D2512-1:153a-34: pa rnam pa bzhis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas
T02D2512-1:153a-35: pa yang dag par mchod la glu dang gar dang
T02D2512-1:153a-36: rol mo'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod par bya'o
T02D2512-1:153a-37: // de nas yang phyag rgya chen por bsams la /
T02D2512-1:153a-38: bcom ldan 'das la khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02D2512-1:153a-39: rdo rje thal mos bskor bar phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:153a-40: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba rnams kyang blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:153a-41: de la dang po'i kho nar dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02D2512-1:153a-42: me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2512-1:153a-43: bum pa la sngags 'di bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa
T02D2512-1:153a-44: gcig bya ste / aom ma h'a su kha zhes
T02D2512-1:153a-45: bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i bum pa'i
T02D2512-1:153b-0: @153b de nas bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:153b-1: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnal 'byor chen po las
T02D2512-1:153b-2: bshad pa'i gnas rnams su rang gi lus la rdo
T02D2512-1:153b-3: rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa yang dag par bzhag
T02D2512-1:153b-4: la / phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs
T02D2512-1:153b-5: padma'i steng du dbang phyug chen po chung ma dang
T02D2512-1:153b-7: de gnyis kyi steng du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi
T02D2512-1:153b-8: phyag rgya chen po g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas
T02D2512-1:153b-10: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la mchod yon blangs te /
T02D2512-1:153b-11: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas /
T02D2512-1:153b-12: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02D2512-1:153b-13: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:153b-14: des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02D2512-1:153b-15: de nas yang sangs rgyas kyi phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba blangs pa la /
T02D2512-1:153b-18: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba snga ma bzhin du blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:153b-22: bris pa'i dbu rgyan sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2512-1:153b-25: rdo rje'i phreng ba dang bcas pas phreng ba de
T02D2512-1:153b-26: bcings la re re zhing bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D2512-1:153b-27: bya zhing rdo rje rin chen yang bzlas la des
T02D2512-1:153b-28: bdag nyid dbang bskur ba dar dbyangs dang bcas pa
T02D2512-1:153b-29: byas te / rdo rje 'bar ba dang bdag po dang /
T02D2512-1:153b-30: ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:153b-31: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i ba rtul zhugs blang bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:153b-33: phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje ste //
T02D2512-1:153b-34: ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba la //
T02D2512-1:153b-35: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2512-1:153b-36: de nas phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:153b-37: khro bo'i mtshon cha'i phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:153b-38: de ltar bdag nyid mchod nas /
T02D2512-1:153b-39: de kho na nyid kyis rdo rje gzung phar bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:153b-40: rtag tu 'dod chags las byung khro //
T02D2512-1:153b-41: rdo rje sems dpas 'dul ba'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:153b-42: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba yang //
T02D2512-1:153b-43: rab tu 'jigs pa'i snying po yin //
T02D2512-1:153b-44: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid do //
T02D2512-1:153b-45: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2512-1:153b-46: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02D2512-1:153b-47: nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2512-1:153b-48: 'di dag thams cad myur du bsgrub //
T02D2512-1:153b-49: ces bya ba ni chos te 'dis dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:154a-0: @154a * // de nas 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:154a-1: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:154a-2: thams cad nam mkha' mchog sbyor bas //
T02D2512-1:154a-3: thams cad nam mkha' zhes smra zhing //
T02D2512-1:154a-4: rdo rje phyag rgyas rgyas btab la //
T02D2512-1:154a-5: khams gsum yang ni bza' bar bya //
T02D2512-1:154a-6: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig go //
T02D2512-1:154a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la sngags bzlas nas /
T02D2512-1:154a-8: tshigs / rdo rje phyag rgyas rgyas btab la //
T02D2512-1:154a-9: khams gsum yang ni bza' dang /
T02D2512-1:154a-10: lung bstan pa yang bcom ldan 'das las mnos la
T02D2512-1:154a-11: yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:154a-12: dang / bzlas brjod byas nas phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:154a-13: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:154a-14: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi //
T02D2512-1:154a-15: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02D2512-1:154a-16: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:154a-17: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2512-1:154a-18: de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:154a-19: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga'o //
T02D2512-1:154a-20: de nas rang gi sdom pa sbyin par 'os pa
T02D2512-1:154a-21: la sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis dam tshig 'dzin du
T02D2512-1:154a-22: gzhug pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug la /
T02D2512-1:154a-23: de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed nas /
T02D2512-1:154a-24: de rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:154a-25: spos dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D2512-1:154a-27: shar sgo la bltas nas gnas pa'i bum pas dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:154a-28: bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho gas bcug la /
T02D2512-1:154a-29: cho ga thams cad la rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:154a-30: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:154a-32: // / rdo rje ni rdo rje'i rigs te /
T02D2512-1:154a-33: de'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:154a-34: de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang ;
T02D2512-1:154a-35: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad nas /
T02D2512-1:154a-36: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa
T02D2512-1:154a-37: rnams la slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes
T02D2512-1:154a-38: bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par
T02D2512-1:154a-39: bya ba'i phyir / de nas sgrub pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:154a-40: de la ras la sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs
T02D2512-1:154a-41: pa'i sgrub pa ni ras la bcom ldan 'das zhes
T02D2512-1:154a-42: bya ba la sogs pa 'di nyid kyis gsungs pa
T02D2512-1:154a-43: yin te / snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02D2512-1:154a-44: rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgyas h'um zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:154a-45: zlos shing brtsam par byas la dkyil 'khor gyi tshul
T02D2512-1:154b-0: nyid kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das @154b
T02D2512-1:154b-1: pa'i lha thams cad bri ba'am /
T02D2512-1:154b-3: de nas sgrub pa chen po la yang de bzhin te /
T02D2512-1:154b-4: de bzhin du dngos grub mchog rnams ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:154b-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i skabs su gsungs pa'i cho ga nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid dam /
T02D2512-1:154b-6: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'dir bsgrub par bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02D2512-1:154b-7: / de bas na de bzhin du dngos grub mchog rnams la ni zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2512-1:154b-8: ras la bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:154b-9: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad dpa' bo gcig pu bri ba'o //
T02D2512-1:154b-10: de'i mdun du lag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcings te ;
T02D2512-1:154b-11: bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o zhes bya ba ni khams gsum
T02D2512-1:154b-12: rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis
T02D2512-1:154b-13: bcings ba'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:154b-15: dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:154b-16: bdag la byin gyis rlob pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas /
T02D2512-1:154b-17: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:154b-18: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la zla ba nya nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:154b-19: nyin re sbyor bas ji srid zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02D2512-1:154b-20: sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:154b-21: de nas zla ba nya la ji skad du gsungs
T02D2512-1:154b-22: pa'i tshul gyis ras las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2512-1:154b-23: h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la /
T02D2512-1:154b-24: mchod yon phul ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D2512-1:154b-25: h'um gis rang gi gnas su dgod par byas la /
T02D2512-1:154b-26: rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgya dang po nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:154b-27: phyis ci bder dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du'am /
T02D2512-1:154b-28: bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig pu bris pa'am /
T02D2512-1:154b-30: de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te bdag la
T02D2512-1:154b-31: byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bcom
T02D2512-1:154b-32: ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du ras la bzhugs
T02D2512-1:154b-33: su gsol la / phyag rgya chen por bsams te /
T02D2512-1:154b-34: nyin re'i sbyor bas ji srid zla ba gnyis pa'i
T02D2512-1:154b-35: nya la bab pa de srid kyi bar du dpag
T02D2512-1:154b-36: tu med pa'i bzlas brjod kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:154b-37: de nas de'i tshe mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02D2512-1:154b-38: de nas nang bar bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas /
T02D2512-1:154b-39: sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad stsol bar 'gyur /
T02D2512-1:155a-0: dpa' bo gcig pu'i ras ris la @155a * //
T02D2512-1:155a-1: yang sngar bshad pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad la /
T02D2512-1:155a-2: phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2512-1:155a-4: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas
T02D2512-1:155a-5: brjod byas nas tho rangs kha bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D2512-1:155a-6: zhal bstan nas sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje h'um
T02D2512-1:155a-8: ma bsgrubs par yang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa byas nas sngags bzlas te /
T02D2512-1:155a-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zla ba gcig
T02D2512-1:155a-10: gi bar du bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa byas
T02D2512-1:155a-11: nas / de'i rjes thogs nyid la snying po ma bsgrubs kyang las 'di dag byed par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-1:155a-12: de bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2512-1:155a-13: ji skad bshad pa thams cad gsad pa la ni
T02D2512-1:155a-14: rdo rje khro bo mthar byed kyis so zhes bya
T02D2512-1:155a-15: ba la sogs pa de nyid las gzhan du mi
T02D2512-1:155a-16: 'gyur ba'o // thams cad rjes su chags par bya
T02D2512-1:155a-17: ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstan
T02D2512-1:155a-18: 'gyur ba'o // pa'o // thams cad gsad pa la
T02D2512-1:155a-19: ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di nyid
T02D2512-1:155a-20: 'gyur ba'o // pa'o // kyi bshad pa'o // de
T02D2512-1:155a-21: bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa bya zhing bdag la
T02D2512-1:155a-22: byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2512-1:155a-23: gdug pa thams cad gsad pa la ni khro bo rdo rje mthar byed kyis bya ste /
T02D2512-1:155a-24: lnga po bsdus pa bcings nas bzlog nas /
T02D2512-1:155a-25: kha'i grva gnyis su mche ba ston pa'i tshul du
T02D2512-1:155a-26: gzhag par bya zhing gdug pa thams cad kyang mche
T02D2512-1:155a-27: ba gtsigs pa'i zhal nas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
T02D2512-1:155a-28: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis zos par gyur par bsgom
T02D2512-1:155a-29: par bya ste / 'di ni rdo rje khro bo mthar byed do //
T02D2512-1:155a-30: thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni //
T02D2512-1:155a-31: khro bo'i blta ba'i bzlas pas so zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:155a-32: ni bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la rdo rje 'bar
T02D2512-1:155a-33: ba'i gzugs brnyan bskyed pa ni rgyas gdab pa'o //
T02D2512-1:155a-34: khro gnyer bsnyer zhing mig gdangs nas /
T02D2512-1:155a-35: khro bas lta ba ni khro bo'i lta ba ste /
T02D2512-1:155a-36: 'dis rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:155a-37: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing bsgrub par bya ba la rgyas gdab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:155a-38: mig gnyis las rdo rje 'bar ba phyung la bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dbab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:155a-39: de lta bus ni thams cad rgyas gdab par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:155a-40: thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khros pas
T02D2512-1:155a-41: gzhig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni srin po la
T02D2512-1:155a-42: sogs pa'i gdug pa thams cad gzhig cing mi snang
T02D2512-1:155b-0: zas la @155b sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad snang
T02D2512-1:155b-1: bar 'gyur ba las mi snang bar bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:155b-2: gzhig pa ste / gsang ba'i rdo rje sor bzhi
T02D2512-1:155b-3: pa'i tshad blangs la bsgrub par bya ba gzhig pa'i
T02D2512-1:155b-4: bsam pas khros par gyur pa dang /
T02D2512-1:155b-5: rdo rje khu tshur gyis g-yogs par bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:155b-6: de lta bus ni thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro ;
T02D2512-1:155b-7: / thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni zhes
T02D2512-1:155b-8: bya ba ni dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:155b-9: 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag brgyal nas khas bub
T02D2512-1:155b-10: tu lhung bar gyur pa ni nges par gnon pa'o
T02D2512-1:155b-12: rdo rje khros pas phyogs der brdeg par bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:155b-13: rang gi lag tu h'um las rdo rje 'bar ba
T02D2512-1:155b-14: bsams la phyogs gang na bsgrub par bya ba gnas
T02D2512-1:155b-15: pa de la rang gi lag tu bsams pa'i rdo
T02D2512-1:155b-16: rje bsgrub par bya ba nges par gnon pa'i bsam
T02D2512-1:155b-18: de lta bus ni rdo rjes bcom par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:155b-19: yungs kar la sogs pa yang h'um zhes bya bas
T02D2512-1:155b-20: rdo rje 'bar bar bsams te des phyogs der bsnun
T02D2512-1:155b-21: par bya'o // gnad thams cad ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-1:155b-22: de rnams dbug pa ni rnam par gzhom pa'o //
T02D2512-1:155b-23: de ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D2512-1:155b-24: rdo rje phra mo 'bigs byed kyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:155b-25: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'i g-yas pa'i mdzub
T02D2512-1:155b-26: mo lcags kyus g-yon logs nas g-yon pa'i mdzub mo
T02D2512-1:155b-27: bzung la / bsgrub par bya ba'i gnad nas drangs la /
T02D2512-1:155b-28: rdo rje mdas nges par 'bigs par gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:155b-29: 'di ni rdo rje phra mo 'bigs byed do //
T02D2512-1:155b-31: thams cad kyi snying ni sems can thams cad kyi snying gi padma'o //
T02D2512-1:155b-32: de rnams 'byin pa ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi
T02D2512-1:155b-33: sbyor bas bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la zhugs la
T02D2512-1:155b-34: / de'i snying gi padma khros par gyur pa dang dbyung bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:155b-35: de lta bus ni thams cad kyi snying 'byin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:155b-36: gdug pa thams cad tshar gcad pa ni srin po la sogs pa tshar gcod pa'o //
T02D2512-1:155b-38: khros pas rdo rje bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:155b-39: de bzhin du bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2512-1:155b-40: rdo rje 'bar ba de kho na nyid kyis blangs
T02D2512-1:155b-41: la h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing khros pas bskor
T02D2512-1:155b-42: la / rdo rje 'bar ba de las rdo rje
T02D2512-1:155b-43: 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i khro bo rnams phyung ste
T02D2512-1:156a-1: kyis gdug pa thams cad gzir bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:156a-3: rdo rje lu gu rgyud la sogs pas bcings par gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:156a-4: de lta bus ni gdug pa thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:156a-5: gdug cing khros pa ni srog 'phrog pa'i ma rungs pa ste /
T02D2512-1:156a-6: de rnams dags pa ni gzhom pa'o //
T02D2512-1:156a-8: khros pas lcags phye'i sbyin sreg byas pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:156a-9: mngon spyod kyi thab khung du bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2512-1:156a-10: rje h'um mdzad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par
T02D2512-1:156a-11: bsams la / h'um che ge mo gh'a ta ya h'um /
T02D2512-1:156a-12: zhes bskul te ral gri la sogs pa mtshon cha'i
T02D2512-1:156a-13: phye ma'i spyin sreg gi thab khung de las rdo
T02D2512-1:156a-14: rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i khro bo rnams byung
T02D2512-1:156a-15: ba rnams kyis gdug pa rnams thal bar byed par
T02D2512-1:156a-16: 'gyur zhing za bar gyur par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:156a-17: bdud thams cad myug par byed pa la ni zhes
T02D2512-1:156a-18: bya ba la bdud kyang yin la thams cad kyang
T02D2512-1:156a-19: yin pas na bdud thams cad do //
T02D2512-1:156a-20: de rnams brlag pa ni zil gyis mnan cing tshar bcad pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:156a-22: rang gi sa bon gyi sbyin sreg gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:156a-23: sngags pa 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas zil gyis gnon pa dang /
T02D2512-1:156a-26: lha'i bu'i bdud rnams kyis mnan par gyur na /
T02D2512-1:156a-27: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi
T02D2512-1:156a-28: sbyor bas rnal 'byor chen po byas la ting nge
T02D2512-1:156a-30: de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:156a-31: ni bdag po zhes rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ngo
T02D2512-1:156a-32: bo nyid du bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2512-1:156a-34: mdun du h'um las rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgyas bsams te /
T02D2512-1:156a-35: de yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi lha mor bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:156a-36: de nas de dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyor ba byas par bsgoms la /
T02D2512-1:156a-37: yid kyis yang dag par sbyor ba bsgoms pa las /
T02D2512-1:156a-38: rang gi sa bon rdo rje rigs kyi gzugs can gyis nam mkha' kun du bkang la /
T02D2512-1:156a-39: rang gi lus la bye ma'i bum pa la chu'i
T02D2512-1:156a-40: bum pa blugs pa bzhin du zhugs nas bdag nyid
T02D2512-1:156a-41: rdo rje'i rigs kyi rdul phra rab las grub pa
T02D2512-1:156b-0: gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs pa 'od zer 'bar ba kun du 'khrigs pa'i @156b 'od dang ldan pa /
T02D2512-1:156b-1: nyon mongs pa'i bud shing thams cad sreg par byed
T02D2512-1:156b-2: pa'i bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje h'um mdzad bsgom
T02D2512-1:156b-3: par bya'o // 'di ni yid kyi rang bzhin gyi sa bon gyi sbyin sreg yin te /
T02D2512-1:156b-4: 'dis bdud thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:156b-5: de skad du yid kyi sbyin sreg gi dbang du mdzad nas ;
T02D2512-1:156b-6: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa gzhig pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:156b-7: khro bo'i sprin ni rnam par bsgom par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-1:156b-8: phyi'i rang gi sa bon dang sbyin sreg bya bar bshad na ni /
T02D2512-1:156b-9: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bdud rnams zil gyis mnan pa la /
T02D2512-1:156b-10: de rnams la nges par dmigs pa dang bcas pa bskyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:156b-11: gnod sbyin thams cad bskrad pa la ni zhes bya
T02D2512-1:156b-12: ba ni gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams gnas nas
T02D2512-1:156b-13: bskyod cing mi gzhag pa ni bskrad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:156b-15: ha ha zhes dgod cing bzlas pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
T02D2512-1:156b-16: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la /
T02D2512-1:156b-17: de'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:156b-19: khyim la sogs pa la gnod pa byed pa'i gnod
T02D2512-1:156b-20: sbyin ma rungs pa rnams ha ha ha ha h'um
T02D2512-1:156b-21: dushta yaksha autstsha ta ya h'um zhes bya ba ha
T02D2512-1:156b-22: ha zhes dgod pas khro bo chen pos khyab pa
T02D2512-1:156b-23: dang bzlas brjod byas la kha las rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2512-1:156b-24: pa la sogs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs sprul nas phyung
T02D2512-1:156b-25: ba 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs can de rnams kyis
T02D2512-1:156b-26: gnod sbyin gdug pa de rdo rje 'bar ba la
T02D2512-1:156b-27: sogs pas bsregs par gyur pa dang /
T02D2512-1:156b-28: dbyig pa la sogs pa rnams kyis brdegs par gyur pa dang /
T02D2512-1:156b-29: skrod par gyur par rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:156b-30: ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sogs pa'i ri bo
T02D2512-1:156b-31: chen po rnams su lcags sgrog gis bcing bar gyur
T02D2512-1:156b-33: de lta bus ni gnod sbyin thams cad skrod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:156b-34: klu thams cad gdon pa la ni rdo rjes la brdabs nas bzlas pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:156b-35: klu'i mtsho'i 'gram du klu gdug pa gdon par bya
T02D2512-1:156b-36: ba'i phyir mngon spyod las bshad pa'i rjes rnams kyis
T02D2512-1:156b-38: de'i snying gar de'i ming bcug nas h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:156b-39: gsang ba'i lcags kyus bkug la gzugs brnyan der bcug ste /
T02D2512-1:156b-40: rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcings la /
T02D2512-1:157a-0: @157a * // de bzlas pa'i srad bu dmar pos kyang bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:157a-1: de nas h'um zhes bya ba las rdo rje rtse
T02D2512-1:157a-2: bzhi pa 'bar ba bskyed la klu'i snying gar rdo
T02D2512-1:157a-3: rje phur bu ji lta ba bzhin du brdungs shing
T02D2512-1:157a-4: / h'um n'a ga che ge mo h'um zhes shin tu khros pas bzlas brjod byas la /
T02D2512-1:157a-5: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas rdo rje bzung zhing /
T02D2512-1:157a-6: des kyang rdo rje lcags kyu lta bu 'bar ba'i
T02D2512-1:157a-7: tshogs kyis khyer te 'ongs par bsam par bya ste
T02D2512-1:157a-8: / de lta bus ni klu thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:157a-9: lha rnams ltung bar bya ba ni //
T02D2512-1:157a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:157a-11: lha rnams zhes bya ba ni ma h'a de ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2512-1:157a-12: de dag thams cad bar snang las sa la bab pa ni ltung bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-1:157a-14: lha mo rdo rje ltung byed kyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:157a-15: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings la /
T02D2512-1:157a-16: lha thams cad bzung ba'i bsam pas phyag rgya bcings la gyen du bteg la /
T02D2512-1:157a-17: lha rnams ltung bar bya ba'i bsam pas thur du dbab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:157a-18: 'di ni lha mo rdo rje ltung byed kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:157a-19: 'dis lha rnams ltung bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:157a-20: lha'i bdag po thams cad ni dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:157a-21: de rnams dbang du bya ba ni rang yi dam du bya ba'o //
T02D2512-1:157a-22: de rnams nyid dregs pa dang phral nas dul ba la 'jog pa ni dul ba'o ;
T02D2512-1:157a-23: / shing rdo rje can gyi lcug ma la sogs pas brdegs pa ni bsnun pa'o //
T02D2512-1:157a-24: de rnams nyid rnam par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D2512-1:157a-25: dang srog dang bral bar bya ba ni dbang phyug
T02D2512-1:157a-26: chen po la sogs pa nyid kyis gsang ba'o //
T02D2512-1:157a-28: rdo rje srid pa gsum po 'dul bar byed pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
T02D2512-1:157a-29: rdo rje h'um mdzad nyid kyis h'um hi zhes bya
T02D2512-1:157a-30: bas 'jig rten gsum dbang du bya ba'i bsam pas
T02D2512-1:157a-31: sbyor pa ni srid pa gsum po 'dul bar byed
T02D2512-1:157a-32: pa ste / rang gi khro gnyer gyi phyogs las
T02D2512-1:157a-33: byung ba'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs kyis lha'i
T02D2512-1:157a-34: bdag po thams cad 'dul bar byed par bsam par
T02D2512-1:157a-35: pa ste / bya ste / de lta bus ni
T02D2512-1:157a-36: de rnams dbang du bya ba la sogs pa byas
T02D2512-1:157a-37: pa ste / bya ste / par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:157a-38: rnam thos sras rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:157a-39: zhes bya ba la ni rnam thos sras kyi gzugs
T02D2512-1:157a-40: brnyan la snga ma bzhin du gsang ba'i lcags kyus
T02D2512-1:157a-41: rnam thos sras bkug la bcug nas bcings te /
T02D2512-1:157b-0: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings @157b nas ;
T02D2512-1:157b-1: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:157b-2: rkang pa g-yon pas rnam thos sras kyi gzugs mnan nas /
T02D2512-1:157b-3: h'um bee shra ba na aa nu r'a dza ku ru h'um /
T02D2512-1:157b-4: zhes bzlas na rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:157b-5: lus ngan po mnan nas dpal dbrog pa la ni rdo rje skyas bus so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:157b-6: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya las g-yon pa'i khu tshur g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mnan la /
T02D2512-1:157b-7: yang g-yon pa'i mdzub mos so bzung ste /
T02D2512-1:157b-8: dpal dbrog pa'i bsam pa drangs pa 'di ni rdo rje skyes bu ste /
T02D2512-1:157b-9: 'dis snga ma bzhin du lus ngan po dang rnam
T02D2512-1:157b-10: thos sras sgrub pa'i sbyor bas mnan la dpal dbrog
T02D2512-1:157b-11: par bya'o // 'dod pa'i lha dbang du bya ba la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:157b-12: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs brnyan mdun du bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:157b-13: de la snga ma bzhin du 'dod pa'i lha bcug ste /
T02D2512-1:157b-14: rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la /
T02D2512-1:157b-15: h'um k'a ma de ba ba sha ma na ya
T02D2512-1:157b-16: h'um zhes bzlas brjod byas la rang gi lus las
T02D2512-1:157b-17: byung ba'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rim gyis bkug
T02D2512-1:157b-18: nas / rang gi rkang pa gnyis la ltung bar byas par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:157b-19: de lta bus ni 'dod pa'i lha dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:157b-20: tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje
T02D2512-1:157b-21: rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:157b-22: ni / lnga po bsdus pa ni rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgya ste ;
T02D2512-1:157b-23: de bcings la tshangs pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba
T02D2512-1:157b-24: las ltung bar bya ba'i bsam pas 'jig rten thams
T02D2512-1:157b-25: cad las phul du byung ba'i gzugs dang /
T02D2512-1:157b-29: reg bya rnams sprul la nye bar dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:157b-30: de nas des de rnams mthong bas bsam gtan las nyams par gyur te /
T02D2512-1:157b-31: des na de phyag rgya 'dis ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:157b-32: khyab 'jug gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los dral bas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:157b-33: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo
T02D2512-1:157b-34: g-yon pa 'khor lo'i tshul du 'phred du bzhag la
T02D2512-1:157b-35: / de nas de la mdzub mo g-yas pas yang
T02D2512-1:157b-36: dang yang du dral bar bya ba 'di ni rdo
T02D2512-1:157b-39: dbang phyug chan po 'dul ba la ni rdo rje
T02D2512-1:157b-40: tri sh'u la'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:157b-41: / rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya las /
T02D2512-1:157b-43: gung mo dang srin lag rtse gsum du byas la /
T02D2512-1:157b-44: de g-yas pa'i mdzub mos dral bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:158a-0: @158a * // 'di ni rdo rje tri sh'u la dral ba ste /
T02D2512-1:158a-1: 'dis dbang phyug chen po 'dul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:158a-2: ma mo thams cad bsad pa la ni rdo rje
T02D2512-1:158a-3: khro bo'i tshogs kyi srin mos sa zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:158a-4: ni / au ma la sogs pa ma mo'i tshogs rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:158a-5: de'i dngos grub sgrub pa thams cad ni ma mo thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:158a-6: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu gnyis su byas te /
T02D2512-1:158a-7: h'um m'a tri ga na m'a ra ya h'um /
T02D2512-1:158a-8: zhes bzlas la gsang bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:158a-9: 'di ni rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyi srin mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:158a-10: phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ni 'byung po'i gdon dang /
T02D2512-1:158a-11: srin po'i gdon la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro ;
T02D2512-1:158a-12: / de rnams kyi phyag rgya ni lag pa'i thabs kyi tshul lo //
T02D2512-1:158a-13: dam tshig ni mi 'da' ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:158a-14: de rnams kyi chos ni gzhan gsod pa la sogs pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2512-1:158a-15: gsang ba'i dngos grub ni de rnams kyi sngags kyi dngos grub bo //
T02D2512-1:158a-16: de lta bu'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:158a-19: gsang ba'i dngos grub rnam par gtor ba zhes bya
T02D2512-1:158a-20: ba ni phan tshun du rnam par gtor ba ste
T02D2512-1:158a-21: / de nyid ni rnam par 'jig pa'o //
T02D2512-1:158a-23: rdo rje khro bo'i gdug pa'i dam tshig 'jig par byed pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:158a-24: rdo rje h'um mdzad nyid de'i tshul gyis sbyar ba
T02D2512-1:158a-25: ni rdo rje khro bo gdug pa'i dam tshig 'jig
T02D2512-1:158a-27: ri dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:158a-28: khro bo'i lta bas ni mi bskyod pas rdo rje
T02D2512-1:158a-29: 'bar ba sprul la bsgrub par bya ba'i ri la
T02D2512-1:158a-30: sogs pa'i steng du ltung bar byas na ri la
T02D2512-1:158a-32: ltung pa thams cad bslang ba la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:158a-33: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas bslang ba'i tshul
T02D2512-1:158a-34: du sbyar ba 'di ni rdo rje khro bo'i bslang
T02D2512-1:158a-35: ba'o // thams cad spro ba la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:158a-36: gter la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad gar las
T02D2512-1:158a-37: byung ba'i khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyis blangs nas
T02D2512-1:158a-38: / yid kyis drangs nas gzhan du bzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje khro bo'i rnal 'byor ma ste /
T02D2512-1:158a-40: thams cad dbrog pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:158a-41: gser la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyis blangs la dbrog par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:158a-42: 'di ni rdo rje khro bo'i 'phrog pa'i khu tshur te /
T02D2512-1:158b-1: 'jigs pa thams cad bskyed pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:158b-2: 'jigs pa thams cad ni seng ge la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:158b-3: de dbyung ba ni bskyed pa'o //
T02D2512-1:158b-4: de yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:158b-5: khro bo'i lta bas blta bzhin du seng ge la sogs pa sprul pa'am /
T02D2512-1:158b-6: mnar med pa la sogs pa sprul la /
T02D2512-1:158b-7: gzhan rnams la 'jigs pa bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:158b-8: 'di ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta ba'o //
T02D2512-1:158b-9: dpung thams cad gsad pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:158b-10: lha'i bu la sogs pa'i dpung thams cad ni dpung thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:158b-11: de bsad pa la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la kha phye ste /
T02D2512-1:158b-12: 'jigs byed kyi gdong skra gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D2512-1:158b-13: mgo thur du btud de 'gro zhing bhyo zhes bya
T02D2512-1:158b-14: ba smra ba 'di ni rdo rje khro bo'i gnod
T02D2512-1:158b-15: sbyin mo ste / 'dis dpung thams cad gsod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:158b-16: gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang zhes bya
T02D2512-1:158b-17: ba la sogs pa la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
T02D2512-1:158b-18: bcings la / mthe'u chung gnyis ka'i grva gnyis su bzhag ste /
T02D2512-1:158b-19: mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu gnyis kyis bsgrub par bya ba 'di ni /
T02D2512-1:158b-20: rdo rje khro bo'i ma rungs pa'i srin mo ste /
T02D2512-1:158b-21: 'dis gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:158b-22: rgyal po la sogs pa mi chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsum ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:158b-23: rang gi khrag gi rgyun zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:158b-24: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlog ste /
T02D2512-1:158b-25: sam lus pa nub ba'i bsam pas rab tu sbyar
T02D2512-1:158b-26: ba 'di ni rdo rje khro bo'i sa 'og gi
T02D2512-1:158b-27: phyag rgya ste / 'dis sa thams cad nub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:158b-28: khams gsum thams cad bsal ba la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:158b-31: mtho ris ni 'jig rten gsum thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:158b-32: de bsal ba la ni rnam par gzhig pa'o //
T02D2512-1:158b-33: de yang rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
T02D2512-1:158b-34: de ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas la /
T02D2512-1:158b-35: shin tu khros pa'i g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dril bu blangs te /
T02D2512-1:158b-36: thams cad byas la g-yas pas rdo rje 'bar ba gsor zhing h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:158b-37: h'um mdzad kyis rdo rje 'bar ba las /
T02D2512-1:158b-38: rdo rje 'khrigs pa dus mtha'i rlung gis bskyod pa'i bskal pa'i me'i phung po lta bur sprul la /
T02D2512-1:158b-39: des 'jig rten gsum po thams cad thal bar byed par 'gyur bar bsam bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:159a-0: @159a * // de lta bus ni khams gsum thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:159a-1: 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba la ni /
T02D2512-1:159a-2: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog gi
T02D2512-1:159a-3: rdo rje khro bos so zhes bya ba ni 'di'i
T02D2512-1:159a-4: gong du bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje me ltar
T02D2512-1:159a-5: 'bar ba'i phyag rgya dang hi zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:159a-6: 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal
T02D2512-1:159a-7: ba ste / h'um hri zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-1:159a-8: khams gsum thams cad dbab pa dang //
T02D2512-1:159a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la khams gsum rnam
T02D2512-1:159a-10: par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis sbyar
T02D2512-1:159a-11: te / rdo rje rtse mor sbyar ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:159a-12: 'dis khams gsum thams cad dbab pa dang /
T02D2512-1:159a-17: khams gsum thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni /
