T02D2512-1:162a-13: bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-1:162a-14: dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bri bar bya'o zhes
T02D2512-1:162a-16: nang du gnyis pa ni zur bzhi pa la zhes
T02D2512-1:162a-17: bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad
T02D2512-1:162a-18: kyi dbus su dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:162a-19: // de bzhin du sgo dang mtshams rnams su bcas
T02D2512-1:162a-20: pa bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar
T02D2512-1:162a-21: de kho na nyid bsdus par 'gro ba 'dul ba'i
T02D2512-1:162a-22: dkyil 'khor chen por dkyil 'khor dbus ma sgo bzhi
T02D2512-1:162a-23: la bltas pa dang mtshams bzhi ji ltar yod pa
T02D2512-1:162a-24: de bzhin du sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyang
T02D2512-1:162a-25: sgo dang bcas par de bzhin du bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:162a-26: // // de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul du
T02D2512-1:162a-27: thig bzhi sa thig btab pa la ni zhes bya
T02D2512-1:162a-28: ba ni de ltar nang gi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi
T02D2512-1:162a-29: // // pa bris la / shar dang nub dang byang dang /
T02D2512-1:162a-30: lhor thig bzhi btab pa ste /
T02D2512-1:162a-31: dkyil 'khor brgyad ces bya ba'i cho ga 'dis thig bzhi dang thig gdab pa byas la /
T02D2512-1:162a-32: tshon dmar pos ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:162a-33: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dgod par bya'o zhes
T02D2512-1:162a-34: bya ba ka ba brgyad kyi tshul gyis bris pa'i
T02D2512-1:162a-35: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ste /
T02D2512-1:162a-36: padma'i lte ba la padma'i gdan la 'jig rten dbang phyug bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:162a-37: de'i mdun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:162a-38: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:162a-39: la sogs pa la phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam
T02D2512-1:162a-40: bu la shar lho mtshams su padma chen po la
T02D2512-1:162a-41: sa 'dzin lha mo ming shr'i zhes bya ba phyag
T02D2512-1:162a-43: g-yas na gter gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-1:162b-0: lho @162b nub mtshams su padma chen po rgya mtsho
T02D2512-1:162b-1: ming hr'i: zhes bya ba phyag g-yon pa na padma
T02D2512-1:162b-2: bsnams pa / g-yas na sprul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa /
T02D2512-1:162b-3: nub byang mtshams su padma chen po nyi ma'i ming
T02D2512-1:162b-4: gi zhes bya ba phyag g-yon pa na padma bsnams
T02D2512-1:162b-5: pa / g-yas na padma'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa'o ;
T02D2512-1:162b-6: / byang shar mtshams su padma chen po rlung gi
T02D2512-1:162b-7: lha mo ming dh'i: zhes bya ba phyag g-yon na
T02D2512-1:162b-8: padma bsnams pa / g-yas na ba dan bsnams pa legs par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:162b-9: shar phyogs kyi sgor padma chen po chags pa'i mtshon cha'i mtshan ma bud med kyi gzugs dang /
T02D2512-1:162b-10: lhor padma chen po gtum pa'i dbang phyug gi mtshan ma sprul gyi gzugs dang /
T02D2512-1:162b-11: nub tu padma chen po nag po'i mtshan ma phag gi gzugs dang /
T02D2512-1:162b-12: byang du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i mtshan ma padma'i gzugs bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:162b-14: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i sbyor bas 'phags
T02D2512-1:162b-15: pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i
T02D2512-1:162b-17: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:162b-18: ji srid dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar gyur
T02D2512-1:162b-19: pa de srid kyi bar du dkyil 'khor bsgom par
T02D2512-1:162b-20: bya'o // de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil
T02D2512-1:162b-21: 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum po
T02D2512-1:162b-22: bya'o // bsgoms la / bar snang gi phyogs su snga ma bzhin du yang dag par bzhag ste /
T02D2512-1:162b-23: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su thig legs par gdab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:162b-24: 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra'o //
T02D2512-1:162b-25: de'i nang du de'i phyed kyi tshad kyi ri mo
T02D2512-1:162b-26: gnyis phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi la mngon sum
T02D2512-1:162b-27: du bltas pa / mtshams bzhi po ri mo gnyis kyi dbus na gnas pa /
T02D2512-1:162b-28: padma'i phreng bas kun du mnyes par mdzes par byas la /
T02D2512-1:162b-29: nang gi dkyil 'khor sgo med par bris te /
T02D2512-1:162b-30: 'dir ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du padma 'dab ma brgyad bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:162b-31: de nas phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:162b-32: gyi lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma
T02D2512-1:162b-33: rnams la dbus su bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs
T02D2512-1:162b-34: dbang phyug g-yon snyems pas rdo rje padma 'dzin cing
T02D2512-1:162b-35: thugs ka'i phyogs su 'byed par mdzad pa sku mdog
T02D2512-1:162b-36: dmar skya zhal 'dzum dmul ba sems dpa'i skyil mo
T02D2512-1:163a-2: 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
T02D2512-1:163a-3: zla ba'i 'od can bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:163a-4: de'i shar gyi padma'i 'dab ma la padma chen po sku mdog dmar ba /
T02D2512-1:163a-6: me tog padma dang mda' gzhu bsnams pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:163a-7: de'i lho phyogs su padma chen po gtum po'i dbang
T02D2512-1:163a-8: phyug sku mdog nag po dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs
T02D2512-1:163a-9: 'dzin pa / khros pa spyan gsum pa phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02D2512-1:163a-10: de la phyag g-yas gnyis na tri sh'u la dang padma bsnams pa /
T02D2512-1:163a-11: g-yon gnyis na kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-1:163a-12: de'i rgyab tu padma chen po khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa /
T02D2512-1:163a-13: sku mdog nag po phyag bzhi pa ste /
T02D2512-1:163a-14: de la phyag g-yas gnyis na padma dang 'khor lo bsnams pa /
T02D2512-1:163a-15: g-yon gnyis na dbyig pa dang dung bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-1:163a-16: de'i byang du gnas pa'i padma la padma chen po
T02D2512-1:163a-17: mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa
T02D2512-1:163a-18: / sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa /
T02D2512-1:163a-20: g-yas na dbyig pa dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa /
T02D2512-1:163a-21: g-yon gnyis na padma dang ril pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-1:163a-22: shar lho'i mtshams kyi padma'i 'dab mar sna tshogs padma la /
T02D2512-1:163a-23: padma chen pos 'dzin sa chen po 'dzin pa g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa ste /
T02D2512-1:163a-24: de la phyag gnyis kyis gcig la gcig bzung ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs shing /
T02D2512-1:163a-25: phyag g-yon pa 'degs pas sa 'dzin par mdzad pa /
T02D2512-1:163a-26: yang phyag g-yon pa gnyis na dung dang padma bsnams pa /
T02D2512-1:163a-27: g-yas gnyis na 'khor lo dang dbyig pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-1:163a-28: lho nub mtshams su padma chen po rgya mtsho chu
T02D2512-1:163a-29: lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar po gdengs ka
T02D2512-1:163a-30: brgyad pa / g-yas na padma bsnams pa /
T02D2512-1:163a-31: g-yon na sprul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-1:163a-32: nub byang gi mtshams su padma chen po nyi ma
T02D2512-1:163a-33: sku mdog dmar po phyag g-yas na padma bsnams pa
T02D2512-1:163a-34: / g-yon na padma'i steng na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:163a-35: byang shar mtshams su padma chen po rlung gi gzugs 'dzin par mdzad pa /
T02D2512-1:163a-36: sku mdog nag po phyag g-yas na ba dan bsnams pa /
T02D2512-1:163a-37: g-yon na padma bsnams pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:163a-38: lhag ma rnams ni sngar smras pa bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:163a-39: 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying po ni hr'i: zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-1:163b-0: de la padma chen po chags pa'i @163b 'dod chags
T02D2512-1:163b-1: ni byang chub chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyi sems
T02D2512-1:163b-2: kyi ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T02D2512-1:163b-3: don thams cad la chags pa nyid dang /
T02D2512-1:163b-4: de ston pa'i mtshan ma ni 'dod chags kyi mtshan
T02D2512-1:163b-5: ma bud med kyi gzugs zhes bya ba bud med
T02D2512-1:163b-6: kyi lus te / des ni de'i ngo bo nyid du ston te /
T02D2512-1:163b-7: bud med chags pas 'gro ba bde byed phyir //
T02D2512-1:163b-9: padma chen po gtum pa'i dbang phyug ni zhe sdang ste /
T02D2512-1:163b-10: byang chub kyi sems chen po des gdug pa rnams
T02D2512-1:163b-11: la sdang ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po
T02D2512-1:163b-12: zhes bya ba'i chos nyid de ston pa'i byang chub
T02D2512-1:163b-13: kyis zhe sdang bzlog par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:163b-14: de'i mtshan ma ni sprul gyi gzugs zhe sdang ngo bo nyid med par ston pa ste /
T02D2512-1:163b-15: zhe sdang ni drag po'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-1:163b-16: padma chen po nag po ni gti mug ste /
T02D2512-1:163b-17: byang chub kyi sems chen po'i mtshan nyid can de
T02D2512-1:163b-18: la lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis rnam par rtog
T02D2512-1:163b-19: pas dbang phyug la sogs pa yongs su brtags pas
T02D2512-1:163b-20: gdul bya rnams yongs su 'khrul par gyur pa la
T02D2512-1:163b-21: de rnams kyi dngos po la mngon par zhen par
T02D2512-1:163b-22: spang bar bya ba'i phyir gti mug mnyam pa nyid
T02D2512-1:163b-23: ston par mdzad pas de'i tshul gyis na gti mug
T02D2512-1:163b-25: de'i mtshan ma ni phag gi gzugs te /
T02D2512-1:163b-26: chos nyid de ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:163b-27: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni thar pa ste /
T02D2512-1:163b-28: kun du dga' ba tshangs pa'i bzhi //
T02D2512-1:163b-29: zhes zer ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad do /
T02D2512-1:163b-30: de'i phyir de'i mtshan ma ni padma ste /
T02D2512-1:163b-31: des dri ma thams cad dang bral ba ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-1:163b-32: de ltar mtshan ma de rnams kyis mtshon pa'i don
T02D2512-1:163b-33: bshad pas gdul bya rnams kyis 'dod chags la sogs
T02D2512-1:163b-34: pa'i mnyam pa nyid rnam par bsgoms nas thar pa
T02D2512-1:163b-35: chen po'i grong khyer gyi sgo 'jig rten las 'das
T02D2512-1:163b-36: pa'i dbang po lnga'i ngo bo nyid rtogs nas /
T02D2512-1:163b-37: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer byang chub chen po'i
T02D2512-1:163b-38: sems la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon sum du
T02D2512-1:163b-40: de bas na 'di dag ni sgo rnams su bri bar bya'o ;
T02D2512-1:163b-41: / de nas gos dkar po zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-1:163b-42: sogs pas de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas de'i rjes
T02D2512-1:163b-43: thogs nyid la slob dpon ras dkar po la padma'i
T02D2512-1:163b-44: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa des smad
T02D2512-1:164a-0: gdong g-yogs byas la ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa'i padma'i rigs @164a * //
T02D2512-1:164a-1: kyi slob dpon ni 'di ltar rang nyid 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:164a-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:164a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ji ltar 'dam gyi nang na gnas kyang 'dam gyis mi gos /
T02D2512-1:164a-5: rang bzhin gyis kha dog mar po'i padma dmar po
T02D2512-1:164a-6: ni rang bzhin gyis kha dog dmar po la rang
T02D2512-1:164a-7: gi nyes pa chu las byung ba'i 'dam pa la
T02D2512-1:164a-8: sogs pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:164a-9: gang na zhe na 'dam gyi nang na'o //
T02D2512-1:164a-10: de bzhin du rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2512-1:164a-11: dpa' rnams ni bag chags dang bcas pa khams gsum
T02D2512-1:164a-12: na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams med par thugs
T02D2512-1:164a-13: rje chen po'i 'dod chags kyi chags pa ni 'dod
T02D2512-1:164a-15: gti mug la sogs pa 'khor ba'i mtsho'i dbus na
T02D2512-1:164a-16: 'khor ba nas byung ba nyes pa rnams kyis mi
T02D2512-1:164a-17: gos pas na de ltar zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-1:164a-18: de bzhin zhes bya ba'i sgra gnyis pa ni nges par gzung ba ste /
T02D2512-1:164a-19: ji ltar padma 'dam gyi nang na dmar du zin kyang chu'i nyes pas mi gos so //
T02D2512-1:164a-20: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bag chags dang
T02D2512-1:164a-21: bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba rnams ni
T02D2512-1:164a-22: 'khor ba'i 'dam gyi nang du skyes shing thugs rje
T02D2512-1:164a-23: chen po'i chags pas chags su zin kyang 'khor ba'i
T02D2512-1:164a-24: nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:164a-25: de ltar chos rnams bsgoms na ni //
T02D2512-1:164a-26: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yongs su dag pa'i
T02D2512-1:164a-27: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thugs rje chen po'i
T02D2512-1:164a-28: chags pas chags kyang 'dod chags la sogs pa'i 'khor
T02D2512-1:164a-29: ba'i chu'i nyes pa las nges par grol ba yin
T02D2512-1:164a-30: no // de bzhin du las dang po pa'i byang
T02D2512-1:164a-31: chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos thams cad ngo bo
T02D2512-1:164a-32: nyid kyis dag pa'o zhes bsgom zhing /
T02D2512-1:164a-33: yang dang yang du mngon sum du byed la /
T02D2512-1:164a-34: snying rje chen po'i chags pas chags na blo ldan
T02D2512-1:164a-35: zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2512-1:164a-36: pa shes pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2512-1:164a-37: nyon mongs pa can du gyur kyang zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i nyon mongs can dang /
T02D2512-1:164a-38: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang ldan du zin kyang ngo //
T02D2512-1:164a-39: nyon mongs kun las rnam grol nas //
T02D2512-1:164a-40: myur du byang chub mchog thob 'gyur //
T02D2512-1:164a-41: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad las
T02D2512-1:164a-42: rnam par grol ba'i sgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes
T02D2512-1:164a-43: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs pas myur
T02D2512-1:164b-0: ba nyid du mngon par rdzogs @164b par sangs rgyas
T02D2512-1:164b-1: shing / sangs rgyas nyid mthong bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-1:164b-2: ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs pas zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du byed pas so //
T02D2512-1:164b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
T02D2512-1:164b-4: de bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i sems dang sems las
T02D2512-1:164b-5: byung ba ni dbang phyug nyid du 'thob par 'gyur
T02D2512-1:164b-7: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang
T02D2512-1:164b-8: bral bas rang dbang du spyod par mdzad pa'i phyir
T02D2512-1:164b-9: / de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang
T02D2512-1:164b-10: phyug ces mtshan btags so zhes bya ba ni rang
T02D2512-1:164b-11: dbang du gyur pa thugs su chud pa des de'i
T02D2512-1:164b-13: bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces mtshan btags pa'o //
T02D2512-1:164b-14: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni bsgoms pa'i dus nas nye bar bzung nas so //
T02D2512-1:164b-15: bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad shin tu yongs
T02D2512-1:164b-16: su dag pa zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung
T02D2512-1:164b-17: dang thugs rdo rje rnam par dag pa de thugs
T02D2512-1:164b-19: rjes su mthun pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su thob pas so //
T02D2512-1:164b-20: dus ji srid cig gis bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-1:164b-21: byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:164b-22: ji srid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T02D2512-1:164b-23: pa'i byang chub mngon sum du ma byas pa de'i
T02D2512-1:164b-24: bar du / de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2512-1:164b-25: kyis ku dang gsung dang thugs thob pa la gegs
T02D2512-1:164b-26: su gyur pa'i sgrib pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur
T02D2512-1:164b-27: bar du / ba'o // myur du 'tshang rgya ba
T02D2512-1:164b-28: nyid 'thob par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni go
T02D2512-1:164b-29: bar du / ba'o // bar zad do // slob
T02D2512-1:164b-30: ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin
T02D2512-1:164b-32: ji ltar slob dpon gyi 'jug pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:164b-33: cho ga rgyas par bzlas ma thag tu bshad pa
T02D2512-1:164b-34: de bzhin du padma'i slob ma rnams kyi yang shes
T02D2512-1:164b-35: par bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:164b-36: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni gti
T02D2512-1:164b-37: mug gi gnyen po'i phyogs su gyur pa 'dod chags
T02D2512-1:164b-38: thams cad rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ji
T02D2512-1:164b-39: skad bshad pa'i ye shes rnam pa lnga ni ye
T02D2512-1:164b-40: shes te / de las byung ba'i padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor yang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:164b-41: de nas gos dkar po zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:164b-42: 'di'i bar gyi don yang 'di ltar yang shes par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:165a-1: dkyil 'khor bris nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul
T02D2512-1:165a-2: ba'i sbyor bas snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen
T02D2512-1:165a-3: po byas la / 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-1:165a-4: rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i padma'i me tog gi yal
T02D2512-1:165a-5: ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02D2512-1:165a-6: lha thams cad kyi bum pa dang /
T02D2512-1:165a-7: bum pa gang ba rnams hr'i: zhes bya bas re
T02D2512-1:165a-8: re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:165a-10: rdo rje bsdus pa byas la /
T02D2512-1:165a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
T02D2512-1:165a-12: bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02D2512-1:165a-14: hr'i: zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas
T02D2512-1:165a-15: pa dkyil 'khor du bcug pa la rdo rje gnod
T02D2512-1:165a-17: mtshams dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /
T02D2512-1:165a-18: rab dang dra ba dag byas te /
T02D2512-1:165a-19: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi bcings la /
T02D2512-1:165a-20: rdo rje bsung bas bsrungs pa thams cad go cha bskon te /
T02D2512-1:165a-21: hr'i: zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02D2512-1:165a-22: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:165a-23: dri dang dri shya zhes bya bas 'khor dang bcas pa blta bar byas te /
T02D2512-1:165a-24: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2512-1:165a-25: sa ma ya stvam aa ham /
T02D2512-1:165a-26: hr'i: zhes bya ba dang bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:165a-27: rdo rje thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las gung mo gnyis pa snyams la /
T02D2512-1:165a-28: mthe bong dang mthe'u chung phye ste /
T02D2512-1:165a-29: padma'i 'dab ma dang 'dra bar bya ba 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:165a-30: padma chen po'i phyag rgya yang 'di nyid yin no //
T02D2512-1:165a-31: 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya padma'i me tog dang ldan pa bzung la /
T02D2512-1:165a-32: de nas lce la hr'i: zhes bya ba ji lta ba bzhin bsam zhing /
T02D2512-1:165a-33: lha thams cad kyi ljags la yang bsam pa 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:165a-34: aa las snying gar sna tshogs padma bsams la /
T02D2512-1:165a-35: 'gro ba 'dul ba la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya hr'i: zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:165a-36: las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:165a-37: padma'i khu tshur bcings la g-yas pas g-yon pa dbye
T02D2512-1:165a-38: ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag
T02D2512-1:165a-39: rgya'o // gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya chen po nyid do //
T02D2512-1:165a-40: de nas hr'i: zhes bya bas rang gi snying gar padma bsams la /
T02D2512-1:165a-41: phyag rgya chen po bris pa'i rjes su mthun par
T02D2512-1:165a-42: hr'i: zhes bya ba nyid zlos shing bcing bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:165a-43: // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med
T02D2512-1:165b-0: pa'i dbang bskur ba dang padma'i @165b phreng ba'i dbang
T02D2512-1:165b-1: bskur ba bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la
T02D2512-1:165b-2: // phul la / snga ma bzhin du mchod yon dang /
T02D2512-1:165b-5: na bza' bla re la sogs pa yang phul te /
T02D2512-1:165b-6: me tog gi shing la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa byas la /
T02D2512-1:165b-7: phyi rol du glu dang gar dang rol mo dang rta dang glang po che dang /
T02D2512-1:165b-8: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02D2512-1:165b-9: de nas mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:165b-10: aom las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02D2512-1:165b-11: dpag bsam gyi shing dang kha zas ro brgya pa la sogs pa'i bkod pa sprul la /
T02D2512-1:165b-13: phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo dpral ba'i phyogs su sbyar la /
T02D2512-1:165b-14: aom sarba bitp'u ra p'u ra /
T02D2512-1:165b-15: su ra su ra a'a ba rta ya a'a barta
T02D2512-1:165b-16: ya ho: / de nas phyi rol tu gtor ma
T02D2512-1:165b-17: sbyin la / ras dkar po la rdo rje gnod
T02D2512-1:165b-18: sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas te gcig gis smad g-yogs
T02D2512-1:165b-19: sbyin la / bya / gnyis pas stod g-yogs byas la /
T02D2512-1:165b-20: yang gcig la rta mgrin la sogs pa sgo srung
T02D2512-1:165b-21: bzhi'i snying po bzlas pas rang gi gdong g-yogs nas
T02D2512-1:165b-22: / phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin du sdom pa blangs la /
T02D2512-1:165b-23: byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02D2512-1:165b-24: rdo rje padma rdo rje lte ba lta bu'i snying gar padma'i khu tshur bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:165b-25: snga ma bzhin du sgo la mngon par phyogs nas
T02D2512-1:165b-26: gnas pa'i dbus su bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang
T02D2512-1:165b-27: bskur te / 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas
T02D2512-1:165b-28: ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can padma'i me
T02D2512-1:165b-29: tog dang bcas pa bcings la /
T02D2512-1:165b-30: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs nas /
T02D2512-1:165b-31: badzra badzra hr'i: zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:165b-32: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:165b-33: raom hya gri ba ma h'a padma aam ku sha
T02D2512-1:165b-34: a'a karsha ya sh'i ghram sarba padma sa ma ya
T02D2512-1:165b-35: padma aam ku sha dha ra h'um dza: zhes bya
T02D2512-1:165b-36: ba dang / rta mgrin gyis bdag nyid dgug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:165b-37: de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs te /
T02D2512-1:165b-38: aom aa mo gha padma p'a sha kro dha a'a
T02D2512-1:165b-39: karsha ya bra be sha ya ma h'a pa shu
T02D2512-1:165b-40: ba ti ya ma ba ru na ku be ra
T02D2512-1:165b-41: bra hma be sha dha ra sarba padma ku la
T02D2512-1:165b-42: sa ma y'am h'um h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:165b-43: yang bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pas gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:165b-44: yang nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:165b-45: aom padma spho ta bandha sarba padma ku la sa
T02D2512-1:165b-46: ma y'a sh'i gharam h'um bam zhes bya ba dang
T02D2512-1:166a-0: / @166a * // padma'i lcags sgrog gis bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166a-1: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs te /
T02D2512-1:166a-2: aom shan mu kha natku m'a ra be sha dha ra padma sha na ta ya /
T02D2512-1:166a-3: a'a be sha ya sarba padma ku la sa ma y'am sarba mu dra bandha ya /
T02D2512-1:166a-4: sarba siddha yo me pra yatstsha padma a'a be sha ya aa aa aa aa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:166a-5: padma'i 'bebs pas bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166a-6: yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:166a-7: ma h'a ra ta su dri dha /
T02D2512-1:166a-8: su to shyo su su kho badzra satva siddhya m'am zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-1:166a-9: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:166a-10: dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02D2512-1:166a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166a-12: ma h'a r'a ga ma h'a soo khya /
T02D2512-1:166a-13: ma h'a badzra ma h'a dha na /
T02D2512-1:166a-14: ma h'a dznya na ma h'a karma badzra satv'a a'adya siddhya m'am /
T02D2512-1:166a-16: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya h'am /
T02D2512-1:166a-17: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la bdag nyid 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:166a-18: dang po kho nar sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod la sems ma rdo rje bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166a-19: de nas aom padma spho ta aa dhi tishtha aa zhes brjod de /
T02D2512-1:166a-20: sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya sbyar la aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166a-21: yang hr'i: aa zhes lan brgya brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:166a-23: de nas hr'i: zhes bya bas me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166a-24: de nas des blang la de nyid dang rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166a-25: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166a-26: de nas de nyid zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:166a-27: shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te blta bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166a-28: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:166a-29: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166a-30: de nas 'gro ba 'dul pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:166a-31: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02D2512-1:166a-32: ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas rang
T02D2512-1:166a-33: gi dngos grub stsol bar mdzad pa de srid kyi
T02D2512-1:166a-35: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor ba shis pa
T02D2512-1:166a-36: brjod pa 'don pa'i tshul du rang gi snying gar
T02D2512-1:166a-37: bzhag la / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod do //
T02D2512-1:166a-38: rdo rje padma la sogs pas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:166a-39: glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166a-40: de nas yang phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:166b-0: bcom ldan @166b 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta
T02D2512-1:166b-1: zhing rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas la
T02D2512-1:166b-2: / me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba rnams kyang blang bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:166b-3: de la dang ba kho nar dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-1:166b-4: rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i me tog gi yal ga
T02D2512-1:166b-5: las rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las aom ma
T02D2512-1:166b-6: h'a su kha zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar
T02D2512-1:166b-7: bshad pa'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
T02D2512-1:166b-8: bya'o // de nas bdag nyid 'gro ba 'dul bar byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:166b-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnal 'byor chen po las
T02D2512-1:166b-10: gsungs pa'i gnas su rang gi lus la 'gro ba
T02D2512-1:166b-11: 'dul ba la sogs pa legs par bkod nas /
T02D2512-1:166b-12: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma'i steng
T02D2512-1:166b-13: du 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcings
T02D2512-1:166b-14: la 'dug ste / me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2512-1:166b-16: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod de /
T02D2512-1:166b-17: padma'i khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02D2512-1:166b-18: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa hr'i: zhes bya ba 'dis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:166b-19: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166b-20: de nas 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:166b-24: bris pa'i dbu rgyan 'od dpag tu med pa'i phreng ba dang ldan pas /
T02D2512-1:166b-25: rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02D2512-1:166b-26: 'od dpag tu med pa'i padma'i phreng ba'i sngags yongs
T02D2512-1:166b-27: su bzlas pas yang bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya
T02D2512-1:166b-28: zhing / dar dpyangs bcing ba yang byas la /
T02D2512-1:166b-32: ming gi dbang bskur bas bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02D2512-1:166b-33: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga 'di gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166b-34: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma blangs la bsnyems pas bzung ste /
T02D2512-1:166b-35: lag pa g-yas pas rang gi snying ga'i phyogs su kha 'byed cing /
T02D2512-1:166b-36: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje brtul zhugs stsol bar mdzad bzhin bar yang bsams la /
T02D2512-1:166b-37: aom padma ha sta badzra dharma tvam pha la ya zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:166b-38: yang 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:166b-39: rdo rje chos nyid de ji lta bu lags /
T02D2512-1:166b-40: de nas bcom ldan 'das chos nyid ston par mdzad par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:167a-2: 'dam gyi nang na dag pa ste //
T02D2512-1:167a-3: 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs de bzhin //
T02D2512-1:167a-6: de ltar brtul zhugs blangs nas /
T02D2512-1:167a-7: me tog la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis bdag nyid yang dag par mtshod [?] la /
T02D2512-1:167a-8: padma'i mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2512-1:167a-9: de nyid kyis ni padma bzung //
T02D2512-1:167a-11: de kho na nyid 'di yin te /
T02D2512-1:167a-12: bcom ldan sangs rgyas 'phags pa ni //
T02D2512-1:167a-13: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug ste //
T02D2512-1:167a-14: dag pa'i rol mos gar mdzad cing //
T02D2512-1:167a-15: gdul ba yi ni thabs rnams mdzad //
T02D2512-1:167a-16: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2512-1:167a-17: zhes bya ba ni 'di yin te //
T02D2512-1:167a-18: de ltar padma dmar po ni //
T02D2512-1:167a-19: mtshon gyis nyes dang gnas pa yi //
T02D2512-1:167a-20: nyes pa du mas mi gos te //
T02D2512-1:167a-21: de bzhin khams gsum dag pa'o //
T02D2512-1:167a-22: dam tshig gi mi phyag rgya cher //
T02D2512-1:167a-23: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02D2512-1:167a-24: zhes bya ba ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-1:167a-25: bya ba gang dang gang gis ni //
T02D2512-1:167a-27: padma dag par sbyor ba'i bdag / de dang des ni sbyar bar bya //
T02D2512-1:167a-28: zhes bya ba 'di dam tshig go //
T02D2512-1:167a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag bzhi byas te /
T02D2512-1:167a-30: snying po blangs la tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2512-1:167a-32: lung bstan pa bcom ldan 'das las mnos te /
T02D2512-1:167a-33: yang bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2512-1:167a-34: ji ltar 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod byas la /
T02D2512-1:167a-35: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
T02D2512-1:167a-37: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi //
T02D2512-1:167a-38: padma'i slob dpon dka' thub che //
T02D2512-1:167a-39: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:167a-40: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2512-1:167a-41: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:167a-42: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02D2512-1:167a-43: de nas sngom pa dpog par 'os pa'i slob ma
T02D2512-1:167a-44: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdom pa 'dzin du bcug
T02D2512-1:167a-45: la / byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste /
T02D2512-1:167a-46: de'i snying gar de bzhin du padma bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:167a-47: da 'gro ba 'dul bar byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2512-1:167a-48: spos dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D2512-1:167a-49: yon gyi mchod blangs la sgo'i phyogs su bltas nas gnas pa'i bum pas dbang bskur nas /
T02D2512-1:167b-0: @167b bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho gas bcug la /
T02D2512-1:167b-1: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:167b-2: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas ba rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:167b-4: // /'gro bar 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02D2512-1:167b-5: slob dpon gyis 'di las gsungs pa'i dngos grub kyi
T02D2512-1:167b-6: ye shes bslabs par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don
T02D2512-1:167b-8: sgrub pa po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:167b-9: sgrub pa la ni de bzhin du ras kyi ri
T02D2512-1:167b-10: mo gnyis kyis dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur
T02D2512-1:167b-11: ro zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs la
T02D2512-1:167b-12: snying po blangs nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te
T02D2512-1:167b-13: / bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba ras la
T02D2512-1:167b-14: sogs pa la bris pa'i sku mdun du bzhag ste
T02D2512-1:167b-15: / / de'i sbyor bas mdun du spyan drangs nas /
T02D2512-1:167b-16: cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2512-1:167b-17: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:167b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas yod pa'i rdo
T02D2512-1:167b-19: rje padma la hr'i: zhes bya ba rnam par bkod
T02D2512-1:167b-20: la de nyid dpag tu med par nyin re zhing
T02D2512-1:167b-21: bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas
T02D2512-1:167b-22: nas / ji srid zla ba gcig gi bar du
T02D2512-1:167b-23: bzlas brjod byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par
T02D2512-1:167b-24: nas / 'gyur ro // de nas dang po rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgya dang bri ba'am /
T02D2512-1:167b-26: dkyil 'khor du yang des dang por brtsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:167b-28: de yang dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:167b-29: gzhan dag ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:167b-30: 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi ras kyi ri mo'o //
T02D2512-1:167b-31: de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:167b-32: phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:167b-33: sngon du bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba ji srid du zla
T02D2512-1:167b-34: ba gnyis pa'i nya la thug gi bar du bzlas
T02D2512-1:167b-36: de nas de'i mtshan thog thag phyag rgya ma bkrol
T02D2512-1:167b-37: bar ci nas kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de
T02D2512-1:167b-39: de nas tho rangs ka bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas /
T02D2512-1:167b-40: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:167b-41: ras kyi ri mo dang po'i cho ga'o //
T02D2512-1:167b-42: de nas ras kyi ri mo gnyis pa'i cho ga
T02D2512-1:167b-43: ni sngon du bsnyen pa de bzhin du byas la
T02D2512-1:167b-44: / ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba dpa' bo gcig pu bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:168a-0: de nas de'i spyan sngar phyag @168a * //
T02D2512-1:168a-1: rgya chen po la gnas pas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02D2512-1:168a-2: de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas
T02D2512-1:168a-3: brjod byas nas tho rangs bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal
T02D2512-1:168a-4: bstan nas / de bzhin du dngos grub rnams stsol bar 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:168a-5: ras kyi ri mo gnyis pa'i bsgrub pa bya'o //
T02D2512-1:168a-6: de nas ma bsgrubs kyang zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //

T02D2512-1:168a-11: padma la lan stong bzlas te sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:168a-13: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sbyor bas
T02D2512-1:168a-14: hr'i: zhes bya ba lan stong yongs su bzlas te
T02D2512-1:168a-16: mi la sogs pa gzhan dag la dbul zhing sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:168a-17: padma de kha dog dmar zhing 'od zer dmar po'i
T02D2512-1:168a-18: tshogs kyis bsgrubs par bya ba dmar po bsam par
T02D2512-1:168a-19: bya ba ste / de lta bus ni rjes su chags par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:168a-20: thams cad gsang pa la ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:168a-21: sems can mang po la 'khu zhing gsod pa la
T02D2512-1:168a-22: sogs pa rnams la 'dul ba'i dbang gis nye bar
T02D2512-1:168a-25: padma chen po'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:168a-26: padma chen po gtum pa'i dbang phyug ni padma chen po'i khro bo'o //

T02D2512-1:168a-29: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la /

T02D2512-1:168a-31: bsdus te 'dis padma chen po gtum pa'i dbang phyug
T02D2512-1:168a-33: khro bas khro ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir gdul
T02D2512-1:168a-34: ba'i phyir skye bo rnams la yid kyis de gsad
T02D2512-1:168a-35: par bya'o // de nas gdul bya de rnams padma
T02D2512-1:168a-36: chen po gtum pa'i dbang phyug nyid 'thob par 'gyur
T02D2512-1:168a-38: shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:168a-39: thams cad rmongs par 'gyur ba la ni zhes bya
T02D2512-1:168a-40: ba ni rang gi sems dang sems las byung ba'i
T02D2512-1:168a-41: rgyun thams cad de de rnams rmongs par bya ba
T02D2512-1:168a-42: ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis gzung ba
T02D2512-1:168b-0: dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa @168b bsal nas

T02D2512-1:168b-4: par bya zhing / rang ngam gzhan du shes par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-1:168b-6: padma chen po phag gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:168b-7: padma chen po sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya chen po ni padma chen po phag ste /
T02D2512-1:168b-10: bcom ldan 'das padma chen pos 'dzin gyi phyag rgya
T02D2512-1:168b-11: chen po bcings la de'i ngo bo nyid du bdag
T02D2512-1:168b-12: nyid bsams nas / bsgrub par bya ba'i sems can thams cad de'i ngo bo nyid du bya'o //
T02D2512-1:168b-13: de ltar na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'das rmongs par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:168b-14: de rtog par 'gyur ba'i stobs kyis rmong par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:168b-15: sems can gyi khams gdug pa rnams kyang dran pa
T02D2512-1:168b-16: gzhig pa'i bsam pas bsgoms na de kun du rmongs
T02D2512-1:168b-17: par 'gyur ro // nyon mongs pa thams cad ni ji skad bshad pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:168b-18: de rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa ni de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:168b-20: padma chen po rnam par gzigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:168b-21: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:168b-22: sa thams cad kyi bdag po nyid du bya ba ni rgyal po thams cad thob pa'o //
T02D2512-1:168b-23: sa la skyil mo krung bcas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:168b-25: gang rgyal po 'dod pa des ni bcom ldan 'das padma chen po'i nag po'i sbyor ba byas la /

T02D2512-1:168b-27: bzlas pas stong phrag brgya byas te /

T02D2512-1:168b-29: de nas nang par rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:168b-30: chu thams cad dgug pa la ni zhes bya ba

T02D2512-1:168b-38: dbang du bya ba byas la /

T02D2512-1:169a-0: @169a * // bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o //
T02D2512-1:169a-1: thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D2512-1:169a-3: pas bcom ldan 'das padma chen po nag po'i sbyor
T02D2512-1:169a-4: bas snga ma bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas
T02D2512-1:169a-5: la / de'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te bzung
T02D2512-1:169a-6: nas mun pa'i phyogs su nyi ma 'bar ba rab
T02D2512-1:169a-7: tu gtong ba rang gi lus las gtong bar byas
T02D2512-1:169a-8: la / te / de lta bus ni snang bar byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:169a-9: rlung thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa rlung
T02D2512-1:169a-10: gi dkyil 'khor bhe ram pa ldang bar 'dod pas
T02D2512-1:169a-11: / bcom ldan 'das padma chen po rlung gi sbyor
T02D2512-1:169a-12: bas de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas
T02D2512-1:169a-13: / / de'i rjes thogs nyid la rlung thams cad bzung ste /
T02D2512-1:169a-14: ji skad du bshad pa'i rlung thams cad dgug sa dang /
T02D2512-1:169a-17: dbang du bya ba rnams bya'o //
T02D2512-1:169a-18: nyon mongs pa thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:169a-19: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02D2512-1:169a-20: de'i dam tshig ni padma'i rigs te /
T02D2512-1:169a-21: ming 'di skad ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs pa ste /
T02D2512-1:169a-22: padma'i rigs kyi dbugs dbyung ba'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:169a-24: // / de ltar gti mug gi gnyen po'i phyogs su gyur pa padma'i rigs bstan nas /
T02D2512-1:169a-25: da ni ser sna'i gnyen po'i phyogs su gyur pa'i rin po che'i rigs bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:169a-26: de nas zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:169a-27: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de ma thag pa ston par byed pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2512-1:169a-28: bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i khams tham cad kyi lha'i
T02D2512-1:169a-29: rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la

T02D2512-1:169a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang
T02D2512-1:169a-32: po zhes bya ba ni phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams

T02D2512-1:169a-34: pa'i khams gsum mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa
T02D2512-1:169a-35: thams cad de / der nyon mongs pa dang nyon
T02D2512-1:169a-36: mongs pa can ma yin pa'i rmongs pa dang bral

T02D2512-1:169a-39: par mdzad pas na de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum
T02D2512-1:169a-40: thams cad kyi dbang po ste /
T02D2512-1:169a-41: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2512-1:169a-42: yang zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags thams cad rnam
T02D2512-1:169b-0: par dag par ston par @169b mdzad pa la ltos
T02D2512-1:169b-1: nas / dbang bskur ba sbyin pa la sogs pa

T02D2512-1:169b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:169b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab
T02D2512-1:169b-6: dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:169b-7: ni / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de de
T02D2512-1:169b-8: rnams kyis dbang bskur ba ni mnyam pa nyid kyi

T02D2512-1:169b-10: las byung ba'i gzung ba dang 'dzin ba'i rnam par

T02D2512-1:169b-12: ye shes de las byung ba'i rin po che'i rigs
T02D2512-1:169b-13: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur
T02D2512-1:169b-14: ba'o // de'i ye shes gang gis 'byung ba de
T02D2512-1:169b-15: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur
T02D2512-1:169b-16: ba las byung ba'i ye shes so //
T02D2512-1:169b-17: de nyid snying po ste bskyed pa'i gnas su gyur
T02D2512-1:169b-18: pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya
T02D2512-1:169b-19: la / ming de skad ces btags pa'i shes rab
T02D2512-1:169b-20: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs pa'o
T02D2512-1:169b-21: la / // dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni zhes
T02D2512-1:169b-22: bya ba ni sems can thams cad byang chub kyi
T02D2512-1:169b-23: sems chen po rtogs pa bskyed pa dang /

T02D2512-1:169b-35: kyi khams gsum po thams cad du sbyin pa po
T02D2512-1:169b-36: slob ma rnams kyi bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon
T02D2512-1:169b-37: mongs pa rnams dang bral bas chos kyi rgyal po
T02D2512-1:169b-39: khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid 'thob pa ste /
T02D2512-1:169b-40: de'i don du gnas par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-1:169b-41: nor sbyin pa ni zhes bya ba ni dbyig dang
T02D2512-1:169b-42: gser dang rgyal po la sogs pa phyi'i dngos po
T02D2512-1:169b-43: rnams dang chos kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen
T02D2512-1:169b-44: pa yongs su spong ba dang /

T02D2512-1:170a-1: rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni nor sbyin
T02D2512-1:170a-2: pa de ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D2512-1:170a-3: pa'i nor thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid du gnas
T02D2512-1:170a-4: par 'gyur ba'o // chos sbyin pa ni bcom ldan 'das glegs bam bsnams pa dang /
T02D2512-1:170a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:170a-6: chos kyi don gyi rin po che'i phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa byin pa dang /

T02D2512-1:170a-9: rmi lam lta bu'i chos rin po che khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:170a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:170a-11: rtogs par 'gyur ba ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa'o //
T02D2512-1:170a-12: zang zing gi sbyin pa ni zhes bya ba ni rin po che chen po myang ba dang /
T02D2512-1:170a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:170a-14: phyi'i yang zas dang skom dang gos ni zang zing ngo //
T02D2512-1:170a-15: de yongs su gtong ba ni zang zing sbyin pa ste /
T02D2512-1:170a-16: des sems can thams cad tshim par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:170a-17: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bde ba thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:170a-18: zang zing gi sbyin pa de'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2512-1:170a-26: bka' bsgo ba'i tshig rnams te /
T02D2512-1:170a-33: sna tshogs rdo rje ni sems can thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:170a-34: de rnams las byung ba'i bde ba gang yin pa
T02D2512-1:170a-35: de ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bde ba'o
T02D2512-1:170a-36: // de rnams thob pa ni rnyed pa ste /
T02D2512-1:170a-37: de'i don du gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-1:170a-38: de ltar de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:170a-39: bde ba thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D2512-1:170a-40: ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni dang po'i sbyor ba'i
T02D2512-1:170a-41: ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:170a-42: da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin te /

T02D2512-1:170b-1: kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston

T02D2512-1:170b-3: par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha'i

T02D2512-1:170b-13: la'o // bcom ldan 'das kyi rin po che de las zhes bya ba ni /

T02D2512-1:170b-24: bskur ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs
T02D2512-1:170b-26: gzhung 'di dag gi ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:170b-27: de nas 'dus pa mdzad nas brtsams te /

T02D2512-1:170b-32: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2512-1:170b-33: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin te /

T02D2512-1:170b-35: dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che zhes
T02D2512-1:170b-36: bya ba ni dbang bskur ba yang yin la thams

T02D2512-1:173b-41: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag bsal dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02D2512-1:173b-42: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:173b-44: ma h'a r'a ga ma h'a soo khya ma h'a badzra ma h'a dh'a na /
T02D2512-1:173b-45: ma h'a dzny'a na ma h'a karma /
T02D2512-1:173b-46: badzra sa tva a'adya siddhya m'om /
T02D2512-1:173b-47: yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:174a-0: @174a * // dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya m'a /
T02D2512-1:174a-1: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la /
T02D2512-1:174a-2: bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:174a-3: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzla'o //
T02D2512-1:174a-4: de nas g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis sngags
T02D2512-1:174a-5: mdzub lags g-yas pa rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag
T02D2512-1:174a-6: rgyas de dbye zhing aa zhes bya ba nyid lan
T02D2512-1:174a-7: brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:174a-8: de nas tram zhes bya bas me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:174a-9: de nas de blangs la trom zhes bya ba nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:174a-10: de nas trom zhes bya ba zlos shing gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:174a-11: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:174a-13: / de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:174a-14: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:174a-15: de nas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:174a-16: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje lta bas blta zhing /
T02D2512-1:174a-17: ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bstan nas ;
T02D2512-1:174a-18: dngos grub thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-1:174a-19: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor la shis pa
T02D2512-1:174a-20: brjod pa 'don pa'i tshul du snying gar gzhag la
T02D2512-1:174a-21: / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02D2512-1:174a-22: rin po che'i mtshon cha la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis /
T02D2512-1:174a-23: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:174a-24: glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis kyang legs par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:174a-25: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:174a-26: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas la //
T02D2512-1:174a-27: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:174a-28: de la dang po kho nar rdo rje rin chen
T02D2512-1:174a-29: gyi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje'i rin
T02D2512-1:174a-30: po che'i me tog gi yal ga las /
T02D2512-1:174a-31: yang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa sngar bshad pa'i bum pa'i sngags de bzhin du bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:174a-32: bdag nyid 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying por byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2512-1:174a-33: rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas
T02D2512-1:174a-34: rnal 'byor chen po bshad pa'i gnas rnams su rang
T02D2512-1:174a-35: gi lus la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la
T02D2512-1:174a-36: sogs pa yang dag par bzhag nas /
T02D2512-1:174b-0: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi @174b nang du rta bdun dang
T02D2512-1:174b-1: ldan pa'i shing rta'i steng du sna tshogs padma bris
T02D2512-1:174b-2: la / de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings te 'dug nas /
T02D2512-1:174b-3: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:174b-5: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02D2512-1:174b-6: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu blangs la /
T02D2512-1:174b-7: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa tr'om zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:174b-8: des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:174b-9: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02D2512-1:174b-10: de nas rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:174b-11: lugs ma'am brdungs pa la sogs pa'i rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02D2512-1:174b-12: dar dbyangs dang ldan pa la /
T02D2512-1:174b-13: trom zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzlas pas yang bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02D2512-1:174b-15: rin po che'i dril bu dang bcas par blangs la /
T02D2512-1:174b-16: bdag po dang ming gis dbang bskur ba dag gis dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:174b-17: de nas dngos grub kyi rin po che'i rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02D2512-1:174b-18: me tog la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis
T02D2512-1:174b-19: bdag nyid yang dag par mchod cing rin po che'i
T02D2512-1:174b-20: mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam
T02D2512-1:174b-21: pa bcu gnyis kyis mchod la /
T02D2512-1:174b-22: rdo rje rin po che de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:174b-23: nyi ma 'di ni dam pa ste //
T02D2512-1:174b-24: thams cad mthong ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2512-1:174b-25: nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2512-1:174b-26: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:174b-27: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid do //
T02D2512-1:174b-28: rin po che'i dril bu chos kyis dkrol bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:174b-29: bsam pa thams cad 'grub pa ni //
T02D2512-1:174b-30: don bsam 'grub pa dam pa ste //
T02D2512-1:174b-31: 'dod pa de ni rab grub phyir //
T02D2512-1:174b-32: 'dod las thar pa'i bde ba che //
T02D2512-1:174b-33: zhes bya ba ni chos so //
T02D2512-1:174b-34: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:174b-35: 'dod dang bde ba kun gyi phyir //
T02D2512-1:174b-36: mi mthun pa yang sbyin bya ste //
T02D2512-1:174b-37: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi //
T02D2512-1:174b-38: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par gyis //
T02D2512-1:174b-39: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig go //
T02D2512-1:174b-40: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te snying po bzung la /
T02D2512-1:174b-41: tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2512-1:174b-43: lung bstan pa dag mnos nas /
T02D2512-1:174b-44: yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dag byas te /
T02D2512-1:175a-2: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:175a-3: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:175a-4: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi //
T02D2512-1:175a-5: rin chen slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02D2512-1:175a-6: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:175a-7: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2512-1:175a-8: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rdzogs so; ;
T02D2512-1:175a-9: // de nas sdom pa dbog par 'os pa'i slob
T02D2512-1:175a-10: ma la sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdom pa 'dzin
T02D2512-1:175a-12: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag bya'o //
T02D2512-1:175a-13: de nas de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje rin chen bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:175a-14: de 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying por byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2512-1:175a-15: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas /
T02D2512-1:175a-17: sgor mngon par phyogs nas gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:175a-18: rang nyid 'jug pa'i cho gas bcug ste /
T02D2512-1:175a-19: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:175a-20: rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas phye la /
T02D2512-1:175a-22: trom aa aa aa aa zhes lan brgya bzlas so //
T02D2512-1:175a-23: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:175a-24: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:175a-26: // / de ltar dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02D2512-1:175a-27: slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:175a-28: sgrub pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:175a-29: sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no
T02D2512-1:175a-30: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-1:175a-31: sgrub pa la ras kyi ri mo gnyis gsungs pa
T02D2512-1:175a-32: dang / de'i dngos grub rnams ji skad du gsungs
T02D2512-1:175a-33: pa de bzhin du 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i
T02D2512-1:175a-34: dang / sgrub pa dang ; de sgrub pa rnams kyang de ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:175a-36: ji skad du gsungs pa'i tshul dam tshig dang dbang
T02D2512-1:175a-37: bskur ba theb pa rnams kyis 'phags pa nam mkha'i
T02D2512-1:175a-38: snying po'i sku ras la bris pa la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:175a-40: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas ;
T02D2512-1:175a-41: bcom ldan 'das mdun du ji lta ba bzhin du spyan drangs te /
T02D2512-1:175a-42: phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas /
T02D2512-1:175a-43: rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-1:175a-44: bzlas brjod dpag tu med pas zla ba gcig gi
T02D2512-1:175a-45: bar du sngon du bsnyen pa snga ma bzhin du
T02D2512-1:175b-0: byas la / de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi @175b mal gyi sar ras ris bris nas /
T02D2512-1:175b-1: de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad de /
T02D2512-1:175b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la
T02D2512-1:175b-3: zla ba gcig gi bar du dpag tu med pa'i
T02D2512-1:175b-4: bzlas brjod de bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2512-1:175b-5: de nas zla ba nya la bab pa dang mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na /
T02D2512-1:175b-6: nad par bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos zhal bstan nas /
T02D2512-1:175b-7: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad stsol bar 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:175b-8: de ras kyi ri mo dang po'i cho ga'o //
T02D2512-1:175b-9: de nas ras ris gnyis pa la sgrub pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:175b-10: sngon du bsnyen pa de bzhin du byas la /
T02D2512-1:175b-11: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dba' bo gcig pu ras la bris te /
T02D2512-1:175b-12: de'i spyan sngar bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:175b-14: de nas zla ba nya la bab pa dang /
T02D2512-1:175b-15: mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas te /
T02D2512-1:175b-16: de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos zhal bstan nas /
T02D2512-1:175b-17: sgrub pa po la nam mkha'i snying po nyid stsol bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-1:175b-18: de nas ma bsgrubs par zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D2512-1:175b-19: dbang bskur ba thams cad thob cing zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:175b-20: ni dbang bskur ba yang yin la thams cad kyang
T02D2512-1:175b-21: yin pas na / dbang bskur ba thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:175b-25: sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba rnams te /
T02D2512-1:175b-26: byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02D2512-1:175b-27: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:175b-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:175b-29: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa'o //
T02D2512-1:175b-30: de thob pa ni mngon sum du byas pa'o //
T02D2512-1:175b-32: rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:175b-33: rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings pa'i tshul du bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:175b-34: rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba ste /
T02D2512-1:175b-35: des dbang bskur ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:175b-36: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:175b-37: bsam pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na bsam pa thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:175b-38: de dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thob par 'dod pa'o //
T02D2512-1:175b-39: de yongs su rdzogs pa ni dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thob pa'o //
T02D2512-1:176a-0: nyin re zhing nyi ma 'char kar bzlas brjod dpag tu @176a * //
T02D2512-1:176a-1: med pa byas pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:176a-2: de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa byas la /
T02D2512-1:176a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod dpag tu
T02D2512-1:176a-4: med pa bya zhing nyin re zhing yang bdag la
T02D2512-1:176a-5: byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2512-1:176a-6: 'di ni rin po che chen po 'dzin pa nor sbyin gyi dngos grub ston pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:176a-7: chos thams cad kyi don shes pa la ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:176a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sems dang sems las byung ba dang /
T02D2512-1:176a-9: padma'i rigs ni chos thams cad do //
T02D2512-1:176a-10: de rnams kyi don ni ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D2512-1:176a-11: de shes pa ni nges par byas pa'o//
T02D2512-1:176a-13: dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' la lta zhing bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:176a-14: rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i nam mkha' de la
T02D2512-1:176a-15: mig gi rnam par shes pa dang blos blta bzhin
T02D2512-1:176a-16: du bzlas brjod tram zhes bya ba bzlas par bya'o
T02D2512-1:176a-18: chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'o zhes bsgom zhing bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02D2512-1:176a-19: 'dis ni chos rin po che'i dngos grub gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:176a-20: zas dang skom thams cad la sogs pa re thams
T02D2512-1:176a-21: cad thob par bya ba la ni zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:176a-22: la / bza' ba la sogs pa ni zas thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:176a-23: zan dron dang 'bras chan la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:176a-24: khu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni skom thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:176a-25: de la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni zas dang skom thams cad la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:176a-26: ro thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ste /
T02D2512-1:176a-27: zhib la sogs pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D2512-1:176a-28: mdar ba dang skyur pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i ro brgya ni 'jig rten pa'o //
T02D2512-1:176a-29: de rnams thob pa ni rnyed par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-1:176a-31: nam mkha' las yid la 'dod pas nyin re zhing
T02D2512-1:176a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyi bzlas pa stong byas pas so
T02D2512-1:176a-34: nyin re ni nyi ma re re zhing pa //
T02D2512-1:176a-35: bcom ldan 'das ni rin po che chen po ro myang ba'i gzugs can gyi nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02D2512-1:176a-36: bzlas pa stong byas pas ni tram zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:176a-37: lan stong gi bar du bzlas pas sgrub pa po
T02D2512-1:176a-38: la dngos grub stsol ba ste /
T02D2512-1:176a-39: rin po che chen po'i ro myang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi sbyor bas 'di bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:176b-0: gdugs chen po thob par bya ba @176b la ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:176b-1: rig pa 'dzin pa dang 'khor los sgyur ba nyid
T02D2512-1:176b-2: la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i rgyal srid thob pa'o
T02D2512-1:176b-4: gdugs bzung nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:176b-5: lha mo rin chen gyi sbyor bas rin po che'i gdugs bzung la bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
T02D2512-1:176b-6: rnam par rgyal ba chen po thob pa la ni
T02D2512-1:176b-7: rin chen rgyal mtshan mchog gis so zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:176b-8: la / lha'i bu la sogs pa gzhan dag las rgyal ba ni /
T02D2512-1:176b-9: rnam par rgyal ba chen po ste /
T02D2512-1:176b-10: de thob pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:176b-11: de yang rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i rdo
T02D2512-1:176b-12: rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las
T02D2512-1:176b-13: gung mo dang / srin lag dang /
T02D2512-1:176b-14: mthe'u chung gi sor mo brkyang la /
T02D2512-1:176b-15: srin lag dang mthe'u chung phan tshun sprel ba ni rgyal mtshan mchog ste /
T02D2512-1:176b-17: lha mo rin chen rgyal mtshan mchog gi sbyor bas tram ham zhes bzlas brjod byas te /
T02D2512-1:176b-18: phyag rgya bcings pa de las rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D2512-1:176b-19: chen po la sogs pa'i khro bo'i go cha dang
T02D2512-1:176b-20: / ya lad bgos par gyur pa sprul pa la /
T02D2512-1:176b-21: de rnams kyis bdud la sogs pa'i sde skrag par gyur par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:176b-22: de lta bus ni thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:176b-23: grags pa chen po ni zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-1:176b-24: pa la 'jig rten gsum du khyad par can du
T02D2512-1:176b-25: gyur cing / dga' bar bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2512-1:176b-26: gzhan gyi yon tan bsgrags pa ni grags pa chen
T02D2512-1:176b-27: gyur cing / po'o // 'jig rten thams cad yang dag par bsrung zhing /
T02D2512-1:176b-28: dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las zlog par byed la /
T02D2512-1:176b-29: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub
T02D2512-1:176b-30: ster bar byed pa'o zhes snyen pa'i sga thob pa'o
T02D2512-1:176b-31: // ming ni rin chen mchog gi rin po che'i
T02D2512-1:176b-32: slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khams gsum
T02D2512-1:176b-33: mtha' dag tu rab tu grags pa ni ming ste
T02D2512-1:176b-34: // / grags pa dang snyan pa chen po dang /
T02D2512-1:176b-35: ming de lta bu thob pa'o //
T02D2512-1:176b-37: nyin re zhing sgo thams cad nas bzlas par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:176b-38: lha mo rin chen lnga'i sbyor bas /

T02D2512-1:176b-40: phyi dro nub tu blta ba dang /
T02D2512-1:176b-41: nam phyed na byang du bltas la bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-1:177a-0: bdag po yang yin la chen po yang yin @177a * //
T02D2512-1:177a-3: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rgyal po ste /

T02D2512-1:177a-8: rin po che'i srog shing gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:177a-10: lha mo rin chen srog shing gi sbyor bas /
T02D2512-1:177a-11: trom hri zhes bzlas brjod byas te /
T02D2512-1:177a-12: de lta bus ni bdag po chen por 'gyur ro //

T02D2512-1:177a-15: de'i dam tshig ni rin po che'i rigs te /
T02D2512-1:177a-16: ming de skad ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so //
T02D2512-1:177a-17: dpal mchog dang po las shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D2512-1:177a-18: tu phyin pa'i dum bu'i rin po che'i rigs kyi
T02D2512-1:177a-21: // / de ltar ser sna'i gnyen po'i phyogs su rin po che'i rigs bshad nas //
T02D2512-1:177a-22: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
T02D2512-1:177a-23: dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gcig tu byas pa
T02D2512-1:177a-24: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar sgrub po //
T02D2512-1:177a-25: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2512-1:177a-26: can ni rdo rje khu tshur bsgoms pas grub par
