T02D2512-1:177a-29: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2512-1:177a-30: 'dod pa'i khams thams cad du ji skad du bshad
T02D2512-1:177a-31: pa'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2512-1:177a-32: bzhugs nas / de'i rjes thogs nyid la shes rab
T02D2512-1:177a-33: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs pa'o
T02D2512-1:177a-34: bzhugs nas / ; / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2512-1:177a-35: cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pas zhes
T02D2512-1:177a-36: bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2512-1:177a-37: ye shes ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang
T02D2512-1:177a-38: bzhugs nas / ; / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par des pa dang /
T02D2512-1:177a-39: rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyar des pa'o //
T02D2512-1:177a-40: de nyid ni sems can gyi khams thams cad rgyas 'debs pas na phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:177a-41: de thob pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa ste /
T02D2512-1:177a-42: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa'o //
T02D2512-1:177a-43: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:177a-44: de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2512-1:177b-0: phyag gnyis @177b byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya 'ching bar mdzad pas so //
T02D2512-1:177b-1: rtag pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ji srid par bzhugs pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2512-1:177b-2: rgyun gyi rtag pa nyid kyis na rtag pa'o //
T02D2512-1:177b-3: yang zhes bya ba ni dbang bskur ba sbyin pa la sogs pa gsungs pa la ltos nas /
T02D2512-1:177b-4: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra smas so //
T02D2512-1:177b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di skad du bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:177b-6: de'i byin gyi rlabs ni 'khor ba ji sred par brtan par mdzad pa'i thos pa dang /
T02D2512-1:177b-8: bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes gang gis shes
T02D2512-1:177b-9: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje ltar
T02D2512-1:177b-11: ming de skad ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:177b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya
T02D2512-1:177b-13: ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ste
T02D2512-1:177b-14: / de yongs su 'dzin pa ni phyag rgya chan po bsgom pa ste /
T02D2512-1:177b-15: de'i nga rgyal bsgom pa'i sbyor bas so //
T02D2512-1:177b-16: des don ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-1:177b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:177b-18: gang gi phyir phyag rgya chen po thams cad ni
T02D2512-1:177b-19: gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs so zhes bsgom pa'i rnal 'byar
T02D2512-1:177b-20: pa ni byang chub chen po'i tshul du skye bar
T02D2512-1:177b-21: 'gyur te / de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:177b-22: gsung gi phyag rgya ni byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ljags so //
T02D2512-1:177b-23: de yongs su 'dzin pa ni de'i ngo bo nyid bsgom pas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba'o //
T02D2512-1:177b-24: des don ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-1:177b-25: chos thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:177b-26: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na chos thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:177b-27: chos dang don dang res pa'i tshig dang /
T02D2512-1:177b-28: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2512-1:177b-29: de rnams 'thob par 'gyur pa ni rnyed pa ste /
T02D2512-1:177b-31: rgyu nyid du sgrub par byed do //
T02D2512-1:177b-32: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:177b-33: lce la rdo rje dkar po rnam par bsams nas /
T02D2512-1:177b-35: rang bzhin gyis dag par lhag par mos par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:177b-36: thugs kyi phyag rgya ni byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'o //
T02D2512-1:177b-37: de yongs su 'dzin pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:178a-0: ting nge 'dzin kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin @178a * //
T02D2512-1:178a-3: lha thams cad kyi sbyor bas rang gi snying gar
T02D2512-1:178a-4: sems dpa' rdo rje lta bur sems rtse gcig tu
T02D2512-1:178a-5: gyur pa ste / de rnams thob pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-1:178a-6: 'dis kyang don 'di skad ston par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:178a-7: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02D2512-1:178a-8: rdo rje rnam par bsams nas de'i dbus su bzlas pa byas pa'i snying po bkod la /
T02D2512-1:178a-9: sgrub pa pos bzlas brjod dam bsgom pa bya'o //
T02D2512-1:178a-10: rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ste /
T02D2512-1:178a-11: de yongs su 'dzin pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:178a-12: lus dang ngag dang sems thams cad rdo rje ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02D2512-1:178a-13: de dag thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa ni
T02D2512-1:178a-14: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa thob pa ste
T02D2512-1:178a-17: rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2512-1:178a-18: las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas bzlas brjod dam bsgom pa byas na /
T02D2512-1:178a-20: sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:178a-21: tshig rnams kyis rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2512-1:178a-24: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:178a-25: las kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa thun mong du gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:178a-27: rang gi snying gar sems dpa' rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:178a-28: byang chub kyi sems chen po bsgom pas phyag rgya chen po thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:178a-29: lce la rdo rje dkar po rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:178a-30: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes bsgoms pas sngags thams cad gdon par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:178a-31: yang rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:178a-32: de'i dbus su rig pa'i sngags thams cad dang /
T02D2512-1:178a-33: dam tshig gi phyag rgya mig yor dang mtshungs par bsgom pa dang /
T02D2512-1:178a-34: chos [?] thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:178a-35: rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:178a-36: de'i dbus su bzlas par bya ba'i rig sngags bkod la /
T02D2512-1:178a-37: las kyi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-1:178a-38: chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:178a-39: de ltar rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi phyag
T02D2512-1:178a-40: rgya bsgrub pa bshad nas gang la la zhes bya
T02D2512-1:178b-0: ba la sogs pas slob @178b dpon las rna ba'i
T02D2512-1:178b-1: rnam par shes pas gzung bar 'gyur ba ni thob
T02D2512-1:178b-2: pa'o // ston pa ni gzhan rnams la 'chad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:178b-3: dngos grub thams cad ni phyag rgya chen po thams cad grub pa'o //
T02D2512-1:178b-4: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni gsung gi phyag rgya thams cad grub pa'o /
T02D2512-1:178b-5: shes pa thams cad ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad grub pa'o //
T02D2512-1:178b-6: dgos pa thams cad ni las kyi phyag rgya thams cad grub pa ste /
T02D2512-1:178b-7: 'di nyid kyis don bzhi po nyid ston par gyur pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:178b-8: lus dang ngag dang sems thams cad rdo rje'i dngos
T02D2512-1:178b-9: grub dam pa thob nas zhes bya ba ni lus
T02D2512-1:178b-10: dang gnag dang sems thams cad rdo rje nyid thob
T02D2512-1:178b-11: pas byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02D2512-1:178b-12: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:178b-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:178b-14: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa nas /
T02D2512-1:178b-15: dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:178b-16: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T02D2512-1:178b-17: pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
T02D2512-1:178b-18: 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems
T02D2512-1:178b-19: chen po la sogs pa 'dis bla na med pa
T02D2512-1:178b-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur
T02D2512-1:178b-21: ro // de ltar na de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:178b-22: mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2512-1:178b-23: bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin
T02D2512-1:178b-25: da ni de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya
T02D2512-1:178b-26: ba la sogs pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa
T02D2512-1:178b-28: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:178b-29: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sprul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:178b-30: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur la bskul ba dang /
T02D2512-1:178b-31: de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ba'i phyir snying po 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:178b-32: dam tshig chen po phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:178b-33: phyag gnyis dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya 'ching par mdzad pa ste /
T02D2512-1:178b-34: rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya thams cad ni rdo
T02D2512-1:178b-35: rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi
T02D2512-1:178b-37: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni sprul pa rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-1:178b-38: de'i dam tshig ni rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu ste /
T02D2512-1:178b-39: ming de skad ces bya ba'i snying po 'dis gsungs pa ni /
T02D2512-1:179a-2: de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis /
T02D2512-1:179a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad rgyas btab pa'o zhes bya bar sbyar te //
T02D2512-1:179a-4: aa zhes bya ba gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin
T02D2512-1:179a-5: gshegs pa la sogs pa dang sems can thams cad
T02D2512-1:179a-6: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' byang chub sems
T02D2512-1:179a-7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur gyi
T02D2512-1:179a-8: ngo bo nyid du gyur pas phyag rgya chen po
T02D2512-1:179a-9: dang / chos dang dam tshig dang las kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:179a-10: phyag rgya thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2512-1:179a-12: las kyi phyag rgya bdag nyid skyed par byed pas
T02D2512-1:179a-13: mi phyed par byas pa ni rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-1:179a-14: ste / der gyur pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid do //
T02D2512-1:179a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' de'i rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-1:179a-16: pa thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog gi
T02D2512-1:179a-17: rgyu ste / rdo rje sems dpa' skyed par byed pa des sangs rgyas nyid dam /
T02D2512-1:179a-18: byang chub sems dpa' thob pa nyid ni /
T02D2512-1:179a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub mchog gi rgyus rgyas btab pas /
T02D2512-1:179a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pas sems can thams cad rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2512-1:179a-21: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:179a-22: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nye bar bsdu ba ste /
T02D2512-1:179a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos
T02D2512-1:179a-24: grub kyi rgyus rgyas btab pa 'ba' zhig tu ma
T02D2512-1:179a-25: zad kyi / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i gsang ba las /
T02D2512-1:179a-26: phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du dam tshig gi sems dpa' byung ba dang /
T02D2512-1:179a-27: gsung gi gsang ba las ljags kyi rig sngags rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:179a-28: thugs kyi gsang ba las rdo rje'i gzugs rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:179a-29: sna tshogs rdo rje las sna tshogs rdo rje 'chang ba rnams phyung ba'o //
T02D2512-1:179a-30: phyung nas kyang dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis
T02D2512-1:179a-31: bzhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba ni de rnams
T02D2512-1:179a-32: kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur yongs su
T02D2512-1:179a-33: bskor nas / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:179a-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:179a-35: bzhugs par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad
T02D2512-1:179a-36: pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin
T02D2512-1:179a-37: no // de nas 'dus pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:179a-38: gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:179b-0: dam tshig dang dbang bskur @179b ba thob pa rnams
T02D2512-1:179b-1: kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:179b-2: 'di'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:179b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2512-1:179b-4: slob ma zhugs pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:179b-5: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:179b-6: ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi mthar snyoms par zhugs par
T02D2512-1:179b-7: mdzad pa'i rjes tho gas nyid la zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-1:179b-8: don to // bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:179b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni sngar bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:179b-10: de las byung ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil
T02D2512-1:179b-11: 'khor ni sems can gyi khams rnams rgyas 'debs pas
T02D2512-1:179b-12: na phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02D2512-1:179b-13: de la dmigs pa rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa
T02D2512-1:179b-14: gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de mngon sum du
T02D2512-1:179b-15: mdzad pa'o / phyag rgya thams cad kyi rdo rje
T02D2512-1:179b-16: dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di
T02D2512-1:179b-17: gsungs so zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya yang yin
T02D2512-1:179b-18: la thams cad kyang yin pas na phyag rgya thams
T02D2512-1:179b-19: mdzad pa'o / cad de / phyag rgya chen po dang /
T02D2512-1:179b-21: las kyi phyag rgya rnams so //
T02D2512-1:179b-22: de nyid mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2512-1:179b-23: de'i dam tshig ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2512-1:179b-24: ming de skad ces bya ba ni 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:179b-25: 'dis ni don 'di skad ston par 'gyur te //
T02D2512-1:179b-26: ting nge 'dzin gsum po ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02D2512-1:179b-27: ji srid dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:179b-28: de nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:179b-29: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni dang po'i sbyor bas bris la zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:179b-30: 'di dag ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rdo
T02D2512-1:179b-31: rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:179b-32: // nang du rdo rje thig gi 'khor lo bri'o
T02D2512-1:179b-33: zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su
T02D2512-1:179b-34: rdo rje phreng ba zlum por bri'o //
T02D2512-1:179b-35: de bzhin du de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor brgyad par
T02D2512-1:179b-36: theg btab pa la zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i
T02D2512-1:179b-37: thig gi 'khor lo'i dbus su shar dang /
T02D2512-1:179b-40: lhor thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:179b-41: de nas de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2512-1:179b-42: khu tshur gser gyi mdog can rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2512-1:180a-1: bcas pa'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya gnyis kyis 'ching bar mdzad pa /
T02D2512-1:180a-2: zhal rnam par bzhad pa ste /
T02D2512-1:180a-3: cung zad 'dzum pa dang bcas pas /
T02D2512-1:180a-4: aa zhes bya bas yang dag par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:180a-5: de bzhin du rdo rje'i sku mchog ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:180a-6: ji srid lha mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D2512-1:180a-7: du lha thams cad gnas ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2512-1:180a-8: gzhag par bya'o // de nas dam tshig gi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:180a-9: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyod de /
T02D2512-1:180a-10: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:180a-12: zhugs nas slob dpon med par yang phyag rgya thams
T02D2512-1:180a-13: cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:180a-14: ni / gang zhig slob dpon yod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'o //
T02D2512-1:180a-15: de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad don yod
T02D2512-1:180a-16: par thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dkyil
T02D2512-1:180a-17: 'khor du 'jug pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
T02D2512-1:180a-18: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i
T02D2512-1:180a-19: dngos grub rnams dang rigs gzhan gyi dkyil 'khor las
T02D2512-1:180a-20: gsungs pa rnams kyang don yod cing 'bras bu dang
T02D2512-1:180a-22: phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:180a-23: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa ni phyag rgya thams cad de ;
T02D2512-1:180a-24: de rnams kyi ye shes ni chos thams cad rang
T02D2512-1:180a-25: bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'o zhes nges par gyur pa'o
T02D2512-1:180a-26: // des dbang phyug tu gyur pa ni rang dbang du gyur pa'i gtso bo'o //
T02D2512-1:180a-27: myur ba ni shin tu skyen pa nyid du'o //
T02D2512-1:180a-28: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D2512-1:180a-29: chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
T02D2512-1:180a-31: de nas thams cad byas la /
T02D2512-1:180a-32: bdag nyid la go bar bya ba'i phyir sku gsung
T02D2512-1:180a-33: thugs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa dam tshig
T02D2512-1:180a-34: brjod par bya'o // de yang sku dang gsung dang
T02D2512-1:180a-35: thugs rnams kyis gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas de'i ngo
T02D2512-1:180a-36: bo nyid yin pas na phyag rgya thams cad ces
T02D2512-1:180a-37: brjod par bya'o // bya ba sta / sku dang
T02D2512-1:180a-38: gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams bsgom pa'i ngo bo
T02D2512-1:180a-39: nyid kyi sbyor ba des sgrub pa po'i rgyud la
T02D2512-1:180a-40: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams
T02D2512-1:180a-41: cad ces bya bar grags shing nges pa'o //
T02D2512-1:180a-42: gang zhig ce na dam tshig ste /
T02D2512-1:180a-43: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2512-1:180b-0: 'di'i las na ci @180b zhig yin zhe na dngos grub kun ster ba'o zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:180b-1: byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /
T02D2512-1:180b-2: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:180b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:180b-4: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2512-1:180b-5: can gyis dngos grub thams cad ster par byed pas
T02D2512-1:180b-6: na / dngos grub kun ster ba'o //
T02D2512-1:180b-10: las dang phyag rgya rnams gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:180b-11: de nas de'i ngo bo nyid du bsgom pa'i stobs
T02D2512-1:180b-12: kyis rnal 'byor pa phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2512-1:180b-13: pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du
T02D2512-1:180b-14: 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:180b-15: slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no zhes bya
T02D2512-1:180b-16: ba ni ji ltar slob dpon gyi 'jug pa'i cho
T02D2512-1:180b-17: ga rgyas par gsungs pa de bzhin du slob ma
T02D2512-1:180b-18: rnams kyi yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:180b-19: phyag rgya thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:180b-20: la phyag rgya thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi 'od
T02D2512-1:180b-21: gsal ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T02D2512-1:180b-22: de las byung ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil
T02D2512-1:180b-23: 'khor ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor zhes
T02D2512-1:180b-24: bya'o // thams cad rnam par gsal bar bya ba'i phyir slar yang bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:180b-25: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor bas
T02D2512-1:180b-26: rdo rje dbyings las gsungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po
T02D2512-1:180b-27: byas la / ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:180b-28: ji srid dkyil 'khor mngon sum du mthong bar gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:180b-29: de nas ji skad du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin bsgoms la ;
T02D2512-1:180b-30: bar snang gi phyogs su snga ma bzhin du bzhag
T02D2512-1:180b-31: nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su thig gdab par
T02D2512-1:180b-32: bya'o // 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ste /
T02D2512-1:180b-33: de'i nang du de'i phyed kyi tshad kyi zlum pho'i
T02D2512-1:180b-34: rdo rje'i thig ka pa brgyad dang ldan par thig
T02D2512-1:180b-36: de nas legs par bri bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:180b-37: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:180b-38: de nas dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i lte ba'i phyogs su
T02D2512-1:180b-39: gnas pa'i padma la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu
T02D2512-1:180b-40: tshur sku mdog ser po zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas
T02D2512-1:181a-0: pa / dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin cing @181a * //
T02D2512-1:181a-1: thugs ka'i phyogs su 'tshir brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2512-1:181a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i cod phan gyis dbang bskur ba /
T02D2512-1:181a-3: zhal shar du gzigs pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:181a-4: de'i mdun du rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas
T02D2512-1:181a-5: su rdo rje sku mchog rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i
T02D2512-1:181a-7: g-yas phyogs su k'i li k'i la'i gnas su rdo
T02D2512-1:181a-8: rje ljags rdo rje smra ba'i cha lugs 'dzin pa
T02D2512-1:181a-10: rgyab tu rdo rje dran pa'i gnas su byang chub
T02D2512-1:181a-11: sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:181a-12: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D2512-1:181a-13: bsnams pa / rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:181a-14: g-yon logs su rdo rje snyems pa'i gnas su byang
T02D2512-1:181a-15: chub sems dpa' rdo rje rdo rje zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:181a-16: rdo rje snyems pa'i sku'i cha lugs 'chang ba /
T02D2512-1:181a-17: de'i phyag rgya'i tshul can no //
T02D2512-1:181a-18: nang gi dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi shar lho'i mtshams
T02D2512-1:181a-19: su lha mo phyag rgya'i khu tshur zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:181a-20: rdo rje khu tshur gyi cha lugs 'chang ba /
T02D2512-1:181a-21: dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa thogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:181a-22: lho nub kyi mtshams su lha mo rin chen gyi
T02D2512-1:181a-23: khu tshur zhes bya ba 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying
T02D2512-1:181a-25: dam tshig gi rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin chen 'dzin cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:181a-26: nub byang mtshams su bcom ldan 'das ma ye shes
T02D2512-1:181a-27: kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba 'jig rten dbang phyug
T02D2512-1:181a-29: dam tshig padma'i khu tshur gyis padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-1:181a-30: byang shar mtshams su bcom ldan 'das ma las kyi
T02D2512-1:181a-31: khu tshur zhes bya ba dngos po thams cad rdo
T02D2512-1:181a-32: rje las dang 'dra ba rdo rje khu tshur gyis
T02D2512-1:181a-33: las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa
T02D2512-1:181a-34: bri bar bya'o // shar phyogs kyi sgor bcom ldan
T02D2512-1:181a-35: 'das ma rdo rje snyems ma bdag nyid kyi dngos
T02D2512-1:181a-36: po thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra ba
T02D2512-1:181a-37: rdo rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2512-1:181a-38: lho phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje ljags ma rdo rje smra pa dang 'dra ba /
T02D2512-1:181a-40: nub phyogs kyi sgor ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ma ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i cha lugs 'chang ba'o //
T02D2512-1:181a-41: byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje rdo rje ma rdo rje las dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2512-1:181a-42: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir ni sgeg mo la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:181b-0: 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying @181b po ni aa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-1:181b-2: de bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02D2512-1:181b-3: 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung
T02D2512-1:181b-4: ba'i rdo rje me tog gi yal ga las rnam
T02D2512-1:181b-5: par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02D2512-1:181b-6: lha thams cad kyi bum pa dang /
T02D2512-1:181b-7: gang ba'i bum pa rnams la aa zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:181b-8: re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzla'o
T02D2512-1:181b-9: // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi yongs su phye ste /
T02D2512-1:181b-10: rdo rje bsdu ba byas la bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2512-1:181b-11: phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing bcom ldan 'das la
T02D2512-1:181b-12: mchan brgya rtsa brgyad pas kyang bstod la /
T02D2512-1:181b-14: aa zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du bcug rnas /
T02D2512-1:181b-15: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba byas te mtshams bcing ba dang /
T02D2512-1:181b-16: dra ba dang rab dag byas la /
T02D2512-1:181b-17: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcings te /
T02D2512-1:181b-18: rdo rje srung bas srung ba thams cad go bskon nas /
T02D2512-1:181b-19: aa zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02D2512-1:181b-20: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:181b-21: a'a: dri shya zhes bya bas 'khor dang bcas pa la blta bar byas la /
T02D2512-1:181b-22: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma
T02D2512-1:181b-23: ya stvam aa ham aa zhes lan gsum brjod de
T02D2512-1:181b-24: bsgrub par bya'o // rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe'u
T02D2512-1:181b-25: chung gnyis kyi bar du mthe bong bcings la ma
T02D2512-1:181b-26: dzu ba mo bkug pa 'di ni dam tshig rdo
T02D2512-1:181b-27: rje khu tshur gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2512-1:181b-28: de nas lce la rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du bsams la /
T02D2512-1:181b-29: aa zhes bya ba lha thams cad kyi ljags la bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:181b-30: 'di ni 'di ltar lha thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:181b-31: rang gi snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2512-1:181b-32: lha thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:181b-33: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02D2512-1:181b-34: gcig la gcig btsir ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:181b-35: gnyi ga snyems pa dang bcas pas bstod de 'jog pa 'di ni rdo rje'i sku'i mchog gi'o //
T02D2512-1:181b-36: rdo rje gnyis kar bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje ljags kyi'o //
T02D2512-1:181b-37: ting nge 'dzin mchog ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'o //
T02D2512-1:181b-38: rdo rje gar bskor te bkrol la mkhur ba dang spyi bor 'jog pa ni rdo rje rdo rje'o //
T02D2512-1:181b-39: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis nges par btsir ba ni lha mo phyag rgya'i khu tshur gyi'o //
T02D2512-1:182a-0: nam mkha'i snying po'i las kyi phyag rgya ni lha mo bcom ldan 'das ma nor @182a * //
T02D2512-1:182a-2: g-yas kyis g-yon dbye ba ni lha mo ye shes kyi khu tshur gyi'o //
T02D2512-1:182a-3: rdo rje rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid ni lha mo las kyi khu tshur gyi'o //
T02D2512-1:182a-4: sgeg mo la sogs pa'i ni sngar bshad pa'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid do //
T02D2512-1:182a-5: rdo rje snyems ma la sogs pa'i yang rdo rje
T02D2512-1:182a-6: sku mchog la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen
T02D2512-1:182a-7: po rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya rnams gzung bar
T02D2512-1:182a-8: bya'o // rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:182a-9: ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas /
T02D2512-1:182a-10: thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182a-11: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams
T02D2512-1:182a-12: cad bcom ldan 'das kyi thun mong gi snying po
T02D2512-1:182a-13: ni 'dir aa zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-1:182a-14: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur
T02D2512-1:182a-15: ba thams cad dbang bskur la snga ma bzhin du
T02D2512-1:182a-20: bla re la sogs pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la phul la /
T02D2512-1:182a-21: mchod pa rnam pa lnga byas nas /
T02D2512-1:182a-22: phyi rol du glu dang gar dang rol mo dang /
T02D2512-1:182a-25: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02D2512-1:182a-26: de nas phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:182a-27: aom zhes bya ba las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02D2512-1:182a-28: dpag bsam gyi shing kha zas ro brgya la sogs pa'i bkod pa sprul la /
T02D2512-1:182a-30: phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo spyi bor bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:182a-33: a'a brta ya a'a brta ya ho: zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182a-34: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la /
T02D2512-1:182a-35: sbyin sreg byas nas ras shin tu dmar ba la rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:182a-36: de las ras gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02D2512-1:182a-37: gcig gis stod g-yogs byas nas yang gcig la rdo
T02D2512-1:182a-38: rje lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi yongs su bzlas
T02D2512-1:182a-39: pas rang gi gdong g-yogs par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182a-40: de nas phyag btsal ba la sogs pa sngon du
T02D2512-1:182a-41: 'gro bas de bzhin du sdom pa yang dag par
T02D2512-1:182a-42: blangs la byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02D2512-1:182a-43: de bzhin du snying gar rdo rje bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:182a-44: shar phyogs kyi sgo la bltas nas /
T02D2512-1:182a-45: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02D2512-1:182b-0: @182b rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-1:182b-1: rgya bcings nas de bzhin du me tog gi phreng
T02D2512-1:182b-2: ba blangs la / badzra badzra aa zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:182b-3: badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182b-4: de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs te /
T02D2512-1:182b-5: badzra p'a sha h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182b-6: de nas nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs te /
T02D2512-1:182b-7: badzra spho ta bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182b-8: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas snga ma bzhin du zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:182b-9: badzra a'a be sha a'a: zhes bya bas bdag nyid dbang du bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182b-10: de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:182b-15: a'adya siddhya m'am zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182b-16: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:182b-17: dkyil 'khor la lan gsum bskor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:182b-18: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:182b-26: badzra satva a'a dya siddhya m'am /
T02D2512-1:182b-27: yang 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:182b-28: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya m'am /
T02D2512-1:182b-29: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la aa zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod do //
T02D2512-1:182b-30: de bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182b-31: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje phye la /
T02D2512-1:182b-32: bdag nyid la dbab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:182b-33: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182b-34: de nas aa zhes bya bas me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182b-35: de nas de blangs la aa zhes bya ba nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182b-36: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:182b-37: de nas de zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /

T02D2512-1:194b-26: yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:194b-27: dza: h'um bam ho: / pra siddh'a m'am /
T02D2512-1:194b-28: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la /
T02D2512-1:194b-29: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:194b-30: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje phye la /
T02D2512-1:194b-31: aa zhes bya ba de bzhin du brjod cing bdag nyid la dbab bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:194b-32: de nas aa zhes bya ba zlos shing me tog dong bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:194b-34: aa nyid kyis rang gi mgo bo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:194b-35: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //

T02D2512-1:194b-37: de nas ral gri dang glegs bam gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:194b-38: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dgrol lo //
T02D2512-1:194b-39: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /

T02D2512-1:194b-41: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bstan nas
T02D2512-1:194b-42: dngos grub stsol bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar
T02D2512-1:194b-44: aa ra ba tsa na zhes bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-1:194b-45: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor ba shis pa

T02D2512-1:194b-47: bzhag la / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02D2512-1:194b-48: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:194b-49: glu dang rol mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:195a-0: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i @195a * //
T02D2512-1:195a-1: phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:195a-2: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te /
T02D2512-1:195a-3: rdo rje thal mo bsko bas phyag byas te /
T02D2512-1:195a-4: me tog la sogs pa dang dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:195a-5: de la dang po kho nar bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2512-1:195a-6: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i ral
T02D2512-1:195a-7: gri dang / me tog gi yal ga las rnam
T02D2512-1:195a-8: par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sngar bshad pa'i bum
T02D2512-1:195a-9: pa'i sngags de bzhin du yong su bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:195a-10: bdag nyid 'jam dpa'i dbyangs su byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2512-1:195a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnal
T02D2512-1:195a-12: 'byor chen po las gsungs pa'i gnas rnams su bcom
T02D2512-1:195a-13: ldan 'das rang gi gnas su bkod la /
T02D2512-1:195a-15: h'um gis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por
T02D2512-1:195a-16: gsungs pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa yang
T02D2512-1:195a-17: rang gi lus la rang gi gnas su bkod de
T02D2512-1:195a-18: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs
T02D2512-1:195a-19: padma'i steng du 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-1:195a-21: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:195a-23: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod nas /
T02D2512-1:195a-24: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02D2512-1:195a-25: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa aa zhes bya bas bdag nyid dbang bskur zhing /
T02D2512-1:195a-26: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02D2512-1:195a-27: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur zhing /
T02D2512-1:195a-31: bris pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:195a-32: rdo rje ral gri rdo rje dril bu dang bcas par blangs te /
T02D2512-1:195a-33: bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur bdag gis kyang aa zhes bya bzlos shing dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:195a-34: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:195a-35: ral gri 'di ni rtag bzung la //
T02D2512-1:195a-36: shes rab tshul 'di dkar smra zhing //
T02D2512-1:195a-37: nam mkha' sangs rgyas sbyor ba yis /
T02D2512-1:195a-39: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung phyir dang //
T02D2512-1:195a-40: sems can mang po bsrung ba'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:195a-42: bsod nams dag kyang thob par 'gyur //
T02D2512-1:195b-0: @195b de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02D2512-1:195b-1: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:195b-2: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod
T02D2512-1:195b-3: pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis kyang yang dag par
T02D2512-1:195b-4: mchod par bya'o // de nas rdo rje ral gri de kho na nyid kyis bzung la /
T02D2512-1:195b-5: rdo rje dril bu chos kyis dkrol zhing /
T02D2512-1:195b-6: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:195b-7: de kho na nyid la sogs pa ni //
T02D2512-1:195b-8: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2512-1:195b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de dag nyid yin te /
T02D2512-1:195b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:195b-13: tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2512-1:195b-16: yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:195b-17: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02D2512-1:195b-18: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
T02D2512-1:195b-20: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi /
T02D2512-1:195b-21: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02D2512-1:195b-22: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:195b-23: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2512-1:195b-24: de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:195b-25: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:195b-27: // / de nas sngom pa dpog par 'os pa'i slob ma la //
T02D2512-1:195b-28: sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug
T02D2512-1:195b-29: cing byang chub tu sems bskyed pa byed du gzhug
T02D2512-1:195b-30: go // de nas de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:195b-31: me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D2512-1:195b-33: sgo la bltas nas gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:195b-34: bdag nyid 'jug pa'i tshogs bcug ste /
T02D2512-1:195b-35: yang rdo rje dbang pa'i phyag rgya dril bu dang
T02D2512-1:195b-36: bcas pas rkang pa g-yon pas de'i rkang pa g-yas
T02D2512-1:195b-37: pa mnan la / aa aa: aa: aa: aa: zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:195b-38: tsheg drag med ba'i aa dang po dang /
T02D2512-1:195b-39: tshig drag dang bcas pa'i aa: bzhi lan brgya bzlas la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:195b-40: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:195b-41: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:195b-43: // / de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa dang /
T02D2512-1:196a-1: sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs nas /
T02D2512-1:196a-2: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02D2512-1:196a-3: slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab par
T02D2512-1:196a-4: bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2512-1:196a-5: phyir / sgrub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:196a-6: sgrub pa dag ni de bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:196a-7: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-1:196a-8: sgrub pa la sngon du bsnyen pa ras ris kyi
T02D2512-1:196a-9: spyan sngar bya bar gsungs pa de bzhin du /
T02D2512-1:196a-10: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:196a-12: zla ba nya nas brtsams nas /
T02D2512-1:196a-13: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyan sngar dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bcings la /
T02D2512-1:196a-14: ji ltar skyo bar mi 'gyur bar /
T02D2512-1:196a-15: dang po bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2512-1:196a-17: aa ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba'i bzlas brjod
T02D2512-1:196a-18: ji srid zla ba gcig gis sngon du bsnyen pa
T02D2512-1:196a-19: byas par gyur gyi bar du bya'o //
T02D2512-1:196a-20: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor bas snga ma bzhin du bri ba'am /
T02D2512-1:196a-22: de nas yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2512-1:196a-23: bcom ldan 'das ras kyi ri mo la ji lta
T02D2512-1:196a-24: ba bzhin du spyan drangs nas cho ga thams cad
T02D2512-1:196a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka na gnas pa'i rdo rje la bzlas par bya ba'i sngags bkod de /
T02D2512-1:196a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:196a-28: zla ba nya nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:196a-29: de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa'i sbyor bas ji
T02D2512-1:196a-30: srid du phyi ma'i nya la bab kyi bar du
T02D2512-1:196a-31: bzlas brjod bya'o // de nas de'i mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02D2512-1:196a-32: nang bar bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas /
T02D2512-1:196a-33: sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:196a-34: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig pa
T02D2512-1:196a-35: ras la bris la de'i spyan sngar phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-1:196a-36: po ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te bzlas brjod
T02D2512-1:196a-37: 'bum bya'o // de nas zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02D2512-1:196a-38: nang par bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas rang gi dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:196a-39: de nas ma bsgrubs par yang de bzhin du las
T02D2512-1:196a-40: rnams grub par 'gyur ba ni zhes bya ba zla
T02D2512-1:196a-41: ba gcig gi bar du bsnyen pa ji lta ba
T02D2512-1:196b-0: bcom @196b ldan 'das kyi sbyor ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas /
T02D2512-1:196b-1: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du
T02D2512-1:196b-2: bya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad ni nam mkha'
T02D2512-1:196b-3: dang mnyam pa'o zhes bsgom zhing /
T02D2512-1:196b-4: aa zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas nas de nas
T02D2512-1:196b-5: 'dis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par
T02D2512-1:196b-6: 'gyur ro // mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2512-1:196b-7: thob pa la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:196b-8: 'gyur ro // la / mtshan ma med pa'i ting
T02D2512-1:196b-9: nge 'dzin rtogs par 'dod pas ji skad du gsungs
T02D2512-1:196b-10: pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'o
T02D2512-1:196b-12: de nas rtse gcig pa thob pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:196b-13: smon pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:196b-14: de bzhin du thams cad byas la /
T02D2512-1:196b-15: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa'o zhes mthar
T02D2512-1:196b-16: sems rtse gcig pa thob pas smon pa med pa'i
T02D2512-1:196b-18: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-1:196b-19: sogs pa snga ma bzhin du thams cad byas te
T02D2512-1:196b-20: / chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o zhes bsgom zhing /
T02D2512-1:196b-21: aa zhes bya ba bzlas te /
T02D2512-1:196b-22: ji srid de lta bu'i rnam par sems rtse gcig
T02D2512-1:196b-23: pa thob par 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du
T02D2512-1:196b-24: bsgoms na / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:196b-25: nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa la ni chos bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:196b-26: nyon mongs pa thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:196b-27: de rnams gcod pa ni spangs par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-1:196b-28: chos so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa ni chos bsgom pa ste /
T02D2512-1:196b-29: des 'dod chags la sogs pa spong bar 'gyur ro ;
T02D2512-1:196b-30: / yi ge thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig gi
T02D2512-1:196b-31: ye shes ni nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag
T02D2512-1:196b-32: par rig pa'o // de ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-1:196b-33: spros pa med pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:196b-34: chos thams cad ni dag gi lam dang bral ba'o
T02D2512-1:196b-35: zhes bsgom pa ni spros pa med pa'i ye shes
T02D2512-1:196b-36: bsgom pa ste / des de thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-1:196b-37: gnas thams cad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:196b-38: rtsig pa dang snam bu dang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i gnas thams cad la /
T02D2512-1:196b-39: gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po de bzhin nyid du
T02D2512-1:196b-40: ston par byed pa'i yi ge chos thams cad gdong
T02D2512-1:197a-1: pa'i phyir aa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'i zhes
T02D2512-1:197a-2: bya ba la sogs pas de bzhin nyid du nye
T02D2512-1:197a-3: bar dmigs shing chos kyi sku mthong ba'i phyir ro
T02D2512-1:197a-5: aa la sogs pa'i yi ge'i ngo bo nyid bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:197a-6: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir aa ni chos
T02D2512-1:197a-7: thams cad kyi sgo'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:197a-8: bsgom pa ni / aa la sogs pa'i yi ge ngo bo nyid sgom pa ste /
T02D2512-1:197a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub 'thob
T02D2512-1:197a-11: pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2512-1:197a-14: rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:197a-15: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bod gnyis pa shibs la /
T02D2512-1:197a-16: mdzub mo gnyis padma'i 'dab ma ltar bya zhing gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa bkug la /
T02D2512-1:197a-17: ral grir bya ba 'di ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:197a-18: 'di bcings la chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang
T02D2512-1:197a-19: mnyam pa'o zhes ji srid shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D2512-1:197a-20: tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur gyi
T02D2512-1:197a-21: bar du bsgoms na des de 'thob par 'gyur ro
T02D2512-1:197a-22: // 'khor lo chen po ltar yi ge bskor ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:197a-23: 'khor lo yang yin la chen po yang yin pas na 'khor lo chen po ste /
T02D2512-1:197a-24: gdul bya'i skye bo'i rgyud la 'pho ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:197a-25: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02D2512-1:197a-27: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ste /
T02D2512-1:197a-28: rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi ni 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:197a-29: de las byung ba'i yi ge aa ra pa tsa na la sogs pa la yang /
T02D2512-1:197a-30: 'khor lo chen po ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ste /
T02D2512-1:197a-31: des nye bar mtshon pa'i dkyil 'khor ni 'khor lo
T02D2512-1:197a-32: chen po ltar yi ge bskor ba'i dam tshig ces
T02D2512-1:197a-33: bya ba la / ming de skad ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs pa ste /
T02D2512-1:197a-34: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu
T02D2512-1:197a-35: las gsungs pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
T02D2512-1:197a-36: pa'i rtog pa bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:197a-38: // / de ltar 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtog pa
T02D2512-1:197a-39: gsungs nas da ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:197a-40: du 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur pa 'phags pa rdo rje
T02D2512-1:197a-41: 'khor lo'i rtog pa bshad pa'i phyir de nas zhes
T02D2512-1:197b-0: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs @197b te ;
T02D2512-1:197b-1: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2512-1:197b-2: snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2512-1:197b-3: mdzad 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang
T02D2512-1:197b-4: byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na /
T02D2512-1:197b-5: ji skad du bshad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis bskor cing bzhugs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:197b-6: de'i rjes thogs nyid la 'khor lo chen po la
T02D2512-1:197b-7: 'jug pa'i zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D2512-1:197b-8: tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do zhes bya bar
T02D2512-1:197b-9: sbyar ro // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni
T02D2512-1:197b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab
T02D2512-1:197b-11: dang mnyam pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:197b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:197b-13: sems dpa' thams cad de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa ni /
T02D2512-1:197b-14: khams gsum gyi nang du gtogs pa rnams so //
T02D2512-1:197b-15: sems dpa' thams cad ni bshad ma thag pa rnams te /
T02D2512-1:197b-16: de rnams kyi 'khor lo ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2512-1:197b-17: de'i nang du 'dug pa ni dbus su bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:197b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:197b-19: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ltos nas /
T02D2512-1:197b-20: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra smos so //
T02D2512-1:197b-21: 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D2512-1:197b-22: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:197b-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:197b-24: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams
T02D2512-1:197b-25: cad du bsngo ba yin pas na 'khor lo chen
T02D2512-1:197b-26: po'o // de la 'jug pa ni bla na med
T02D2512-1:197b-27: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs pa
T02D2512-1:197b-28: po'o // ste / ming de skad ces bya ba'i
T02D2512-1:197b-29: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gang
T02D2512-1:197b-30: yin pa de bshad pa ni ston par mdzad pa'o
T02D2512-1:197b-31: po'o // ste / // rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa dang //
T02D2512-1:197b-33: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:197b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:197b-36: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D2512-1:197b-37: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2512-1:197b-38: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T02D2512-1:197b-39: de'i mnyam pa nyid du ni gzung ba dang 'dzin
T02D2512-1:197b-40: pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba nyid de
T02D2512-1:197b-41: / kun rdzob dang don dam par dbyer mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2512-1:198a-0: de gnyis ka'i ngo bo nyid kyis gang mnyam shing thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin @198a * //
T02D2512-1:198a-1: gyis gang thos pa dang bsam pa dang /
T02D2512-1:198a-2: bsgom pa rnams kyis rtogs par gyur pa ni 'jug pa'o //
T02D2512-1:198a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:198a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:198a-5: de la 'jug pa ni phyi dang gsang ba'i tshul gyis 'jug pa ste /
T02D2512-1:198a-6: de la phyi'i 'jug pa ni ji ltar sprul pa'i
T02D2512-1:198a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2512-1:198a-9: gdul bya rnams rdo rje sems dpar gang zhig mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:198a-10: gsang ba'i 'jug pa ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2512-1:198a-11: sems dpas mdzad pa phyi'i 'jug pa de nyid du
T02D2512-1:198a-12: gang ye shes dbab pa dang de kho na nyid
T02D2512-1:198a-13: bcu rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can de ni gsang ba'i
T02D2512-1:198a-14: 'jug pa ste / de'i don du rdo rje mnyam
T02D2512-1:198a-15: pa nyid la 'jug pa'i rgyu'i dngos por gnas shing
T02D2512-1:198a-17: / don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:198a-18: don ni rin po che'i rigs dang /
T02D2512-1:198a-19: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:198a-20: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D2512-1:198a-21: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02D2512-1:198a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'i sku'o //
T02D2512-1:198a-23: de'i mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni /
T02D2512-1:198a-25: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D2512-1:198a-26: rin po che'i rigs de la phyi dang gsang ba'i 'jug pa ji skad du bshad pa ste /
T02D2512-1:198a-27: de'i don du 'jug par 'gyur ba ni /
T02D2512-1:198a-28: ji ltar sprul pa'i rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil
T02D2512-1:198a-29: 'khor du bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i slob
T02D2512-1:198a-30: dpon gyis gdul bya rnams gang 'jug par bya ba'i
T02D2512-1:198a-31: don te de ni don gyi mnyam pa nyid rtogs
T02D2512-1:198a-32: pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:198a-33: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:198a-35: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:198a-36: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D2512-1:198a-37: rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang /
T02D2512-1:198a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D2512-1:198a-39: de'i mnyam pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2512-1:198a-40: mi phyed pa nyid de 'jug pa ni de rtogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:198b-0: dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo @198b ni padma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:198b-1: de la 'jug pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i
T02D2512-1:198b-2: bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul bas gdul bya rnams
T02D2512-1:198b-3: la gang zhig mdzad pa ste /
T02D2512-1:198b-4: de'i don du chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:198b-5: thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:198b-6: thams cad ni las kyi rigs dang /
T02D2512-1:198b-7: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:198b-8: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D2512-1:198b-9: rnam par thar pa'i sgo rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang /
T02D2512-1:198b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D2512-1:198b-11: de'i mnyam pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2512-1:198b-14: 'khor lo thams cad ni las kyi dkyil 'khor du gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sprul pa'o //
T02D2512-1:198b-15: der 'jug pa ni ji skad du gsungs pa'i bcom
T02D2512-1:198b-16: ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gdul bya rnams la
T02D2512-1:198b-18: de'i don du ni thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
T02D2512-1:198b-19: la 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2512-1:198b-20: to // de ltar na bcom ldan 'das zhes bya
T02D2512-1:198b-21: ba nas brtsams te 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug
T02D2512-1:198b-22: par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas
T02D2512-1:198b-23: ni ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs pa yin no
T02D2512-1:198b-24: to // // da ni de nas zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:198b-25: la sogs pas ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa
T02D2512-1:198b-26: to // // yin te / de ltar bcom ldan
T02D2512-1:198b-27: 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2512-1:198b-28: sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'khor lo la rang
T02D2512-1:198b-29: gi dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2512-1:198b-30: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i phyir bskul ba dang /
T02D2512-1:198b-31: de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ba'i phyir snying po ni smras pa'o //
T02D2512-1:198b-32: rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:198b-33: rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs kyi rtsibs brgyad dang ldan pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
T02D2512-1:198b-34: bskor ba ni lag pa g-yas pa'i gung mo'i steng du bskor ba'o//
T02D2512-1:198b-35: 'khor lo thams cad ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams so //
T02D2512-1:198b-37: ji skad du bshad pa'i phyi dang gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02D2512-1:198b-38: de'i don gyi dam tshig ni rgyu'o //
T02D2512-1:198b-39: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la bzhag nas smras pa'o //
T02D2512-1:199a-0: smras so zhes bya ba ni ming de skad ces bya @199a * //
T02D2512-1:199a-1: ba'i snying po gsungs pa ni /
T02D2512-1:199a-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:199a-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'khor los h'um zhes bya
T02D2512-1:199a-5: ba 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2512-1:199a-6: par snang mdzad la sogs pa gang phyogs bcu'i de
T02D2512-1:199a-7: bzhin gshegs pa de dag la sogs pa 'dod pa
T02D2512-1:199a-8: dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D2512-1:199a-9: gyi khams gsum gyi nang du gtogs pa'i skal ba
T02D2512-1:199a-10: ji lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad
T02D2512-1:199a-11: dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhes pa 'khor lo'i dkyil
T02D2512-1:199a-13: bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi
T02D2512-1:199a-14: 'khor lo bskor ba'i thugs las sems bskyed ma thag
T02D2512-1:199a-15: tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:199a-16: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams
T02D2512-1:199a-17: zhes pa 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2512-1:199a-18: dpa' rnams byung nas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ji
T02D2512-1:199a-19: lta ba bzhin du bzhugs so //
T02D2512-1:199a-21: de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni /
T02D2512-1:199a-22: dkyil 'khor gyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:199a-23: de nas 'dus pa nas brtsams te gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:199a-24: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa
T02D2512-1:199a-25: rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2512-1:199a-26: ba 'di'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:199a-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2512-1:199a-28: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:199a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:199a-30: dkyil 'khor thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:199a-31: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:199a-32: de rnams la zhugs pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:199a-33: de'i don gyi phyag rgya ni 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2512-1:199a-34: de la dmigs pa'i ming de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2512-1:199a-35: 'khor lo thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyag
T02D2512-1:199a-36: rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms
T02D2512-1:199a-37: par zhugs pa'o // dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad ces bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:199a-38: dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-1:199b-0: pa la sogs pa rigs thams cad kyi @199b dkyil
T02D2512-1:199b-1: 'khor te / der 'jug par bya ba'i phyir de'i dam tshig ni rgyu'o //
T02D2512-1:199b-2: ming de skad ces bya ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:199b-3: ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdo
T02D2512-1:199b-4: rje 'khor lo'i 'khor los mtshon pa'i dkyil 'khor 'og
T02D2512-1:199b-5: nas bshad pa 'di gsungs pas so //
T02D2512-1:199b-6: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du byas te
T02D2512-1:199b-7: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil
T02D2512-1:199b-9: nang gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bris la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:199b-10: dkyil 'khor 'di'i nang du dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor bri ba'o //
T02D2512-1:199b-11: dbus su rdo rje 'khor lo la rdo rje 'khor
T02D2512-1:199b-12: lo bskor ba gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:199b-14: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'khor
T02D2512-1:199b-15: lo ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo
T02D2512-1:199b-16: rtsibs brgyad pa / phyag g-yas pa'i gung mo'i rtse mo la yongs su bskor ba gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:199b-17: phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:199b-18: la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje
T02D2512-1:199b-19: 'khor lo de'i phyogs dang mtshams rnams su snga ma
T02D2512-1:199b-20: bzhin du phyag na rdo rje nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:199b-21: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bar gyi byang chub sems
T02D2512-1:199b-22: dpa' rnams dkyil 'khor dang po'i tshul du zhes pa
T02D2512-1:199b-23: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du gzhag
T02D2512-1:199b-24: par bya zhing bzhugs su gsol bar bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:199b-25: // phyi'i mtshams rnams su rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil
T02D2512-1:199b-26: 'khor bzhi bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyi'i
T02D2512-1:199b-27: rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams te /
T02D2512-1:199b-28: zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa dang /
T02D2512-1:199b-31: ma mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:199b-32: bskor phyogs kyi rim pas byang shar mtshams kyi bar du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:199b-33: sgo rnams su mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-1:199b-34: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ji lta
T02D2512-1:199b-35: ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas
T02D2512-1:199b-36: nyid dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur
T02D2512-1:199b-38: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02D2512-1:199b-39: mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis rdo rje bcing ba ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:199b-40: de dang sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor du zhugs na /
T02D2512-1:200a-2: dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub pa des sgrub pa pos sangs rgyas nyid dam /
T02D2512-1:200a-3: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:200a-4: de nas 'khor lo blangs la zhes bya ba ni h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:200a-5: bcom ldan 'das la 'khor lo nod ba'o//
T02D2512-1:200a-6: 'khor lo'i ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya zhing zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:200a-7: 'khor lo mgo la bzhag la h'um kye rdo rje
T02D2512-1:200a-8: 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'khor lo'i
T02D2512-1:200a-9: ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:200a-10: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
T02D2512-1:200a-11: dkyil 'khor thig bzhi btab pa'i rigs rnams su 'jug
T02D2512-1:200a-12: par bya'o zhes bya ba ni zhi ba mdung thung
T02D2512-1:200a-13: gis mtshan pa la sogs pa bzhi rnams kyang ji
T02D2512-1:200a-14: lta ba bzhin du bris la /
T02D2512-1:200a-15: zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa la sogs pa'i dkyil
T02D2512-1:200a-16: 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga nyid kyis 'jug par
T02D2512-1:200a-17: bya'o // slob ma rnams gzhug pa yang de bzhin
T02D2512-1:200a-18: no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dir slob dpon
T02D2512-1:200a-19: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs pa slob
T02D2512-1:200a-20: ma rnams la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o
T02D2512-1:200a-21: bya'o // // 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:200a-22: rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa la sogs
T02D2512-1:200a-23: pa gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi rgyud la 'pho
T02D2512-1:200a-24: bar byed pa'i don gyi na 'khor lo ste /
T02D2512-1:200a-25: de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed ma
T02D2512-1:200a-26: thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:200a-29: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'khor lo'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02D2512-1:200a-30: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:200a-31: ji srid du mngon sum du mthong bar gyur gyi bar du dkyil 'khor 'di bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:200a-32: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la /
T02D2512-1:200a-33: bar snang gi phyogs su snga ma bzhin du bzhag ste /
T02D2512-1:200a-34: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:200a-35: 'di'i phyir dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:200a-36: 'di'i nang du ni de'i phyed kyi tshad kyi zlum
T02D2512-1:200a-37: po rdo rje phreng ba'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:200a-38: rdo rje ka ba brgyad dang ldan par thig gdab
T02D2512-1:200a-39: par bya'o // de nas thams cad ji lta ba
T02D2512-1:200b-0: bzhin du bris la lha thams @200b cad kyi gnas
T02D2512-1:200b-1: su sna tshogs padma'i gdan bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:200b-2: de nas dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i lte ba'i phyogs su
T02D2512-1:200b-3: bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi
T02D2512-1:200b-4: 'khor lo bskor ba gser gyi mdog can /
T02D2512-1:200b-5: ji skad du bshad pa'i sna tshogs padma'i gdan la /
T02D2512-1:200b-6: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D2512-1:200b-7: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2512-1:200b-8: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba /
T02D2512-1:200b-9: phyag g-yas na snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying
T02D2512-1:200b-10: ga'i phyogs su rdo rje 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pas
T02D2512-1:200b-11: yongs su bskor ba phyag g-yon pas gdan la bsnyems
T02D2512-1:200b-12: te bzhugs pa / spyan rab tu gdangs shing rnam par bye ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:200b-13: de'i shar phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje yid las
T02D2512-1:200b-14: byung ba'i gnas su phyag na rdo rje sngar bshad
T02D2512-1:200b-15: pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa /
T02D2512-1:200b-16: shar lho'i mtshams su 'jam dpal gzhon nu /
T02D2512-1:200b-17: lhor k'i li k'i la'i gnas su nam mkha'i snying po /
T02D2512-1:200b-18: lho nub mtshams su nam mkha'i mdzod /
T02D2512-1:200b-19: nub tu rdo rje dran pa'i gnas su 'jig rten dbang phyug /
T02D2512-1:200b-20: nub byang mtshams su sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
T02D2512-1:200b-21: byang du rdo rje bsnyems pa'i gnas su rdo rje khu tshur /
T02D2512-1:200b-22: byang shar mtshams su rdo rje gnod sbyin bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:200b-23: yang shar phyogs kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02D2512-1:200b-26: byang du nam mkha'i snying po bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:200b-27: yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sna ma bu'i shar
T02D2512-1:200b-28: lho'i mtshams su zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil
T02D2512-1:200b-29: 'khor / lho nub mtshams su ming po gsum gyi dkyil 'khor /
T02D2512-1:200b-30: nub byang mtshams su sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2512-1:200b-31: byang shar mtshams su ma mo'i dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid
T02D2512-1:200b-32: ji skad du bshad pa bzhin du bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:200b-33: // 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying po ni h'um zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-1:200b-34: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas de bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02D2512-1:200b-35: rdo rje 'khor lo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yongs
T02D2512-1:200b-36: su bzung ba'i rdo rje 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i
T02D2512-1:200b-37: me tog gi yal ga las bum pa thams cad
T02D2512-1:200b-38: dang / bum pa gang ba rnams la h'um zhes
T02D2512-1:200b-39: bya ba re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D2512-1:200b-40: dang / la / dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phye nas /
T02D2512-1:200b-41: rdo rje bsdu ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:201a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom @201a * //
T02D2512-1:201a-2: bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod de /
T02D2512-1:201a-4: h'um zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
T02D2512-1:201a-5: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal te /
T02D2512-1:201a-10: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcing sa la /
T02D2512-1:201a-11: rdo rje srung bas bsrung ba thams cad go bskon te /
T02D2512-1:201a-12: h'um zhes bya bas mchod yon phul la /
T02D2512-1:201a-13: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:201a-14: h'um dri shya zhes bya bas 'khor dang bcas pa blta bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:201a-15: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2512-1:201a-17: aa ham h'um zhes lan gsum brjod la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:201a-18: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i ji skad du gsungs
T02D2512-1:201a-19: pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni thams cad kyi
T02D2512-1:201a-20: dam tshig gi sbyor ba ste /
T02D2512-1:201a-22: rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:201a-23: de nas lha thams cad kyi ljags la h'um zhes
T02D2512-1:201a-24: bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du bsams pa 'di
T02D2512-1:201a-25: ni lha thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:201a-26: rang gi snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:201a-27: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
T02D2512-1:201a-28: ba la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya yang de
T02D2512-1:201a-30: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyang gar las
T02D2512-1:201a-31: 'byung ba'i 'og nas bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po
T02D2512-1:201a-32: ni las kyi phyag rgya yin par shes par bya'o
T02D2512-1:201a-33: // yang h'um las rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsams la /
T02D2512-1:201a-34: h'um zhes bya bas ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su
T02D2512-1:201a-35: 'brangs te bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i phyag
T02D2512-1:201a-36: rgya chen po bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:201a-37: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi phyag rgyas
T02D2512-1:201a-38: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pas dbang bskur zhing
T02D2512-1:201a-39: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams ni rang gi
T02D2512-1:201a-40: dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:201a-41: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la h'um zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02D2512-1:201a-43: bum pa gang ba rnams dang na bza' dang /
T02D2512-1:201a-44: bla re la sogs pa yang bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la phul te /
T02D2512-1:201a-45: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la /
T02D2512-1:201a-46: phyi rol du glu dang gar dang rol mo dang /
T02D2512-1:201b-0: rta dang glang po che @201b dang ba lang gi
T02D2512-1:201b-1: khyu rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go
T02D2512-1:201b-2: // de nas phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod cing /
T02D2512-1:201b-3: aom las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02D2512-1:201b-5: kha zas ro brgya pa la sogs pa'i bkod pa sprul la 'dis dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:201b-6: phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:201b-7: aom sarba bi tp'u ra p'u ra /
T02D2512-1:201b-10: a'a brta ya ho: zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-1:201b-11: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la /
T02D2512-1:201b-13: shin tu dmar ba'i ras la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:201b-16: yang gcig la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i snying po bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:201b-17: des rang gi gdong g-yogs nas /
T02D2512-1:201b-18: phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin du sngom pa blangs la /
T02D2512-1:201b-19: byang chub tu sems bskyed cing snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar rdo rje bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:201b-20: shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02D2512-1:201b-21: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ji skad du gsungs pa bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:201b-22: de nyid kyis me tog blangs la /
T02D2512-1:201b-23: badzra badzra h'um zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:201b-24: shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:201b-25: badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:201b-26: de nas lho phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:201b-27: badzra p'a sha h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:201b-28: de nas nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:201b-29: badzra spho ta bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:201b-30: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:201b-31: badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes brjod la bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:201b-32: de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:201b-34: su dri dha su to sho //
T02D2512-1:201b-35: su su sho badzra satva a'adya siddhya m'am /
T02D2512-1:201b-36: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:201b-37: dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas /
T02D2512-1:201b-38: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste /
T02D2512-1:201b-40: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D2512-1:201b-41: rdo rje chen po nor che zhing //
T02D2512-1:201b-42: ye shes chen po las che ga / rdo rje sems dpa' deng bdag 'grub //
T02D2512-1:201b-43: yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:202a-2: m'am:/ de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la /
T02D2512-1:202a-3: a'a zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:202a-4: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje phye la /
T02D2512-1:202a-5: de bzhin du a'a zhes bya ba zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:202a-6: de nas h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:202a-7: de nas de blangs la h'um zhes bya ba nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:202a-8: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:202a-9: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:202a-11: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:202a-12: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:202a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:202a-14: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta bar bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:202a-15: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas
T02D2512-1:202a-16: dngos grub thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ba de srid
T02D2512-1:202a-17: kyi bar du h'um zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya'o
T02D2512-1:202a-18: // de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor ba /
T02D2512-1:202a-19: shis pa brjod pa 'don pa'i tshul du rang gi snying gar bzhag nas /
T02D2512-1:202a-20: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02D2512-1:202a-21: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod
T02D2512-1:202a-22: pa rnam pa bzhis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
T02D2512-1:202a-23: pa thams cad dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod
T02D2512-1:202a-24: nas / glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:202a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:202a-26: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02D2512-1:202a-27: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas la ;
T02D2512-1:202a-28: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:202a-29: de la dang po kho nar rdo rje 'khor lo'i
T02D2512-1:202a-30: phyag rgya yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje 'khor lo
T02D2512-1:202a-31: dang me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal
T02D2512-1:202a-32: ba'i bum pa las sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D2512-1:202a-33: gyis gsang sngags yang de bzhin du yongs su bzlas
T02D2512-1:202a-34: la / bdag nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2512-1:202a-35: chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor
T02D2512-1:202a-36: lo bskor bar byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2512-1:202a-37: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rang gi lus la
T02D2512-1:202a-38: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa rnam par bkod
T02D2512-1:202b-0: de / phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du @202b sna tshogs padma bris la /
T02D2512-1:202b-1: de'i steng du sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi
T02D2512-1:202b-2: 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya chen pos 'dug nas
T02D2512-1:202b-3: / me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:202b-5: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod nas /
T02D2512-1:202b-6: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam bar rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02D2512-1:202b-7: aom badzra aa bhishnytsa h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:202b-8: bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:202b-9: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02D2512-1:202b-10: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi phyag rgya'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur zhing /
T02D2512-1:202b-14: bris pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2512-1:202b-15: dar dpyangs kyi dbang bskur bas /
T02D2512-1:202b-16: rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa h'um zhes bya bas blangs la /
T02D2512-1:202b-17: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing bdag po dang ming
T02D2512-1:202b-18: gi dbang bskur ba dag gis dbang bskur bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:202b-19: // de nas dngos grub kyi 'khor lo'i brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02D2512-1:202b-20: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas bdag nyid mchod cing /
T02D2512-1:202b-21: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:202b-22: de nas 'khor lo de kho na nyid kyis bzung la /
T02D2512-1:202b-23: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2512-1:202b-25: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2512-1:202b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:202b-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la snying po blangs te /
T02D2512-1:202b-28: tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rjes su gnang ba dang gzengs bstod pa dang /
T02D2512-1:202b-29: lung bstan pa rnams nye bar mnos la /
T02D2512-1:202b-30: yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2512-1:202b-31: ci 'dod par bzlas pa yang bya ste /
T02D2512-1:202b-32: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:202b-33: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi //
T02D2512-1:202b-34: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02D2512-1:202b-35: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir ;
T02D2512-1:202b-36: / slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2512-1:202b-37: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:202b-38: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o //
T02D2512-1:202b-39: de nas sdom pa dpog par 'os pa'i slob ma
T02D2512-1:202b-40: la sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdom pa 'dzin du
T02D2512-1:203a-0: gzhug pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed du gzhug pa dag @203a * //
T02D2512-1:203a-2: de'i snying gar rdo rje de bzhin du bskyed nas /
T02D2512-1:203a-3: rdo rje 'khor lor byin gyis brlabs te spos dang me tog la sogs pas mchod la /
T02D2512-1:203a-4: yon gyi mchog blangs nas shar phyogs kyi sgo la
T02D2512-1:203a-5: bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i chus dbang bskur
T02D2512-1:203a-6: la / bdag nyid 'jug pa'i cho gas bcug la /
T02D2512-1:203a-7: yang rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pas rkang pa g-yon pa dang /
T02D2512-1:203a-8: de'i rkang pa g-yas pa mnan la /
T02D2512-1:203a-9: h'um aa aa: aa: aa: a'a: zhes lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na babs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:203a-10: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:203a-11: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:203a-13: // / de nas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa dang /
T02D2512-1:203a-14: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs nas /
T02D2512-1:203a-15: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02D2512-1:203a-16: slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab par
T02D2512-1:203a-17: bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i cho ga bstan par bya
T02D2512-1:203a-18: ba'i phyir / sgrub pa rnams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:203a-19: sgrub pa rnams ni de bzhin no zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:203a-20: ni ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa gsungs
T02D2512-1:203a-21: pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chen po
T02D2512-1:203a-22: rdo rje 'khor lo'i khro bo'i ras kyi ri mo
T02D2512-1:203a-23: gnyis pa sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02D2512-1:203a-24: bsgrub par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:203a-25: de nas ma bsgrubs par yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T02D2512-1:203a-26: dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa la ni /
T02D2512-1:203a-27: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:203a-28: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'khor lo'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:203a-29: ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyis bcom
T02D2512-1:203a-30: ldan 'das rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings la
T02D2512-1:203a-31: / h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:203a-32: g-yas nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis bskor nas /
T02D2512-1:203a-33: dkyil 'khor thams cad sprul par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:203a-34: de nas de la lta bzhin du h'um zhes bya ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la /
T02D2512-1:203a-35: phyag rgya rang gi khar bcug ste bzhag na /
T02D2512-1:203a-36: de lta bus ni rdo rje 'khor los dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:203a-37: dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa la ni rdo rje
T02D2512-1:203a-38: 'khor lo chen pos so zhes bya ba ni de
T02D2512-1:203b-0: bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'khor @203b lo'i
T02D2512-1:203b-2: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2512-1:203b-3: h'um zhes bya ba zlos shing mgal me'i 'khor lo'i
T02D2512-1:203b-4: tshul du bskor bar bya ba 'di ni rdo rje
T02D2512-1:203b-6: 'dis gtso bo chen po thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams su 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:203b-7: de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni /
T02D2512-1:203b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:203b-9: ji ltar rdo rje 'khor lo chen pos dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:203b-10: chen po thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur pa de
T02D2512-1:203b-11: bzhin du mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
T02D2512-1:203b-13: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i dang po'i rdo rjes 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:203b-14: de bzhin du dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2512-1:203b-15: pa la ni dam tshig chen po'i 'khor los so
T02D2512-1:203b-17: dam tshig gi gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2512-1:203b-18: dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid la sogs pa rgyud las ji skad gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:203b-19: der 'jug pa ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ste /
T02D2512-1:203b-20: rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la gung mo gnyis rtse mo'i tshul du brkyang nas /
T02D2512-1:203b-21: mdzub mo gnyis so sor brkyang la /
T02D2512-1:203b-22: gung mo de nyid kyi rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyab
T02D2512-1:203b-23: tu bzhag pa 'di ni dam tshig chen po'i 'khor
T02D2512-1:203b-24: lo ste / 'dis dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:203b-25: las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni thams
T02D2512-1:203b-26: cad kyi 'khor los so zhes bya ba ni las
T02D2512-1:203b-27: kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni
