T02D2512-1:206b-28: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2512-1:206b-29: phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur te /
T02D2512-1:206b-30: dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:206b-31: stong pa nyid du smra pa ni /
T02D2512-1:206b-32: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi ral gri ste /
T02D2512-1:206b-33: des chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa'o zhes ston pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:206b-34: de nas stong pa nyid du smra ba zhes 'di la bshad do //
T02D2512-1:206b-35: dkyil 'khor 'dri ba ni 'phags pa rdo rje'i rgyu'i mtshan ma 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ste /
T02D2512-1:206b-36: de phyag na bsnams pas gang zhig dkyil 'khor rdzogs
T02D2512-1:206b-37: par byed par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa la de
T02D2512-1:206b-38: nges pa nyid du rdzogs par mdzes pas na /
T02D2512-1:207a-1: phyir de ni dkyil 'khor 'dri ba zhes bshad do //
T02D2512-1:207a-2: mchod pa thams cad ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2512-1:207a-3: de phyag na bsnams pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas la mchod pa dang /
T02D2512-1:207a-4: sems can gyi don bya ba yongs su rdzogs par mdzad de /
T02D2512-1:207a-5: des na mchod pa thams cad ces bshad do //
T02D2512-1:207a-6: sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:207a-7: mtshan ma de phyag na bsnams pas bdud thams cad
T02D2512-1:207a-8: la sogs pa gdug pa rnams rnam par 'jig par
T02D2512-1:207a-9: mdzad la / de nas sems can rnams skyob par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-1:207a-10: de ltar na byang chub sems dang ting nge 'dzin dang dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:207a-11: phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:207a-12: stong pa nyid du smra ba dang /
T02D2512-1:207a-15: sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa rnams so //
T02D2512-1:207a-16: de dag nyid ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa ste /
T02D2512-1:207a-17: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa sgrub pa'i mchod
T02D2512-1:207a-18: pa rnams ni phyi'i mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad
T02D2512-1:207a-19: las mchog tu gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-1:207a-20: de'i cho ga rgyas pa ni rdo rje sems dang
T02D2512-1:207a-21: 'al sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid gsal ba'i dbye ba
T02D2512-1:207a-22: ste / des na da phyag na bsnams ba phyag
T02D2512-1:207a-23: na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2512-1:207a-24: ste / brgyad do // de bas na de rnams
T02D2512-1:207a-25: ni byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa bla na
T02D2512-1:207a-26: med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa phyag na
T02D2512-1:207a-28: ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:207a-29: ji srid dbang ldan gyi phyogs kyi bar du sna
T02D2512-1:207a-30: tshogs padma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo kung gis
T02D2512-1:207a-31: bzhugs par rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po
T02D2512-1:207a-32: las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen pos aom zhes bya
T02D2512-1:207a-33: ba bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:207a-34: phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni me tog la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:207a-35: rnams dang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sbrang rtsi
T02D2512-1:207a-38: rdo rje dgun rnams rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:207a-39: las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya chen pos me'i phyogs nas
T02D2512-1:207a-40: brtsams te / dbang ldan gyi phyogs kyi bar du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:207b-0: sgo rnams su ni zhes bya ba la shar phyogs kyi sgor ni dong @207b tse dang ;
T02D2512-1:207b-2: nub tu mu tig gi 'bras bu dang /
T02D2512-1:207b-3: byang du rin po che zhes bya ba padma r'a ga gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:207b-4: de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thams cad kyi
T02D2512-1:207b-5: mchod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya
T02D2512-1:207b-6: ba la / nam mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:207b-7: de bcings la rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i tshul gyis slob dpon zhugs nas /
T02D2512-1:207b-8: de nas chog de nyid kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyi
T02D2512-1:207b-9: dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba ni mchod pa thams
T02D2512-1:207b-11: zhugs nas sna tshogs rdo rje blangs la zhes bya
T02D2512-1:207b-12: ba ni de ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:207b-13: chen po'i tshul gyis rdo rje thams cad kyis zhugs
T02D2512-1:207b-14: la / bcom ldan 'das las aom zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:207b-15: sna tshogs rdo rje mnos te /
T02D2512-1:207b-16: aom zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:207b-17: kye sna tshogs che ge mo zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:207b-18: de ltar bdag nyid dbang bskur nas slob dpon gyis mchod pa rnam pa bzhi bya ste /
T02D2512-1:207b-19: 'di lta ste lus kyi las thams cad dang phyag bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:207b-20: ngag dang yid dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:207b-21: de la aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya
T02D2512-1:207b-22: b'a ka tsitta pra na me na badzra banda nam
T02D2512-1:207b-23: ka ro mi zhes bya ba 'di ni mchod pa
T02D2512-1:207b-24: gcig go // sems kyis chos kyi dbyings su spros
T02D2512-1:207b-25: pas mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang zhes bya
T02D2512-1:207b-26: gcig go // ba ni / thos pa dang /
T02D2512-1:207b-27: mthong ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par rnams kyi sems kyis nam mkha' kun du bkang la /
T02D2512-1:207b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D2512-1:207b-29: rdo rjes zhes bya ba rang gi snying gar rdo
T02D2512-1:207b-30: rje rtse lnga pa bsgoms pa 'di ni mchod ba
T02D2512-1:207b-31: gsum pa'o // phyag rgyas mchod pa gcig tu byas pa'o //
T02D2512-1:207b-32: zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya rnams sam /
T02D2512-1:207b-33: rdo rje sbrang rtsi la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas mchod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:207b-34: de dag gcig tu byas pa'i phyag rgya ni mchod pa bzhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:207b-35: slob ma rnams ni gzhug pa'i las kyang de bzhin
T02D2512-1:207b-36: no zhes bya ba slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga
T02D2512-1:207b-37: bzhin du slob ma rnams gzhug pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:207b-38: cho ga rnams kyang bya ba'o //
T02D2512-1:207b-39: las kyi dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba ni byang
T02D2512-1:207b-40: chub kyi sems la sogs pa ji skad du bshad
T02D2512-1:207b-41: pa'i mchod pa rnam ba bzhi ni las te /
T02D2512-1:208a-1: byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni las kyi dkyil 'khor yin pa'am /
T02D2512-1:208a-2: de bskyed pa'i rgyu'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-1:208a-3: yang 'di'i don bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:208a-4: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' mdzod kyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:208a-5: de nyid kyis rnal 'byor chen po bya'o //
T02D2512-1:208a-6: de nas ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom bar byas la /
T02D2512-1:208a-7: dkyil 'khor ji srid mngon sum du mthong bar gyur
T02D2512-1:208a-8: ba de srid kyi bar du dkyil 'khor 'di bsgom
T02D2512-1:208a-9: par bya'o // de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i
T02D2512-1:208a-10: dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum
T02D2512-1:208a-12: bar snang gi phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2512-1:208a-13: bzhag nas nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su ji lta
T02D2512-1:208a-14: ba bzhin du gdab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:208a-15: 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2512-1:208a-16: 'di'i nang du 'di'i phyed kyi tshad du 'phags pa
T02D2512-1:208a-17: nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar thig
T02D2512-1:208a-18: btab la / dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:208a-19: de nas lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan byas la /
T02D2512-1:208a-20: dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i dbus su sna tshogs padma'i steng
T02D2512-1:208a-21: du bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod zhal shar phyogs
T02D2512-1:208a-22: su gzigs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:208a-23: de'i shar phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02D2512-1:208a-24: me'i phyogs su 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa /
T02D2512-1:208a-25: k'i li k'i la'i gnas su nam mkha'i snying po /
T02D2512-1:208a-26: bden bral gyi phyogs su nam mkha' mdzod /
T02D2512-1:208a-27: rdo rje dran pa'i gnas su 'jig rten dbang phyug /
T02D2512-1:208a-28: rlung gi phyogs su sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
T02D2512-1:208a-29: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i gnas su rdo rje khu tshur /
T02D2512-1:208a-30: dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje gnod sbyin legs par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:208a-31: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la me'i mtshams su rdo rje sbrang rtsi /
T02D2512-1:208a-32: bden bral gyi mtshams su rdo rje sprin /
T02D2512-1:208a-33: rlung gi mtshams su rdo rje ston ka /
T02D2512-1:208a-34: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su rdo rje dgun bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:208a-35: shar phyogs kyi sgor ni dong tse /
T02D2512-1:208a-36: lho phyogs kyi sgor ni gser /
T02D2512-1:208a-37: nub phyogs su ni mu tig gi 'brum bu /
T02D2512-1:208a-38: byang phyogs kyi sgor ni rin po che padma r'a g-yang dag par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:208b-0: 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying po ni aom @208b zhes bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:208b-2: de bzhin du sbyor ba chen po byas la /
T02D2512-1:208b-3: nam mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02D2512-1:208b-4: me tog gi lcug mas bum pa thams cad dang /
T02D2512-1:208b-6: aom zhes bya ba re re zhing bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas te /
T02D2512-1:208b-7: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phye nas rdo rje bsdu ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:208b-8: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
T02D2512-1:208b-9: bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02D2512-1:208b-11: aom zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas
T02D2512-1:208b-12: ba dkyil 'khor du bcug la rdo rje gnod sbyin
T02D2512-1:208b-18: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcings la /
T02D2512-1:208b-19: rdo rje srung bas bsrung ba thams cad go bskon te /
T02D2512-1:208b-20: aom zhes bya bas mchod yon phul la dam tshig
T02D2512-1:208b-21: gi phyag rgyas aom dri shya zhes bya ba dang
T02D2512-1:208b-22: / 'khor dang bcas pa blta bar byas te /
T02D2512-1:208b-23: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2512-1:208b-25: aa ham zhes lan gsum brjod la bsgrub par bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:208b-26: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya las /
T02D2512-1:208b-30: dar 'phan gyi rtse mo ltar bya ba 'di ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:208b-31: de nas lha thams cad kyi ljags la aom zhes
T02D2512-1:208b-32: bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du bsams pa 'di
T02D2512-1:208b-33: ni 'dir lha thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o
T02D2512-1:208b-34: // aa zhes bya bas snying gar sna tshogs rdo
T02D2512-1:208b-35: rje bsams la lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya sngar
T02D2512-1:208b-36: bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can aom zhes pa nyid zlos
T02D2512-1:208b-38: de nas h'um las rang gi snying gar rdo rje rtse lnga ba bsams la /
T02D2512-1:208b-39: ji ltar bris pa'i rjes su mthun par nam mkha'
T02D2512-1:208b-40: mdzod la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po aom zhes
T02D2512-1:208b-41: bya ba zlos shing bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:208b-42: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i cod phan dang sna tshogs
T02D2512-1:208b-43: rdo rje'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba dag
T02D2512-1:208b-44: gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dbang bskur
T02D2512-1:208b-45: bar bya'o // 'dir sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i
T02D2512-1:208b-46: dbang bskur ba nam mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi
T02D2512-1:209a-1: aom zhes bya bas dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la aom zhes bya bas mchod yin phul la /
T02D2512-1:209a-4: bum pa gang pa rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:209a-6: bla re la sogs pa phul te /
T02D2512-1:209a-7: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la /
T02D2512-1:209a-8: phyi rol du glu dang gar dang /
T02D2512-1:209a-11: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02D2512-1:209a-12: de nas phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:209a-13: aom zhes bya ba nyid las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02D2512-1:209a-15: kha zas ro brgya ba la sogs pa'i bkod pa rnams sprul la /
T02D2512-1:209a-17: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la spyi bor bzhag nas /
T02D2512-1:209a-18: aom sarba bi db'ur p'u ra su ra su ra a'a barta ya a'a barta ya ho //
T02D2512-1:209a-20: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209a-21: de nas shin tu dmar ba'i ras la /
T02D2512-1:209a-22: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis yongs su bzlas pa gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02D2512-1:209a-24: yang gcig la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:209a-25: snying po bzhi yongs su bzlas pas rang gi gdong
T02D2512-1:209a-26: g-yogs par bya'o // de nas phyag 'tshal ba la
T02D2512-1:209a-27: sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin du sdom
T02D2512-1:209a-28: g-yogs par bya'o // pa bzung la / byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02D2512-1:209a-29: snga ma bzhin du snying gar rdo rje bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:209a-30: shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02D2512-1:209a-31: nam mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:209a-32: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs nas /
T02D2512-1:209a-33: badzra badzra aom zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:209a-34: shar phyogs kyi sgor badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209a-35: de nas lho phyogs nas zhugs la badzra p'a sha h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209a-36: yang nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs nas badzra spo ta bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209a-37: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du
T02D2512-1:209a-38: zhugs la badzra a'a be sha a'a: zhes pa dang
T02D2512-1:209a-40: de nas de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sgor zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:209a-46: a'a dya siddhy'a m'am zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209b-0: @209b de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:209b-1: dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02D2512-1:209b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:209b-3: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:209b-4: ma h'a r'a ga ma h'a soo bya /
T02D2512-1:209b-5: ma h'a badzra ma h'a dh'a na /
T02D2512-1:209b-6: ma h'a dzny'a na ma h'a karma badzra satva a'adya siddhy'a m'am /
T02D2512-1:209b-7: yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:209b-10: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la aa zhes bya ba brgya bzlas nas /
T02D2512-1:209b-11: bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209b-12: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje phye la /
T02D2512-1:209b-13: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod cing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209b-14: de nas aom zhes bya ba zlos shing me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209b-16: aom nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209b-17: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02D2512-1:209b-18: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:209b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:209b-21: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209b-22: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:209b-23: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02D2512-1:209b-24: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas
T02D2512-1:209b-25: rang gi dngos grub stsol bar gyur pa de srid
T02D2512-1:209b-26: kyi bar du aom zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya'o
T02D2512-1:209b-27: // de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor ba shis
T02D2512-1:209b-28: pa brjod pa 'don pa'i tshul du rang gi snying
T02D2512-1:209b-29: // gar bzhag la / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02D2512-1:209b-30: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:209b-31: glu dang rol mo la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:209b-32: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:209b-33: bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te /
T02D2512-1:209b-34: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas nas /
T02D2512-1:209b-35: me tog la sogs ba dang dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya'o /
T02D2512-1:209b-36: de la dang po kho nar bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D2512-1:209b-37: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i sna
T02D2512-1:209b-39: me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2512-1:209b-40: bum pa la sngar bshad pa'i bum pa'i sngags de
T02D2512-1:209b-41: bzhin du yongs su bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:210a-0: bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod du byin gyis @210a * //
T02D2512-1:210a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rnal
T02D2512-1:210a-3: 'byor chen po las gsungs pa'i gnas su bcom ldan
T02D2512-1:210a-4: 'das 'khor dang bcas pa aom gyis rang gi gnas
T02D2512-1:210a-5: su bkod la / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2512-1:210a-6: nang du sna tshogs padma'i steng du nam mkha' mdzod
T02D2512-1:210a-7: kyi phyag rgya chen pos bdag nyid 'dug nas /
T02D2512-1:210a-8: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:210a-9: mchod yon blangs la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par bstod nas /
T02D2512-1:210a-10: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02D2512-1:210a-11: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa aom zhes bya bas bdag nyid dbang bskur zhing chu de btung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:210a-12: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2512-1:210a-13: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdag nyid dbang bskur zhing /
T02D2512-1:210a-17: bris pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2512-1:210a-18: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:210a-19: sna tshogs rdo rje sna tshogs dril bu dang bcas par blangs te /
T02D2512-1:210a-20: bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur bdag gis kyang aom zhes bya bzlos shing dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:210a-21: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02D2512-1:210a-22: me tog la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa lngas bdag nyid la yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:210a-23: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod
T02D2512-1:210a-24: pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis kyang yang dag par
T02D2512-1:210a-25: mchod par bya'o // de nas rdo rje de kho na nyid kyis bzung la /
T02D2512-1:210a-26: chos kyi dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:210a-27: de kho na nyid la sogs pa ni //
T02D2512-1:210a-28: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2512-1:210a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar smras pa nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:210a-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la snying pos blangs te /
T02D2512-1:210a-31: tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2512-1:210a-34: lung bstan pa mnos la yang bdag nyid la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:210a-35: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02D2512-1:210a-36: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te /
T02D2512-1:210a-38: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yi //
T02D2512-1:210a-39: rdo rje slob don dka' thub ches//
T02D2512-1:210b-0: @210b sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:210b-1: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2512-1:210b-2: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:210b-3: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:210b-5: // / de nas sdom pa dbog par 'os pa'i slob
T02D2512-1:210b-6: ma sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdom ba 'dzin du
T02D2512-1:210b-7: gzhug par bya'o // de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug la /
T02D2512-1:210b-8: de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed de /
T02D2512-1:210b-9: de nam mkha' mdzod du byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2512-1:210b-10: dri dang me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:210b-11: yon gyi mchog yang dag par blangs te /
T02D2512-1:210b-12: rang gi 'jug pa'i cho gas gzhug pa dang dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:210b-13: de nas yang dbab pa'i phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2512-1:210b-14: rkang pa g-yon pas de'i rkang pa g-yas pa mnan la /
T02D2512-1:210b-15: aom aa: aa: aa: a'a: zhes bya ba lan brgya rtsa bzlas la dbab bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:210b-16: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:210b-17: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:210b-19: // / de ltar dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la /
T02D2512-1:210b-20: slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes rlabs lab
T02D2512-1:210b-21: par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i cho ga bstan par
T02D2512-1:210b-22: bya ba'i phyir de nas sgrub pa zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:210b-24: sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:210b-25: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa gsungs pa
T02D2512-1:210b-26: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
T02D2512-1:210b-27: kyi sgrub pa la sogs pa la sngon du bsnyen
T02D2512-1:210b-28: pa byas te / ras kyi ri mo gnyis la
T02D2512-1:210b-29: bsgrub par bya ba shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-1:210b-30: pa byas te / don to // de nas ma
T02D2512-1:210b-31: bsgrubs par yang ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:210b-33: byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa la ni rang
T02D2512-1:210b-34: gi snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pas so zhes bya
T02D2512-1:210b-35: ba ni bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byas
T02D2512-1:210b-36: la / aom zhes bya ba zlos shing rang gi
T02D2512-1:210b-37: snying ga'i zla ba la rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D2512-1:210b-39: de lta bus ni byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:210b-40: ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa la ni thams cad dag par bsgoms pas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:210b-41: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:210b-42: aom zhes bya ba zlos shing chos thams cad ni
T02D2512-1:210b-43: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bsgom par
T02D2512-1:211a-1: de lta bus ni ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:211a-2: dbang bskur ba la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba sna tshogs kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:211a-3: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:211a-4: de nyid kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2512-1:211a-5: aom zhes bya ba'i bzlas brjod byas na de lta
T02D2512-1:211a-6: bus ni dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa byas par 'gyur
T02D2512-1:211a-7: ro // phyag rgya'i mchod pa la ni sna tshogs
T02D2512-1:211a-8: rdo rje thams cad kyis so zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:211a-9: ro // / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:211a-10: de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:211a-11: aom zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya ba 'di ni sna tshogs rdo rje thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:211a-12: de lta bus ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:211a-13: stong pa nyid kyi mchod pa la ni aa la
T02D2512-1:211a-14: sogs pa'i yi ge'i lung bstan pas so zhes bya
T02D2512-1:211a-15: ba ni / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:211a-16: aa ra pa tsa na zhes brjod cing /
T02D2512-1:211a-19: aa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //
T02D2512-1:211a-20: ra zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o //
T02D2512-1:211a-21: pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o //
T02D2512-1:211a-22: tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'o //
T02D2512-1:211a-23: na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o //
T02D2512-1:211a-28: rang bzhin med pa nyid de /
T02D2512-1:211a-29: snying po 'di bsgoms la bsgrubs na /
T02D2512-1:211a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi
T02D2512-1:211a-32: snod yin te de bas na snying po 'dis de
T02D2512-1:211a-33: bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid
T02D2512-1:211a-34: kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:211a-35: sngags 'di ni aa la sogs ba'i yi ges lung bstan pa ste /
T02D2512-1:211a-36: 'dis ni stong pa nyid mchod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:211a-37: dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:211a-38: bcom ldan 'das sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi
T02D2512-1:211a-39: 'khor lo bskor ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gang
T02D2512-1:211a-40: yin pa de ni rdo rje 'khor lo sna tshogs
T02D2512-1:211a-41: te / 'di bcings la sems bskyed ma thag tu
T02D2512-1:211a-42: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyor ba byas la
T02D2512-1:211a-43: te / / aom zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas te /
T02D2512-1:211a-44: de lta bus ni dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:211a-45: mchod pa thams cad la ni sna tshogs rdo rjes so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:211b-0: bcom ldan 'das nam @211b mkha' mdzod kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni sna tshogs rdo rje ste /
T02D2512-1:211b-2: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod kyi sbyor ba byas nas /
T02D2512-1:211b-3: aom zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas te /
T02D2512-1:211b-4: de lta bus ni mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:211b-5: gdug pa 'dul ba'i mchod pa la ni khro bos
T02D2512-1:211b-6: so zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2512-1:211b-7: gnod sbyin gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:211b-8: 'di'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:211b-9: aom ha zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas na gdug pa thams cad zos par 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:211b-10: de lta bus ni gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:211b-11: me tog la sogs pa dor ba la ni bzlas
T02D2512-1:211b-12: pas so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sbrang rtsi
T02D2512-1:211b-13: la sogs pa dus kyi mchod pa bzhi'i snying po
T02D2512-1:211b-14: zlos shing 'di rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya rnams
T02D2512-1:211b-16: de lta bus ni me tog dor ba la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:211b-17: sna tshogs rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces
T02D2512-1:211b-18: bya ba la sna tshogs rdo rje ni byang chub
T02D2512-1:211b-19: kyi sems la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa bzhi'o
T02D2512-1:211b-20: // de'i dam tshig ni de las byung ba'i nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2512-1:211b-21: ming de skad bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs pa ste /
T02D2512-1:211b-22: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' mdzod kyi rtog pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:211b-24: // / de ltar tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur
T02D2512-1:211b-25: gyur pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi rtog pa bshad nas
T02D2512-1:211b-26: / da ni bsrung ba'i las kyi cho ga'i rang
T02D2512-1:211b-27: bzhin rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rtog pa bshad pa'i
T02D2512-1:211b-28: / phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:211b-29: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2512-1:211b-30: de bzhin du thams cad mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-1:211b-31: rnam par snang mdzad gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i
T02D2512-1:211b-32: rgyal bo'i gnas na ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs
T02D2512-1:211b-33: pa dang / de'i rjes thogs nyid la shes rab
T02D2512-1:211b-34: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs pa'o
T02D2512-1:211b-35: pa dang / // gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus pa //
T02D2512-1:211b-36: zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu la mngon par dga' ba dang /
T02D2512-1:211b-37: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam bar rtog pas bcom pa'i gdug pa thams cad do //
T02D2512-1:211b-38: de rnams 'dul ba ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog pa dang /
T02D2512-1:212a-1: par rtog pa la mngon par zhen pa las bzlog
T02D2512-1:212a-2: pa'i chos bdag med pa bsgom pa ston par mdzad
T02D2512-1:212a-3: pas gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar spyod cing nus
T02D2512-1:212a-4: pa ste / cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhis rang dbang du mdzad par spyod ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:212a-5: ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-1:212a-6: sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:212a-7: sems can thams cad ni ji skad du bshad pa rnams so //
T02D2512-1:212a-8: de'i snying po mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam spong ba dang /
T02D2512-1:212a-9: ji skad du bshad pa'i mngon par zhen pa dag spong ba'o der nges pa ni ye shes te /
T02D2512-1:212a-10: de 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa gang yin pa ste /
T02D2512-1:212a-11: de skad ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul de bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:212a-12: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro bo mnyam pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:212a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02D2512-1:212a-17: byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sems
T02D2512-1:212a-18: dang sems las byung ba rnams ni sems can thams
T02D2512-1:212a-19: cad de / de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni don dam par de bzhin nyid yin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:212a-20: kun rdzob tu mdza' bo dang /
T02D2512-1:212a-22: dgra bo rnams la thugs rje chen po'i gzhan gyi dbang gis sems mnyam pa nyid de /
T02D2512-1:212a-23: khro bos phan pa ma yin pa las bzlog pa dang /
T02D2512-1:212a-24: phan pa la sbyor ba'i sems kyis so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:212a-25: khro bo mnyam pa nyid do zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid des /
T02D2512-1:212a-28: dgra bo rnams la rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khro
T02D2512-1:212a-29: bo'i gzugs yang dag par ston cing sdig pa las
T02D2512-1:212a-30: ldog par byed pa ni khro bo'i mnyam pa nyid
T02D2512-1:212a-31: de / dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i
T02D2512-1:212a-32: shugs kyi khro bos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul
T02D2512-1:212a-34: khro bo'i bya ba bsgrub pa ni khro bo'i mnyam pa nyid do ;
T02D2512-1:212a-35: / gang gi tshe khro bo'i bya ba bsgrub pa las ldog par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2512-1:212a-36: sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid las khro bo'i dul ba nyid do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:212a-37: gang gi tshe sems can thams cad 'dul bar gyur
T02D2512-1:212a-38: pa de'i tshe khro bos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
T02D2512-1:212b-0: med pas thugs rje chen po'i khro @212b bos 'dul
T02D2512-1:212b-1: bar 'gyur zhing bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-1:212b-2: don to // khro bo de'i chos nyid gang zhe na /
T02D2512-1:212b-3: sems can thams cad chos nyid las khro bo'i chos nyid do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:212b-4: sems can thams cad don dam par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba nyid de /
T02D2512-1:212b-5: de dang lhan cig tu gyur pa ni /
T02D2512-1:212b-6: khro bo'i chos nyid yin la /
T02D2512-1:212b-7: gang sems can thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i
T02D2512-1:212b-8: ngo bo nyid de ni khro bo dngos po med
T02D2512-1:212b-10: de ni sems can thams cad med pa nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:212b-11: khro bo 'di'i ming mi phyed pa'i ming ji skad du bya zhe na /
T02D2512-1:212b-12: sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro bo rdo rje nyid do zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:212b-13: sems dang sems las byung ba rnams ni don dam
T02D2512-1:212b-14: par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T02D2512-1:212b-16: de ni sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid yin la /
T02D2512-1:212b-17: des khro bo rdo rje nyid yin te /
T02D2512-1:212b-18: sems can thams cad kyi rdo rje nyid gang yin
T02D2512-1:212b-19: pa de nyid ni thugs rje chen po khro bo'i
T02D2512-1:212b-21: chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2512-1:212b-22: yang na khro bos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la
T02D2512-1:212b-23: 'khor ba ji srid par gnas pa ni sems can
T02D2512-1:212b-24: thams cad kyi rdo rje nyid do //
T02D2512-1:212b-25: sems can thams cad kyi rdo rje nyid de rgyur gyur pas khro bo rdo rje nyid de /
T02D2512-1:212b-26: khro bos gdul ba'i sems can thams cad rnam par gdul bar bya ba'i bya ba'o //
T02D2512-1:212b-27: 'khor ba ji srid par khro bo'i bya ba bsgrub
T02D2512-1:212b-28: pa rgyu na mi gcod pa nyid ni khro bo
T02D2512-1:212b-30: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni rgyu
T02D2512-1:212b-31: gang gis na sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid
T02D2512-1:212b-32: pas khro bo mnyam pa nyid de zhes bya bas
T02D2512-1:212b-33: / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro bo rdo rje nyid yin zhe na /
T02D2512-1:212b-34: gang gi phyir 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:212b-35: 'di nyid ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid can te /
T02D2512-1:212b-37: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid nas sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid kyi bar te /
T02D2512-1:212b-38: des khro bo rdo rje nyid do zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:212b-39: ste khro bo mnyam pa nyid la sogs pas kyang
T02D2512-1:212b-40: sems can gdug pa can thams cad 'dul bar mdzad
T02D2512-1:212b-41: cing / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu 'jog par mdzad pas na /
T02D2512-1:213a-1: cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-1:213a-2: de ltar na de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:213a-3: byang chub bo zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas
T02D2512-1:213a-4: ni ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs pa yin no
T02D2512-1:213a-5: // de ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2512-1:213a-6: pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin
T02D2512-1:213a-7: la de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma
T02D2512-1:213a-8: bzhin te de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2512-1:213a-9: mdzad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin la
T02D2512-1:213a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa'i
T02D2512-1:213a-11: // phyir dang / rang gi dkyil 'khor sprul bar bya ba'i phyir bskul pa mdzad pa dang /
T02D2512-1:213a-12: de'i rjes thogs nyid la snying po 'di rang gi dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ba'i phyir smras pa'o //
T02D2512-1:213a-13: bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa ni khro bo'i ha ha
T02D2512-1:213a-14: zhes bya ba'i gad rgyangs dang bcas pa'i zhal lo
T02D2512-1:213a-15: // rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang //
T02D2512-1:213a-17: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje mche ba'i
T02D2512-1:213a-18: mtshon bya bzung nas rang gi zhal gyi grva gnyis
T02D2512-1:213a-20: rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:213a-21: de dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs
T02D2512-1:213a-22: kyis zhes bya ba ni ji skad du rab tu
T02D2512-1:213a-23: grags pas rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya
T02D2512-1:213a-24: ba'i snying po 'di dkyil 'khor sprul par mdzad pa'i
T02D2512-1:213a-25: phyir smras pa ni ha zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-1:213a-26: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i sems dpa' rnams zhes bya ba la ;
T02D2512-1:213a-27: sems can rnams gdul ba'i don gyi sems dpa' rnams
T02D2512-1:213a-28: ni gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i sems dpa'i rnams
T02D2512-1:213a-29: te / rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo la sogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:213a-30: dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs so zhes
T02D2512-1:213a-31: bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2512-1:213a-32: po ni dang po'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2512-1:213a-33: de'i sbyor bas de'i dbyibs kyi rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-1:213a-34: la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis bzhugs pa'o
T02D2512-1:213a-35: // de ltar na de nas zhes bya ba nas
T02D2512-1:213a-36: brtsams te bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad
T02D2512-1:213a-37: pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa gsungs pa yin
T02D2512-1:213a-38: // no // de nas 'dus pa nas brtsams te ;
T02D2512-1:213a-39: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:213a-40: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa
T02D2512-1:213a-41: rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2512-1:213a-42: ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:213a-43: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2512-1:213b-0: slob ma la gzhug pa la @213b sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:213b-1: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2512-1:213b-2: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:213b-3: ji srid mtshan ma thob kyi bar du bsgoms la /
T02D2512-1:213b-4: de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:213b-5: thabs thams cad kyis 'dul ba'i khro bo zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:213b-7: gdug cing ma rungs pa nyid 'dor du 'jug pas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:213b-8: thabs thams cad kyang yin la 'dul ba yin pas na /
T02D2512-1:213b-10: de nyid ni khro bo'i rdo rje ste rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:213b-11: de la dmigs pas na ming de skad ces bya
T02D2512-1:213b-12: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon
T02D2512-1:213b-14: gdug pa thams cad 'dul zhing byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:213b-15: mi phyed pa gang yin pa ste /
T02D2512-1:213b-16: ming de skad ces bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs shing bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D2512-1:213b-17: phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni //
T02D2512-1:213b-18: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D2512-1:213b-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs su 'di'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:213b-21: de ni nang rim nyid du ni //
T02D2512-1:213b-22: dkyil 'khor bzang po gru bzhi pa //
T02D2512-1:213b-24: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zur bzhi pa shin
T02D2512-1:213b-25: tu mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:213b-26: // thig bzhir ldan zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i
T02D2512-1:213b-27: srad bu gnyis dang mtshams kyi srad bu gnyis gdab
T02D2512-1:213b-28: // par bya ste / de ltar thig bzhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:213b-29: tshon sna lngas ni rnam par bris //
T02D2512-1:213b-35: dkar po'i mdog can gyi tshon rnams kyis legs bar thig gdab nas ri mor bris pa ni /
T02D2512-1:213b-36: tshon sna lngas ni rnam par bris //
T02D2512-1:213b-38: ka ba brgyad kyi mdun gnas par //
T02D2512-1:213b-39: zhes bya ba la 'di nyid du gnas pas na gnas pa zhes bya la /
T02D2512-1:213b-40: mdun yang yin la gnas pa yang yin pas na mdun na gnas ba ste /
T02D2512-1:213b-41: ka ba brgyad kyi mdun na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba'o //
T02D2512-1:213b-44: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan
T02D2512-1:213b-45: gyi steng du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dang yang dag
T02D2512-1:214a-1: de'i zhes bya ba ji ltar bris pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:214a-2: dbus ma'i dbus su ci rigs par zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:214a-3: rdo rje gnod sbyin lugs ma'am /
T02D2512-1:214a-6: bris pa ha zhes bya ba dgod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:214a-7: rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa dang zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:214a-8: ni rdo rje mche ba gnyis gtsigs pa'i bu ga
T02D2512-1:214a-9: dang bcas pa'i zhal gyi phyogs so //
T02D2512-1:214a-12: 'bar ba rnams kyi phreng bar gyur pha gang yin pa de ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o //
T02D2512-1:214a-14: phan tshun du 'gro ba'i 'od gang yin pa de
T02D2512-1:214a-15: ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od ces bya'o
T02D2512-1:214a-16: // de'i zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o //
T02D2512-1:214a-17: kun du zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang phyogs mtshams
T02D2512-1:214a-18: rnams su phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang
T02D2512-1:214a-19: chub sems dpa' brgyad gnod sbyin gyi gzugs 'chang ba
T02D2512-1:214a-20: shin tu zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:214a-21: khyad par du yang 'jigs par byed pa rdo rje
T02D2512-1:214a-22: la sogs pa rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa bri
T02D2512-1:214a-23: bar bya'o // phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams ba zhir ni mche ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:214a-24: phyi dang nang gi sgo rnams su ni khro bo'i rdo rje yang dag par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:214a-25: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas /
T02D2512-1:214a-26: ras sngon po la snga ma bzhin du sngags bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:214a-27: de dag gi smad g-yogs la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas /
T02D2512-1:214a-28: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:214a-29: 'dis me tog gi phreng ba bzung ste /
T02D2512-1:214a-30: ji lta ba bzhin zhugs na ji skad du gsungs pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:214a-31: rdo rje mche ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:214a-32: la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i rtsa ba yod pa'i
T02D2512-1:214a-33: mche ba ni / rdo rje mche ba ste /
T02D2512-1:214a-34: de blangs la rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas bdag nyid dbang bskur nas /
T02D2512-1:214a-35: de'i rjes thogs nyid la rdo rjes rdo rje gnod sbyin la bsnun par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:214a-36: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyes pas /
T02D2512-1:214a-37: zhal nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i bzhad pa mdzad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:214a-38: de nas sgrub pa pos bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das grub pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:214a-39: de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:214b-0: de ltar bdag nyid 'jug pa la sogs @214b pa byas nas /
T02D2512-1:214b-1: bcom ldan 'das las snying po mnos la /
T02D2512-1:214b-4: chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:214b-5: de nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2512-1:214b-6: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya thams
T02D2512-1:214b-7: cad ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bzhin du bsgrub
T02D2512-1:214b-8: par bya'o // de nas mchod la zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:214b-9: ni de ltar ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i phyag
T02D2512-1:214b-10: rgya bsgrub pa byas nas slob ma bcug la /
T02D2512-1:214b-11: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2512-1:214b-12: phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis bcom
T02D2512-1:214b-13: ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod
T02D2512-1:214b-14: nas / ro dang kha zas dang gnas pa thams cad kyis slob ma rnams tshim par byas la /
T02D2512-1:214b-15: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro bo
T02D2512-1:214b-16: mnyam pa nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:214b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi
T02D2512-1:214b-18: brjod la / bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol to //
T02D2512-1:214b-19: dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdus nas slar dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:214b-20: de bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:214b-21: ji ltar rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor du
T02D2512-1:214b-22: phyag rgya bcing ba la sogs pa'i cho ga gsungs
T02D2512-1:214b-23: pa de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2512-1:214b-24: pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang bya bar shes
T02D2512-1:214b-25: par bya'o // phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:214b-26: zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-1:214b-27: 'di'i don slar yang bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:214b-28: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi spyor bas rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02D2512-1:214b-29: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:214b-30: ji srid du mngon sum du mthong bar gyur gyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:214b-31: de nas ji skad du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2512-1:214b-32: sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la bar
T02D2512-1:214b-33: snang gi phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du yang
T02D2512-1:214b-35: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su legs par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:214b-36: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig btab la /
T02D2512-1:214b-37: nang du 'di'i phyi'i phyed kyi tshad dang /
T02D2512-1:214b-38: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa grub bzhi la /
T02D2512-1:214b-39: ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes par byas pa /
T02D2512-1:214b-40: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan
T02D2512-1:214b-41: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:215a-1: dbus ma'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin /
T02D2512-1:215a-2: rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su phyag na rdo rje /
T02D2512-1:215a-3: shar lho mtshams kyi le'u tshe la 'jam pa'i dbyangs /
T02D2512-1:215a-4: k'i li k'i la'i gnas su nam mkha'i snying po /
T02D2512-1:215a-5: lho nub mtshams su nam mkha' mdzod /
T02D2512-1:215a-6: rdo rje dran ba'i gnas su 'jig rten dbang phyug /
T02D2512-1:215a-7: nub byang mtshams su sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba /
T02D2512-1:215a-8: rdo rje snyems pa'i gnas su rdo rje khu tshur /
T02D2512-1:215a-9: byang shar mtshams kyi le'u tshe la rdo rje gnod sbyin gnyis pa bri bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:215a-10: de dag thams cad kyang sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D2512-1:215a-11: sku mdog nag po shas cher gtum pa 'jigs pa rnams kyang 'jigs par mdzad pa /
T02D2512-1:215a-12: 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od mnga' ba rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2512-1:215a-13: ha ha zhes gsal bar bzhad pa'i zhal mnga' ba'o //
T02D2512-1:215a-14: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su mche ba'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:215a-15: phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i sgo rnams su khro bo'i rdo rje rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:215a-16: 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying po ni ha zhes bya ba yin no //
T02D2512-1:215a-17: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas de bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
T02D2512-1:215a-18: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje mche ba dang /
T02D2512-1:215a-19: me tog gi yal ga las bum pa thams cad dang /
T02D2512-1:215a-20: bum pa gang ba rnams la ha zhes bya ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-1:215a-21: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhi phye la bsdu ba byas te /
T02D2512-1:215a-22: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom zhing /
T02D2512-1:215a-23: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis yang dag par bstod la /
T02D2512-1:215a-25: ha zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
T02D2512-1:215a-26: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal ba byas nas /
T02D2512-1:215a-31: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:215a-32: rdo rje bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad go cha bskon te /
T02D2512-1:215a-33: ha zhes bya bas mchod yon phul la /
T02D2512-1:215a-34: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:215a-35: ha dram shya zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ngang bcas pa blta bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:215b-0: dza: h'um bam ho: @215b sa ma ya stam /
T02D2512-1:215b-1: sa ma ya stvam aa ham ha /
T02D2512-1:215b-2: zhes lan gsum brjod la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:215b-3: de la bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-1:215b-4: rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo'i rtse gnyis bkug la /
T02D2512-1:215b-5: mthe bo gnyis shin tu brkyang ba ni rdo rje mche ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2512-1:215b-6: de nas lha 'di dag thams cad kyi ljags la ha zhes bya ba bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:215b-8: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2512-1:215b-9: ha zhes bya ba zlos shing rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2512-1:215b-10: dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i lha thams cad kyi phyag
T02D2512-1:215b-12: rang gi snying gar h'um las rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2512-1:215b-13: pa bsams la ha zhes bya ba zlos shing ji
T02D2512-1:215b-14: ltar bris pa dang rjes su mthun par lha thams
T02D2512-1:215b-15: cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:215b-16: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2512-1:215b-17: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dag
T02D2512-1:215b-18: gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dbang bskur
T02D2512-1:215b-19: la / ha zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul te /
T02D2512-1:215b-21: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:215b-23: bla re la sogs pa phul la /
T02D2512-1:215b-24: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de /
T02D2512-1:215b-25: phyi rol tu glu dang gar dang /
T02D2512-1:215b-29: ba lang gi khyad rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02D2512-1:215b-30: de nas phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:215b-31: ha zhes bya ba nyid las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02D2512-1:215b-33: kha zas ro brgya pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams sprul la /
T02D2512-1:215b-35: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la spyi bor gzhag la aom sarba bi tp'u ra p'u ra /
T02D2512-1:215b-37: a'a barta ya a'a barta ya ho zhes brjod do //
T02D2512-1:215b-38: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2512-1:215b-39: de nas ras sngon po la rdo rje gnod sbyin
T02D2512-1:215b-40: gyis yongs su bzlas pa gcig gis smad g-yogs bya
T02D2512-1:215b-42: yang gcig la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:215b-43: snying po bzhi yongs su bzlas pas rang gi gdong
T02D2512-1:215b-44: g-yogs par bya'o // de nas phyag 'tshal ba la
T02D2512-1:216a-0: sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin @216a *
T02D2512-1:216a-1: g-yogs par bya'o // // du sdom pa bzung la /
T02D2512-1:216a-2: byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
T02D2512-1:216a-3: snga ma bzhin du snying gar rdo rje bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:216a-4: shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas nas /
T02D2512-1:216a-5: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur te /
T02D2512-1:216a-6: rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:216a-7: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung nas
T02D2512-1:216a-8: badzra badzra ha zhes zlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2512-1:216a-9: par bya ste / shar phyogs kyi sgor badzra aam ku sha dza: zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:216a-10: de nas lho phyogs nas zhugs la badzra p'a sha h'um zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:216a-11: yang nub phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la badzra spho ta bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:216a-12: de nas byang phyogs kyi sgo nas de bzhin du zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:216a-13: badzra a'a be sha a'a: zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:216a-15: de nas de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sgor zhugs la /
T02D2512-1:216a-18: su to shya ma h'a dh'a na su su kho /
T02D2512-1:216a-20: a'adya siddhy'a m'am zhes brjod par bya'o//
T02D2512-1:216a-21: de nas rnam par sgeg pa'i rdo rjes phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:216a-22: dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02D2512-1:216a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:216a-24: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:216a-25: ma h'a ra ga ma h'a soo khya /
T02D2512-1:216a-26: ma h'a badzra ma h'a dzny'a na /
T02D2512-1:216a-29: yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:216a-30: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhy'a m'am /
T02D2512-1:216a-31: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la aa zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas nas /
T02D2512-1:216a-32: bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:216a-33: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje ma phye la /
T02D2512-1:216a-34: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya brjod cing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:216a-35: de nas ha zhes bya ba zlos shing me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:216a-37: ha nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:216a-38: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02D2512-1:216a-39: de nas de nyid zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:216a-42: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:216a-43: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:216a-44: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:216a-45: bcom ldan 'das la khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02D2512-1:216a-46: ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal bstan nas
T02D2512-1:216a-47: rang la dngos grub stsol bar gyur pa de srid
T02D2512-1:216b-0: @216b kyi bar du h'a zhes bya bzlas brjod bya'o
T02D2512-1:216b-1: // de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor ba shis
T02D2512-1:216b-2: pa brjod pa 'don pa'i tshul du rang gi snying
T02D2512-1:216b-3: // gar bzhag la / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod de /
T02D2512-1:216b-4: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:216b-5: glu dang rol mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:216b-6: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:216b-7: bcom ldan 'das la khro bo'i lta bas bltas te /
T02D2512-1:216b-8: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas nas /
T02D2512-1:216b-9: me tog la sogs pa dang dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya'o ;
T02D2512-1:216b-10: / de la dang po kho nar bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-1:216b-11: kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i
T02D2512-1:216b-12: rdo rje dang / me tog gi yal ga las
T02D2512-1:216b-13: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la sngar bshad pa'i
T02D2512-1:216b-14: bum pa'i sngags de bzhin du yongs su bzlas la
T02D2512-1:216b-15: rdo rje dang / / bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin du byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2512-1:216b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnal
T02D2512-1:216b-17: 'byor chen po las gsungs pa'i gnas su bcom ldan
T02D2512-1:216b-18: 'das 'khor dang bcas pa has rang rang gi gnas
T02D2512-1:216b-19: su bkod la / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma'i steng du /
T02D2512-1:216b-21: de'i steng du bdag nyid rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi
T02D2512-1:216b-22: phyag rgya chen pos 'dug nas mchod yon blangs la
T02D2512-1:216b-23: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par
T02D2512-1:216b-24: mchod de mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas yang dag par
T02D2512-1:216b-25: bstod nas / rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la ;
T02D2512-1:216b-26: aom badzra aa bhishinytsa ha zhes bya bas bdag nyid dbang bskur zhing chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02D2512-1:216b-27: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2512-1:216b-28: rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdag nyid dbang bskur zhing /
T02D2512-1:216b-32: bris pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2512-1:216b-34: dar dpyangs kyis dbang snga ma bzhin du bskur la /
T02D2512-1:216b-35: ha zhes bya bas rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa blangs te /
T02D2512-1:216b-36: ha zhes bya ba zlos bzhin du bdag po dang
T02D2512-1:216b-37: ming gi dbang bskur ba dag gis kyang dbang bskur
T02D2512-1:217a-1: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blangs la /
T02D2512-1:217a-2: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:217a-3: rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod
T02D2512-1:217a-4: pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis kyang yang dag par
T02D2512-1:217a-5: mchod par bya'o // de nas rdo rje de kho na nyid kyis bzung la /
T02D2512-1:217a-6: chos kyi dril bu dkrol zhing dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par byas te /
T02D2512-1:217a-7: de kho na nyid la sogs pas ni //
T02D2512-1:217a-8: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2512-1:217a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje'i rigs kyi
T02D2512-1:217a-10: dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su smras pa nyid yin par
T02D2512-1:217a-11: shes par bya'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la snying po blangs te /
T02D2512-1:217a-12: tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2512-1:217a-14: lung bstan pa mnos la yang bdag nyid la byin
T02D2512-1:217a-15: gyis brlab pa la sogs pa dang ji ltar mngon
T02D2512-1:217a-16: par 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod byas nas /
T02D2512-1:217a-17: bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:217a-18: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yi //
T02D2512-1:217a-19: rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches //
T02D2512-1:217a-20: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:217a-21: slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2512-1:217a-22: de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:217a-23: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:217a-25: // / de nas sdom pa dbog par 'os pa'i slob
T02D2512-1:217a-26: ma la sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis sdom pa 'dzin
T02D2512-1:217a-28: de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug la /
T02D2512-1:217a-29: de'i snying gar de bzhin du rdo rje bskyed de /
T02D2512-1:217a-30: rdo rje gnod sbyin du byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2512-1:217a-31: dri dang me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:217a-32: yon gyi mchog yang dag par blangs te /
T02D2512-1:217a-33: rang gi 'jug pa'i cho gas gzhug pa dang dbab pa bya'o //
T02D2512-1:217a-34: de nas yang rdo rje dang pa pa'i phyag rgya dril bu dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2512-1:217a-35: rkang pa g-yon pas de'i rkang pa g-yas pa mnan la /
T02D2512-1:217a-36: ha aa: aa: aa: aa: zhes bya ba lan brgya bzlas la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:217a-37: de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:217a-38: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:217a-40: // / de ltar dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob
T02D2512-1:217b-0: pa rnams la slob dpon gyis dngos grub @217b kyi
T02D2512-1:217b-1: ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i cho
T02D2512-1:217b-2: ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:217b-3: sgrub pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:217b-4: sgrub pa dang dngos grub dag kyang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:217b-5: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa las ras
T02D2512-1:217b-6: kyi ri mo gnyis pa bsnyen pa bya bar gsungs
T02D2512-1:217b-7: pa de bzhin du rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sgrub
T02D2512-1:217b-8: pa la yang shes par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:217b-9: dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:217b-10: ma bsgrubs par yang dang po ji lta ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:217b-11: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:217b-12: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sbyor ba byas la ;
T02D2512-1:217b-13: ji skad du bshad pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:217b-14: ha zhes bya bas bdud la sogs pa'i gdug pa thams cad rang dbang du bya'o //
T02D2512-1:217b-15: sems can thams cad 'dul ba la ni zhes bya
T02D2512-1:217b-16: ba ni bya ba ma yin pa thams cad las
T02D2512-1:217b-17: bzlog nas / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyar ba'am /
T02D2512-1:217b-18: theg pa chen po la dgod pa'o //
T02D2512-1:217b-20: khro bas ha ha zhes dgod cing bzlas pas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:217b-21: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:217b-22: khros par 'gyur bas ha zhes bya ba zlos shing
T02D2512-1:217b-23: bsgrub par bya ba rang gi kha nam mkha' dang
T02D2512-1:217b-24: mnyam pa'i nang du zhugs par yid kyis bsam par
T02D2512-1:217b-25: bya ste / de lta bus ni sems can gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:217b-26: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thar pa ni 'du shes dang bral ba'o //
T02D2512-1:217b-27: 'dod chags dang bral ba las ltung bar bya ba
T02D2512-1:217b-28: ni 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pas so sor snang
T02D2512-1:217b-29: ba yang dag par bstan pa'o //
T02D2512-1:217b-31: chos gos dang snam sbyar gyi sbyin sreg gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:217b-32: 'dod chags dang bral ba las ltung bar bya ba'i bsam pas chos gos dum bur byas te /
T02D2512-1:217b-33: rdo rje gnod sbyin thab kyi dbus su rnam par bsams la sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D2512-1:217b-34: de lta bus ni 'dod chags dang bral ba las ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:217b-35: dbang bskur ba thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams so //
T02D2512-1:217b-36: de dbrog pa ni med par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:218a-1: kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:218a-2: gser ba la sogs pa'i phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:218a-3: thams cad rgyas gdang pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:218a-4: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas
T02D2512-1:218a-5: bsgrub par bya ba'i snying gar ha zhes bya bas
T02D2512-1:218a-6: rdo rje 'bar ba bskyed pa ni thams cad rgyas
T02D2512-1:218a-7: gdab pa'o // thams cad bcad pa la ni gzugs
T02D2512-1:218a-8: brnyan byas nas gtubs pas so zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:218a-9: bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan mngon spyod kyi rdzas
T02D2512-1:218a-11: bsgrub par bya ba gsang ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste bcug pa byas la /
T02D2512-1:218a-12: rdo rje rnon po'i sbyor bas ha las ral gri bskyed de /
T02D2512-1:218a-13: ral gri des lha sbyin m'a ra ya ha zhes
T02D2512-1:218a-14: bya ba la sogs pa ming nas smos shing bzlas
T02D2512-1:218a-15: la / gzugs brnyan gtub par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:218a-16: de lta bus ni thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:218a-17: ma rungs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
T02D2512-1:218a-18: 'jig pa la ni rdo rje bzung nas 'jug par
T02D2512-1:218a-20: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:218a-21: 'og nas bshad pa'i gdug pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bris nas khro bo'i rdo rje blangs la /
T02D2512-1:218a-22: ha dushta mandalam bha smi ku ru ham zhes zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:218a-23: gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i gdon gyi dkyil 'khor du
T02D2512-1:218a-24: zhugs la rkang ba gnyis kyis mnyes na de lta
T02D2512-1:218a-25: bus ni de rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:218a-26: mchod pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni
T02D2512-1:218a-27: khros nas bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba la ni
T02D2512-1:218a-28: / nam mkha' mdzod kyi sbyor bas ha zhes bya
T02D2512-1:218a-29: ba zlos shing rang gi kha las rdo rje gnod
T02D2512-1:218a-30: sbyin phyung bas mchod pa thams cad thal bar byas
T02D2512-1:218a-32: de lta bus ni mchod pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:218a-33: thams cad skrag par bya ba la ni 'jigs byed
T02D2512-1:218a-34: kyi lta bas blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:218a-35: / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:218a-36: sems can gdug pa can rnams la ha zhes bya
T02D2512-1:218a-37: ba bzlos shing 'jigs byed kyi lta bas bltas la
T02D2512-1:218a-39: de'i mig gi mtha' sreg par byed par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:218a-40: de lta bus ni thams cad skrag par byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:218a-41: rdo rje dam tshig ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor skyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa ste //
T02D2512-1:218a-42: de skad ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs pa ste /
T02D2512-1:218a-43: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rtog pa'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:218b-0: // / @218b de ltar rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
T02D2512-1:218b-1: da ni rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2512-1:218b-2: rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig tu gyur pa bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:218b-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin la /
T02D2512-1:218b-4: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra ni
T02D2512-1:218b-5: de ma thag pa ste ji skad du gsungs pa'i
T02D2512-1:218b-6: tshul gyis bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i khams thams cad
T02D2512-1:218b-7: kyi gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas
T02D2512-1:218b-9: de'i rjes thogs nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:218b-10: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2512-1:218b-11: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:218b-12: thams cad don dam par dngos po med pa'i ngo
T02D2512-1:218b-13: bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gcig pa nyid ni chos
T02D2512-1:218b-14: thams cad mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D2512-1:218b-15: de la rab tu zhugs pa ni gnyis su med
T02D2512-1:218b-16: pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pas gnas par mdzad
T02D2512-1:218b-17: pa'o // de su zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2512-1:218b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:218b-19: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:218b-20: thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ni thams cad kyi
T02D2512-1:218b-21: chos nyid do // de la dmigs pa'i ye shes ni mchog ste /
T02D2512-1:218b-22: de las byung ba'i thos pa dang bsam pa dang /
T02D2512-1:218b-23: bsgom pa'i ye shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D2512-1:218b-24: tu phyin pa mngon sum du mdzad pa'i rgyu'i shes
T02D2512-1:218b-25: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gang yin
T02D2512-1:218b-26: pa'i mchog ste / ming de skad ces bya ba bshad pa ni gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:218b-27: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi
T02D2512-1:218b-28: pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do zhes
T02D2512-1:218b-29: bya ba la chos thams cad ni byang chub kyi
T02D2512-1:218b-30: sems dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D2512-1:218b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02D2512-1:218b-32: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang /
T02D2512-1:218b-34: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni rnam par thar
T02D2512-1:218b-35: pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid do
T02D2512-1:218b-36: // chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang shes rab
T02D2512-1:218b-37: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyon mongs pa bag
T02D2512-1:218b-38: chags dang bcas par bral ba de thob par byed
T02D2512-1:218b-39: pa'i thabs ni chos bdag med pa'i ye shes te
T02D2512-1:218b-40: // / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D2512-1:219a-0: de'i mnyam pa nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu @219a * //
T02D2512-1:219a-2: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2512-1:219a-4: chos thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa nyid gang
T02D2512-1:219a-5: yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2512-1:219a-6: phyin pa'i gnyis su med pa nyid de /
T02D2512-1:219a-7: don dam par chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D2512-1:219a-8: / thams cad don nyid yin pas shes rab kyi
T02D2512-1:219a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid do zhes bya
T02D2512-1:219a-10: ba la thams cad ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
T02D2512-1:219a-11: phyin pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D2512-1:219a-13: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2512-1:219a-15: de'i don ni thams cad don nyid do //
T02D2512-1:219a-16: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /
T02D2512-1:219a-17: nam mkha'i mnyam pa nyid de /

T02D2512-1:219a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'o //

T02D2512-1:219a-35: thams cad chos nyid yin pa des shes rab kyi

T02D2512-1:219b-8: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos nyid do //
T02D2512-1:219b-9: thams cad las nyid ba des shes rab kyi pha
T02D2512-1:219b-10: rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o
T02D2512-1:219b-11: zhes bya ba la shes rab kyi pha rol tu

T02D2512-1:219b-14: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos nyid do zhes rig par bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:219b-15: khong du chud par bya la shes par bya'o zhes

T02D2512-1:219b-19: gyi bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin dang po gsungs
T02D2512-1:219b-20: pa yin no // da ni de nas zhes bya

T02D2512-1:219b-24: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul par bya ba'i phyir dang

T02D2512-1:219b-26: par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
T02D2512-1:219b-27: chen po la bskul ba'i rjes thogs nyid la snying
T02D2512-1:219b-28: po 'di bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul par mdzad pa'i
T02D2512-1:219b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams
T02D2512-1:219b-31: cad ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D2512-1:219b-33: de rnams kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig ni dkyil
T02D2512-1:219b-34: 'khor nges par sprul pa nyid kyis mngon par 'dod

T02D2512-1:219b-37: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2512-1:219b-39: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing mngon sum du mdzad nas /
T02D2512-1:219b-40: don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:219b-41: thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha rnams so //
T02D2512-1:219b-42: de rnams kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2512-1:219b-43: der nges pa'i ye shes la ming snying po zhes
T02D2512-1:219b-44: bya la de ston par byed pa'i h'um la yang
T02D2512-1:219b-45: nye bar gdags pas de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2512-1:219b-46: de gsungs pa ni ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:220a-0: de yang bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor skyed par @220a * //
T02D2512-1:220a-1: byed pa'i rnam pa la thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad nas /

T02D2512-1:220a-3: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D2512-1:220a-7: 'jig rten pa dag gi dkyil 'khor gyi bar dang /
T02D2512-1:220a-8: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las byung ste /
T02D2512-1:220a-9: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sngar bshad pa'i
T02D2512-1:220a-10: dkyil 'khor chen po'i mtshan nyid du zhugs par gyur
T02D2512-1:220a-11: to // de ltar na de nas zhes bya ba

T02D2512-1:220a-13: bar gyi bshad pas ni ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa

T02D2512-1:220a-17: // / de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs nas /

T02D2512-1:220a-23: da nas zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2512-1:220a-24: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:220a-25: dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-1:220a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la nye bar btud
T02D2512-1:220a-27: de zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2512-1:220a-28: snang mdzad kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas pa'o //
T02D2512-1:220a-29: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-1:220a-30: dam tshig kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas
T02D2512-1:220a-31: na dam tshig chen po ste /
T02D2512-1:220a-32: byang chub kyi sems chen po chos kyi dbyings thog
T02D2512-1:220a-33: ma dang tha ma med pa'o zhes bya ba'i don

T02D2512-1:220a-35: de gsungs pa ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D2512-1:220a-36: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa

T02D2512-1:220a-38: phyi dang nang du bcas pa snga ma bzhin du
T02D2512-1:220a-40: dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas brgyad du //

T02D2512-1:220a-43: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi byang shar mtshams kyi re'u cha'i bar du /
T02D2512-1:220a-44: khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /

T02D2512-1:220b-9: dbus su rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor yang bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:220b-10: 'dis ni yid kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:220b-11: de ltar yid kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs nas /
T02D2512-1:220b-12: da ni bris pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:220b-13: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin la /
T02D2512-1:220b-14: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2512-1:220b-15: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa sngon du

T02D2512-1:220b-17: mdzad nas bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor de bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-1:220b-18: phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:220b-19: de la dam tshig thams cad ni bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:220b-20: de nyid ni mi phyed pas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2512-1:220b-21: de gang gis byin gyis rlob cing brtan par mdzad
T02D2512-1:220b-22: pa de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni dam
T02D2512-1:220b-23: tshig thams cad kyi rdo rjer byin gyis rlob pa
T02D2512-1:220b-24: ste / ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02D2512-1:220b-25: dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te ;
T02D2512-1:220b-26: ming de skad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs pa ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D2512-1:220b-27: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zhes bya ba la
T02D2512-1:220b-28: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyibs su'o
T02D2512-1:220b-29: // phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la zhes bya ba ni kun du bri ba'o //
T02D2512-1:220b-30: de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor chen po rdo rje 'khor
T02D2512-1:220b-31: lo bris nas zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:220b-33: de'i nang du rdo rje 'khor lo chen po zhes
T02D2512-1:220b-34: bya ba rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por
T02D2512-1:220b-35: bshad pa'i nang gi dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar
T02D2512-1:220b-36: bya zhing / de'i dbyibs su bya'o //

T02D2512-1:220b-38: byang shar mtshams kyi re'u cha rnams su rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po nas brtsams te //

T02D2512-1:220b-41: bar bya zhing sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhag par

T02D2512-1:221a-1: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i thig gis thig btab cing /
T02D2512-1:221a-3: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor de legs par thig gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:221a-4: sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2512-1:221a-5: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i
T02D2512-1:221a-6: 'khor dang lhan cig tu lugs ma la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:221a-7: sku gzugs rnams h'um zhes bya ba nyid kyis gzhag
T02D2512-1:221a-8: par bya'o // phyi'i dkyil 'khor du ni phyi'i rdo
T02D2512-1:221a-9: rje'i rigs rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2512-1:221a-10: bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba la phyi'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:221a-11: gyi lha'i snam bu la shar lho mtshams su zhi
T02D2512-1:221a-12: ba mdung thung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2512-1:221a-13: lho nub tu ma mo'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D2512-1:221a-14: nub byang du ming po gsum gyi dkyil 'khor /
T02D2512-1:221a-15: byang shar mtshams su sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:221a-16: sgo rnams su ni rigs rnam pa bzhi'i mtshan ma
T02D2512-1:221a-17: rnams gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba la shar phyogs
T02D2512-1:221a-18: kyi sgor rdo rje sems dpa'/

T02D2512-1:221a-22: kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyi cho
T02D2512-1:221a-23: ga thams cad rgyas par bya'o zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:221a-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por slob dpon
T02D2512-1:221a-25: gyi las kyi cho ga dang /

T02D2512-1:221a-29: po nyid kyi snga ma bzhin du bya ste /
T02D2512-1:221a-30: ras kyi ri mo gnyis nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:221a-31: gang gsungs pa de thams cad 'dir yang bya bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:221a-32: bde ba thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba
T02D2512-1:221a-33: la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D2512-1:221a-34: 'byung pa'i bde ba ni bde ba thams cad do
T02D2512-1:221a-35: // de'i dam tshig ni rgyu ste /
T02D2512-1:221a-36: ming de skad ces bya ba'i rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:221a-38: // /'di'i don slar yang bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:221a-39: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba byas la ;

T02D2512-1:221a-41: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //

T02D2512-1:221a-43: du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du

T02D2512-1:221b-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus ma'i
T02D2512-1:221b-5: re'u cha la yang dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil
T02D2512-1:221b-6: 'khor ro // rdo rje yid las byung ba'i gnas su rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor /

T02D2512-1:221b-8: rdo rje dran pa'i gnas su 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor /
T02D2512-1:221b-9: rdo rje bsnyems pa'i gnas su rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:221b-10: shar lho mtshams kyi re'u cha la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor /
T02D2512-1:221b-11: lho nub mtshams su nam mkha' mdzod kyi'o //

T02D2512-1:221b-13: byang shar mtshams su rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya'o //

T02D2512-1:221b-15: cad sngar bshad pa'i rang gi dkyil 'khor du bris
T02D2512-1:221b-16: la / phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la

T02D2512-1:221b-22: lhor ni rdo rje h'um mdzad /

T02D2512-1:221b-31: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa byas la /

T02D2512-1:221b-39: rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgo bcings te /
T02D2512-1:221b-40: rdo rje bsrung bas bsrung ba thams cad go bskon la /
T02D2512-1:222a-0: h'um zhes bya bas mchod yon dbul bar @222a * //

T02D2512-1:222a-6: h'um zhes bya ba rnam par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:222a-8: rang gi snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams te /

T02D2512-1:222a-10: rgya sngar bshad pa rnams h'um zhes bya ba nyid
T02D2512-1:222a-12: de nas yang rang gi snying gar h'um nyid las rdo rje rtse lnga ba bsams la /
T02D2512-1:222a-13: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-1:222a-14: po h'um zhes bya ba nyid kyis bcing bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:222a-15: // de nas snga ma bzhin du rang gis dbang
T02D2512-1:222a-16: bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2512-1:222a-17: la sogs pa thams cad dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:222a-18: h'um zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor pa'i lha thams cad la mchod yon phul la /
T02D2512-1:222a-20: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:222a-22: bla re la sogs pa phul te /
T02D2512-1:222a-29: ba lang gi khyu rnams kyis kyang mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02D2512-1:222a-30: de nas rigs re re zhing phyag rgya'i mchod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis byas la /
T02D2512-1:222a-31: aom las rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02D2512-1:222a-33: kha zas ro brgya pa la sogs pa'i bkod pa sprul la /
T02D2512-1:222a-35: thal mo khang stong du sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:222a-36: aom sarba bid p'u ra p'u ra su ra su
T02D2512-1:222a-37: ra a'a wa rta ya a'a warta ya ho zhes
T02D2512-1:222a-38: brjod par bya'o // de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2512-1:222a-39: de nas shin tu dmar ba'i gos la ;
T02D2512-1:222a-40: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa de dag las gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02D2512-1:222a-41: gnyis pas stod g-yogs byas nas /
T02D2512-1:222a-42: yang gcig la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i

T02D2512-1:222a-45: byang chub tu sems bskyed la /

T02D2512-1:222b-0: slog @222b dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:222b-2: // / de nas slob ma rnams la yang rdo rje
T02D2512-1:222b-3: sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i cho ga
T02D2512-1:222b-5: slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:222b-7: // / de ltar dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba rnams
T02D2512-1:222b-8: la slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab
T02D2512-1:222b-9: par byas nas / de bzhin du rdo rje sems
T02D2512-1:222b-10: dpa' la sogs pa rang gi dkyil 'khor du gsungs

T02D2512-1:222b-13: pa po rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i cho
T02D2512-1:222b-14: ga 'dod pa de rnams kyi ni rdo rje h'um
T02D2512-1:222b-15: mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i dbang
T02D2512-1:222b-16: bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga 'dir bya'o //
T02D2512-1:222b-17: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:222b-19: // /'dir 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams la lhag par mos pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /

T02D2512-1:222b-21: 'khor gyi de kho na nyid ston par byed pa'i
T02D2512-1:222b-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsungs
T02D2512-1:222b-23: pa ni / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin la /
T02D2512-1:222b-24: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2512-1:222b-25: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'dod pa'i khams
T02D2512-1:222b-26: thams cad kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na phyag na
T02D2512-1:222b-27: rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor
T02D2512-1:222b-28: nas / ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs pa dang /

T02D2512-1:222b-32: sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:222b-33: sems can thams cad ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams la lhag bar mos pa'o //
T02D2512-1:222b-34: de rnams byin gyis rlob pa ni de bzhin gshegs

T02D2512-1:222b-39: rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2512-1:222b-40: par snang mdzad kyis bshad pa ni bka' stsal pa'o
T02D2512-1:222b-41: // sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
T02D2512-1:222b-42: po can no zhes bya ba la sems can thams
T02D2512-1:222b-44: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02D2512-1:222b-45: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no /
T02D2512-1:223a-0: @223a * // de la byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /

T02D2512-1:223a-4: 'dir rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:223a-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du
T02D2512-1:223a-6: bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin nyid yin pas
T02D2512-1:223a-8: de la byang chub kyi sems chen po dang /

T02D2512-1:223a-12: kun du bzang po'i byang chub kyi sems chen po rtogs par byed pa'i ngo bo dang /
T02D2512-1:223a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rigs rtogs pa'i ngo bo ste /

T02D2512-1:223a-15: byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang yin la kun du bzang po yang yin pas na /
T02D2512-1:223a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po ste /
T02D2512-1:223a-17: de ni thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas na /
T02D2512-1:223a-18: de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:223a-19: de rnams su gyur pas na rang bzhin nyid de /
T02D2512-1:223a-20: des na sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no //
T02D2512-1:223a-21: de skad du lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las /
T02D2512-1:223a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med pa /
T02D2512-1:223a-23: sems can gyi rgyud la gnas te /

T02D2512-1:223a-25: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2512-1:223a-33: snying po can no zhes bya ba la rdo rje
T02D2512-1:223a-34: ni rdo rje nor bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

T02D2512-1:223a-36: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:223a-37: 'dir yang rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje
T02D2512-1:223a-38: snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas zhes bya ba

T02D2512-1:223b-0: @223b rin po che'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi
T02D2512-1:223b-1: rdo rje snying pos dbang bskur ba gang yin pa
T02D2512-1:223b-2: de ni rdo rje snying pos dbang bskur ba ste
T02D2512-1:223b-3: / de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dbang bskur ba nyid do //
T02D2512-1:223b-5: gang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid de nyid ni shin tu yang skye ba med pa yin te /
T02D2512-1:223b-6: de bas na don dam par rdo rje nor bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:223b-7: rin po che'i rigs kyi snying po can ni sems can thams cad yin no //
T02D2512-1:223b-8: sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:223b-9: chos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang padma'i rigs so //
T02D2512-1:223b-10: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:223b-11: 'dir rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:223b-12: ngag thams cad rab tu byung ba nyid pas zhes bya ba gsungs te /

T02D2512-1:223b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

T02D2512-1:223b-20: cad kyi rgyud la rab tu 'jug pa de la
T02D2512-1:223b-21: ni / ngag thams cad rab tu 'byung ba'o //

T02D2512-1:223b-44: pa de ni sems can thams cad kyi bya ba
T02D2512-1:223b-45: byed pa'o // de rnams kyi dngos po ni sems
T02D2512-1:224a-0: can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa @224a *
T02D2512-1:224a-2: de dang mthar thug par rab tu sbyor zhing 'brel
T02D2512-1:224a-3: pas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa
