T02D2512-1:224a-6: pa nyid la sbyor bas so zhes bya ba'i sgras
T02D2512-1:224a-7: ni nges par bzung ba ste /
T02D2512-1:224a-8: sbyor ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:224a-9: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
T02D2512-1:224a-14: lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni don dam par
T02D2512-1:224a-15: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yin pas ma skyes
T02D2512-1:224a-16: pa'o // de bas na sems can thams cad ni
T02D2512-1:224a-17: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byas
T02D2512-1:224a-18: pa'o // pa dang / las kyi rigs kyi ngo bo nyid ni las kyi snying po'o //
T02D2512-1:224a-19: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'dis /
T02D2512-1:224a-20: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la sogs pa ston par byed pas /
T02D2512-1:224a-21: don dam par sems can thams cad ni byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D2512-1:224a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02D2512-1:224a-23: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:224a-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:224a-27: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D2512-1:224a-28: las kyi rigs kyi ngo bo nyid du ston pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:224a-29: gzhung 'di dag gis ni phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i
T02D2512-1:224a-30: rigs bzhi'i thun mong gi dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting
T02D2512-1:224a-32: de ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D2512-1:224a-33: ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa yin la /
T02D2512-1:224a-34: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2512-1:224a-35: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
T02D2512-1:224a-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par
T02D2512-1:224a-37: mdzad pas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs la lhag
T02D2512-1:224a-38: par mos pa'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i
T02D2512-1:224a-39: phyir / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la bskul ba dang /
T02D2512-1:224a-40: de'i rjes thogs nyid la rdo rje'i dbang phyug ma
T02D2512-1:224a-41: la sogs pa phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi
T02D2512-1:224a-42: gzugs kyi zhib mdung gis mtshan pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:224a-43: dkyil 'khor skyed par byed pa'i snying po smras par
T02D2512-1:224a-44: gyur pa ni dri zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das
T02D2512-1:224a-45: rdo rje 'dzin pas rdo rje'i dbang phyug gi gzugs
T02D2512-1:224a-46: kyis gsungs pa'o // de nas de'i rjes thogs nyid
T02D2512-1:224a-47: la zhib mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bcom
T02D2512-1:224a-48: ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje dbang phyug
T02D2512-1:224a-49: gi gzugs kyi gnas pa thugs ka nas byung nas
T02D2512-1:224a-50: rang gi gnas su gnas par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:224b-0: de ltar na gzhung 'di dag gis ting nge 'dzin @224b gnyis pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:224b-1: bsdus pa nas brtsams te gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o /
T02D2512-1:224b-3: // / dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams
T02D2512-1:224b-4: kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:224b-5: 'di'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

T02D2512-1:224b-7: 'dis ni slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /
T02D2512-1:224b-8: slob ma zhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga yang gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:224b-9: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni 'das ma thag pa ston par byed pa ste /
T02D2512-1:224b-10: ting nge 'dzin gsum pa bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:224b-11: ji srid mngon sum du mthong bar gyur pa de
T02D2512-1:224b-12: srid kyi bar du dkyil 'khor du bsgom par bya'o
T02D2512-1:224b-13: // de nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la ting nge
T02D2512-1:224b-14: 'dzin gsum bsgoms la dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:224b-16: zhes bya ba ni brtson pa la 'jug pa'o //
T02D2512-1:224b-17: kun nas zlum pa zhes bya ba ni dbyibs zlum pa'o ;
T02D2512-1:224b-18: / thig gsum pa zhes bya ba ni rim pa gsum pa'o //
T02D2512-1:224b-19: dkyil 'khor chen po zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya chen po gtso bor byas pa'o //
T02D2512-1:224b-20: sgo bzhi pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2512-1:224b-21: rim pa re re zhing so sor bsgo bzhi bri
T02D2512-1:224b-22: zhing / mtshams su ni mdung rtse gsum pa bris la /
T02D2512-1:224b-23: de'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bris la /
T02D2512-1:224b-24: dbang phyug chen po'i de'i phyogs dang mtshams rnams te /
T02D2512-1:224b-25: logs thams cad du tshogs brgyad po ste /
T02D2512-1:224b-26: ba lang gi rna ba'i dbang phyug gi bar du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:224b-27: de'i mtshams rnams su ni ma mo'i tshogs thams cad ces bya ba ni rim pa dbus mar ro //
T02D2512-1:224b-28: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'og nas bshad pa bzhin du'o //
T02D2512-1:224b-29: sgo rnams su dbyig pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:224b-30: phyi rol tu ni 'byung po rnams dang yi ge
T02D2512-1:224b-31: rnams bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rim pa
T02D2512-1:224b-32: gsum pa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyi rim
T02D2512-1:224b-33: pa la ni 'byung po brgyad kyi yi ge brgyad
T02D2512-1:224b-34: bri bar bya'o // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas /
T02D2512-1:224b-35: slob dpon thal ba gtsang mas lus bskus shing gos gtsang ma bgos te /

T02D2512-1:225a-1: pa rgya chen po'i bde bar rnam par smin pa
T02D2512-1:225a-2: las te / de'i don du drag po'i las dngos

T02D2512-1:225a-5: gdug pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:225a-6: zhes bya ba ni gdug pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir ma rungs pa'i las bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:225a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' ni gdug pa rnams 'dul ba'o //
T02D2512-1:225a-8: de grub pa ni rdzogs pa ste de'i don du'o //
T02D2512-1:225a-9: 'dod pa kun gyi bdag po dang //
T02D2512-1:225a-10: zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gi bdag po nyid dang /
T02D2512-1:225a-11: rdo rje dbang phyug la sogs pa'i bdag po nyid
T02D2512-1:225a-12: ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po ste 'dod
T02D2512-1:225a-13: pa thams cad kyi bdag po nyid do //
T02D2512-1:225a-14: drag po'i las kyi ngo bo nyid //
T02D2512-1:225a-15: ces bya ba ni rdo rje dbang phyug gi las ni drag po'i las te /
T02D2512-1:225a-16: las de'i dngos po de gyis shig bod pa'o //
T02D2512-1:225a-18: gang rdo rje dbang phyug gi las sna tshogs pa de gyis shig pa'o //
T02D2512-1:225a-19: de lta bu des ni de'i phyag rgya chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2512-1:225a-20: de nas phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab ste zhes bya
T02D2512-1:225a-21: ba ni slob ma bcug nas de rnams kyi phyag
T02D2512-1:225a-22: rgya chen po la sogs pa bslab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:225a-23: de nas nye bar sdud pa'i dus su yang phyi
T02D2512-1:225a-24: rol du gtor ma ji lta ba bzhin du byin
T02D2512-1:225a-25: la / dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:225a-26: de nas brtsams te zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa nas nye bar gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:225a-27: 'jigs pa med par zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi lha rnams kyi 'tshe ba dang bral ba'o //
T02D2512-1:225a-28: dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba ni rdo rje dbang phyug dang /
T02D2512-1:225a-29: phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams kyi rgyur gyur pas so //
T02D2512-1:225a-30: phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2512-1:225a-31: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbang phyug la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyis so /
T02D2512-1:225a-32: bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad rjes su
T02D2512-1:225a-33: myong nas zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dbang phyug
T02D2512-1:225a-34: la sogs pa de rnams nyid kyi'o //
T02D2512-1:225a-35: drag po'i 'jig rten du zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten du grags pa'o //
T02D2512-1:225a-36: mchod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D2512-1:225a-37: dbang phyug dang 'dra bar yang dag par mchod par
T02D2512-1:225a-38: 'gyur bas so // de'i don 'di yin par bshad par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:225a-39: rdo rje dbang phyug gi sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:225b-0: ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa nas @225b brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:225b-1: ji srid mtshan ma thob cing rjes su gnang ba
T02D2512-1:225b-2: thob kyi bar du dkyil 'khor 'di bsgom par bya'o
T02D2512-1:225b-3: // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D2512-1:225b-4: bar snang gi gnas su dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du gzhag la /
T02D2512-1:225b-5: nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su legs par thig gdab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:225b-9: rim pa gsum pa ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2512-1:225b-10: rim pa gsum pa sum 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:225b-11: thams cad kyi sgo bzhi pa la mtshams bzhir mdung rtse gsum pas mtshan pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-12: de nas dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po gdong bzhi pa dgod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:225b-14: gdong lhag ma rnams ni drag cing 'jigs par byed pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-15: khro bo chen po 'jigs byed lag pa bzhi pa
T02D2512-1:225b-16: kha dog nag po lag pa gnyis na rtse gsum
T02D2512-1:225b-17: dang thod pa / yang gnyis kyis glang po che'i
T02D2512-1:225b-18: pags pa rlan dang bcas pa ba dan gyi tshul
T02D2512-1:225b-20: de'i spyi bor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-21: rdo rje dbang phyug de'i mdun gyi lag pa bzhin /
T02D2512-1:225b-25: g-yung drung gis mtshan pa 'dzin par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-26: de bzhin du de'i rgyab kyi lag pa bzhi la yang de bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-27: dkyil 'khor dbus ma de nyid shar phyogs kyi logs
T02D2512-1:225b-28: su nag po chen po lag na tri sh'u la
T02D2512-1:225b-29: thogs pa'o // lho phyogs su dga' byed dbang phyug rdza rnga brdung ba la brtson pa'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-30: nub phyogs su dril chen lag na dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-31: byang phyogs su gar gyi dbang phyug lag na mdung rtse la sogs pa thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-32: shar lho mtshams su thod pa bgrang po lag na thod pa thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-33: lho nub mtshams su gtum pa'i dbang phyug phyag na tri sh'u la dang /
T02D2512-1:225b-37: nub byang mtshams su khatv'am ga lag na kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D2512-1:225b-39: byang shar mtshams su ba lang rna ba'i dbang phyug lag na tri sh'u la thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-40: rim pa gnyis pa'i shar phyogs su drag mo lag na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-41: lhor tshangs pa mo lag na bgrang phreng thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:225b-42: nub tu khyab 'jug mo lag na 'khor lo thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-1: gzhon nu ma lag na dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-2: shar lho mtshams su nag mo lag na thod pa khrag dang bcas pa dang 'khar gsil thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-3: lho nub mtshams su nag mo chen mo lag na chu gri thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-4: nub byang mtshams su zab mo lag na mche ba thogs pa'o//
T02D2512-1:226a-5: byang shar mtshams su srin mo lag na kha tv'am ga thogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi de nyid kyi shar phyogs kyi sgor zhi ba lag na thod pa thogs pa'o /
T02D2512-1:226a-7: lhor bh'e runda lag na rus pa'i lu gu rgyud thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-8: nub tu gtum mo lag na bya rgod thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-9: byang du 'jigs byed ma lag na byi la thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-10: rim pa gsum po la 'byung po'i yi ge tri brgyad phreng brgyad du gnas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-11: phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i shar phyogs kyi sgor
T02D2512-1:226a-12: dbyig pa'i dbang phyug lag na thod pa dang 'khar
T02D2512-1:226a-13: ba thogs pa'o // lhor mgo bo'i dbang phyug lag na ti sh'u la dang thod pa thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-14: nub tu dril bu'i rna ba lag na dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-15: byang phyogs su drag po chen po lag na thod
T02D2512-1:226a-16: pa dang tri sh'u la thogs pa bri bar bya'o
T02D2512-1:226a-17: // 'dir lha thams cad kyi snying po ni tri zhes bya ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-18: de ltar na rdo rje dbang phyug gi sbyor bas dkyil 'khor bris la /
T02D2512-1:226a-19: mdud rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa'i phyag rgyas bzung ba'i rtse gsum pa dang /
T02D2512-1:226a-20: me tog gi yal ga las bum pa thams cad
T02D2512-1:226a-21: dang bum pa gang ba rnams tri zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:226a-22: re re zhing lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas
T02D2512-1:226a-23: la / dkyil 'khor gyi sgo thams cad phye ste /
T02D2512-1:226a-24: tri zhes bya bas rdo rje dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul la /
T02D2512-1:226a-25: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:226a-26: gos dang bla re la sogs pa bstabs te /
T02D2512-1:226a-27: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod la /
T02D2512-1:226a-28: ji skad du bshad pa'i rang gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang mchod de /
T02D2512-1:226a-29: phyi rol du gtor ma byin nas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2512-1:226a-30: de nas ras dkar po la rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02D2512-1:226a-32: de dag las gcig gis smad g-yogs bya /
T02D2512-1:226a-33: gnyis pas ni stod g-yogs bya /
T02D2512-1:226a-34: gsum pas rang gi gdong g-yogs la /
T02D2512-1:226a-35: tri zhes bya ba yongs su bzlas pa'i thal ba gtsang mas lus la byugs te /
T02D2512-1:226a-37: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
T02D2512-1:226b-0: de bzhin du rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsams @226b la ;
T02D2512-1:226b-1: shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas nas /
T02D2512-1:226b-2: phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur nas /
T02D2512-1:226b-3: rtse gsum pas mtshan ma bcings te /
T02D2512-1:226b-4: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung la /
T02D2512-1:226b-5: badzra badzra tri zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2512-1:226b-6: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:226b-7: kye drag po 'byung ba'i bdag po dbang du mdzod cig ces brjod do //
T02D2512-1:226b-8: de nas phyag byas la dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas /
T02D2512-1:226b-9: rdo rje dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug ste /
T02D2512-1:226b-13: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la //
T02D2512-1:226b-14: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:226b-15: bdag nyid la dbab pa bya'o //
T02D2512-1:226b-16: yang g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje sems ma phye la /
T02D2512-1:226b-17: aa zhes bya ba de bzhin du zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab pa bya'o //
T02D2512-1:226b-18: de nas tri zhes bya bas me tog dor ro //
T02D2512-1:226b-19: de nas de blangs la de nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:226b-20: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:226b-21: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:226b-23: de nas rtse mo gsum gyis mtshan pa bcings la /
T02D2512-1:226b-24: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:226b-25: de nas rdo rje dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:226b-26: rdo rje lta bas de la ba lta zhing ji
T02D2512-1:226b-27: srid du rdo rje dbang phyug gi mthong bar byin
T02D2512-1:226b-28: nas / rang gi dngos grub rnams ster bar gyur
T02D2512-1:226b-29: pa de srid kyi bar du tri zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:226b-30: nas / bzlas brjod bya'o // de nas rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje'i lta bas bltas la /
T02D2512-1:226b-31: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas te /
T02D2512-1:226b-32: me tog la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:226b-33: de la dang po kho nar zhi ba mdung gis
T02D2512-1:226b-34: mtshan pas yongs su bzung ba'i mdung rtse gsum pa
T02D2512-1:226b-35: dang / me tog gi yal ga las kyang rnam
T02D2512-1:226b-36: par rgyal ba'i bum pa las sngar bshad pa'i bum
T02D2512-1:226b-37: pa'i sngags de bzhin du yongs su zlos te /
T02D2512-1:226b-38: bdag nyid rdo rje dbang phyug tu byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:226b-39: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma bris nas /
T02D2512-1:226b-40: de'i steng du rdo rje dbang phyug gi phyag rgya
T02D2512-1:226b-41: chen pos 'dug ste me tog la sogs pas bdag
T02D2512-1:226b-42: nyid yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:227a-1: gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum ba las chu blangs la /
T02D2512-1:227a-2: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa tri zhes zlos shing des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya la /
T02D2512-1:227a-3: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02D2512-1:227a-4: de nas rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02D2512-1:227a-6: dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02D2512-1:227a-7: dar dpyangs kyis bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:227a-8: tri zhes bya bas mdung rtse gsum dril bu dang
T02D2512-1:227a-9: bcas pa blangs la tri zhes bya ba nyid zlos
T02D2512-1:227a-10: shing rdo rje dbang phyug gi ming gis dbang bskur
T02D2512-1:227a-11: bas bdag nyid dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:227a-12: tri zhes bya ba nyid kyis bdag po'i dbang bskur ba blangs te /
T02D2512-1:227a-13: mdud rtse gsum de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:227a-14: de la 'jig rten pa 'di dag thams cad ni
T02D2512-1:227a-15: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor du
T02D2512-1:227a-16: bcug nas / rdo rjer mdzad pa de rnams kyi
T02D2512-1:227a-17: phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i phyag
T02D2512-1:227a-20: de nas dril bu chos kyi dkrol bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:227a-21: de la chos ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-1:227a-22: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:227a-23: gdug pa 'dul ba grub phyir dang //
T02D2512-1:227a-24: 'dod kun bdag po nyid kyi phyir //
T02D2512-1:227a-25: gdug pa'i lag la gnas par gyis /
T02D2512-1:227a-26: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2512-1:227a-28: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig chos //
T02D2512-1:227a-29: yang dag bden par smra bya ba //
T02D2512-1:227a-30: de ni khyod kyis brnyas mi bya //
T02D2512-1:227a-31: bden pa yang dag yin zhes bshad //
T02D2512-1:227a-32: ces bya ba ni dam tshig go //
T02D2512-1:227a-33: de nas brtul zhugs blang bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:227a-34: 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur kyang ni //
T02D2512-1:227a-35: mi bden nam yang smra mi bya //
T02D2512-1:227a-36: 'byung po'i gdon yang gzhan min te //
T02D2512-1:227a-37: 'di ni bden pa min las byung //
T02D2512-1:227a-38: de nas brtsams te 'byung po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:227a-39: dbang phyug chen po yang dngos grub thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:227a-40: de nas me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2512-1:227a-41: rang gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang mchod la /
T02D2512-1:227a-43: rdo rje dbang phyug la phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:227a-44: tri zhes bya bas bzang nas yang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2512-1:227a-46: dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:227a-47: de nas bsdu ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:227a-48: aom tri ha ha ha zhes bya ba phyag rgya
T02D2512-1:227b-0: dang bcas pas @227b bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbang
T02D2512-1:227b-1: phyug 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du bcug la
T02D2512-1:227b-2: / gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:227b-3: lag pa g-yon pa sor mo dbus ma gsum bsgreng la /
T02D2512-1:227b-4: bden bral gyi phyogs su dpung pa gyen du brkyang nas /
T02D2512-1:227b-5: g-yas pas lag mthil du sor mo gsum bsdus la mthe bo dang mthe chung brkyang nas /
T02D2512-1:227b-6: kha tv'am ga 'dzin par bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:227b-7: lag pa g-yon pa'i gung mo lcags kyur bya ba
T02D2512-1:227b-8: 'di ni rdo rje dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D2512-1:227b-9: spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:227b-10: 'dis dbang phyug chen po 'khor dang bcas pa bkug la /
T02D2512-1:227b-11: tri zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:227b-12: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal la /
T02D2512-1:227b-17: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcings te /
T02D2512-1:227b-18: rdo rje srung bas bsrung ba thams cad go cha bskon la /
T02D2512-1:227b-19: tri zhes bya bas mchod yon phul te /
T02D2512-1:227b-20: mdud rtse gsum pa'i mig gis tri dram shya zhes
T02D2512-1:227b-21: bya bas 'khor dang bcas pa blta bar byas la
T02D2512-1:227b-22: / dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa
T02D2512-1:227b-23: ma ya stvam aa ham tri zhes lan gsum brjod
T02D2512-1:227b-25: de nas lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang /
T02D2512-1:227b-26: mthe chung lcags sgrog ltar mdud rtse gsum pas mtshan pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:227b-27: snga ma bzhin du lce la rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2512-1:227b-28: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lce la tri zhes bya ba bsam par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:227b-30: snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2512-1:227b-31: rdo rje dbang phyug la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ji ltar bris pa dang /
T02D2512-1:227b-32: rjes su mthun par tri zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:227b-33: gar byed pa'i tshul gyis bcing ba 'di ni de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:227b-34: rang gi snying gar h'um las rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:227b-35: tri zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:227b-36: ji ltar bris pa dang rjes su mthun par rdo
T02D2512-1:227b-37: rje dbang phyug la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po
T02D2512-1:227b-38: bcing bar bya'o // de nas rdo rje rin chen
T02D2512-1:227b-39: gyi bsdu ba'i phyag rgyas rdo rje dbang phyug 'khor
T02D2512-1:227b-40: dang bcas pa dbang bskur pa la /
T02D2512-1:227b-41: tri zhes bya bas rdo rje dbang phyug 'khor dang
T02D2512-1:227b-42: bcas pa la mchod yon phul nas mchod pa rnam
T02D2512-1:228a-0: pa lnga dang / phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par mchod @228a * //
T02D2512-1:228a-2: slob ma gzhug par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2512-1:228a-3: rjes su gnang ba mnos nas slob ma gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:228a-4: de nas slob ma rnams la cho ga thams cad bya'o //
T02D2512-1:228a-5: zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes
T02D2512-1:228a-6: bya ba la zhi ba ni dbang phyug chen po'o
T02D2512-1:228a-7: // de'i mdung ni mdud rtse gsum pa'o//
T02D2512-1:228a-8: de'i mtshan pa ni des dkyil 'khor gang la mtshan
T02D2512-1:228a-9: par byas pa de ni zhi ba'i mdung gis mtshan
T02D2512-1:228a-11: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs la phyag bya ba
T02D2512-1:228a-12: na de la dad pa nyid kyis bya'i 'jig rten
T02D2512-1:228a-13: las 'das pa'i lha rnams la lhag par mos pa
T02D2512-1:228a-14: rnams kyis ni ma yin te /
T02D2512-1:228a-15: de rnams kyis ni 'jug pa dang /
T02D2512-1:228a-17: sngags bzung ba rnams phyag mi bya bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:228a-18: dpal mchog dang po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2512-1:228a-19: phyin pa'i dum bu las gsungs pa'i zhi ba mdung
T02D2512-1:228a-20: gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so
T02D2512-1:228a-22: / // / de ltar zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas /
T02D2512-1:228a-23: da ni ma mo rnams kyis 'dul ba nyid las brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:228a-24: ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:228a-25: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2512-1:228a-26: 'dir dang po sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni zhi
T02D2512-1:228a-27: ba mdung gis mtshan pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por gsungs
T02D2512-1:228a-28: pa nyid do // thams cad dgug pa dang zhes
T02D2512-1:228a-29: bya ba la snying po la sogs pas thams cad
T02D2512-1:228a-31: gzhug pa dang zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor la
T02D2512-1:228a-32: sogs par sems can thams cad la sogs pa gzhug
T02D2512-1:228a-33: pa'o // sems can thams cad bsad pa sems med par bya ba dang shin tu bsad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:228a-34: sgrub pa ni phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2512-1:228a-35: dam tshig ni thams cad dgug pa dang /
T02D2512-1:228a-38: sgrub pa de rnams kyi rgyu ste /
T02D2512-1:228a-39: gang la ming de skad ces bya ba'i snying po ni nges pa'i ye shes te ;
T02D2512-1:228a-40: de bsgom pa dang de ston par byed pa'i sga
T02D2512-1:228a-41: yang nye bar gdags pas de skad ces bya ba'o
T02D2512-1:228a-42: // de smras pa ni bshad par gyur pa ste /
T02D2512-1:228a-44: bshad pa 'di dag gi ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa smras pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:228a-45: de nas 'dus pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:228b-0: gsum pa yin par shes @228b bar bya'o /
T02D2512-1:228b-2: // / da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob
T02D2512-1:228b-3: pa rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa bya'o zhes
T02D2512-1:228b-4: bya ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:228b-5: de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste zhes bya
T02D2512-1:228b-6: ba la sogs pa smos pa ni slob dpon gyi
T02D2512-1:228b-7: las kyi cho ga gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:228b-8: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2512-1:228b-9: sngon du brten pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:228b-10: 'di'i zhes bya ba ni snying po 'di'i'o //
T02D2512-1:228b-11: dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-1:228b-12: zur bzhi pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:228b-13: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas de'i rjes thogs nyid
T02D2512-1:228b-14: lam mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i slob dpon chos spyod
T02D2512-1:228b-15: pa gtsang ba zhes bya ba ni dge ba bcu'i
T02D2512-1:228b-16: las kyi lam gyi chus mi dge ba bcu'i las
T02D2512-1:228b-17: kyi lam bkrus pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2512-1:228b-18: phyi'i chu'i khrus kyis phyi'i dri ma dang bral ba ni tshes spyod pa dang gtsang ba'o //
T02D2512-1:228b-19: gos gtsang ma bgos pa zhes bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-1:228b-20: thams cad za ba 'am zhes bya ba ni nges
T02D2512-1:228b-21: pa ma bzung zhing phyi'i gtsang spra'i spyod pa dang
T02D2512-1:228b-22: bral ba / tshol ba'i rgyud la mngon par dga' bas /
T02D2512-1:228b-27: reg bya rnams la nye bar spyod pa'o //
T02D2512-1:228b-28: thams cad spyad pa la yang smad pa med de zhes bya ba ni ma mo rnams bsgrub pa'o //
T02D2512-1:228b-29: zhi ba'i pho nya'i phyag rgyas zhugs la zhes bya ba ni mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol la /
T02D2512-1:228b-30: lag pa gnyis brkyang ste sa la bzhag nas /
T02D2512-1:228b-31: 'phags pa'i tshul gyis tsog pur 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:228b-32: ce spyang gi sgra 'don par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:228b-33: zhugs la zhes bya ba ni zhi ba'i pho nya'i phyag rgya 'dis ma mo thams cad dang /
T02D2512-1:228b-34: mkha' 'gro'i tshogs thams cad der 'dus par gyur pa'o //
T02D2512-1:228b-35: snying po bzlas par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bhyo zhes bya bar bzlas pa'o //
T02D2512-1:228b-36: de nas bhyo zhes pa bzlas pa tsam gyis dkyil
T02D2512-1:228b-37: 'khor gyi dbus nas bhyo chen po thos par 'gyur
T02D2512-1:228b-38: ro // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:228b-39: gdug pa'i dam tshig ni ma gtogs so zhes bya
T02D2512-1:228b-40: ba ni gang gdon gyis zin pa de ni gdug
T02D2512-1:228b-41: pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya gzhug ste /
T02D2512-1:228b-42: gdug pa'i dam tshig de ma gtogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:228b-43: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D2512-1:228b-44: ltar slob dpon gyi rang gi cho ga rnams rjes
T02D2512-1:228b-45: su spyad la / de'i rjes thogs nyid la slob
T02D2512-1:228b-46: ma rnams nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-1:229a-1: pa mdun du dpung pa bkug la /
T02D2512-1:229a-2: kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'i khu tshur dang /
T02D2512-1:229a-3: g-yas pa'i dpung pa brkyang nas /
T02D2512-1:229a-4: ba dan gsum par byas la /
T02D2512-1:229a-6: srin lag gi thod ba 'dzin pa lta bu chu 'thung ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2512-1:229a-7: nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin la /
T02D2512-1:229a-8: 'dis slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:229a-9: zhugs nas de rnams la slob dpon gyis rna bar
T02D2512-1:229a-10: bhyo zhes bya ba sgra chen pos sbyar bar bya
T02D2512-1:229a-12: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:229a-13: bdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas mchod nas zhes
T02D2512-1:229a-14: bya ba ni rdo rje bdug ba la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:229a-15: phyag rgya rnams kyis phyi'i bdug pa la sogs pa
T02D2512-1:229a-16: blangs nas / bhyo zhes bya ba nyid kyis dkyil 'khor pa thams cad mchod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:229a-17: de nas bhyo zhes bya bas aa ra li zhes
T02D2512-1:229a-18: bya ba'i phyi rol pa'i snying po slob ma rnams
T02D2512-1:229a-20: nag po chen po la sogs pa'i mtshan ma kha
T02D2512-1:229a-21: tv'am ga la sogs pa de rnams sbyin par bya'o
T02D2512-1:229a-22: // de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:229a-23: de ltar rang gi mtshan ma rnams byin nas sems can thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:229a-24: sems can du mal gnod pa byed pa'i gdug pa dang /
T02D2512-1:229a-25: dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa de rnams khyod kyis rgyas gdab par bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:229a-27: gang dkyil 'khor la smod par byed pa de yang khyod kyis bza' bar bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:229a-28: khyod kyis rang gi sngags rnams bstan par mi bya ba ste /
T02D2512-1:229a-29: dam tshig gsum po de dag ni khyod la rnal
T02D2512-1:229a-30: 'byor gyi dngos grub ster bar byed pa yin no
T02D2512-1:229a-31: zhes slob ma la slob dpon gyi dam tshig bstan
T02D2512-1:229a-32: par bya'o // drag po'i dam tshig mdud rtse ste //
T02D2512-1:229a-33: zhes bya ba ni mdud rtse gsum pa'o //
T02D2512-1:229a-34: ma mo rnams kyis rgyas 'debs pa //
T02D2512-1:229a-35: zhes bya ba ni gang ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyis rgyas 'debs ba'i las dang /
T02D2512-1:229a-36: de'i snying po khyed kyis nam yang mi smra ba'o //
T02D2512-1:229a-37: gal te 'das na khyed kyi snying //
T02D2512-1:229a-39: zhes bya ba ni drag po'i rtse gsum gyis khyed kyi snying gzhig par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:229a-40: ma mo rnams kyis gang rgyas 'debs pa'i las des
T02D2512-1:229a-41: khyod kyi snying rtag tu rgyas 'debs par 'gyur ro
T02D2512-1:229a-42: // gal te zhes bya ba ni gal te khyod 'das na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:229a-43: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D2512-1:229a-44: nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya
T02D2512-1:229b-0: @229b thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-1: bslabs nas slob dpon gyi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pa bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:229b-2: me tog la sogs pas dkyil 'khor mchod la /
T02D2512-1:229b-3: dkyil 'khor du gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-4: de nas dkyil 'khor du bstabs pa'i bza' ba dang /
T02D2512-1:229b-6: btung ba thams cad kyis slob ma rnams tshim par byas la /
T02D2512-1:229b-7: dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar bsdus te phyir 'byung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-8: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba la phyag
T02D2512-1:229b-9: rgya ni rdo rje dbang phyug la sogs pa'i gzugs
T02D2512-1:229b-11: dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ni dngos grub
T02D2512-1:229b-12: rnams rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyu la dam tshig ces
T02D2512-1:229b-13: bya ste / ming de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-15: ma mo'i dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i nag po chen po'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:229b-16: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:229b-17: ji srid du mtshan ma dang rjes su gnad ba
T02D2512-1:229b-18: thob par gyur ba de srid kyi bar du ma
T02D2512-1:229b-20: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ma mo'i
T02D2512-1:229b-21: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms
T02D2512-1:229b-22: la / bar snang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bzhag nas /
T02D2512-1:229b-23: nyi ma 'char kar zur bzhi pa sgo byang du bltas par thig btab la /
T02D2512-1:229b-24: de bri bar bya ba ni dmar po la sogs pa tshon sna lnga 'am /
T02D2512-1:229b-27: de'i dbus su nag po chen po gar byed bzhin du gnas pa bri bar bya ste /
T02D2512-1:229b-28: lag pa bcu la kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D2512-1:229b-29: padma thogs ba ci dga' ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-30: de'i byang phyogs kyi logs su drag po lag na rtse gsum thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-31: shar du tshangs pa mo lag na bgrang phreng thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-32: lhor khyab 'jug ma lag na 'khor lo thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-33: nub tu gzhon nu ma lag na dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-34: byang shar mtshams su nag mo lag na gri thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-35: shar lhor nag mo chen po lag na chu gri thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-36: lho nub tu zab mo lag na mche ba thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-37: nub byang mtshams su srin mo lag na kha tv'am ga thogs par dri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:229b-38: sgo'i dbus su g-yas kyi cha la zhi ba mo dang /
T02D2512-1:229b-40: g-yon gyi cha la gtum mo dang /
T02D2512-1:229b-41: 'jigs byed ma rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230a-0: @230a * // 'di rnams ni rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du thod pa dang /
T02D2512-1:230a-4: byi la'i mtshan ma thogs par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230a-5: de ltar nag po chen po'i sbyor bas dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:230a-6: bris la nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-1:230a-7: rgyas yongs su bzung pa'i kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D2512-1:230a-8: me tog gi yal ga las bum pa thams cad dang /
T02D2512-1:230a-9: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:230a-10: padma'i snod rnams la bhyo zhes bya ba re re
T02D2512-1:230a-11: zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas dkyil 'khor
T02D2512-1:230a-12: gyi sgo rnams ji lta ba bzhin du phyi la
T02D2512-1:230a-13: / nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa la
T02D2512-1:230a-14: bhyo zhes bya bas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas mchod
T02D2512-1:230a-15: / yon byin zhing / bum pa dang /
T02D2512-1:230a-16: bum ba gang ba rnams kyang bstabs la /
T02D2512-1:230a-17: yang nag po chen po'i mdun du thod pa dmar po gzhag ste /
T02D2512-1:230a-18: gos dang bla re la sogs pa yang byin la /
T02D2512-1:230a-19: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de /
T02D2512-1:230a-20: rang gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang mchod la /
T02D2512-1:230a-21: phyi rol du gtor ma byin te sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230a-22: de nas ras sngon po la bhyo zhes bya ba bzlas te /
T02D2512-1:230a-23: de dag las gcig gis ni smad g-yogs bya /
T02D2512-1:230a-24: gnyis pas ni stod g-yogs bya /
T02D2512-1:230a-25: yang gcig la bhyo zhes bya ba bzlas pas rang gi gdong g-yogs te /
T02D2512-1:230a-27: de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed la /
T02D2512-1:230a-28: de bzhin du rang gi snying gar rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:230a-29: sga la bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:230a-30: lag na me tog thogs shing zhi ba mo'i pho
T02D2512-1:230a-31: nya'i phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba blangs la
T02D2512-1:230a-32: / badzra badzra bhyo zhes bya bzlos shing dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230a-33: de nas dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02D2512-1:230a-34: g-yas dang g-yon gyi nag po chen po la phyag byas nas /
T02D2512-1:230a-35: de nyid kyi mdun du 'dug la /
T02D2512-1:230a-37: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya m'am /
T02D2512-1:230a-38: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la /
T02D2512-1:230a-39: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230a-40: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje dbye zhing /
T02D2512-1:230a-41: aa zhes bya ba de bzhin du bzlas la bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230a-42: de nas bhyo zhes bya bas me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230b-0: de nas de blangs @230b la de nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230b-1: de nas de nyid kyi gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02D2512-1:230b-2: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:230b-4: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas zhi ba pho nya'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:230b-5: rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o//
T02D2512-1:230b-6: de nas nag po chen po'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:230b-7: de la khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02D2512-1:230b-8: ji srid nag po chen pos mthong ba byin nas
T02D2512-1:230b-9: rang gi dngos grub ster bar gyur ba de srid
T02D2512-1:230b-10: kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230b-11: de nas yang nag po chen po la khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing /
T02D2512-1:230b-12: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas la me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:230b-13: dbang bskur ba rnams blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230b-14: yang nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D2512-1:230b-15: me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2512-1:230b-16: bum pa la sngar bshad pa'i bum pa'i sngags de
T02D2512-1:230b-17: bzhin du yongs su bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:230b-18: bdag nyid de nyid nag po chen por byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:230b-19: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma bris te /
T02D2512-1:230b-20: de'i steng du nag po chen po'i phyag rgya chen pos 'dug nas /
T02D2512-1:230b-21: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid mchod la /
T02D2512-1:230b-23: rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
T02D2512-1:230b-24: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa bhyo zhes zlos shing des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar byas la /
T02D2512-1:230b-25: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230b-26: de nas rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02D2512-1:230b-27: thod pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:230b-28: bhyo zhes bya bas kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D2512-1:230b-29: dril bu dang bcas pa blangs nas /
T02D2512-1:230b-30: bhyo zhes bya ba zlos pa ni na du ming gi dbang bskur ba blang zhing /
T02D2512-1:230b-31: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba yang kha tv'am ga de nyid gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230b-32: 'jig rten thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa ni de kho na nyid do //
T02D2512-1:230b-33: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230b-34: sems can kun la phan phyir dang //
T02D2512-1:230b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni chos so /
T02D2512-1:230b-36: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:230b-37: de la dam tshig ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-1:230b-38: sems can thams cad rgyas btab cing //
T02D2512-1:230b-39: dam tshig sdang rnams bza' bar bya //
T02D2512-1:230b-40: sngags rnams bstan par mi bya ste //
T02D2512-1:230b-41: dam tshig rnal 'byor khyod grub ster //
T02D2512-1:230b-42: drag po'i dam tshig mdung rtse sta //
T02D2512-1:230b-43: ma mo'i bdag nyid rgyas 'debs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:231a-3: de nas me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid mchod
T02D2512-1:231a-4: de rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang rjes su
T02D2512-1:231a-5: gnang ba dang / dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02D2512-1:231a-6: nag po chen po la phyag byas te /
T02D2512-1:231a-7: bhyo zhes bya ba dang rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bzhi blang ngo //
T02D2512-1:231a-8: de nas bhyo kha zhes zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:231a-9: ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i nag po chen po la gtor ma byin la /
T02D2512-1:231a-10: khrag gi thig pa lan brgyad myang bar bya'o //

T02D2512-1:231a-41: bhyo zhes bya ba lan gsum brjod de bsgrub par
T02D2512-1:231a-42: bya'o // de nas snga ma bzhin du rang gi

T02D2512-1:231b-0: @231b nag po chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya

T02D2512-1:231b-7: bhyo zhes bya bas bcing bar bya'o //

T02D2512-1:231b-10: bhyo zhes bya bas nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon byin te /
T02D2512-1:231b-11: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod nas /

T02D2512-1:231b-16: sgra thos par gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o
T02D2512-1:231b-17: // de nas slob dpon ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad ji ltar 'ongs pa /

T02D2512-1:231b-20: de nas slob ma lag na me tog thogs pa ras kyis mig bkab la /

T02D2512-1:231b-22: dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du gzhug par bya'o
T02D2512-1:231b-24: slob mas lag na me tog thogs la /

T02D2512-1:231b-33: de nas lhung bas khro ba dang bcas par 'gyur
T02D2512-1:231b-34: zhing rang gi lha'i las byed pa'i rnal 'byor yang

T02D2512-1:231b-39: de nas de nyid zlos shing sgo srungs nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:231b-41: nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang bcings te /
T02D2512-1:231b-42: slob ma'i snying gar de bzhin du dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:232a-0: de nas de nag po chen po'i gzugs la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs @232a * //

T02D2512-1:232a-5: 'dir phyugs chen po yon du blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:232a-6: de nas 'di la de ltar gyur cig par bsgo ste /
T02D2512-1:232a-7: rang gi mi la spyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:232a-8: de nas rang gi mi de slob dpon gyis blangs te /
T02D2512-1:232a-9: de bsrung ba'i phyir bag zan gyi gzugs brnyan tshos
T02D2512-1:232a-10: pa dang ma tshos pa'i khrag gis khengs par bya'o
T02D2512-1:232a-11: // de nas de blangs la slob ma dam pa dang /
T02D2512-1:232a-12: nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa de la byin la /
T02D2512-1:232a-13: de la 'di skad ces brjod do /
T02D2512-1:232a-14: bhyo bhyo zhes bya ba gnyis bzlas la de nyid zlos shing byin la /
T02D2512-1:232a-15: slob dpon la sogs pa slob ma'i tshogs thams cad kyis gzugs brnyan de bza' bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:232a-17: sangs rgyas pa'i grub pa'i mtha' la ni srog gcod pa rjes su ma gnang ste /
T02D2512-1:232a-18: du 'bod la sogs pa dmyal ba chen po'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //

T02D2512-1:232a-20: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so

T02D2512-1:232a-22: de na mi'i khrag gi thigs pa gnyis blangs la /
T02D2512-1:232a-23: ha ha zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:232a-24: de lta bus ni slob ma grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:232a-25: de nas snga ma bzhin du dam tshig dang chos kyi de kho na nyid bslab ste /
T02D2512-1:232a-27: sha chen kha na ma tho ba med pa la
T02D2512-1:232a-28: bhyo zhes bzlas nas gang zhig za ba de ring
T02D2512-1:232a-29: por mi thogs par rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D2512-1:232a-30: // yongs su dag pa'i sems can gang mi za
T02D2512-1:232a-31: bde dag kyang bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa dag gis
T02D2512-1:232a-33: mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams las 'jigs pa yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2512-1:232a-34: de nas 'di'i dam tshig byin la /
T02D2512-1:232a-35: phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:232a-36: de la dam tshig ni 'di yin te /
T02D2512-1:232a-37: khyod kyis chos ni yong mi spang //
T02D2512-1:232a-38: dam tshig rnams ni bral mi bya //
T02D2512-1:232a-39: mkha' 'gro mas ni zin pa rnams //
T02D2512-1:232a-40: thar pa ru ni mi bya'o //
T02D2512-1:232a-41: mkha' 'gro rnams ni brnyas mi bya //
T02D2512-1:232a-42: gang phyir ma dang bu mo dang //
T02D2512-1:232a-43: de la chos ni gang zhe na //
T02D2512-1:232a-46: de la dam tshig gang zhe na //
T02D2512-1:232b-0: phyag rgya thams cad shes @232b pa'o //
T02D2512-1:232b-1: de la mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bzung ba gang zhe na /
T02D2512-1:232b-3: de la 'dul ba gang zhe na /
T02D2512-1:232b-4: 'di lta ste tshangs par spyod pa'o //
T02D2512-1:232b-6: mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ye shes 'grub bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:232b-7: nag po chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:232b-8: bhyo zhes bya bas mkha' 'gro ma thams cad gzhig pa dang /
T02D2512-1:232b-11: gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang /
T02D2512-1:232b-13: gsod pa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D2512-1:232b-14: lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo bar ma gsum bteg la /
T02D2512-1:232b-15: bden bral gyi logs su lag pa gyen du brkyang nas /
T02D2512-1:232b-16: g-yas pa de'i steng du bkug la /
T02D2512-1:232b-17: lag pas ba dan gsum pa dang /

T02D2512-1:232b-22: lhag ma rnams las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2512-1:232b-23: bhyo zhes bya ba zlos shing las thams cad bya'o //
T02D2512-1:232b-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu
T02D2512-1:232b-25: las gsungs pa'i dpal mchog dang po'i ma mo'i dkyil
T02D2512-1:232b-28: // / ming po gsum gyis 'dul ba'i skye bo las brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:232b-29: de nas sbrang rtsir byed pa la sogs pa zhes
T02D2512-1:232b-30: bya ba la sogs pas ming po gsum gyi dkyil
T02D2512-1:232b-32: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2512-1:232b-33: dang po'i sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:232b-34: 'dir dang po'i sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ma mo'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa nyid do //
T02D2512-1:232b-35: sbrang rtsir byed la sogs pa la //

T02D2512-1:232b-38: sbrang rtsir byed la sogs pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2512-1:232b-41: don thams cad grub pa ste /
T02D2512-1:232b-43: dbang phyug chen mo gang ston bzangs kyi gzugs 'dzin
T02D2512-1:232b-44: pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal bar byed pa'o
T02D2512-1:232b-45: // khyab 'jug ni dpyid kyi gzugs 'dzin pa gang
T02D2512-1:232b-46: yin pa de ni don thams cad grub pa ste
T02D2512-1:232b-48: tshangs pa 'dod chags gzhan sprul pa //
T02D2512-1:232b-49: zhe sdang drag po'i ting nge 'dzin //
T02D2512-1:232b-50: gti mug khyab 'jug bstan byas pas //
T02D2512-1:233a-2: 'dod chags sbrang rtsi byed par bshad //
T02D2512-1:233a-3: zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par grags //
T02D2512-1:233a-4: gti mug der ni bsgrub pa ste //
T02D2512-1:233a-5: gsang ba'i ming ni thams cad du'o //

T02D2512-1:233a-9: mgrin gcig tu zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:233a-10: de ltar na de nas zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:233a-11: sva zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bshad pas ni /
T02D2512-1:233a-12: ting nge 'dzin gsum gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2512-1:233a-13: de nas 'dus pa nas brtsams te gsungs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:233a-14: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa
T02D2512-1:233a-15: rnams kyis bzlas brjod dang bsgom par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2512-1:233a-16: ba 'di'i don bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:233a-17: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang /

T02D2512-1:233a-21: 'di'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:233a-22: sgro yi mtshams ni thams cad du //
T02D2512-1:233a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni shar phyogs kyi sgo nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:233a-28: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu la grub pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:233a-29: tshogs rnam pa bzhi gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:233a-30: phyi rol na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:233a-34: dril bu'i phreng ba ba dan gyi mchog dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2512-1:233a-35: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:233a-39: phyag rgya kun gyis gzhug par bya //
T02D2512-1:233a-41: rtse gsum pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:233a-43: 'jig rten gsum zhes bya ba ni mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang /
T02D2512-1:233a-46: srid gsum zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i srid pa dang /
T02D2512-1:233a-53: mchod gsum ni spun gsum gyis mchod pa'o //
T02D2512-1:233b-0: @233b gti mug gi mchod pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D2512-1:233b-1: sbas pa ni skyes bu gsum gyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs pas so //
T02D2512-1:233b-2: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de
T02D2512-1:233b-3: ltar bdag gis las rnams byas nas so zhes bya
T02D2512-1:233b-4: ba dang / rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i phyag rgyas g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i lcags kyus dgug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:233b-5: de nas dril bu dang bcas pa'i phreng bas 'di
T02D2512-1:233b-6: skad du bshad pa'i ming po gsum 'ongs pas thams
T02D2512-1:233b-8: thams cad phab nas de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o
T02D2512-1:233b-9: zhes bya ba ni slob ma thams cad la phab

T02D2512-1:233b-11: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:233b-12: gzhan la de nyid bstan mi bya //
T02D2512-1:233b-13: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams ni gzhan dag ste /
T02D2512-1:233b-15: 'jig rten gsum po srid gsum mchog //
T02D2512-1:233b-16: ces bya ba la sogs pa de kho na nyid bshad par mi bya'o ;
T02D2512-1:233b-17: / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:233b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-1:233b-23: dga' ba ni rtse ba ste /
T02D2512-1:233b-30: de dag las byung ba'i mgu ba zhes bya ba yid bde ba'i shugs kyis mel tshe zhes bya'o //

T02D2512-1:233b-34: gar gyi rol mo'i mchod pa ste /
T02D2512-1:233b-36: de ltar phyag rgya gar gyi rol mo'i mchod pa byas la /
T02D2512-1:233b-37: phyag rgya de dang bcas pas zhes bya ba ni
T02D2512-1:233b-38: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2512-1:233b-39: bcings la / badzra mushti bam zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:233b-40: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2512-1:233b-41: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:233b-42: zhes bya ba la chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
T02D2512-1:233b-43: rnam par dag pa ni 'da' bar bya ba ma
T02D2512-1:233b-44: yin pas / dam tshig ces bya ste /
T02D2512-1:233b-45: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D2512-1:233b-46: de las byung zhing de ston pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste /
T02D2512-1:233b-47: phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag
T02D2512-1:233b-48: rgya gtso bor byas pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i
T02D2512-1:234a-2: badzra aanydza li zhes bya bas rdo rje thal mo bcings la /
T02D2512-1:234a-3: de nas badzra bandha zhes bya bas rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:234a-4: badzra bandha trata zhes bya bas rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:234a-5: de nas badzra a'a be sha zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:234a-6: rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2512-1:234a-7: aa zhes bya bas bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:234a-8: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2512-1:234a-9: rang gi snying gar dbab pa'i phyag rgya dkrol la
T02D2512-1:234a-10: / rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa la sva rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:234a-11: chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //

T02D2512-1:234a-13: bcu drug las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur par
T02D2512-1:234a-15: de'i steng du yang sva bsams te /
T02D2512-1:234a-16: ka nas ksha'i bar gyi yi ge rnams skar ma lta bur rnam par bsams la /

T02D2512-1:234a-18: / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i steng du yang sva zhes bya ba bsams la /
T02D2512-1:234a-19: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis po las dang po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsam par bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:234a-20: sva zhes bya ba nyid la yang bzla'o //
T02D2512-1:234a-21: de nas rdo rje me tog dang /
T02D2512-1:234a-23: thod pa dang bcas pa sva zhes bya ba las rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:234a-24: mda'i dbus su sva rnam par bsams te /
T02D2512-1:234a-27: thod pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa la som bom hom zhes bya ba rnam par bsams la /

T02D2512-1:234b-19: ming po gsum gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya nyid bcings nas /

T02D2512-1:235a-0: bar snang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas @235a * //

T02D2512-1:235a-18: shar phyogs kyi sgor grub pa mdog dkar po /
T02D2512-1:235a-20: lag na rtse gsum thogs pa'o //

T02D2512-1:235a-23: nub tu chen po mdog dmar skya /
T02D2512-1:235a-24: lag na me tog gi zam tog thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:235a-25: byang du gnod sbyin nag po /

T02D2512-1:235a-29: lag na dbyig pa thogs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:235a-30: lho nub tu khro ba mdog nag po //
T02D2512-1:235a-32: nub byang du mchog mdog nag po /
T02D2512-1:235a-34: byang shar du gsod pa mdog nag po //
T02D2512-1:235a-35: lag na ral gri 'phyar ba bri bar bya'o //

T02D2512-1:235a-37: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas mdung gi mtshan ma'i
T02D2512-1:235a-38: phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rtse gsum pa dang

T02D2512-1:235a-42: sva zhes bya bas ming po gsum 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon byin la /
T02D2512-1:235a-43: bum pa dang bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:235a-44: bla re la sogs pa byin la /
T02D2512-1:235a-45: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de /
T02D2512-1:235a-46: rang gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis kyang mchod pa dang /
T02D2512-1:235b-0: phyi rol tu glu dang gar la sogs pas kyang mchod @235b la ;

T02D2512-1:235b-2: de nas gos bzang po la sva zhes bya ba bzlas la /
T02D2512-1:235b-3: gcig gis ni smad g-yogs bya //
T02D2512-1:235b-4: gnyis pas ni stod g-yogs bya /
T02D2512-1:235b-5: gsum pas ni rang gi dgong g-yogs la /
T02D2512-1:235b-7: byang chub tu sems bskyed la /

T02D2512-1:235b-11: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung la /
T02D2512-1:235b-12: badzra badzra sva zhes brjod cing /
T02D2512-1:235b-13: glu rnams glu ru len pa dang /
T02D2512-1:235b-14: rol mo rnams brdung bar byed pa dang /

T02D2512-1:235b-18: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhye m'am /

T02D2512-1:235b-24: bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:235b-25: de nas sva zhes bya ba zlos shing /

T02D2512-1:235b-28: / de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02D2512-1:235b-29: de nas de nyid zlos shing /

T02D2512-1:235b-32: de nas rtse gsum pas mtshan pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /

T02D2512-1:235b-39: yang de la de bzhin du bltas te /
T02D2512-1:235b-42: me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D2512-1:235b-43: dbang bskur ba rnams blangs bar bya'o //

T02D2512-1:235b-46: bum pa la sngar bshad pa'i sngags de bzhin du
T02D2512-1:236a-1: ; de nas bdag nyid ming po gsum du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:236a-2: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma bris te /
T02D2512-1:236a-3: de'i steng du sva zhes bya ba nyid kyis seng ge'i gang na bzhag la /
T02D2512-1:236a-4: der ming po gsum gyi phyag rgya chen pos 'dug ste /
T02D2512-1:236a-5: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid mchod la /

T02D2512-1:236a-9: des bdag nyid dbang bskur nas chu de btung bar yang bya'o //

T02D2512-1:236a-11: dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /

T02D2512-1:236a-36: rdo rje srung bas srung ba thams cad go cha bskon te /

T02D2512-1:236b-2: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma
T02D2512-1:236b-3: ya stvam aa ham sva zhes lan gsum brjod la

T02D2512-1:236b-6: zhes bya ba rnam par bsam pa 'di ni de
T02D2512-1:236b-7: rnams kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:236b-8: aa zhes bya bas rang gi snying gar sna tshogs padma dang /
T02D2512-1:236b-9: sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsams la /

T02D2512-1:236b-14: rjes su mthun pa ming po gsum la sogs pa'i
T02D2512-1:236b-15: phyag rgya chen po sva zhes bya bas bcing bar

T02D2512-1:236b-17: rgyas ming po gsum la sogs pa la dbang bskur
T02D2512-1:236b-18: bya'o // la / sva zhes bya bas ming po

T02D2512-1:236b-20: bya'o // la / / mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod cing //

T02D2512-1:236b-22: slob ma rnams gzhug pa'i rjes su gnang ba mnos te /
T02D2512-1:236b-23: de rnams bdag nyid 'jug pa'i tshul du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:236b-24: de nas thams cad byas la dam tshig sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2512-1:236b-25: gal te dam tshig 'das gyur na //

T02D2512-1:236b-27: ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba gang //
T02D2512-1:236b-29: rtag tu dam pa brten par bya //
T02D2512-1:236b-30: dam pa min pa yongs su sbang //
T02D2512-1:236b-31: gzhan la de nyid bstan mi bya //
T02D2512-1:236b-32: rtag tu ming po gsum po bsgrub //

T02D2512-1:236b-35: dpal mchog dang po las ming po gsum gyi rtog pa'i rgyal po'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2512-1:236b-37: // / de ltar ming po gsum gyi rtog pa des

T02D2512-1:236b-40: sring mo bzhi'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:236b-41: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

T02D2512-1:236b-43: po gsum gyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa nyid gzung
T02D2512-1:237a-0: bar bya'o // da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa @237a * //

T02D2512-1:237a-4: sring mo bzhis zhes bya ba nas ham zhes bya

T02D2512-1:237a-13: slob ma zhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs pa yin no //

T02D2512-1:237a-15: las kyi mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs nyid la'o //
T02D2512-1:237a-16: 'di zhes bya ba ni ham gi'o //
T02D2512-1:237a-17: zlum bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:237a-18: kun nas zlum po'i dkyil 'khor phur bu la btags
T02D2512-1:237a-19: pa'i srad bu dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te
T02D2512-1:237a-21: de nas h'um zhes phur bu phyung la /
T02D2512-1:237a-22: phur bu'i khung bu tshon sna lngas yongs su bkang la mnyam por bya'o //
T02D2512-1:237a-23: de nas mtshams kyi srad bu gnyis kyis dkyil 'khor de dum bu bzhi par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:237a-24: de nas sgo bzhi po der shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la /
T02D2512-1:237a-25: dga' ba mo shar du blta ba bri bar bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:237a-27: gzhu thogs pa la brtson pa /
T02D2512-1:237a-35: phag mo nub tu blta ba /
T02D2512-1:237a-36: lag na gser gyi gter thogs pa /
T02D2512-1:237a-39: grub pa mo byang du blta ba /
T02D2512-1:237a-40: lag na sha ka ra dang /
T02D2512-1:237a-42: mdog dkar mo bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:237a-43: phyi rol gyi zhes bya ba la /
T02D2512-1:237a-44: sgo bzhi'i dbus su dga' ba mo la sogs pas
T02D2512-1:237a-45: mtshan pa'i yan lag ji lta ba bzhin du shar
T02D2512-1:237a-46: phyogs kyi sgo nas brtsams te bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:237a-47: de nas slob dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2512-1:237a-49: lag pa g-yas pas dril bu bzung ste /
T02D2512-1:237b-0: @237b g-yon pas kha tv'am ga bzung nas h'um zlos shing 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:237b-2: gar gyi mchod pa bstab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya bzhis gar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:237b-3: de nas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad ces bya ba ni go bar zad do //
T02D2512-1:237b-4: las kyi dkyil 'khor ro zhes bya ba la rim pa gtso bor bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:237b-5: brtson 'grus kyi las kyi gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni las kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2512-1:237b-7: ming po gsum gyi skabs su bshad pa'i cho gas dga' ba mo'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:237b-8: ting nge 'dzin sgom pa sngon du 'gro bas sring
T02D2512-1:237b-9: mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor 'di ji srid du mngon sum
T02D2512-1:237b-10: du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du
T02D2512-1:237b-11: bsgom par bya'o // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms la /
T02D2512-1:237b-12: bar snang gi phyogs su dkyil 'khor sring mo bzhi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas btab nas /
T02D2512-1:237b-13: ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag la ;
T02D2512-1:237b-14: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad de /
T02D2512-1:237b-15: yang nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor de
T02D2512-1:237b-16: bzhin du bar snang la bzhag nas thig gdab par
T02D2512-1:237b-17: bya'o // de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i lha mo bzhi'i nga rgyal gyis bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:237b-18: yang shar phyogs kyi sgor mda' dang gzhu gnyis bri bar bya'o ;
T02D2512-1:237b-19: / lho phyogs su phub dang bcas pa'i ral gri'o //
T02D2512-1:237b-20: nub tu gter gyi bum pa'o //
T02D2512-1:237b-21: byang gi sgor gri rings dang bcas pa'i thod pa ham zhes bya ba nyid kyis bri bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:237b-22: de nas sring mo bzhi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02D2512-1:237b-23: me tog gi yal ga las bum pa thams cad dang /
T02D2512-1:237b-24: bum pa gang ba rnams la re re zhing ho zhes brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2512-1:237b-25: rdo rje bsdams pa byas la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang /
T02D2512-1:237b-27: g-yas pa'i srin lag gi rtse mo dang /
T02D2512-1:237b-28: g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi rtse mo sbyar nas bzhag
T02D2512-1:237b-29: pa 'di ni sring mo bzhi'i dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2512-1:237b-30: rgya'o // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams ji lta ba bzhin du phye la /
T02D2512-1:237b-31: ham zhes bya bas sring mo bzhi la mchod yon byin te /
T02D2512-1:237b-33: bum pa gang ba rnams dang /
T02D2512-1:237b-34: bla re la sogs pa yang byin la /
T02D2512-1:237b-35: mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod de rang gi las
T02D2512-1:237b-36: kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis de yang dag par mchod
T02D2512-1:238a-1: rol du glu dang gar la sogs pas kyang mchod pa byed du bcug ste /
T02D2512-1:238a-2: phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238a-3: de nas sbyin sreg byas la gos bzang po la ham zhes bya ba bzlas te /
T02D2512-1:238a-4: de las gcig gis ni smad g-yogs bya /
T02D2512-1:238a-5: gnyis pas ni stod g-yogs bya /
T02D2512-1:238a-6: gsum pas rang gi gdong g-yogs byas la /
T02D2512-1:238a-8: byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
T02D2512-1:238a-9: snga ma bzhin du rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2512-1:238a-10: shar phyogs kyi sgor bltas nas phyi rol na gnas
T02D2512-1:238a-11: pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la dbang bskur te
T02D2512-1:238a-12: / lag pa g-yas pas dril bu dkrol la /
T02D2512-1:238a-13: lag pa g-yon pas khatv'am ga bzung ste /
T02D2512-1:238a-14: badzra badzra zhes bzlas shing dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238a-16: dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum byas te /
T02D2512-1:238a-17: mdun du 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238a-18: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhya m'am /
T02D2512-1:238a-19: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la ;
T02D2512-1:238a-20: aa zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238a-21: yang g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma rdo rje phye la /
T02D2512-1:238a-22: aa zhes bya ba de bzhin du zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238a-23: de nas me tog ham zhes bya bas dor bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238a-25: de nyid kyis rang gi mgo bo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238a-26: de nas de nyid kyis gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02D2512-1:238a-27: de nas de nyid zlos shing shar phyogs kyi cha nas brtsams te /
T02D2512-1:238a-29: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:238a-30: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar dgrol lo //
T02D2512-1:238a-31: de nas dga' ba mo'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
T02D2512-1:238a-32: rdo rje'i lta bas de la blta zhing ji srid du rang gi gzugs bstan nas /
T02D2512-1:238a-33: rang gi dngos grub ster bar gyur pa de srid
T02D2512-1:238a-34: kyi bar du ham zhes bya ba bzlas brjod bya'o
T02D2512-1:238a-35: // yang de la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te /
T02D2512-1:238a-36: rdo rje thal mo bskor bas phyag byas la /
T02D2512-1:238a-37: me tog la sogs pas dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238a-38: de la dang po kho nar sring mo bzhi'i dam
T02D2512-1:238a-39: tshig gi phyag rgyas yongs su bzung ba'i rdo rje
T02D2512-1:238a-40: dang me tog gi yal ga las rnam par rgyal
T02D2512-1:238a-42: aom ma h'a su kha badzra aa mo gha zhes
T02D2512-1:238b-0: bya ba la sogs pa snga ma @238b bzhin du
T02D2512-1:238b-1: bzlas la / bdag nyid ming po gsum gyi gzugs su byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2512-1:238b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sna tshogs padma bris la /
T02D2512-1:238b-3: de'i dbus su ming po gsum gyi phyag rgya chen pos 'dug ste /
T02D2512-1:238b-4: me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D2512-1:238b-5: mchod yon blangs la rdo rje khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa las chu blangs te /
T02D2512-1:238b-6: aom badzra aa bhi shnytsi ham zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:238b-7: des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing /
T02D2512-1:238b-8: chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238b-9: de nas rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02D2512-1:238b-10: dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas rin po che'i cod pan dang /
T02D2512-1:238b-11: dar dbyangs kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:238b-12: ham zhes bya bas dril bu dang bcas pa'i khatv'am ga blangs nas /
T02D2512-1:238b-13: ham zhes bya ba nyid zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:238b-14: ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2512-1:238b-15: bdag po'i dbang bskur ba blangs la /
T02D2512-1:238b-16: bdag nyid la me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D2512-1:238b-17: lha mo bzhi'i las kyi phyag rgyas kyang mchod nas /
T02D2512-1:238b-18: rjes su gnang ba dang dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238b-19: de nas lha mo bzhi la phyag byas te /
T02D2512-1:238b-21: phyag rgya bzhi yang bzung nas /
T02D2512-1:238b-22: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2512-1:238b-23: rang gi ming nas brjod pa dag kyang bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238b-24: de nas dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238b-25: de nas bsdu ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:238b-26: ham zhes bya ba zlos shing /
T02D2512-1:238b-27: gsang ba'i lcags kyus sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238b-28: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bsal bar byas la /
T02D2512-1:238b-33: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcings nas /
T02D2512-1:238b-34: rdo rje srung bas bsrungs ba thams cad go cha bskon te /
T02D2512-1:238b-35: sring mo bzhi la ham zhes bya bas mchod yon byin nas /
T02D2512-1:238b-36: sring mo bzhi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ham dri shya zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:238b-37: sring mo bzhi la blta ba byas la /
T02D2512-1:238b-41: aa ham zhes lan gsum brjod de bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:238b-42: snga ma bzhin du rang gi lce la rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2512-1:238b-43: de rnams kyi lce la yang ham zhes bya ba bsam pa 'di ni 'dir chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:238b-44: 'dir snying gar aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams
T02D2512-1:238b-45: la gar gyi sbyor bas ham zhes zlos shing sring
T02D2512-1:239a-2: 'di ni de rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2512-1:239a-3: h'um las rang gi snying gar rdo rje rnam par bsams la /
T02D2512-1:239a-4: ham zhes bya ba zlos shing de rnams ji ltar
T02D2512-1:239a-5: bris pa dang rjes su mthun par phyag rgya chen
T02D2512-1:239a-7: de nas de rnams la rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas dbang bskur la /
T02D2512-1:239a-8: ham gis mchod yon byin te /
T02D2512-1:239a-9: mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2512-1:239a-10: las kyi phyag rgya rnam pa bzhis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2512-1:239a-11: phyag byas nas slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir gnang ba mnos la /
T02D2512-1:239a-12: bdag nyid 'jug pa'i sbyor bas gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2512-1:239a-13: de nas rang gi cho ga thams cad de rnams la rjes su spyad par bya'o ;
T02D2512-1:239a-14: / dpal mchog dang po'i dum bu dang po las
T02D2512-1:239a-15: sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa rdzogs so
T02D2512-1:239a-17: / // / rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad
T02D2512-1:239a-18: pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang ras kyi
T02D2512-1:239a-19: ri mo gnyis la bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni dkyil
T02D2512-1:239a-20: 'khor thams cad la yang so sor shes par bya'o
T02D2512-1:239a-21: // phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa'o
T02D2512-1:239a-22: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems chen po
T02D2512-1:239a-23: // dang / mi bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rdo rje'o //
T02D2512-1:239a-24: de las byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2512-1:239a-25: rang bzhin ni bla na med pa'i rdo rje'i rigs
T02D2512-1:239a-26: so // mos pa spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid byang
T02D2512-1:239a-27: chub kyi sems zag pa dang bcas pa la sogs
T02D2512-1:239a-28: pa las skyes pa gang yin pa rdo rje dbang
T02D2512-1:239a-29: phyug la sogs pa nas sring mo bzhi'i bar gyi
T02D2512-1:239a-30: dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin ni phyi rol gyi rdo
T02D2512-1:239a-31: so // rje'i rigs te / de'i rtog pa ni ji skad bshad pa'o /
T02D2512-1:239a-33: // / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu las /
T02D2512-1:239a-34: dkyil 'khor bco lnga'i rtog pa gsungs nas /
T02D2512-1:239a-35: da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams
T02D2512-1:239a-36: bris nas slob dpon gyis ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2512-1:239a-38: sprul ba rnams rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02D2512-1:239a-39: rang gi rtog pa las gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bzhi brjod nas /
T02D2512-1:239a-40: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi 'don cing /
T02D2512-1:239a-41: de'i don la lhag par mos pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2512-1:239a-42: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par lhag par
T02D2512-1:239a-43: mos pas bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs su
T02D2512-1:239a-44: gnas pa la legs so zhes bya bas dga' bar
T02D2512-1:239b-0: byas nas / bdag nyid @239b bsrung ba byas te
T02D2512-1:239b-1: ldang bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don bstan par
T02D2512-1:239b-2: byas nas / bya ba'i phyir / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin la /
T02D2512-1:239b-3: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag stan par byed pa'i tshig ste /
T02D2512-1:239b-4: ji skad du gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor bris nas /
T02D2512-1:239b-5: ji lta ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol bar bya ba dang /
T02D2512-1:239b-6: rang gi lus la bcug pa byas nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to /
T02D2512-1:239b-7: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2512-1:239b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:239b-9: mtha' yas mu med pas mthar thug cing zhes bya
T02D2512-1:239b-10: ba la de la mtha' yas ba ni chos kyi
T02D2512-1:239b-11: dbyings dang / nam mkha'i dbyings so //
T02D2512-1:239b-12: de nyid ni mu med pa ste /
T02D2512-1:239b-13: mtha' yas pa yang yin pas na mtha' yas mu med pa'o //
T02D2512-1:239b-14: mtha' yas pa dang mu med pa de nyid ni mthar thug pa ste /
T02D2512-1:239b-15: rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas mu med pas mthar thug pa'o //
T02D2512-1:239b-16: de'i chos gang yin zhe na mu med pa'i mthar
T02D2512-1:239b-17: thug pa'i chos nyid dang ldan pas zhes bya ba
T02D2512-1:239b-18: gsungs te / mu med pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang /
T02D2512-1:239b-20: de'i mthar thug pa ni chos kyi dbyings dang /
T02D2512-1:239b-21: nam mkha'i dbyings khyab pa'i chos nyid 'di mnga' bas
T02D2512-1:239b-22: na mu med cing mthar thug pa'i chos dang ldan
T02D2512-1:239b-25: sprul pa'i sku dag gis 'gro ba sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:239b-26: thams cad du song ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2512-1:239b-27: yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02D2512-1:239b-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar te /
T02D2512-1:239b-29: yang zhes bya ba ni bshad zin te /
T02D2512-1:239b-31: 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2512-1:239b-32: cho ga 'di zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rtog pa bco lnga ste /
T02D2512-1:239b-33: mthar thug pa ni yongs su rdzogs par 'di dag gis bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:239b-34: de'i byin gyis brlab pa ni slob dpon gcig gis
T02D2512-1:239b-35: phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med pa'i bar du gdul
T02D2512-1:239b-36: bya rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par
T02D2512-1:239b-38: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na /
T02D2512-1:240a-2: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid de /
T02D2512-1:240a-3: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i tshul gyis kyang phyi ma'i
T02D2512-1:240a-4: mthar thug pa'i bar du mi phyed pa'i 'gro ba'i
T02D2512-1:240a-6: de'i mthar thug ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
T02D2512-1:240a-7: dpag tu yod cing yongs su chad ba'i gzhung gis yang dag par bsdus nas /
T02D2512-1:240a-8: yang dag par bsres te bshad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:240a-9: de'i byin gyis brlab pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i
T02D2512-1:240a-10: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gang
T02D2512-1:240a-11: gis bstan par byas par gyur pa de ni chos
T02D2512-1:240a-12: thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas
T02D2512-1:240a-13: byin gyis brlab pa rdo rje ste /
T02D2512-1:240a-14: ming de skad ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ston par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2512-1:240a-15: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la bzhag nas smras pa'o //
T02D2512-1:240a-16: bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o //
T02D2512-1:240a-17: de nyid gang zhes na shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D2512-1:240a-18: tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas zhes bya
T02D2512-1:240a-19: ba la 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2512-1:240a-20: pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad bdag med
T02D2512-1:240a-22: byang chub kyi sems chen po'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D2512-1:240a-23: de yang thams cad du song ba yin te /
T02D2512-1:240a-24: de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa yin la /
T02D2512-1:240a-25: de'i dngos po nyid ni mtha' yas pa nyid de /
T02D2512-1:240a-26: des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid du gyur pa yin te /
T02D2512-1:240a-27: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2512-1:240a-28: rigs thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2512-1:240a-29: yin la / de rnams kyi mtha' yas pa nyid
T02D2512-1:240a-30: ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad du rtag tu zhugs
T02D2512-1:240a-31: pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid do
T02D2512-1:240a-32: yin la / // chos bdag med pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D2512-1:240a-33: ye shes las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2512-1:240a-34: cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams kyi gdul
T02D2512-1:240a-35: bya'i dbang gi phyir phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med
T02D2512-1:240a-36: pa'i nam mkha' khyab par mdzad ces bya ba'i don
T02D2512-1:240a-37: to // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2512-1:240a-38: ni 'dir nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes dang
T02D2512-1:240a-39: to // / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D2512-1:240a-40: de'i mu med pa nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2512-1:240a-41: des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid du 'gyur te /
T02D2512-1:240b-0: @240b thams cad kyang yin pas na rdo rje thams cad de /
T02D2512-1:240b-1: rin po che'i rigs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2512-1:240b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //

T02D2512-1:241a-0: shes rab kyi mthar thug pa'i @241a * //

T02D2512-1:241a-11: sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
